package customer.controller;

import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.validation.Errors;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import customer.biz.CustomerBIZ;
import customer.vo.CustomerVO;

@Controller("CustomerController")
public class CustomerServlet {

	@Autowired
	CustomerBIZ customer_biz;

	@RequestMapping("/selectAll.do")
	public String selectAllAdmin(Model m) {
		List<CustomerVO> all = customer_biz.getAll();
		m.addAttribute("all", all);	
		return "WEB-INF/view/admin/cus_control.jsp";
	}

	@RequestMapping("/delete.do")
	public String deleteAdmin(@RequestParam("del_name") String name) {
		int res = customer_biz.getDelete(name);
		if (res > 0)
			return "/selectAll.do";
		return "";
	}
	

	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/join.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public ModelAndView customerJoin() {
		CustomerVO VO = new CustomerVO();
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/customer/join.jsp","customer",VO);
		return mav;
		
	}	

	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/join.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public ModelAndView MyInsert(@ModelAttribute("customer") CustomerVO customer,Errors result) {
		int r = 0;
		/*customer_biz.validate(customer, result);
		if(result.hasErrors()) {  	
			return new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/customer/join.jsp");
		}*/
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
		System.out.println(customer);
		r = customer_biz.getInsert(customer);
		
		if(r ==  0) {
			mav.addObject("msg", "?ò¨Î∞îÎ•∏ Í∞íÏùÑ ?ûÖ?†•?ïò?ã≠?ãú?ò§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "join.do");
			return mav;
		}
		mav.addObject("msg", "Í∞??ûÖ?ù¥ ?ôÑÎ£åÎêò?óà?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
		mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/index.jsp");
		return mav;

	}
	
	
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/find.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public ModelAndView customerFind() {
		CustomerVO VO = new CustomerVO();
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/customer/FindID.jsp","customer",VO);
		return mav;
		
	}
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/find.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public ModelAndView customerFindID(@ModelAttribute("customer") CustomerVO customer) {
		String ID = null;
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
		System.out.println(customer);
		ID = customer_biz.getCustomerID(customer);
		if(ID == null) {
			mav.addObject("msg", "?ï¥?ãπ?ïò?äî IDÍ∞? Ï°¥Ïû¨?ïòÏß? ?ïä?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/customer/find.do");			
		}else {
			mav.addObject("msg", "?ãπ?ã†?ùò ID?äî " + ID + " ?ûÖ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/index.jsp");
		}
		
		return mav;

	}
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/findPW.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public ModelAndView customerFindPw() {
		CustomerVO VO = new CustomerVO();
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/customer/FindPW.jsp","customer",VO);
		return mav;
		
	}
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/findPW.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public ModelAndView customerFindPW(@ModelAttribute("customer") CustomerVO customer,HttpSession session) {
		CustomerVO vo = null;
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
		System.out.println(customer);
		vo = customer_biz.getCustomerPW(customer);
		if(vo == null) {
			mav.addObject("msg", "?ãµÎ≥??ù¥ ?ùºÏπòÌïòÏß? ?ïä?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/customer/findPW.do");			
		}else {
			session.setAttribute("find_ID", vo.getC_id());
			mav = new ModelAndView("redirect:/customer/resetPW.do");
			///WEB-INF/view/customer/resetPW.jsp
		}
		
		return mav;

	}
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/resetPW.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public ModelAndView customerresetPW() {
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/customer/resetPW.jsp");
		return mav;
		
	}
	
	@RequestMapping(value = "/customer/resetPW.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public ModelAndView customerresetPW(@ModelAttribute("customer") CustomerVO customer,HttpSession session) {
		
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
		System.out.println(customer);
		customer.setC_id((String)session.getAttribute("find_ID"));
		
		int r = customer_biz.getCustomerResetPW(customer);
		
		if(r == 1) {
			mav.addObject("msg", "ÎπÑÎ? Î≤àÌò∏Í∞? Î≥?Í≤ΩÎêò?óà?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/index.jsp");			
		}else {
			mav.addObject("msg", "ÎπÑÎ?Î≤àÌò∏Í∞? ?ùºÏπòÌïòÏß? ?ïä?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/customer/resetPW.do");
		}
		
		return mav;

	}

	/*
	 * ?öå?õêÍ∞??ûÖ?ãú Ï§ëÎ≥µ?ïÑ?ù¥?îî - Ï≤¥ÌÅ¨ ?îÑÎ°†Ìä∏ Î≤ÑÌäº ?ôú?Ñ±?ôî ÎπÑÎ?Î≤àÌò∏ , ÎπÑÎ?Î≤àÌò∏ ?ôï?ù∏ ?èô?ùº?ïúÏß? ?ôï?ù∏
	 * 
	 * Î°úÍ∑∏?ù∏?ãú ?ú†?ö®?Ñ±Í≤??Ç¨ - idÍ∞? ?ûà?äîÏß? Í≤??Ç¨ - idÍ∞? ?óÜ?ùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞ alert ?óÜ?äî?ïÑ?ù¥?îî?ûÖ?ãà?ã§ . - ?ûà?ùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞ - pwÍ∞? ?ïàÎßûÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞ -
	 * alert Î°úÍ∑∏?ù∏ ?ã§?å® ?ïò???äµ?ãà?ã§. - pwÍ∞? ?ûà?äî Í≤ΩÏö∞ - Î°úÍ∑∏?ù∏ ?Ñ±Í≥?,Í∞ùÏ≤¥Í∞? ?ÑòÍ≤? Ï£ºÍ∏∞
	 * 
	 * 
	 */

	@RequestMapping(value = "/login.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public ModelAndView login(@RequestParam("userID") String userID,
			@RequestParam("userPassword") String userPassword) {
		CustomerVO vo = new CustomerVO();
		vo.setC_id(userID);
		vo.setC_pw(userPassword); // http session
		ModelAndView mav = null;
		int r = customer_biz.getLogin(vo);
		if(r == 1) {
			mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
			mav.addObject("msg", "?ùºÏπòÌïò?äî IDÍ∞? Ï°¥Ïû¨?ïòÏß? ?ïä?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/index.jsp");
			return mav;
		}else if(r == 2) {
			mav = new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/redirect.jsp");
			mav.addObject("msg", "?å®?ä§?õå?ìúÍ∞? ?ùºÏπòÌïòÏß? ?ïä?äµ?ãà?ã§.");
			mav.addObject("url", "/ITformation/index.jsp");
			return mav;
		}
		System.out.println(r);
		return new ModelAndView("/index.jsp", "customer", userID);

	}

	@RequestMapping("/myPage.do")
	public ModelAndView mypage(HttpSession session) {
		String id = (String) session.getAttribute("userID");
		CustomerVO vo = customer_biz.getCustomer(id);
		return new ModelAndView("WEB-INF/view/customer/myPage.jsp", "CustomInfo", vo);
	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/updateCustomer.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public String updateCustomer(@ModelAttribute CustomerVO user) {
		int r = customer_biz.getUpdate(user);
		System.out.println(r);
		//CustomerVO vo = customer_biz.getCustomer(user.getC_id());
		
		return "/myPage.do";

	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/deleteCustomer.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public ModelAndView deleteCustomer(@RequestParam("userID") String userID) {
		int res = customer_biz.getDelete(userID);

		return new ModelAndView("/index.jsp");

	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/logout.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public String logout(HttpSession session) {
		session.invalidate();
		return "/index.jsp";
	}

}





59     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\customer\dao\CustomerDAO.java

package customer.dao;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.List;

import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import customer.vo.CustomerVO;

@Repository
public class CustomerDAO {

	static SqlSessionFactory factory;
	static {
		String resource = "customer/conf/mybatis-config.xml";
		InputStream inputStream;
		try {
			inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(resource);
			factory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}// static end

	public List<CustomerVO> getAll() {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		List<CustomerVO> all = null;
		try {
			all = session.selectList("customerMapper.CustomerAll");
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;
	}

	// insert
	public int getInsert(CustomerVO cus) {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;
		System.out.println(cus);
		try {
			all = session.insert("customerMapper.CustomerInsert", cus);
			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}

	// delete
	public int getDelete(String id) {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;
		try {
			all = session.delete("customerMapper.CustomerDelete", id);
			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}

	// update

	public int getUpdate(CustomerVO pro) {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;
		try {
			if (pro.getC_pw() != null)
				all = session.update("customerMapper.CustomerUpdatePw", pro);
			if (pro.getC_nic_name() != null)
				all = session.update("customerMapper.CustomerUpdateNic", pro);
			if (pro.getC_email() != null)
				all = session.update("customerMapper.CustomerUpdateEmail", pro);
			if (pro.getC_phone() != null)
				all = session.update("customerMapper.CustomerUpdatePhone", pro);

			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}

	public int getLogin(CustomerVO Vo) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		CustomerVO VO = null;
		int res = 1;
		try {
			VO = session.selectOne("customerMapper.CustomerLoginCheck", Vo);
			if (VO != null) {
				VO = session.selectOne("customerMapper.CustomerLogin", Vo);
				if (VO != null) {
					res = 0;
				} else
					res = 2;
			}

		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return res;
	}

	// getCustomer
	public CustomerVO getCustomer(String id) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		CustomerVO VO = null;
		try {
			VO = session.selectOne("customerMapper.CustomerSelect", id);
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return VO;
	}

	public String getCustomerID(CustomerVO vo) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		String id = null;
		try {
			CustomerVO VO = session.selectOne("customerMapper.CustomerSelectID", vo);
			if (VO != null)
				id = VO.getC_id();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return id;
	}

	public CustomerVO getCustomerPW(CustomerVO vo) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		CustomerVO VO = null;
		try {
			VO = session.selectOne("customerMapper.CustomerSelectPW", vo);
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return VO;
	}

	public int getCustomerResetPW(CustomerVO vo) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int r = 0;
		try {
			r = session.update("customerMapper.CustomerUpdatePw", vo);
			if (r > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return r;
	}

}





60     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\customer\vo\CustomerVO.java

package customer.vo;

public class CustomerVO {
	private String c_id;
	private String c_nic_name;
	private String c_name;
	private String c_email;
	private String c_phone;
	private String c_pw;
	private String c_birth;
	private String c_sex;
	private String c_post;
	private String c_add;
	private String c_dadd;
	private String c_exadd;
	private int c_answer_type;
	private String c_answer;
	
	public CustomerVO() {
		super();
	}

	public CustomerVO(String c_id, String c_nic_name, String c_name, String c_email, String c_phone, String c_pw,
			String c_birth, String c_sex, String c_post, String c_add, String c_dadd, String c_exadd, int c_answer_type,
			String c_answer) {
		super();
		this.c_id = c_id;
		this.c_nic_name = c_nic_name;
		this.c_name = c_name;
		this.c_email = c_email;
		this.c_phone = c_phone;
		this.c_pw = c_pw;
		this.c_birth = c_birth;
		this.c_sex = c_sex;
		this.c_post = c_post;
		this.c_add = c_add;
		this.c_dadd = c_dadd;
		this.c_exadd = c_exadd;
		this.c_answer_type = c_answer_type;
		this.c_answer = c_answer;
	}

	public String getC_id() {
		return c_id;
	}

	public void setC_id(String c_id) {
		this.c_id = c_id;
	}

	public String getC_nic_name() {
		return c_nic_name;
	}

	public void setC_nic_name(String c_nic_name) {
		this.c_nic_name = c_nic_name;
	}

	public String getC_name() {
		return c_name;
	}

	public void setC_name(String c_name) {
		this.c_name = c_name;
	}

	public String getC_email() {
		return c_email;
	}

	public void setC_email(String c_email) {
		this.c_email = c_email;
	}

	public String getC_phone() {
		return c_phone;
	}

	public void setC_phone(String c_phone) {
		this.c_phone = c_phone;
	}

	public String getC_pw() {
		return c_pw;
	}

	public void setC_pw(String c_pw) {
		this.c_pw = c_pw;
	}

	public String getC_birth() {
		return c_birth;
	}

	public void setC_birth(String c_birth) {
		this.c_birth = c_birth;
	}

	public String getC_sex() {
		return c_sex;
	}

	public void setC_sex(String c_sex) {
		this.c_sex = c_sex;
	}

	public String getC_post() {
		return c_post;
	}

	public void setC_post(String c_post) {
		this.c_post = c_post;
	}

	public String getC_add() {
		return c_add;
	}

	public void setC_add(String c_add) {
		this.c_add = c_add;
	}

	public String getC_dadd() {
		return c_dadd;
	}

	public void setC_dadd(String c_dadd) {
		this.c_dadd = c_dadd;
	}

	public String getC_exadd() {
		return c_exadd;
	}

	public void setC_exadd(String c_exadd) {
		this.c_exadd = c_exadd;
	}

	public int getC_answer_type() {
		return c_answer_type;
	}

	public void setC_answer_type(int c_answer_type) {
		this.c_answer_type = c_answer_type;
	}

	public String getC_answer() {
		return c_answer;
	}

	public void setC_answer(String c_answer) {
		this.c_answer = c_answer;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "CustomerVO [c_id=" + c_id + ", c_nic_name=" + c_nic_name + ", c_name=" + c_name + ", c_email=" + c_email
				+ ", c_phone=" + c_phone + ", c_pw=" + c_pw + ", c_birth=" + c_birth + ", c_sex=" + c_sex + ", c_post="
				+ c_post + ", c_add=" + c_add + ", c_dadd=" + c_dadd + ", c_exadd=" + c_exadd + ", c_answer_type="
				+ c_answer_type + ", c_answer=" + c_answer + "]";
	}
	
}

		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public int getAge() {

	}

		this.age = age;
	}

62     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\pms\biz\PmsBiz.java

package pms.biz;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import pms.dao.PmsDao;
import pms.entity.PmsEntity;
import pms.vo.PmsVo;

@Service
public class PmsBiz {
	
	@Autowired
	PmsDao pmsDao;
	
	public List<PmsEntity> getAll(int pms_pmno){
		List<PmsEntity> list = pmsDao.getAll(pms_pmno);
		Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<PmsEntity>() {

			@Override
			public int compare(PmsEntity o1, PmsEntity o2) {
				return o2.getPms_no() - o1.getPms_no();
			}
		});
		return list;
	}
	
	public int getInsertPms(String pms_id, int pms_pmno, PmsVo vo) {
		PmsEntity entity = new PmsEntity();
		entity.setPms_id(pms_id);
		entity.setPms_pmno(pms_pmno);
		entity.setPms_mission(vo.getPms_mission());
		entity.setPms_st(vo.getPms_st());
		entity.setPms_end(vo.getPms_end());
		entity.setPms_color(vo.getPms_color());
		
		return pmsDao.getInsertPms(entity);
	}
	
	public int getDeletePms(int pms_no) {
		return pmsDao.getDeletePms(pms_no);
	}
	
	public int getUpdatePms(int pms_no, PmsVo vo) {
		PmsEntity entity = new PmsEntity();
		entity.setPms_no(pms_no);
		entity.setPms_mission(vo.getPms_mission());
		entity.setPms_st(vo.getPms_st());
		entity.setPms_end(vo.getPms_end());
		entity.setPms_color(vo.getPms_color());
		
		return pmsDao.getUpdatePms(entity);
	}
}

package pms.controller;

import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import pms.biz.PmsBiz;
import pms.entity.PmsEntity;
import pms.vo.PmsVo;

@Controller("PmsController")
public class PmsServlet {
	
	@Autowired
	PmsBiz pms_biz;
	
	@RequestMapping("/selectAllPms.do")
	public ModelAndView selectAllPms(@RequestParam(value="pms_pmno") int pms_pmno) {
		List<PmsEntity> all = pms_biz.getAll(pms_pmno);
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("", "AllPms", all);
		return mav;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/insertPms.do")
	public String insertPms( HttpSession session, @RequestParam(value="pms_pmno") int pms_pmno,@RequestParam(value="vo") PmsVo pmsVo) {
		String userID = (String) session.getAttribute("userID");
		if(userID == null) {
			return "" + pms_pmno;
		} else { 
			int r = pms_biz.getInsertPms(userID, pms_pmno, pmsVo);
			System.out.println(r);
		}
		return null;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/deletePms.do")
	public int deletePms(@RequestParam(value="pms_no") int pms_no) {
		int r = pms_biz.getDeletePms(pms_no);
		return 0;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/updatePms.do")
	public String updatePms(@RequestParam(value="vo") PmsVo pmsvo, @RequestParam(value="pms_no") int pms_no) {
		int r = pms_biz.getUpdatePms(pms_no, pmsvo);
		return null;
	}
}





64     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\pms\dao\IPms.java

package pms.dao;

public interface IPms {
	String all_pms = "select * from pms where pms_pmno = ?";	
	
	String insert_pms = "insert into pms (pms_seq,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
	
	String delete_pms = "delete form pms where pms_no = ?";
	
	String update_pms = "update pms set (pms_id, pms_st, pms_end, pms_color) = (?,?,?,?) where pms_no = ?";
}





65     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\pms\dao\PmsDao.java

package pms.dao;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import pms.entity.PmsEntity;

@Repository
public class PmsDao implements IPms {
	
	@Autowired
	JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

	public List<PmsEntity> getAll(int pms_pmno) {
		List<PmsEntity> all = jdbcTemplate.query(all_pms, new Object[] { pms_pmno }, new RowMapper<PmsEntity>() {

			@Override
			public PmsEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new PmsEntity(rs.getInt("pms_no"), rs.getString("pms_id"), rs.getInt("pms_pmno"),
						rs.getString("pms_mission"), rs.getString("pms_st"), rs.getString("pms_end"),
						rs.getString("pms_color"));
			}
		});
		return all;
	}
	
	public int getInsertPms(PmsEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(insert_pms, new Object[] {
				entity.getPms_id(), entity.getPms_pmno(), entity.getPms_mission(), entity.getPms_st(), entity.getPms_end(), entity.getPms_color()
		});
	}
	
	public int getDeletePms(int pms_no) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(delete_pms, new Object[] {pms_no});
	}
	
	public int getUpdatePms(PmsEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(update_pms, new Object[] {
				entity.getPms_mission(), entity.getPms_st(), entity.getPms_end(), entity.getPms_color(), entity.getPms_no()
		});
	}
}





66     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\pms\entity\PmsEntity.java

package pms.entity;

public class PmsEntity {

	private int pms_no;
	private String pms_id;
	private int pms_pmno;
	private String pms_mission;
	private String pms_st;
	private String pms_end;
	private String pms_color;

	public PmsEntity() {
		super();
	}

	public PmsEntity(int pms_no, String pms_id, int pms_pmno, String pms_mission, String pms_st, String pms_end,
			String pms_color) {
		super();
		this.pms_no = pms_no;
		this.pms_id = pms_id;
		this.pms_pmno = pms_pmno;
		this.pms_mission = pms_mission;
		this.pms_st = pms_st;
		this.pms_end = pms_end;
		this.pms_color = pms_color;
	}

	public int getPms_no() {
		return pms_no;
	}

	public void setPms_no(int pms_no) {
		this.pms_no = pms_no;
	}

	public String getPms_id() {
		return pms_id;
	}

	public void setPms_id(String pms_id) {
		this.pms_id = pms_id;
	}

	public int getPms_pmno() {
		return pms_pmno;
	}

	public void setPms_pmno(int pms_pmno) {
		this.pms_pmno = pms_pmno;
	}

	public String getPms_mission() {
		return pms_mission;
	}

	public void setPms_mission(String pms_mission) {
		this.pms_mission = pms_mission;
	}

	public String getPms_st() {
		return pms_st;
	}

	public void setPms_st(String pms_st) {
		this.pms_st = pms_st;
	}

	public String getPms_end() {
		return pms_end;
	}

	public void setPms_end(String pms_end) {
		this.pms_end = pms_end;
	}

	public String getPms_color() {
		return pms_color;
	}

	public void setPms_color(String pms_color) {
		this.pms_color = pms_color;
	}
}

68     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\re\biz\ReBiz.java

package re.biz;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import re.dao.ReDao;
import re.entity.ReEntity;
import re.vo.ReVo;

@Service
public class ReBiz {
	@Autowired
	ReDao reDao;

	public List<ReEntity> getEntity(int no) {
		return reDao.getEntity(no);
	}

	public int getInsertRe(int bno, ReVo vo, String userID) {
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_bno(bno);
		entity.setRe_exp(vo.getRe_exp());
		entity.setRe_id(userID);
		System.out.println("BIZ : " + entity);
		return reDao.getInsertRe(entity);
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getAll() {
		List<ReEntity> list = reDao.getAll();
		Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public int compare(ReEntity o1, ReEntity o2) {
				return o2.getRe_no() - o2.getRe_no();
			}
		});
		return list;
	}

	public int getDeleteRe(int re_no) {
		System.out.println(re_no + " = Biz");
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_no(re_no);
		return reDao.getDeleteRe(entity);
	}

	public int getUpdateRe(String exp, int re_no) {
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_no(re_no);
		entity.setRe_exp(exp);
		return reDao.getUpdateRe(entity);
	}

}

package re.controller;

import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import re.biz.ReBiz;
import re.entity.ReEntity;
import re.vo.ReVo;

@Controller("ReController")	
public class ReServlet {
	@Autowired
	ReBiz re_biz;

	@RequestMapping("/selectAllRe.do")
	public ModelAndView selectAllRe() {
		List<ReEntity> all = re_biz.getAll();
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("WEB-INF/view/re/re.jsp", "AllRe", all);
		return mav;
	}



	@RequestMapping("/reply/view.do")
	public ModelAndView view(@RequestParam int re_no) {
		List<ReEntity> entity = re_biz.getEntity(re_no);
		return new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/re/reView.jsp", "entity", entity);
	}

	@RequestMapping("/reply/write.do")
	public String wirteRedirect() {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/reWrite.jsp";
	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/reply/update.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public String updateRedirect() {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/rewrite.jsp";
	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/reply/update.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public String updateReply(@ModelAttribute ReVo reVo) {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/rewrite.jsp";
	}
	
	

}





70     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\re\dao\IRe.java

package re.dao;

public interface IRe {
	String all_re = "select * from re";
	
	String select_re = "select * from re where re_bno = ? order by re_no";
	String select_re01 = "select * from re_id = ? and re_bno = ?";
	
	String insert_re = "insert into re values (reno.nextval,?,?,?,sysdate)";
	
	String delete_re = "delete re where re_no = ?";
	
	String update_re = "update re set re_exp = ? where re_no = ?";
	
}





71     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\re\dao\ReDao.java

package re.dao;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import re.entity.ReEntity;

@Repository
public class ReDao implements IRe {

	@Autowired
	JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

	public int getInsertRe(ReEntity entity) {
		System.out.println("DAO : " + entity);
		return jdbcTemplate.update(insert_re,
				new Object[] { entity.getRe_bno(), entity.getRe_exp(), entity.getRe_id() });
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getAll() {
		List<ReEntity> all = jdbcTemplate.query(all_re, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("revo"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re_day"));
			}

		});
		return all;
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getEntity(int no) {
		List<ReEntity> entity = jdbcTemplate.query(select_re, new Object[] { no }, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				ReEntity e = new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("re_exp"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re_day"));
				return e;
			}
		});
		return entity;
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getSelect(ReEntity entity) {
		Object[] a = new Object[] {};
		if (entity.getRe_id().isEmpty()) {
			entity.setRe_id("");
		}

		a = new Object[] { entity.getRe_bno(), entity.getRe_id() };

		List<ReEntity> sel = jdbcTemplate.query(select_re01, a, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("re_exp"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re.day"));
			}
		});
		return sel;
	}

	public int getDeleteRe(ReEntity entity) {
		System.out.println(entity.getRe_no() + " = Dao");
		Object[] a = new Object[] { entity.getRe_no()};

		int r = jdbcTemplate.update(delete_re, a);
		return r;
	}

	public int getUpdateRe(ReEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(update_re, new Object[] { entity.getRe_exp(), entity.getRe_no() });
	}
}





72     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\192_168_0_182\«¡∑Œ¡ß∆ÆπÆº≠_0124_DIAGRAM\daeaee\src\re\entity\ReEntity.java

package re.entity;

public class ReEntity {

	private int re_no;
	private int re_bno;
	private String re_exp;
	private String re_id;
	private String re_day;

	public ReEntity() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public ReEntity(int re_no, int re_bno, String re_exp, String re_id, String re_day) {
		super();
		this.re_no = re_no;
		this.re_bno = re_bno;
		this.re_exp = re_exp;
		this.re_id = re_id;
		this.re_day = re_day;
	}

	public int getRe_no() {
		return re_no;
	}

	public void setRe_no(int re_no) {
		this.re_no = re_no;
	}

	public int getRe_bno() {
		return re_bno;
	}

	public void setRe_bno(int re_bno) {
		this.re_bno = re_bno;
	}

	public String getRe_exp() {
		return re_exp;
	}

	public void setRe_exp(String re_exp) {
		this.re_exp = re_exp;
	}

	public String getRe_id() {
		return re_id;
	}

	public void setRe_id(String re_id) {
		this.re_id = re_id;
	}

	public String getRe_day() {
		return re_day;
	}

	public void setRe_day(String re_day) {
		this.re_day = re_day;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "ReEntity [re_no=" + re_no + ", re_bno=" + re_bno + ", re_exp=" + re_exp + ", re_id=" + re_id
				+ ", re_day=" + re_day + "]";
	}

}

76     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\Channel\src\com\client\ChatClient.java

package com.client;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Frame;
import java.awt.TextArea;
import java.awt.TextField;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;

public class ChatClient extends Frame implements Runnable {


	InetSocketAddress hostAddress = null;
	SocketChannel client = null;

	TextArea outputArea;
	TextField inputField;

	public ChatClient(String title) {
		super(title);

		setLayout(new BorderLayout());

		outputArea = new TextArea();
		outputArea.setEditable(false);

		add(outputArea, "Center");
		inputField = new TextField();
		add(inputField, "South");

		inputField.addActionListener(new InputListener());
	}

	public void addMessage(String msg) {
		outputArea.append(msg);
	}

	public void connect(String host, int port) {
		try {
	
			hostAddress = new InetSocketAddress(host, port);
			client = SocketChannel.open(hostAddress);
	
		} catch (Exception e) {
			System.err.println("¿‘√‚∑¬ ø°∑Ø¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.");
			System.exit(1);
		}

	}

	public void disconnect() {
		try {
			client.close();
		
		} catch (IOException e) {
		}
	}

	public void run() {
		try {
			while (true) {
				ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(256);
				client.read(buffer);
				String output = new String(buffer.array()).trim();

				addMessage(output + "\n");
				buffer.clear();
			}
		} catch (IOException e) {
			disconnect();
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {

		ChatClient mf = new ChatClient("¿⁄πŸ √§∆√ ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ");

		mf.pack();
		mf.setSize(500, 300);
		mf.setVisible(true);

		mf.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				System.exit(0);
			}
		});
		mf.connect("127.0.0.1", 9999);

		Thread thread = new Thread(mf);
		thread.start();

	}

	class InputListener implements ActionListener {

		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			String input = inputField.getText();
			inputField.setText("");
			try {
				byte[] message = new String(input).getBytes();
				ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.wrap(message);
				client.write(buffer);
		
				buffer.clear();
			} catch (Exception e1) {
				e1.printStackTrace();
			}
		}

	}

}




77     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\Channel\src\com\server\ChatServer.java

package com.server;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
import java.nio.channels.SelectionKey;
import java.nio.channels.Selector;
import java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel;
import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.Vector;

public class ChatServer {
	Vector<Service> Clients; // ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ ∞¥√º∏¶ ¿˙¿Â«œ¥¬ ∞˜

	public ChatServer() {
		Clients = new Vector<>();
	}

	public Service getClient(SocketChannel socketChannel) {
		for(Service s : Clients) {
			if(s.getsocketChannel().equals(socketChannel))
				return s;
		}
		
		return null;
	}

	public void addClient(Service s) { // ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ∞° ¡¢º”«œ∏È √ﬂ∞°
		Clients.add(s);
	}

	public void removeClient(Service s) { // ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ∞° ¡æ∑·µ«∏È ªË¡¶
		Clients.remove(s);
	}

	public void sendMessageAll(String str) { // ∏µÁ ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æø°∞‘ πﬁ¿∫ ∏ﬁΩ√¡ˆ∏¶ √‚∑¬
		try {
			for (Service s : Clients) {
				s.sendMessage(str);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ChatServer server = null;
		Selector selector = null;
		ServerSocketChannel serverSocket = null;
		try {
			server = new ChatServer();
			selector = Selector.open();
			serverSocket = ServerSocketChannel.open();
			InetSocketAddress hostAddress = new InetSocketAddress("localhost", 9999);
			serverSocket.bind(hostAddress);
			serverSocket.configureBlocking(false);

			int ops = serverSocket.validOps();
			serverSocket.register(selector, ops, null);

		} catch (IOException e) {
			System.err.println("º≠πˆ ª˝º∫ ø¿∑˘ ");
		}

		System.out.println("º≠πˆ : " + serverSocket + " ø°º≠ ø¨∞·¿ª ±‚¥Ÿ∏≥¥œ¥Ÿ.");

		try {
			while (true) {
				
				try {
					selector.select();
				} catch (IOException e1) {
					e1.printStackTrace();
				}
				
				Set<SelectionKey> selectedKeys = selector.selectedKeys();
				Iterator<SelectionKey> iter = selectedKeys.iterator();
				
				while (iter.hasNext()) {
					SelectionKey ky = iter.next();
					if (ky.isAcceptable()) {
						try {
							SocketChannel client = serverSocket.accept();
							
							client.configureBlocking(false);
							client.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_READ);
							Service s = new Service(server, client);
							System.out.println("≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ : " + client + " ø°º≠ ¡¢º”«œø¥Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
							s.sendMessage("\nUsername : \n");
							server.addClient(s);
							
						} catch (IOException e) {
							System.err.println("≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ ¡¢º” ø¿∑˘");
						}
						
					} else if (ky.isReadable()) {
						
						SocketChannel client = (SocketChannel) ky.channel();
						Service s = null;
						try {
							s = server.getClient(client);						
							if(s.UserName == null)
								s.setName();
							else
								s.Chat();
						} catch (NullPointerException e) {
							try {
								client.close();
							} catch (IOException e1) {
								e1.printStackTrace();
							}
						}
						
					}
					iter.remove();	
				}	
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			try {
				serverSocket.close();
			} catch (IOException e1) {
				e1.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
		System.out.println("º≠πˆ∏¶ ¡æ∑·«’¥œ¥Ÿ.");
	}

}





78     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\Channel\src\com\server\Service.java

package com.server;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;

public class Service {
	private ChatServer server;
	private SocketChannel socketChannel;
	String UserName;
	
	public SocketChannel getsocketChannel() {
		return this.socketChannel;
	}

	public Service(ChatServer server, SocketChannel socketChannel) {
		this.server = server;
		this.socketChannel = socketChannel;
	}

	public void sendMessage(String str) throws IOException {
		ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(1024);
		buffer = ByteBuffer.wrap(str.getBytes());
		if (str != null)
			socketChannel.write(buffer);
		buffer.clear();
	}

	public String readMessage() throws IOException {
		ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(1024);
		socketChannel.read(buffer);
		String output = new String(buffer.array()).trim();
		buffer.clear();
		return output;
	}

	public void setName() {
		
		try {
			String input;
			if ((input = readMessage()) != null) {
				UserName = input;
				sendMessage(UserName);
				server.sendMessageAll("# " + UserName + " ¥‘¿Ã µÈæÓø¿ºÃΩ¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
			}

		} catch (IOException e) {
			System.err.println("¥–≥◊¿” ª˝º∫ ø¿∑˘");
			//e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}

	public void Chat() {
		try {
			
			String inputLine;
			if ((inputLine = readMessage()) != null) {
				server.sendMessageAll("[" + UserName + "]" + inputLine);
			}

		} catch (IOException e) {
			server.removeClient(this);
			server.sendMessageAll("# " + UserName + " ¥‘¿Ã ≥™∞°ºÃΩ¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
			System.out.println("≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ : " + socketChannel + " ø°º≠ ¡¢º”¿Ã ≤˜∞ÂΩ¿¥œ¥Ÿ...");
		}

	}

}

// public (∞¯∞≥), protected(ªÛº”Ω√¿⁄º’ø°∞‘∞¯∞≥) , default(∞∞¿∫ pkg ≥ªø°º≠∞¯∞≥), private(∞∞¿∫cls -this ø°º≠∞¯∞≥)

82     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\Day03\src\com\exam\Ex01.java

package com.exam;
/*
* a       b
*100+200 = hap
*200 - 100 = sub
*100 * 200 = mul
*200 / 100 = div
*
*/

public class Ex01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// 1. main methodø° ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ æπ¥œ¥Ÿ.
// 2. µ•¿Ã≈∏ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ : int
		int a=0, b=0;
		int hap=0, sub=0;
		int mul;
		int div;
		
//		3. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		a = 100;
		b = 200;

//		4. ø¨ªÍ
		hap = a + b;
		sub = b - a;
		mul = a * b;
		div = b / a;

//		5. √‚∑¬ 

		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d\n", a, b, hap); // ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ »Æ∫∏ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", b, a, sub);
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %3d\n", a, b, mul); // ∞¯∞£(3ƒ≠)¿Ã ∫Øºˆ(5ƒ≠)∫∏¥Ÿ ¿€¥ı∂Ûµµ √‚∑¬¿∫ ¡§ªÛ¿˚¿∏∑Œ µ . 
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		System.out.printf("'%5d' / %c = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		
// Day04≤®∏¶ æ≤∞Ì ΩÕ¿∏∏È, .jar∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∂Û¿Ã∫Í∑Ø∏Æø° √ﬂ∞°Ω√ƒ—æﬂ æµ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. (∞∞¿∫ ∆–≈∞¡ˆ≥ªø° ¿÷¥¬∞Õ∏∏æµºˆ¿÷¿Ω)
		
	}

}

package com.exam;
/*
* a       b
*100+200 = hap
*200 - 100 = sub
*100 * 200 = mul
*200 / 100 = div
*
*/

public class Ex011 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// 1. main methodø° ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ æπ¥œ¥Ÿ.
//	2. µ•¿Ã≈∏ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ : int
		int a;
		int b;
		int hap;
		int sub;
		int mul;
		int div;
//		3. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		a = 100;
		b = 200;

//		4. ø¨ªÍ
		hap = a + b;
		sub = b - a;
		mul = a * b;
		div = b / a;

//		5. √‚∑¬ 

		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d\n", a, b, hap); // ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ »Æ∫∏ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", b, a, sub);
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %3d\n", a, b, mul); // ∞¯∞£(3ƒ≠)¿Ã ∫Øºˆ(5ƒ≠)∫∏¥Ÿ ¿€¥ı∂Ûµµ √‚∑¬¿∫ ¡§ªÛ¿˚¿∏∑Œ µ . 
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		System.out.printf("'%5d' / %c = %5d\n", b, a, div);

	}

}

//		int b = 0, c = 100, d = 20, e = 1; // ≥™ø≠µµ ∞°¥…

	}

}

    // String[] args : ∏≈∞≥∫Øºˆ (»£√‚¿ª «œ∏È ∞™¿ª πﬁ∞⁄¥Ÿ.)

		a = 127; // 127∑Œ ¿Á¥Î¿‘«—¥Ÿ.
		System.out.println(a); // a = 127¿Ã µ«æ˙Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.
		
//		a = 128; 1byte ¥¬ 127±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ æµ ºˆ ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°(-128 ~127) ø¿∑˘∞° ≥≤.

// char(2byte) : unicode 0 ~65535 , «—πÆ¿⁄∏¶ «•Ω√«“∂© single quote ' '
public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
 
		 char ch = 100; // char∑Œ º±æ«œø¥±‚ ∂ßπÆø° unicode 100ø° «ÿ¥Á«œ¥¬ 'd'∏¶ »£√‚
		 System.out.println("ch="+ch);
		 
		 char ch02= 'd'; // d -> 100 -> d ∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«œ¥¬ ∞˙¡§¿Ã ¥ı ø¿∑°∞…∏≤ but ±◊∑∏¥Ÿ∞Ì ±ª¿Ã 100¿∏∑Œ Ω·¡Ÿ « ø‰∞° æ¯¿Ω. 
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + ch02);
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + ch02 + 100);
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + (ch02 + 100)); // ch02πÊø°¥¬ d∞° µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ.
         System.out.println("ch02=" + ('d' + 100));
		
		
//	   char res = ch + ch02; // +¥¬ ∫∏≈Î ø¨ªÍ«œ∑¡∞Ì «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°  int∑Œ πŸ≤Ÿ∂Û∞Ì µµøÚ∏ª ª˝º∫µ  (char + char = > int ¿Œµ•, øﬁ¬  char res ø°º≠ ¿⁄∑·«¸ type¿ª char∑Œ ¡ˆ¡§, int∏¶ ≥÷¿ª ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ.)
	 char res =  (char) (ch + ch02) ; // 'd'+100 = 100 + 100 = 200 -- > unicode 200∞™, ƒ⁄µÂ ∞™¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È ?	
       System.out.println("res=" + res);
 
         char res02 = 'd' + 2; // 'd' + 2 = 100 + 2 = 102 --> f
         System.out.println("res02=" + res02);
		
		
		
		
	}

}

package com.test;
// ¿⁄∏Æºˆ¡ˆ¡§ (¿⁄∏ÆπË¡§) :  %C πÆ¿⁄, %D ¡§ºˆ %f Ω«ºˆ %s           printf(String format, object ... args)
// formatt ; printf ∏¶ æ≤¥¬ ¿Ã¿Ø¥¬ println¿∫ consoleπ€ø° √‚∑¬«œ¡ˆ ∏¯«‘, web browser∑Œ æµ¥Î println¿Ã æ¯±‚ ∂ßπÆø°
// println ¿∏∑Œ«œ∏È «—¡Ÿ∏∏ √‚∑¬«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ¿⁄∏Æ ∏¬√ﬂ±‚∞° æÓ∑¡øÚ
public class MTest06 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
 System.out.printf("%c%c", 'A','B');
 System.out.printf("%10c %10c", 'A','B'); // 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char
 System.out.printf("%10c %10c \n %c ", 'A','B', 'c'); // 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char
 System.out.printf("\n %5d %10.2f \n", 100, 92.789); // ¡ŸπŸ≤Ÿ∞Ì + 5¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° ¡§ºˆ 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø°  º“º˝¡° ¿⁄∏Æ 2¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ
 System.out.printf("\n %-5d %10.2f \n", 100, 92.789); // ¡ŸπŸ≤Ÿ∞Ì + 5¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° ¡§ºˆ 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø°  º“º˝¡° ¿⁄∏Æ 2¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ (øﬁ¬ ¡§∑ƒ)
 

 // 	
	
	
	}
}





91     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\Day03\src\com\test\MTest07.java

package com.test;

public class MTest07 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		char ch = '\u0000';
		char end = '\uffff'; // ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ πÆ¿⁄, ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ¿Œ¡Ÿ ∏∏£¥¬ ∞ÊøÏ, ∆˘∆Æø° µ˚∂Ûº≠ ∞™¿Ã æ»≥™ø√ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. int∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«ÿº≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ µÈæÓ∞¨≥™ »Æ¿Œ
		System.out.println("ch=" + (int) ch + "~" + (int) end);
		System.out.println("ch=" + ch + "~" + end);

		char f_name = '——';
		System.out.println(f_name + ":" + (int) f_name);

		char a = '\ubc15', b = '\uc131', c = '\uc544', d='\n';
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C", a, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C%C", a,d, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%%C%C%C%C", a,d, b, c);
		String str = "\n\\ubc15\\uc131\\uc544";
		System.out.println(str);
		String strr = "\n\ubc15\uc131\uc544";
		System.out.println(strr);
		String str01 = null;
		System.out.println(str01);
	
	String str02 = null; // null¿∫ object∏¶ √ ±‚»≠ Ω√ƒ—¡÷¥¬ ≈∞øˆµÂ.	
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // 
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // ¥Ÿ∏• «¡∑Œ±◊∑•ø°º≠¥¬ ∆ØºˆπÆ¿⁄ æ≤∑¡∏È æ’ø° % Ω·æﬂ«“ ºˆµµ ¿÷¿Ω.(% ø¨ªÍ¿⁄∞° ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°)
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ'100%'¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // single quotation¿Ã πÆ¿⁄ø≠∑Œ √‚∑¬ µ  (±◊¿¸ πˆ¿¸ø°º≠¥¬ \'100%\' ¿∏∑Œ ¿€º∫) 

	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ\"100%\"¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // double quotation æ≤∑¡∏È æ’ø° \ ∫Ÿø©¡‡æﬂ «‘. (single¿∫ æ»∫Ÿø©µµ§« µ )
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	}

}

93     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY04\src\com\exam\Calc.java

package com.exam;

public class Calc {

	public static void Hap (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a+b));
	}
	public static void Sub (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a-b));
	}
	public static void Mul  (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a*b));
	}
	public static void Div (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a/b));
	}

}







94     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY04\src\com\exam\Exam01.java

package com.exam;
	// æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.
/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
 *  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
 *  √—¡° : ?
 *  ∆Ú±’ : ?
 *   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
 *   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
 */
public class Exam01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String name = "»´±Êµø";      
		int g = 100, m = 78, e = 82;
// 3. ø¨ªÍ
		int tot = 0;
		double av = 0.0;

		tot = g + m + e;
		av = (double) tot / 3;    

		System.out.printf("¿Ã∏ß : %10S\n", name);
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %5d ºˆ«–: %5d"
				+ " øµæÓ: %5d\n", g,m,e); 
		System.out.printf("√—¡° : %5d \n∆Ú±’ : %5.1f", tot, av); 
	
	}

}





95     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY04\src\com\exam\Exam02.java

package com.exam;

// ∞™¿ª πﬁ¿∏∏È √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
public class Exam02 { // class user data type = ¿⁄∑·«¸

	public static void Prn_A(int a) {
		System.out.println("Prn_A: " + a);
	}

	public static void Prn_B(double d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_B: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_C(char c) {
		System.out.println("Prn_C: " + c);
	}

	public static void Prn_D(String d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_D: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_E(char a, String b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_E: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void Prn_F(boolean a, boolean b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_F: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Prn_A(1000);
		Prn_B(90.9);
		Prn_C('A');
		Prn_D("sung-a");
		Prn_E('b', "abab");
		Prn_F(true, false);

	}
}

package com.exam;

// æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.
/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
 *  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
 *  √—¡° : ?
 *  ∆Ú±’ : ?
 *   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
 *   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
 */
public class Exam03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// 1. µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ , 2. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘ ,
		String name = "»´±Êµø";
		int g = 100, m = 78, e = 82;

		int tot = 0;
		double av = 0.0;

		// 3. ø¨ªÍ (√—¡°, ∆Ú±’)

		// 4. √‚∑¬ (system.out.printf() )

		System.out.printf("¿Ã∏ß : %10S\n", name);
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %5d ºˆ«–: %5d" + " øµæÓ: %5d\n", g, m, e); // «¡∑Œ±◊∑•¿∫ ';'¿ª ∏∏≥™±‚ ¿¸±Ó¡ˆ ≥°≥≠∞‘ æ∆¥‘.
		Score.Prn_tot(g, m, e);
		Score.Prn_avg(g, m, e);

	}

}

98     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY04\src\com\exam\Score.java

package com.exam;

//1. ºº ∞˙∏Ò¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ √—¡°¿ª ±∏«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞Æ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫.
//2. ºº ∞˙∏Ò¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ ∆Ú±’¿ª ±∏«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞Æ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫.
public class Score {
	
	 public static void Prn_tot(int k, int m, int e) {
		 
		 int tot = k + m + e;
		 System.out.printf("√—¡° : %5d \n", tot );
	 }

	 public static void Prn_avg(int k, int m, int e ) {
		  double avg = (double) (k+m+e) / 3;
		  System.out.printf("∆Ú±’ : %5.2f \n", avg );
	 }
}

	public static void Prn_Name(String name) {
		System.out.println(name + "¥‘ æ»≥Á«œººø‰, ∏∏≥™∫À∞‘µ«æÓ øµ±§¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ :) "); 
		// Prn¿∫ πÿø° String nameø° name¿ª ∏∏ß. Prn_Name¿« ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¿Ã±‚∂ßπÆø° Prn¿Ã »£√‚µ«æÓæﬂ String πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ ºˆ ¿’¥Ÿ.

		Prn_Name("»´±Êµø") ; // ∏ﬁº“µÂ »£√‚«“ ∂ß full name¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È ∞∞¿∫ class¿« static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ √£¥¬¥Ÿ. 
		Prn_Name("¡§±Êµø") ; // double quote∏¶ µøπ›«œ∏È ∏µŒ String¿∏∑Œ ∞£¡÷«’¥œ¥Ÿ.
		Prn_Name("º∫æ∆") ;

		System.out.println(a+"øÕ "+b);
		
	}

	Disp (100, 200); // methodø° ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«“ ∂ß¥¬ ,∑Œ ±∏∫–

108     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY04\src\com\test02\MTest03.java

package com.test02;
// ¿⁄πŸ¿« ∏ﬁº“µÂ º±æΩ√ πÆπ˝
// 1. ∏ﬁº“µÂ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄(parameter) ∫Øºˆø° √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¡ˆ¡§«“ ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ. like, public static void Mtest(int a=0) æ»µ .
//     ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥¬ »£√‚Ω√, ∫ÛπÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∞™¿ª ≥÷¿Ω.
// 2. ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿∫ ∏ﬁº“µÂ »£√‚Ω√ø° µø¿œ«— µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È  π¨Ω√«¸ «¸∫Ø»Ø(¿⁄µø«¸∫Ø»Ø)¿Ã ¿œæÓ≥≠¥Ÿ. 
//     (int¥¬ 4byte, 4byte ≥ª¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿∫ ø°∑Øæ¯¿Ã int∑Œ √‚∑¬«‘, boolean¿∫ ¡¶ø‹)
// 		like, public static void Mtest(int a) , Mtest('A'); ∞·∞˙ :65
// 3. Java¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ(overload)∏¶ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.  (ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂøÕ ø¿πˆ∂Û¿ÃµÂ)
//     means ¥‹¿œ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø°(Mtest03)ø°º≠ µø¿œ«— ¿Ã∏ß¿« ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄¿« ≈∏¿‘¿Ã≥™ ∞≥ºˆ∏¶ ¥Ÿ∏£∞‘ º±æ«œ¥¬ ∞Õ. (∏µÁ OOP∞° ¥Ÿµ )
//     cause ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘ ∂ßπÆø°. ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ±‚¥…,∏Ò¿˚¿Ã ∞∞±‚ ∂ßπÆø°

public class MTest03 {

	public static void Mtest(int a) {
		System.out.println(a+"=> int");
	}
	public static void Mtest(char a) {
		System.out.println(a + "=> char"); // method ¿Ã∏ß ∞∞æ∆µµ, ∫Øºˆ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ±∏∫∞∞°¥…«œπ«∑Œ ∞∞¿Ã æµ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
	}
	public static void Mtest(char a,char b) {
		System.out.println(a +" & "+ b+ "=> char");
	}

	public static void Mtest (char a, int b) {
		System.out.println(a +" = " + b);
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Mtest('A');
		Mtest(100);
		Mtest('A','B');
		Mtest ('A', 35) ;
 // System.out.println((int) true); casting ¿⁄√º∞° æ»µ 

	}

}

public class Mtest04 {

}





110     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

public class MTest01 {

	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static float getF() {
		return 98.7f;
	}

	public static int getRes01() {
		return 'A'; // 4byte int πÊø° 'A' 2byte¥¬ µÈæÓ∞• ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
	}

	public static int getRes02() {
		return (int) 98.7; // = 98 ; ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘¿Ã ∏¬æ∆æﬂ «—¥Ÿ.
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int res = getRes(); // ¡§ºˆ100¿ª return«œ¥¬ getRes() ∏ﬁº“µÂ return 100;
		System.out.println(res); // 100
		float f = getF(); // return 98.7f
		System.out.println(f); // 98.7f
		int res01 = getRes01(); // 'A'¿« int ∞™ 65 ;
		System.out.println(res01); 
		int res02 = getRes02(); // 98.7¿« int∞™ 98;
		System.out.println(res02);
		
		System.out.println(getRes()); // system.out.println(int); = system.out.println(98);
		 // floatø°¥¬ 'A'∞° ø÷ æ»µ«≥™ ? characther¥¬ 0-66535±Ó¡ˆ¿« ∞™, -∞™¿Ã æ¯∞Ì, Ω«ºˆ∞° æ∆¥‘. 65!=65.0
		
		
		
		/// 2∞≥∏¶ π≠æÓº≠ »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄. : µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£∏È String πÆ¿⁄ø≠ ∑Œ √Î±ﬁ.
		System.out.println(getRes()+"¿∫"+getF()+"¿Ã æ∆¥œ¿›æ∆ø‰");
		System.out.println(getRes()+getF()); // ¥ı«œ±‚∞° µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ.
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
	}
}

112     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;

public class MTest03 {
	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static int getRes(int a) {
		return a * 2; // argument : parameter∏¶ πﬁ¥¬æ÷µÈ.
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int r = getRes();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(getRes()); // so, getRes¥¬ ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤

		int r01 = getRes(2);
		System.out.println(r01);
		System.out.println(getRes(2));

		int r02 = getRes(getRes()); // getRes()=100 --> getRes(int a)= a*2 = 100*2
		System.out.println(r02);

	}

}

package com.test;
// APIø°º≠ ¡¶∞¯«œ¥¬ return«¸ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ªÁøÎ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
//		1. Interger class ªÁøÎ
		int su = 10; // OS∞° ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ ¿⁄∑·«¸ = ±∏¡∂√º , so, int¥¬ ±‚∫ª«¸. (¿¸ºº∞Ëø°º≠¥Ÿ¿Ã∑∏∞‘æ≤∞Ì¿÷æÓ ∫Ø∞Ê«“ ºˆ æ¯¥¬ ±‚∫ª¿⁄∑·«¸)
		// java¿« ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß¥¬ class, ±‚∫ª¿⁄∑·«¸ø°¥Ÿ∞° ±‚¥…¿ª √ﬂ∞°«“ ºˆ æ¯¿ª±Ó? == wrapper class.
		// so, java¥¬ ¿œπ› ¿⁄∑·«¸(like, int) + ±‚¥…(called method) = Integer = java.lang (¿⁄∑·«¸¿∏∑Œ
		// ¿Ã∑ÁæÓ¡¯ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ¿‹ƒ°)
		// Class Int¥¬ int∏¶ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ æ÷µÈ .

		// 1) C∏∂¿ŒµÂ - ¿⁄πŸ∏¶ ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ¬•∏È ∞®¡°¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.
		String str = Integer.toBinaryString(su); // Cmind ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ø÷ ¿⁄πŸ∏¶ æ≤¥¬∞Õ¿Ã¡ˆø‰ ?
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + str); // () æ»¿« ∞™¿« type¿∫ String ("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :"∏¶ ∆˜«‘«œ∞Ì ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆ

		// 2) ¿⁄πŸ∏∂¿ŒµÂ - πŸ∑Œ »£√‚¿ª «’Ω√¥Ÿ. Integer≤®. static = class.method
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 8¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" +  Integer.toOctalString(su));
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 16¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" +  Integer.toHexString(su));

//	    public static String toBinaryString(int su); // 1. method∏¶ ∞°¡Æø». 2.static »Æ¿Œ . 3. void/return »Æ¿Œ  - return¿œ ∞ÊøÏ ƒ⁄µÂ¿« ∏∂¡ˆ∏∑¡Ÿø£ æ¡¶≥™ {return "" ;}
		// to Ω√∏Æ¡Ó : toBinaryString : int∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠, 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ πﬁæ∆º≠ String type¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«—¥Ÿ.

		// System.out.println("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ."+ );

	public static void Prn(int su) {

		System.out.println("su∏¶   8¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + Integer.toOctalString(su));
		System.out.println("su∏¶ 16¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + Integer.toHexString(su));

	}

package com.test;

public class MTest06 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		System.out.println(com.test01.Mytest.a);
		// 2. Math class ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ »∞øÎ«ÿ ∫æΩ√¥Ÿ.

		// public static double sqrt(double a); // double=8byte¿Ãπ«∑Œ ¿Ã«œ æÓ∂≤
		// º˝¿⁄µÁ(int,float,..)¥Ÿ ø√ºˆ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// public static void Prn(A) {} ø©±‚º≠ A∞° super class ¿œ∂ß, Aæ∆∑° ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞° ¥Ÿ µÈæÓø¬¥Ÿ. means
		// A=Ω√¿€¡÷º“
		// (º±¡∂¥¬ π´¡∂∞« 1∞≥, æ∆∫¸∞° 2∞≥¿œ ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ.) A-B-C (O), AB-C (X) : ¥Ÿ¡ﬂªÛº” ∫“∞°¥…

		int su = 100;
		double d = Math.sqrt(su); // Math.sqrt(100.0) ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì ª˝∞¢«‘
		System.out.printf("su = %d  ==> sqrt = %3.1f\n", su, d);

		// πŸ∑Œ √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. cause, println¿Ã double¿ª √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°.
		System.out.println(Math.sqrt(su));

		// ex)ø‹∫Œø°º≠ µÈæÓø¬ µ•¿Ã≈Õ¥¬ πÆ¿⁄≈∏¿‘ ¡÷¡ˆ æ ¿∏∏È ±‚∫ª¿˚¿∏∑Œ String¿∏∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ.
		// "100"¿ª º˝¿⁄∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«— ¥Ÿ¿Ωø° + 200¿ª «ÿº≠ ¿¸º€«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ.
		String str = "100";
		int r = Integer.parseInt(str); // str π›µÂΩ√ string ¿ÃæÓæﬂ «‘.
		System.out.println(r + 200);

		r = r + 200; // r=100 + 200
		System.out.println(r);

		r += 200; // r=r-50 ; r-= 50; (-= , +=, *=, /= ªÁ¿Ãø° ∞¯πÈ¿÷¿∏∏È æ»µ ) r¿ª µŒπ¯æ≤±‚ Ω»æÓº≠ø‰..
		System.out.println(r);

		// int∏¶ πÆ¿⁄ø≠∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ. : 'int∏¶!!'ø° ∞¸«— ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥œ±Ó class int∏¶ µ⁄¡Ææﬂ«—¥Ÿ. ∫Ø»Ø = to /
		String str02 = Integer.toString(r);
		System.out.println(str02 +1000); // πÆ¿⁄ø≠¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.	

	   //  String str03 = 100; String¿ª int∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ∂Û¥¬ error ∏ﬁºº¡ˆ ª˝±Ë
		
		
	     
	
	}

}

package com.test01;

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		U_Test u1 = new U_Test();   // ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«œ¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄.
		U_Test u2 = new U_Test(); // ª˝º∫¿⁄¿« ∏Ò¿˚ : ∞¥√º¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ √ ±‚»≠(√ ±‚∞™¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷¥¬ ∞Õ)
					// returnµµ æ¯∞Ì, voidµµ æ¯¿∏∏È method∞° æ∆¥—∞≈¡ˆ ! 
		System.out.println(u1);
		System.out.println(u2);

		u1.a = 2000;
		u1.d = 9.7;
		u2.a = 3000;
		u2.d = 10.7;
		
		System.out.println(u1.a);
		System.out.println(u1.d);
		System.out.println(u2.a);
		System.out.println(u1.d);

		/// u1.a != u2.a , æˆø¨»˜ µ—¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏• ¡÷º“∏¶ ∞Æ¿Ω. 
		// u1 new / u2 new∏¶ ∞¢∞¢ ∏∏≥™¥¬ º¯∞£ º≠∑Œ ¥Ÿ∏• ¡÷º“∏¶ ª˝º∫. heapø° ¥Ÿ∏• πÊ¿Ã ª˝±Ë. u1¿« a/d
		/// , u2¿« a/d
		
		
	}

}





117     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test01\MTest03.java

package com.test01;
// ¡Ò∞≈øÓ ª˝º∫¿⁄ Ω√∞£ ><

class Test {

	public int a, b; // ∏‚∏”∫Øºˆ 2∞≥

	public Test() {
		a = 100;
		// ¿Ã∞‘ µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞≈¥Ÿ ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}

	public Test(int a) { // means ∞™¿ª ¡÷∏Èº≠ ª˝º∫.
		// non static ¡÷º“∞° æ¯¥¬ æ÷µÈ¿ª this(classø°º≠ ≥™ø¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, memoryø°º≠ πÊ ¡÷∑¡∞Ì ∏∏µÎ)∑Œ ∏∏µÎ.
		this.a = a; // ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ ª˝º∫¿⁄.(this) : «ˆ¿Á ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ(∞¥√º=t2ø°∞‘ ∞™¿ª ≥—±Ê)∏¶ ¡ˆƒ™«œ¥¬ ø¨ªÍ¿⁄.
		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞«∞° ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}

}

public class MTest03 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test t1 = new Test(); // public Test ();
		// ∞˝»£æ»ø° ∞™¿Ã æ¯¥¬(=parameter∞°æ¯¥¬) default ª˝º∫¿⁄.
		// new µ⁄ø°ø¿∏È ¿⁄¿Øøµø™ ∞¯∞£ø° πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		// Testø°¥¬ ∫Øºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.
		// Test() <=æÍ∞° ª˝º∫¿⁄¿Œµ•, new∏¶ ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ∏∂¿⁄ 6line πÊ∏∏µÈ∞Ì, 9 √‚∑¬«— ¥Ÿ¿Ωø° ¡÷º“ ¬¸¡∂ ?
		// what if ,
		System.out.println(t1.a);

		Test t2 = new Test(4000); // t1¿∫ ∫ÛπÊ , t2¥¬ ∞™¿ª ∞°¡¯πÊ
									// public Test(int a)
		System.out.println(t2.a);

	}
}

package com.test01;
// MAKER∞° ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫ª¥Ÿ.

// SUMMARY ¡ﬂø° CONSTRUCTOR∞° ¿÷¥¬ ≥.
// non static ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏£∏È ≥≤¿« ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ø√ ºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.
// ª˝º∫¿⁄¥¬ ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ«“ºˆ¿÷¥Ÿ. java.lang.integer¿« ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∫∏¿⁄.
// parameter value∏¶ ¡‡æﬂ ª˝º∫¿⁄ ∞°¥….

// java.util.random (CONSTRUCTOR) : non static π€ø° æ¯¥Ÿ¥¬∞‘ π∫∏ª¿Ãæﬂ 

import java.util.Random;

public class MTest04 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Integer i = new Integer(100);
		System.out.println(i); // ¡ˆ±› inter i πÊø° 100¿Ã µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ.

		Random r = new Random(); // 03ø°º≠ default ª˝º∫¿⁄ ∏ÌΩ√«—∞Õ√≥∑≥ ø©±‚º≠µµ ∏ÌΩ√«ÿ¡ÿ∞Õ.
		System.out.println(r.nextInt(10));

		int ar [] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50}         ;
        System.out.println(ar[2]); 
	}
}

	public Test() {
		a = 100;
		// ¿Ã∞‘ µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞≈¥Ÿ ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");

	public Test(int a) { // means ∞™¿ª ¡÷∏Èº≠ ª˝º∫.
		// non static ¡÷º“∞° æ¯¥¬ æ÷µÈ¿ª this(classø°º≠ ≥™ø¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, memoryø°º≠ πÊ ¡÷∑¡∞Ì ∏∏µÎ)∑Œ ∏∏µÎ.

		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞«∞° ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");

		// new µ⁄ø°ø¿∏È ¿⁄¿Øøµø™ ∞¯∞£ø° πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∞⁄¥Ÿ.

120     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test01\Mytest.java

package com.test01;

public class Mytest {
	public static int a ; // MyTest¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿Ã∏Èº≠ static¿Ã∞Ì, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∞° µ»¥Ÿ. ∞¢¿Â ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß∞° classø©º≠ class π€ø° ¿Œºˆ∏¶ º±æ«œ¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	public static int b=10 ; // MyTest¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿Ã∏Èº≠ static¿Ã∞Ì, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∞° µ»¥Ÿ. ∞¢¿Â ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß∞° classø©º≠ class π€ø° ¿Œºˆ∏¶ º±æ«œ¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	public static int c ; // MyTest¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿Ã∏Èº≠ static¿Ã∞Ì, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∞° µ»¥Ÿ. ∞¢¿Â ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß∞° classø©º≠ class π€ø° ¿Œºˆ∏¶ º±æ«œ¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("a="+a ); // ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ √ ±‚»≠∞° « ø‰∞° æ¯µÂ§ø§∑.
		System.out.println("b="+b ); // ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ √ ±‚»≠∞° « ø‰∞° æ¯µÂ§ø§∑.
		System.out.println("a="+Mytest.a ); // ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ √ ±‚»≠∞° « ø‰∞° æ¯µÂ§ø§∑.

		a = 3000;
	System.out.println(a);
		int c = 100;
	
		System.out.println("c="+c ); // ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ √ ±‚»≠∞° « ø‰∞° æ¯µÂ§ø§∑.
		System.out.println("c="+Mytest.c ); // ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ √ ±‚»≠∞° « ø‰∞° æ¯µÂ§ø§∑.

	}
}





121     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test01\Mytest01.java

package com.test01;
//ex) int a; double d; ==> «—≤®π¯ø° U_Test class∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ. (4+8=12πŸ¿Ã∆Æ¬•∏Æ πÊ) - ªÁøÎ¿⁄ ¿⁄∑·«¸ - class∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓ Ω·∂Û.

class U_Test { // classø° ≥ ∏∏¿« username¿ª ≥÷¿∏∏È ¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ãµ»¥Ÿ. // Class U_Test∞° ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ∏¶ æÛ∏∂≥™ ¬˜¡ˆ«œ¥¬¡ˆ æÀ ºˆ æ¯¿Ω.
	public int a; // class æ»ø° º±æ«— ∫Øºˆ¥¬ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ & static¿Ã æ¯±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ¡÷º“∞° æ¯¿Ω.
	public double d;
}

public class Mytest01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// 1. static¿Ã æ∆¥œ∏È (non_static)¡÷º“∞° æ¯±‚∂ßπÆø° ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ »£√‚.
		// Class∏Ì ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∫Øºˆ	
		U_Test um      = new U_Test();
	
	 System.out.println(um);
	 um.a=100;
	 um.d=99.9;
			 System.out.println(um.a+" : " + um.d);
			 System.out.println( );
			 um=null;  // ∫ÒøÏ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫µ•, ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ «◊ªÛ √ ±‚»≠ «ÿ¡‡æﬂ«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° Null
			 System.out.println(um.a+" : " + um.d);		 // ¡÷º“∏¶ ¡ˆøˆπˆ∑¡º≠ æ»∫∏¿”(=¡÷º“∞° ≤˜±Ë) ¥ŸΩ√ ±◊¡÷º“ ∏¯ √£¿Ω.. = ∞¥√º√ ±‚»≠
		
	}
}







122     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY05\src\com\test01\Mytest05.java

package com.test01;

public class Mytest05 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// run as - configurations - main¿« directory¿ª »Æ¿Œ - argumentsø° ∞™¿ª ¡ÿ¥Ÿ

		// µŒºˆ∏¶ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆ «’¿ª ±∏«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		int a = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
		int b = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);

		System.out.println(a + "+" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "-" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "*" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "/" + b + "=" + (a + b));

	}
}

125     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test\Address.java

package com.test;
/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address {

	public String name;   // ¿Ã∏ß
	public String Addr;   // ¡÷º“
	public String number; // ¿¸»≠π¯»£
	
	
	
	public Address () {}// µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
	
	
	public Address (String name, String number) { 

		this.name = name;
		this.number= number;
		this.Addr = Addr ; 
		
	}
	public Address (String name, String addr, String number) { 

		this.name = name; 
		this.Addr = addr ; 
		this.number = number ;
		
	}
	
	
// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.
	
@Override
  // toString : ∞Ì¡§∞™¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡‹
	public String toString() { // π∫º“∏∞¡ˆ ∏∏£∞⁄¡ˆ∏∏, ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ ª˝º∫«ﬂ¥Ÿ. source - generate toString (toString¿∫ ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ¿« override)
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", Addr=" + Addr + ", number=" + number + "]"; 
	}


public void Prn() {

	System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
}


public void setName(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}


public void setAddr(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}


public void setnumber(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}




}

127     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test\Address3.java

package com.test;

/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address3 {

	private String name; // ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ ∏µŒ private ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
	private String Addr;  // ∫Øºˆ «œ≥™¥Á set/get «œ≥™æø ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.
	private String number;     

	public Address3() {	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setAddr(String Addr) {
		this.Addr = Addr;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}

	public void setNumber(String number) {
		this.number = number;
	}

	public String getNumber() {
		return number;
	}

	public Address3(String name, String addr, String number) { // defaultª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏ÌΩ√ª˝º∫¿⁄∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«ﬂ¿›æ∆ø‰. πŸ∑Œ Ω««‡«œ∏È MTest ø¿∑˘≥≤.
		// ±◊∑°º≠ ¿ßø° ∫ÛπÊ¿ª πÃ∏Æ ∏’¿˙ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡‹

		this.name = name; // ¿ßø°º≠ ∏∏µÈæÓ ≥ı¿∫ ∫ÛπÊ¿ª, ø©±‚º≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ √§øˆ ≥÷¿ª∞≈¿”.
		this.Addr = addr;
		this.number = number;

	}

// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.

	public void Prn() {

		System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
	}

}

package com.test;
/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address5 {

	private String name;   // ¿Ã∏ß
	private String Addr;   // ¡÷º“
	private String number; // ¿¸»≠π¯»£


	
public Address5() {
		super();
		// ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ 
	}



public Address5(String name, String addr, String number) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		Addr = addr;
		this.number = number;
	}



public String getName() {
		return name;
	}



	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}



	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}



	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		Addr = addr;
	}



	public String getNumber() {
		return number;
	}



	public void setNumber(String number) {
		this.number = number;
	}
// ø¿∏•¬  πˆ∆∞ - source - generate - getter/setter
// ø¿∏•¬  πˆ∆∞ 	- source - generate - constructor using field.
// static ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° ¥Ÿ∏• ª˝º∫¿⁄øÕ ¥Ÿ∏£¥Ÿ ?

	

// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ
public void Prn() {

	System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
}




}

131     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test\MTest022.java

package com.test;
// this () : ≥ª∫Œª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚ 

class My {
	public String name;

	public My() {
	  this("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆"); // overload »£√‚. (1»∏º∫¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ¥¯¡ˆ¥¬∞≈) øÿ∏∏«œ∏È ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ∏∏µÏ¥œ¥Ÿ.
	   System.out.println("overload ¥Ÿ≥‡ø»");
	  // this.name = "noname" (∏ﬁ∏∏Æ »Æ∫∏«ﬂ¥Ÿ∞° ¡‹) 
	} // 11∂Û¿Œ¿« overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚, .name «œ¥¬∞Õ∞˙ () ¿∫ º”µµ¬˜¿Ã∞° ∏π¿Ã≥≤.
//	 ex) ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø° ø√∏Æ¥¬ Ω√∞£¬˜. ¡˜¥Î¿‘¿∫ Ω√∞£¿Ã ø¿∑°∞…∏Æ¡ˆ æ ¿Ω. 
//  ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ∏¶ »Æ∫∏«œ∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ ªÛ≈¬ø°º≠ ¡÷º“∏¶ √£æ∆∞°º≠ ∞™¿ª ¥Î¿‘«œ¥¬µ• Ω√∞£¿Ã∞…∏≤.
  // ±◊≥… ( )æ»ø° ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿ª ¥¯¡Æ¡÷∞Ì ≥°≥™±‚ ∂ßπÆ. 8∂Û¿Œ¿∫ 1»∏º∫(¡ˆø™∞™), 10∂Û¿Œ¿∫ ¿·Ωƒº∫(my default∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥Ÿ∞° ¡÷¥¬∞Õ).
	// º”µµ¥¬ ∞™¿ª æÓ∂ª∞‘ ¡÷¥¿≥ƒø° µ˚∂Û ¥Ÿ∏ß.default ª˝º∫¿⁄, overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿÷¿ª∂ß, ≥ª∫Œ¿˚¿∏∑Œ 8∂Û¿Œ Ωƒ¿∏∑Œ ∏π¿Ã √≥∏Æ«‘.
	
	public My(String name) {
		this.name = name; 
		// name=name ; ≥ªπÊø° ≥™∏¶ ≥÷∞⁄¥Ÿ. ¡ˆ±›¿∫ "º∫æ∆º∫æ∆" ≥÷∞Ì º“∏Íµ≈. æ¯æÓ¡Æπˆ∑¡. .¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ ±◊πÊø°º≠∏∏ ¿÷∞Ì, ø‹∫Œø°º≠ »£√‚¿Ã æ»µ .
		 // ¿⁄±‚∞° ¿⁄±‚∏¶ ∫Œ∏£∞Ì ªÁ∂Û¡Æº≠, ≥™¡ﬂ§∑ §ƒ∫Œ∏¶ ∂ß null ∞™¿Ã µÈæÓ∞°∞‘ µ .
		// this.name ; ¿¸ø™ ∫Øºˆ∞° ø». «ˆ¿Á ∏‚πˆ∏¶ ∏ÌΩ√»£√‚ «—¥Ÿ. my ∞¥√º¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ name = ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ name (¡ˆ±›¿∫)
	}   // overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ // 
}

public class MTest022 {

	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		 My m2 = new My("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆º∫æ∆"); //
		 System.out.println(m2.name);
		 // name = name ; ¿œ∂ß null
	}    // this.name = name; ¿œ∂ß, "tº∫æ∆º∫æ∆º∫æ∆"

package com.test;
// Address ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫ »ƒ, ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ∞˙ √‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */

public class MTest03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Address a1 = new Address();
		Address a2 = new Address();
		Address a3 = new Address();
		a1.setName("º∫æ∆");
		a1.setAddr("º≠øÔΩ√");
		a1.setnumber("01-01");
		a1.Prn();

		a2.setName(æ∆º∫); //  ¿¸«Ù ∏∏£∞⁄¥¬µ• ?
		
		a2.Addr(¥Î¿¸Ω√);
		a2.number(20-01);
		a2.Prn();

		a3.setName(æ≈æ≈);
		a3.setAddr()±§¡÷Ω√);
		a3.setnumber(31-25);
		a3.Prn();

		System.out.println();
		
//1. º∫æ∆¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿ª π⁄º∫æ∆∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê»ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a1.name = "π⁄º∫æ∆";
		a1.Prn();

//2.  æ∆º∫¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ ∞≈¡¶µµ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê»ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a2.Addr = "∞≈¡¶µµ";
		a2.Prn();

//3.  æ≈æ≈¿« π¯»£∏¶ 12-34∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a3.number = "12-34";
		a3.Prn();
	}

}

// ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.

// static, non static ¥Ÿ∏£¿›æ∆ø© ? µ—¥Ÿ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest05 {

	public static Address getAddress(Address r) {
//		return r;  ∞·∞˙ ∞™¿Ã    :       »´±Êµø         º≠øÔ      11-11 

		r.name = "¡§±Êµø";
		r.Addr = "∞≈¡¶µµ";
		r.number = "22-22"; // address∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ address ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		return r;
		
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address("»´±Êµø", "º≠øÔ", "11-11");
		Address res = getAddress(a1); /// static , a1 πﬁæ∆º≠ π∫∞° (∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿Ã «ÿ¥Á µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘¿Ã∂˚ ∏¬æ∆æﬂ)∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		// like, int r = getA() ; int r = 100 ;
		res.Prn(); // πﬁæ∆º≠ ±◊≥… ∏Æ≈œ.

	 
	res = new MTest05().getAddress(a1); // ∞¥√ºª˝º∫«ÿº≠ non static¿∏∑Œ »£√‚«œ∑¡¥¬ ∞≥ºˆ¿€.
	res.Prn();
	
	}

	 public Address getAddress01(Address r) { // ∏Ù∂Û -_- ππæﬂ ¿Ã∞‘  
		 return r;
	 }  // non static »£√‚

}

package com.test;
// Integer ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« non_static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

// lang.integer / Method Summary 4∞≥¿« ≈«  ¡ﬂø° Instance Method = non static
// Constructor Summary : ª˝º∫¿⁄ - ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ ª˝º∫¿⁄ 2∞≥ (int / String) 
// µŒπ¯¬∞∑Œ ∞•∞‘
//Integer(String s) 
//Constructs a newly allocated Integer object that represents the int value indicated by the String parameter.
// ø‹∫Œ(≥◊∆Æøˆ≈© ø¨∞·, ∆ƒ¿œ¿‘√‚∑¬, µ•¿Ã≈Õ ∫£¿ÃΩ∫, ¿•º≠∫ÒΩ∫)ø°º≠ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∏¶ ∞Æ¥Ÿ ¿˙¿Â«ﬂ¥ı¥œ, ∏µÁ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∞°String¿∏∑Œ ¿˙¿Âµ∆¥Ÿ∞Ì ∞£¡÷, ==> CSV(comma separated value)ø°º≠ ¿˙¿Â«ﬂ¥Ÿ.
// CSV(excel)ø° ∏µÁ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∞° ¡§ºˆ∞™¿ª String¿∏∑Œ ∞¸∏Æ «œ¥ı∂Û.
// String∞™¿ª ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ ¡§ºˆ∑Œ ø¨ªÍ«ÿº≠ Noqlø° Mongodbø° ¿˙¿Â«ÿº≠ ¡¬«•∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ Ω√≈∞∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ.

public class MTest06 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		String su = "980=.007";
		Integer i = new Integer(su);
// double d = i.doubleValue();  // double¿Ã integer∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«ÿ¡÷¥¬∞‘ « ø‰«‘.(double classø°∞°º≠ »Æ¿Œ)
		// double ∞™¿ª ªÃæ∆øÕº≠, casting æ»«œ∞Ì class∑Œ «ÿ∞·«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ.
		// 1. String¿ª double∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
		double d = new Double(su);
		int r = d.intValue();
		System.out.println(r);

		int res = new Double(su).intValue();
		System.out.println(res);
		// Integer i = new Integer (su);

		// 2. double¿ª Integer∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
		//

	}

}

package com.test;

//Address ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ≈Î«ÿº≠ √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«ÿº≠ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
// ¥‹, ∞¥√º∏¶ √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ πﬁ¿∫ »ƒ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest44 { 
    public static void Disp(Address ar) { // ar = a1¿« ¡÷º“.
    	ar.Prn();
    	ar.name = "what???";
   
    	System.out.println(ar);
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address ("»´±Êµø","º≠øÔ","11-11");
		Address a2 = new Address ("¡§±Êµø","∫ŒªÍ","22-22");
		Address a3 = new Address ("√÷±Êµø","±§¡÷","33-33");
		
		 // secure code ∞° « ø‰ / a1¿∏∑Œ æ≤∏È æ»µ≈ø©. ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘µµ æ¯∞Ì, ∫∏æ»µµ æ˚∏¡¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.

		
		System.out.println("a1 &="+a1);
		System.out.println("a2 &="+a2);
		System.out.println("a3 &="+a3);
		a1.Prn(); // a1 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘) / class( ¿⁄∑·«¸ / ¿Ø¿˙µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘ / ¬¸¡∂«¸ class)¿⁄πŸ¿« »£√‚¥‹¿ß¥¬ method, Ω««‡¥‹¿ß¥¬ class
		a2.Prn(); // a2 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)
		a3.Prn(); // a3 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)

		System.out.println();
		
		Disp(a1); // public static void Disp(Address); // ∞¥√º∏¶ ≥—∞‹º≠ ¥‹¿œ ¿€æ˜¿ª π›∫π Ω√≈≥ ºˆ ¿’¥Ÿ.
		Disp(a2);
		Disp(a3); // ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙.
		
		a3.Prn();
		
		
	}
}
// MTest03∞˙ ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙

// ¥‹, ∞¥√º∏¶ √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ πﬁ¿∫ »ƒ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest45 { 
    public static void Disp(Address ar) { // ar = a1¿« ¡÷º“.
    	ar.Prn();
    	ar.setName("what???");
   
    	System.out.println(ar);
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address ("»´±Êµø","º≠øÔ","11-11");
		Address a2 = new Address ("¡§±Êµø","∫ŒªÍ","22-22");
		Address a3 = new Address ("√÷±Êµø","±§¡÷","33-33");
		
		 // secure code ∞° « ø‰ / a1¿∏∑Œ æ≤∏È æ»µ≈ø©. ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘µµ æ¯∞Ì, ∫∏æ»µµ æ˚∏¡¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.

		
		System.out.println("a1 &="+a1);
		System.out.println("a2 &="+a2);
		System.out.println("a3 &="+a3);
		a1.Prn(); // a1 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘) / class( ¿⁄∑·«¸ / ¿Ø¿˙µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘ / ¬¸¡∂«¸ class)¿⁄πŸ¿« »£√‚¥‹¿ß¥¬ method, Ω««‡¥‹¿ß¥¬ class
		a2.Prn(); // a2 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)
		a3.Prn(); // a3 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)

		System.out.println();
		
		Disp(a1); // public static void Disp(Address); // ∞¥√º∏¶ ≥—∞‹º≠ ¥‹¿œ ¿€æ˜¿ª π›∫π Ω√≈≥ ºˆ ¿’¥Ÿ.
		Disp(a2);
		Disp(a3); // ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙.
		
		a3.Prn();
		
		
	}
}

package com.test;
// ∞¥√ºª˝º∫ ø¨Ω¿ & ¡÷º“∏¶ »Æ¿Œ
// «—π¯æ≤∞Ì πˆ∏Æ∞≈≥™ or ∞Ëº” æ≤∞≈≥™.

public class Mytest01 {
public int a;

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println(new Mytest01().a); 
                            // ∞¥√ºª˝º∫ . ∏‚πˆ»£√‚ 
		                    // means «—π¯∏∏ æ≤∞⁄¥Ÿ. = read only.
		Mytest01 m1 = new Mytest01();
		System.out.println(m1.a+ ": &" + m1);
		m1.a = 100;
		System.out.println(m1.a+":&"+m1);
		System.out.println(new Mytest01()); // ∏Æ≈œ¿∫ printlnø° «—π¯«œ∞Ì ≥°. ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ∞Ì ≥°≥ª∞⁄¥Ÿ¥¬ ∂Ê. 4∞≥¿« πÊ∏∏ ∏∏µÎ.
		 // new Mytest01() ¥¬ ¡÷º“. (ø¿∏•¬ ø° ¿÷¿∏¥œ±Ó, ¡÷º“ = ∞™ = ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤), 
		 // like, disp(color C); disp(new color(255,0,0));  ¡÷º“∏Æ≈œæ»«ﬂ¿∏¥œ±Ó, «—π¯æ≤∞Ì πˆ∏≤.

		// like, color c = new color (255,0,0); ∫Øºˆ ¿÷¿∏¥œ±Ó ∞Ëº” æ≤∞⁄¡ˆ. æ∆∑°¿ß∑Œ ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙∞° ≥™ø».
		// disp(c) ; 
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());

		
	}

}

package com.test02;

public class MTest01 {

	public static final int k = 10000;

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		final int a = 10; // ∫Øºˆ∏¶ ªÛºˆ»≠ : FINAL¿Ã ∏≈øÏ ¡ﬂø‰«’¥œ¥Ÿ.  // field∂Û∞Ì 
		System.out.println("a=" + a);

//		a = 1000; // æ»µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ. 10 != 1000, final¿Ã∂Û∞Ì æ’ø°º≠ ªÛºˆº±æ¿ª «ﬂ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, µ⁄ø°º≠ a ∞™¿ª ∫Øºˆ√≥∑≥ ∫Ø∞ÊΩ√≈≥ ºˆ æ¯¿Ω.
		System.out.println("k=" + k);
		System.out.println("k=" + MTest01.k);

	}
}





142     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test02\MTest02.java

package com.test02;
// static ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ¡§¿««“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. √ ±‚»≠ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.

class Test {
	public int a;
	public static int s;

	/// ¿œπŸ∏‚πˆ∫ØºˆøÕ static ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ
	static { // static ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿« √ ±‚»≠∏¶ ¿ß«ÿ ¿Ø¿œ«œ∞‘ class æ»ø° πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ æ∏.
		System.out.println("--------------");
		s = 100;
	} // ¡÷º“∞° ª˝±‚∏Èº≠ ¡¶¿œ∏’¿˙ »£√‚¿Ãµ 

	public Test() {
		System.out.println("ª˝º∫¿⁄æﬂ ≥™¥¬");
		// s = 1000;
	}
}

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test t1 = new Test();
		Test t2 = new Test();
		System.out.println(Test.s); // static∞˙ public test µ— ¡ﬂø° ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ¥¬ static ¿Ã ∏’¿˙ ø¿¿›æ∆, ±◊∑≥ √ ±‚»≠¥¬ static øµø™ø° ¡›¥œ¥Ÿ.
	}

}

144     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test02\MTest04.java

package com.test02;

class Test02 {
	private int a;
	private int b;

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a; // ø©±‚ æ¯¿∏∏È ¿–±‚ ¿¸øÎ (getter)
	}

	public void setB(int b) { // ∏‚πˆ ∫Øºˆ bø°∞‘ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê
		this.b = b;
	}

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	} // ø©±‚ æ¯¿∏∏È æ≤±‚ ¿¸øÎ (setter)

	public int getB() { // ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ b ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ
		return b;
	}
}

public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// Test02 ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ 1000¿ª ¿‘∑¬«— »ƒ √‚∑¬ «ÿ ∫∏¿⁄.
		Test02 t1 = new Test02(); // a∂Û¥¬ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∞° ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø° «“¥Áµ»¥Ÿ.
		t1.setA(1000); // ∞™¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê
		System.out.println(t1.getA()); // ∏Æ≈œ

		t1.setB(2000);
		System.out.println(t1.getB());
	}

}





145     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY07\src\com\test02\MTest05.java

package com.test02;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Random;

import com.test.Address;

public class MTest05 { // ∏µÁ class¥¬ object¿« ¿⁄Ωƒ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì ª˝∞¢«—¥Ÿ.
	public String toString() { //º±¡∂∞° ∞°¡¯ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ∞° ¡§¿«∏¶ ªı∑Œ «—¥Ÿ.
	return "≥ª≤®æﬂ"	;
	
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		MTest05 m = new MTest05(); // default ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ maker√¯ø°º≠ ¡¶∞¯«ÿº≠ »£√‚ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
		System.out.println(m.toString()); // ∞∞¿∫ ¿«πÃ∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		System.out.println(m); // m æ»ø°¥¬ ¡÷º“∞° µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ. @≈∞øˆµÂ∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ«œø©, hashcode ∞™¿∏∑Œ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡‹.

		/* toString (java.object.method)
		 * https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/index.html
public String toString()
Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read. It is recommended that all subclasses override this method. 
The toString method for class Object returns a string consisting of the name of the class of which the object is an instance, the at-sign character `@', and the unsigned hexadecimal representation of the hash code of the object. In other words, this method returns a string equal to the value of: 
 getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())
 
Returns:
a string representation of the object.
*/
		
		Address ar = new Address();
		System.out.println(ar);
		System.out.println(ar.toString());  // µŒ ∞™¿Ã ∞∞æ∆. ar¿Ã∂Û∞Ì æ≤∏È ªÁΩ« to.string¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ∞Ì ¿÷æ˙¥¯∞≈¡ˆ.
		
		Random r = new Random();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(r.toString());
		
		Runtime rt = Runtime.getRuntime();// ¿⁄±‚ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø° ¿⁄±‚∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ single turn. 
		rt.exec("mspaint");
	}
}

package com.exam;

public class Myclass {
	private int a;

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	}

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public static void View() {
// ∞∞¿∫ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø° ¿÷æÓµµ static¿Ã non static∫Œ∏£∑¡∏È, ¡÷º“ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡‡æﬂ«‘
		
		Myclass m = new Myclass();
		m.setA(100);
		System.out.println(m.getA());
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// new Myclass().View(); æ»µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ. ø÷ æ»µ»¥Ÿ∞Ì ? static¿« »£√‚¿∫ class.method ∑Œ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∫“∑Ø¡‡æﬂ«œ¥œ±Óøµ
		Myclass.View();

	}

}

package com.test;

// æÓ¡¶ «ﬂ∂≤ Tostring¿ª ø¨Ω¿«œ∞Ì ∞•∞‘ø© 
// object¿« ∏‚πˆ (java.lang.object) : ∞¥√º¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ µø¿˚¿∏∑Œ «“¥Áµ» 16¡¯ºˆ ∞™¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ. (object∞° ¡¶∞¯«ÿ¡÷¥¬ ±‚∫ª ∫£º“µÂ)
// getclass, getname,
// ∞¥√º.
// ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø°¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∞°¿÷¥Ÿ.
// ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ≥™¥≠∂ß ±‚∫ª«¸/¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ≥™¥´¥Ÿ.
// ø¯«¸¿∫ static / non static (∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆµµ, ∏ﬁº“µÂµµ )

// ª˝º∫¿⁄¥¬ ªÛº”µ«¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ. ≥™¥¬ this ª˝º∫¿⁄, º±¡∂¥¬ super ?
public class MTest {
	 public String toString() {
		 return "≥™¿«¡÷º“¥¬" + super.toString();
	 } // super∞° æ¯¿∏∏È ≥ª∞° ≥™∏¶ ∫Œ∏ß.
	  // mtestµµ tostring¿Ã ¿÷∞Ì , super¥¬ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ º±¡∂¿« ∏Æ≈œ∞™. 
	 
public static void main(String[] args) {
	System.out.println(new MTest());
	System.out.println(new MTest().toString());

	MTest m1=new MTest();
	System.out.println(m1);
	System.out.println(m1.toString());

}
}

package com.test;

// java beans = getter & setter = ∞™∏∏ ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ¥¬ ValueObject (VO) - voø°¥¬ getset¿« ¿‹ƒ°
//com.kt.vo  : ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∞£ø° ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚
//com.kt.entity : DB¿« ≈◊¿Ã∫Ì ±‚∫ª ¥‹¿ß (attribute = col in DB)ø° ∏¬¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ º±æ«œ∞Ì ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚	
//com.kt.biz : ∫Ò¡Ó¥œΩ∫ ∑Œ¡˜ , ø¨ªÍ«œ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫
public class MTest02 {

	private Test t1; // class µµ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆµµ ø√∂Ûø√ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.

	public MTest02() {
		t1 = new Test(); // class∏¶ ø©±‚ø° ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ÿ¥Ÿ
	}

	public MTest02(Test t1, Test t2, Test t3) {
		super();
		this.t1 = t1;

	}



	public Test getT1() {
		return t1;
	}

	public void setT1(Test t1) {
		this.t1 = t1;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) { // class∏¶ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞°¡Æ∞°∏È »£√‚¿ª æÓ∂ª∞‘ «œ§ø§§ø© ?

		MTest02 m1 = new MTest02(); // m1¿∫ ¿⁄¿Øøµø™ ∞¯∞£ø° ¿÷¥¬ MTest02∏¶ ¬¸¡∂.
//		 MTest¥¬ t1ø°¥Ÿ∞° new test∂Û∞Ì«ÿº≠ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∏¶ ª˝º∫Ω√ƒ◊æÓ.
		// Mtest 02æﬂ, ≥ ¥¬ m1¿Ãæﬂ. «œ∞Ì µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∫Øºˆ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæ˘¥Ÿ∏È,
		// new mtest 02 ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ public MTest02∑Œ ø√∂Û∞°¥¬µ•, Test t1¿Ã∂Û¥¬ πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∞Ì null¿ª ¡÷¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
// t1¥¬ new test (11), t1¥¬ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬æ÷ (¿⁄¿Øøµø™∞¯∞£ ø∑ø° new Test πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓ ) 
		// = ø¨ªÍ¿⁄∞° πﬂª˝«œ¥œ±Ó, int a¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ Test t1¿Ã ¬¸¡∂∏¶ «œ∞Ì(Mtest02¿« ∞¥√º)

		System.out.println(m1.getT1()); //////// «œ≥™µµ ∏∏£∞⁄æ˝§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ªππ≥ƒ∞Ì
		System.out.println(m1);

		Test t1 = new Test();

		m1.setT1(t1);
		// System.out.println(m1.getT1().getA());

package com.test;
// java beans = getter & setter = ∞™∏∏ ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ¥¬ ValueObject (VO) - voø°¥¬ getset¿« ¿‹ƒ°
//com.kt.vo  : ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∞£ø° ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚
//com.kt.entity : DB¿« ≈◊¿Ã∫Ì ±‚∫ª ¥‹¿ß (attribute = col in DB)ø° ∏¬¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ º±æ«œ∞Ì ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚

public class MTest22 {

		return t1;
	}

	public void setT1(Test t1) {
		this.t1 = t1;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) { // class∏¶ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞°¡Æ∞°∏È »£√‚¿ª æÓ∂ª∞‘ «œ§ø§§ø© ?

155     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY08\src\com\test01\MStudent.java

package com.test01;

import com.test.Address;

public class MStudent {

	public static void main(String[] args) { 
		Student s1 = new Student (1, new Address("»´±Êµø", "11","11"));
		Student s2 = new Student (2, new Address("¡§±Êµø", "22","22"));
		Student s3 = new Student (3, new Address("π⁄±Êµø", "33","33"));

		System.out.println(s1);
		System.out.println(s2);
		System.out.println(s3);
		
		System.out.println("===================");
		
		// 1π¯ «–ª˝¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ º≠øÔ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ, ¿¸√º √‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		// ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∞°¡¢±Ÿ¿Ã ∫“∞°¥…«— private¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿Ã∏ß¿ª √£¿∏∑¡∏È Address¿« getName¿ª ¬ÔæÓæﬂ »´±Êµø¿Ã ≥™ø». (Address∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ getAddress∏¶ ∏’¿˙ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿæﬂ∞⁄¡ˆ)
		
		System.out.println("no :"+s1.getNo());
		System.out.println("name:"+s1.getAddress().getName());
		System.out.println("addr: "+s1.getAddress().getAddr());
		System.out.println("phone: "+s1.getAddress().getPhone());
			System.out.println();
		System.out.println(s1.getAddress());
		System.out.println(s1.getAddress().toString());
		 // Address ≥ªøÎø° toString¿ª ¿Á¡§¿« «ﬂ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¡÷º“∞° æ∆¥œ∂Û ≥ªøÎ¿Ã ≥™ø…¥œ¥Ÿ.
		Address ar=s1.getAddress();
		System.out.println(ar); // ar.toString ();
		
		
		s1.getAddress().setAddr("º≠øÔΩ√"); // get¿∫ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬∞≈∞Ì, set¿∫ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
		 // get Addressø°º≠ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ setAddr¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ¥¬∞≈¡ˆ (get addressø°º≠ set ¿∏∑Œ √£æ∆∞°¥¬∞≈æﬂ)
		System.out.println(ar);
		s1.getAddress().setPhone("2222");
		System.out.println(ar);
		
	}}




156     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\DAY08\src\com\test01\Student.java

package com.test01;

import com.test.Address;

public class Student {
	private int no;
	private Address address;

	public Student(int no, Address address) {
		super();
		this.no = no;
		this.address = address; // ø¿∏•¬ ø° ª˝±‰ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	}

	
	
	public Student() {
		super(); // Address∏¶ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠, null∑Œ √ ±‚»≠µ«¥œ±Ó, æ»ø° ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ. ??
		          // ¿œ∫Œ∑Ø ∫Òøˆ≥˘¥Ÿ±∏ø© ?
		

	}

	public int getNo() {
		return no;
	}

	public void setNo(int no) {
		this.no = no;
	}
	// Address ∞¥√º¿Œ address ¡Ô ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞Ÿ¥Ÿ.
	
	public Address getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(Address address) {
		this.address = address;
	}




public String toString() {
	String str= String.format("no.%5d", this.getNo());
	return str+ address;
}

	

}

public class Address {
	public static void maind(String[] args) {
		Address ar = new Address ("»´±Êµø","º≠øÔΩ√","88-88");
		System.out.println(ar); // ar.toString :  ¿Á¡§¿««—∞… ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ »£√‚«œ±‚ ¿ß«‘?

		ar.setName("¡§±Êµø"); // ∞™ ∫Ø∞Ê
	
		System.out.println(ar);
		System.out.println(ar.getName());
		
}
