303     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\JDBC3\src\com\dao\BookDao.java

package com.dao;

//1.¿¸√º   2.√ﬂ∞°  3.∑πƒ⁄µÂºˆ   4.¡æ∑·
// insert into bookshop values('88-001101-a1','¿⁄πŸ3¿œøœº∫','±Ëøœº∫',13000);
// insert into bookshop values('90-201101-a1','JSP¥ﬁ¿Œµ«±‚','¿Ã¥ﬁ¿Œ',25000);

public interface BookDao {

	String sql_all = "SELECT * FROM BOOKSHOP";
	String sql_insert = "INSERT INTO BOOKSHOP VALUES(?,?,?,?)";
	String sql_count = "SELECT COUNT (*) FROM BOOKSHOP";
	String sql_update = "UPDATE BOOKSHOP SET PRICE=? WHERE SUBJECT = ?";
	String sql_delete = "DELETE FROM BOOKSHOP WHERE ISBN=?";

}





304     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\JDBC3\src\com\dao\BookShopDao.java

package com.dao;

import static common.JDBCTemplate.*;

import java.sql.*;
import java.util.*;

import com.entity.BookShopVo;

public class BookShopDao implements BookDao {

	Connection conn;

	public BookShopDao(Connection conn) {
		this.conn = conn;
	}

	public int appendBook(String isbn, String subject, String author, int price) {
// √ﬂ∞°

		PreparedStatement pstm = null;
		int res = 0;

		try {
			pstm = conn.prepareStatement(sql_insert);
			pstm.setString(1, isbn);
			pstm.setString(2, subject);
			pstm.setString(3, author);
			pstm.setInt(4, price);

			res = pstm.executeUpdate();
			if (res > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			} else
				Rollback(conn);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			Rollback(conn);
			e.printStackTrace();
		} finally {
			if (res < 0) {
				Rollback(conn);

			}
			Close(pstm);
		}

		return 0;
	}

	public List<BookShopVo> listBook() { // ¥Ÿ«¸º∫ List or ArrayList
// 	¿¸√º
		BookShopVo vo = null;
		List<BookShopVo> all = new ArrayList<>();

		Statement stmt = null;
		ResultSet rs = null;

		try {
			stmt = conn.createStatement();
			rs = stmt.executeQuery(sql_all);

			while (rs.next()) {
				vo = new BookShopVo();
				vo.setIsbn(rs.getString(1));
				vo.setSubject(rs.getString(2));
				vo.setAuthor(rs.getString(3));
				vo.setPrice(rs.getInt(4));
				all.add(vo);
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(stmt);
		}

		return all;
	}

	public int countBook() {

		Statement stmt1 = null;
		ResultSet rs = null;
		int a = 0;
		try {
			stmt1 = conn.createStatement();

			rs = stmt1.executeQuery(sql_count);
			if (rs.next()) {
				a = rs.getInt(1); // count(*) æµ ºˆ æ¯¿∏π«∑Œ 1¿ª¡ÿ¥Ÿ. ∫∞ƒ™ ¡·¿∏∏È, ∫∞ƒ™¿∏∑Œ ∫“∑Øµµ µ 
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(stmt1);
		}

		return a;
	}

	public int updateBook(BookShopVo vo) {
		PreparedStatement pstm1 = null;
		int r = 0;
		try {
			pstm1 = conn.prepareStatement(sql_update);
			pstm1.setInt(1, vo.getPrice());
			pstm1.setString(2, vo.getSubject());

			r = pstm1.executeUpdate();
			if (r > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			System.out.println(e.getMessage());
		} finally {
			Close(pstm1);
		}

		return 0;
	}

	public int deleteBook(String isbn) {
		PreparedStatement pst = null;

		int a = 0;

		try {
			pst = conn.prepareStatement(sql_delete);
			pst.setString(1, isbn);
			a = pst.executeUpdate();
			if (a > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} finally {
			Close(pst);
		}

		return a;
	}

}





305     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\JDBC3\src\com\entity\BookShopVo.java

package com.entity;

public class BookShopVo {

	/*
	 * create table bookshop( isbn varchar2(15) primary key, subject varchar2(30)
	 * not null, author varchar2(10), price number(6));
	 */

	
	private String isbn ;
	private String subject ;
	private String author ;
	private int price ;
	
	public BookShopVo() {
		super();
	}


	public String getIsbn() {
		return isbn;
	}

	public void setIsbn(String isbn) {
		this.isbn = isbn;
	}

	public String getSubject() {
		return subject;
	}

	public void setSubject(String subject) {
		this.subject = subject;
	}

	public String getAuthor() {
		return author;
	}

	public void setAuthor(String author) {
		this.author = author;
	}

	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}

	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	
	
	
	
}





306     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\JDBC3\src\com\view\SalesBookShop.java

package com.view;

import com.biz.*;
import com.dao.*;
import com.entity.*;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class SalesBookShop {

	Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

	public SalesBookShop() {
		super();
	}

	public int menu() {
		StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
		sb.append("1. ¿¸√º  ");
		sb.append("2. √ﬂ∞°  ");
		sb.append("3. ∑πƒ⁄µÂ ºˆ  ");
		sb.append("4. ºˆ¡§  ");
		sb.append("5. ªË¡¶  ");
		sb.append("6. ¡æ∑· \n  ");
		sb.append("º±≈√(1-6) : ");
		System.out.println(sb.toString());
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		return n;
	}

	public void process(int n) {

		BookShopBiz biz = new BookShopBiz();
		BookShopVo vo = new BookShopVo();
		String isbn;
		String subject;
		String author;
		int price;

		switch (n) {

		case 1: // ¿¸√º
			List<BookShopVo> all = biz.listBook();
			for (BookShopVo r : all) {
				System.out.printf("%20s %10s %5s %10d \n", r.getIsbn(), r.getSubject(), r.getAuthor(), r.getPrice());
			}

			/*
			 * List<BookShopVo> all = biz.listBook(); Iterator<BookShopVo> it =
			 * all.iterator(); while(it.hasNext()){ BookShopVo vo = (BookShopVo) it.nex();
			 * // iterator¿« hasnext record ¿–∞Ì ∏∂¡ˆ∏∑ point ¿ßƒ° <> ResultSet¿« next () record¿–∞Ì ,
			 * pointer new recordø° ¿Ãµø »ƒ true System.out.print("ISBN : "+ vo.getIsbn() +
			 * "\t"); System.out.print("SUBJECT : "+vo.getSubject()+ "\t");
			 * System.out.print("AUTHOR : "+vo.getAuthor()+ "\t");
			 * System.out.print("PRICE : "+vo.getPrice()+ "\n");
			 */

			break;

		case 2: // √ﬂ∞°
			System.out.println("ISBN : ");
			isbn = sc.next().trim();
			vo.setIsbn(isbn);
			System.out.println("SUBJECT : ");
			subject = sc.next().trim();
			vo.setSubject(subject);
			System.out.println("AUTHOR : ");
			author = sc.next().trim();
			vo.setAuthor(author);
			System.out.println("PRICE : ");
			price = sc.nextInt();
			vo.setPrice(price);

			int res = biz.appendBook(isbn, subject, author, price);
			if (res > 0) {
				System.out.println("√ﬂ∞°µ«æ˙Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ");
				System.out.println(res);
			} else {
				System.out.println("√ﬂ∞° Ω«∆–«œø¥Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
				System.out.println(res);
			}
			vo = null;
			break;

		case 3: // ∑πƒ⁄µÂºˆ
			int cnt = biz.countBook();
			System.out.println("¿¸√º ∑πƒ⁄µÂºˆ¥¬ " + cnt + "∞≥ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ");
			break;
		case 4: // ºˆ¡§ : subject∑Œ √£æ∆º≠ price∏¶ ∫Ø∞Ê

			System.out.println("SUBJECT : ");
			subject = sc.next().trim();

			System.out.println("PRICE : ");
			price = sc.nextInt();
			vo.setPrice(price);

			BookShopVo vo1 = new BookShopVo();
			vo1.setSubject(subject);
			vo1.setPrice(price);
			int res1 = biz.updateBook(vo1);
			if (res1 > 0) {
				System.out.println("Update complete successfully !");
			}
			break;
		case 5: // ªË¡¶
			System.out.println("ISBN : ");
			isbn = sc.next();
			
			res=biz.deleteBook(isbn);
			if(res>0) 
			{
				System.out.println("DELETE");
			}
			
			
			vo.setIsbn(isbn);
			
			break;
		case 6: // ¡æ∑·
			System.out.println(" ** «¡∑Œ±◊∑•¿ª ¡æ∑·«’¥œ¥Ÿ. **");
			System.exit(0);

		}

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		SalesBookShop sb = new SalesBookShop();
		while (true) {
			int n = sb.menu();
			sb.process(n);
		}

	}

}





307     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\JDBC3\src\common\JDBCTemplate.java

package common;

// connection & close∏∏ ¿÷¥Ÿ. 
// DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑· / ROLLBACK / COMMIT 4∞≥∏∏ ¿÷¿Ω
// client∞° æÓ∂≤ pageø° ¡¢º”¿ª «œ∞«, ø¨∞·µ» ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ ∏µŒ client ¡§∫∏∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷æÓæﬂ «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿Ã∞˜ø° ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥¬ ¿¸∫Œ static¿∏∑Œ ª˝º∫.
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Properties;

/*Name : JDBCTemplate
 * DESC : DB¿–æÓø¿∞Ì π›»Ø«œ¥¬ µÓ ±‚¥…¿ª ºˆ«‡«œ¥¬ Utility ≈¨∑°Ω∫
 * DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑·
 * */

public class JDBCTemplate {
	public static void Commit(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.commit();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// ∆Æ∑£¿Ëº«√≥∏Æ (rollback)
	public static void Rollback(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.rollback();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

// DBø¨∞·

	public static Connection getConnection() {
		try {
			Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		String url = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@127.0.0.1:1521:XE";
		Properties pro = new Properties();
		String id = "user";
		String pw = "password";
		pro.put(id, "bigdata");
		pro.put(pw, "admin1234");

		Connection con = null;
		try {
			con = DriverManager.getConnection(url, pro);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		try {
			con.setAutoCommit(false);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return con;
	}
// db ¡æ∑·

	public static void Close(Connection con) {
		if (isConnection(con)) {
			try {
				con.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// DBøÕ ONNECCT∞° µ«æ˙¥¬¡ˆ ø©∫Œ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ
	public static boolean isConnection(Connection con) {
		boolean valid = true;
		try {
			if (con == null || con.isClosed()) {
				valid = false;
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			valid = true;
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return valid;
	} // statement close

	public static void Close(Statement stmt) {
		if (stmt != null) {
			try {
				stmt.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	public static void Close(ResultSet rs) {
		if (rs != null) {
			try {
				rs.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

public class Address {

	private String phone;

		super(); // ¿÷¿∏≥™ æ¯¿∏≥™
	}

	 // ª˝º∫¿⁄ ∏∏µÈ±‚
	public Address(String name, String addr, String phone) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	 // getter & setter   ø©±‚±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ «œ∏È java beans.
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}

	public String getPhone() {
		return phone;
	}

	public void setPhone(String phone) {
		this.phone = phone;
	}
/*
	// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ toString () override. 
	 // ¡§¿« «ÿ ≥ı¿∫ ∞Õ¿ª ¥ŸΩ√ ¡§¿««œ¥¬ ¿Á¡§¿« = annotation
	
	@Override   // ¡÷ºÆ¿∫ Ω««‡«“∂ß º“∏Íµ«¥¬µ•, @∏¶ ∫Ÿ¿Ã∏È ªÏæ∆¿’¿Ω. 
	            // if) tostring¿Ã∂Û∞Ì æ≤∏È, @override∞° ∫∏∞Ì ∞…∑Ø¡‹, æﬂ ! toString¿Ã∂Û∞Ì Ω·æﬂ override∂Û∞Ì !
	 // ∫Ò¡Ó¥œΩ∫ ∑Œ¡˜¿« ∞ÊøÏ, ƒ⁄µÂ ¬•º≠ jar∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∞Ì, @-- ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ æ≤¥¬∞≈æﬂ.

		return null;
	} */
 // √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ toString ()
	@Override

public String toString() {
//System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", this.name, this.addr, this.phone); // ≥ª ∫Øºˆ∞° ππ∞° ¿÷¥¬¡ˆ ∏Ù∂Ûº≠, 'this.'¿ª ƒ°∏È, ∞°¡¯ ∫Øºˆ∞° πÿ¿∏∑Œ ¥Ÿ µ˚∂Ûø¿¥œ±Ó º±≈√«œ∏Èµ .
// √‚∑¬πÆ¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ. ±◊∑≥ ¿¸√º∞° πÆ¿⁄ø≠¿ÃæÓæﬂ «‘. printf ¥¬ void¿Ã±‚ ¥ÎπÆø° ≥™¡ﬂø° ∏Æ≈œ¿ª ≤¿ «ÿ¡‡æﬂ«‘.
// lang.string.-method - 	format¿ª Ω·∫∏¿⁄. 
	
	// ≥ª∞° ∏∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« ∏‚πˆ∫ØºˆµÈ¿ª √‚∑¬«“∂ß, ln æ≤∏È ƒ‹º÷ø°º≠ π€ø° ë°Ωø πÆ¿⁄ø≠¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ ø©±‚¿˙±‚ ª—∏Æ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫∞≈æﬂ. ±◊∑≤∂© format¿ª Ω·º≠ πÆ¿⁄ø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «ÿ¡÷¥¬∞≈¡ˆ.
	// ln¿∫ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ µÈæÓ∞°∏È æ»Ω·ø©. 
	String str=String.format("%10s %10s %10s \n", this.name, this.addr, this.phone);
return str;
}

309     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JavaWork\MyScore\src\com\test\Score.java

package com.test;
// ¿Ã∏ß ±πæÓ øµæÓ ºˆ«– (√—¡° ∆Ú±’«–¡° ==> ∞ËªÍ«ÿº≠ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡‡æﬂ «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° return «¸)
public class Score {

	private String name ;
	private int kor, eng, mat, tot;
	private double avg;
	private String grad;
	
	public Score() {
		// ∫ÛπÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∂ß, ≥ª∫Œ¿˚¿∏∑Œ √ ±‚ ∞™¿ª ∞Æ∞⁄¥Ÿ∞Ì «œ∏È, æ∆∑°øÕ∞∞¿Ã ∏∏µÁ¥Ÿ.
		this("noname",50,60,80);
		// ªı∑ŒøÓ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«“∂ß, ≥ª∫Œ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ »£√‚«œ∞‘ µ»¥Ÿ. ¡÷¿« )this ( )  dl «¸Ωƒ¿Ã ª˝º∫¿⁄»£√‚¿Ã¥œ±Ó ∏ﬁº“µÂ »£√‚¿Ã∂˚ ¥Ÿ∏ß ( class.method¿Ã∏ß ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì »£√‚«ÿæﬂ¡ˆ )
		
	} // set (¿ÃπÃ ¿‘∑¬µ«æÓ ¿÷¥¬ √ ±‚∞™¿Ã ∆≤∏±∂ß, set , get §∑øÎ«œø© ºˆ¡§ )


	
	
	public Score(String name, int kor, int eng, int mat) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.kor = kor;
		this.eng = eng;
		this.mat = mat;


	}




	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}


	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}


	public int getKor() {
		return kor;
	}


	public void setKor(int kor) {
		this.kor = kor;
	}


	public int getEng() {
		return eng;
	}


	public void setEng(int eng) {
		this.eng = eng;
	}


	public int getMat() {
		return mat;
	}


	public void setMat(int mat) {
		this.mat = mat;
	}


	public int getTot() {
		tot = getKor() + getEng() + getMat() ;
		return tot;
	}


	public double getAvg() {
		avg = (double) getTot()/3;
		return avg;
	}


	public String getGrad() {
		switch ((int)getAvg()/10) {
		
		case 10 :
		case 9 : grad = "A"; break;
		case 8 : grad = "B"; break;
		case 7 : grad = "C"; break;
		case 6 : grad = "D"; break;
		default : grad = "F"; break;

		}// switch end
		return grad;
		
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {


		String str = String.format("%10s %5d %5d %5d %5d %5.1f %3s \n", getName(),getKor(),getEng(),getMat(),getTot(),getAvg(),getGrad());
		return str ;
		
	}

	
	

public static void main(String[] args) {


	Score sc = new Score ( );

System.out.println(sc);}
	
	
	
	
	
}

// public (∞¯∞≥), protected(ªÛº”Ω√¿⁄º’ø°∞‘∞¯∞≥) , default(∞∞¿∫ pkg ≥ªø°º≠∞¯∞≥), private(∞∞¿∫cls -this ø°º≠∞¯∞≥)

//			pkg.cls∏¶ º±æ«œ¥¬ ≈∞øˆµÂ (øÕ¿œµÂƒ´µÂ ∞°¥…) (ø¯«œ¥¬ ¥‹¿œ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏∏ »£√‚«œ¥¬∞‘ ¡¡¿Ω)
// import ªÁøÎ«œ¡ˆ æ æ∆µµ ªÁøÎ«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ pkg : java.lang.* (¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ã µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ) ø÷ ? (object∏¶ ªÛº”πﬁæ“±‚ ∂ßπÆø°)

313     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\Day03\src\com\exam\Ex01.java

package com.exam;
/*
* a       b
*100+200 = hap
*200 - 100 = sub
*100 * 200 = mul
*200 / 100 = div
*
*/

public class Ex01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// 1. main methodø° ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ æπ¥œ¥Ÿ.
// 2. µ•¿Ã≈∏ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ : int
		int a=0, b=0;
		int hap=0, sub=0;
		int mul;
		int div;
		
//		3. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		a = 100;
		b = 200;

//		4. ø¨ªÍ
		hap = a + b;
		sub = b - a;
		mul = a * b;
		div = b / a;

//		5. √‚∑¬ 

		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d\n", a, b, hap); // ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ »Æ∫∏ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", b, a, sub);
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %3d\n", a, b, mul); // ∞¯∞£(3ƒ≠)¿Ã ∫Øºˆ(5ƒ≠)∫∏¥Ÿ ¿€¥ı∂Ûµµ √‚∑¬¿∫ ¡§ªÛ¿˚¿∏∑Œ µ . 
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		System.out.printf("'%5d' / %c = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		
// Day04≤®∏¶ æ≤∞Ì ΩÕ¿∏∏È, .jar∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∂Û¿Ã∫Í∑Ø∏Æø° √ﬂ∞°Ω√ƒ—æﬂ æµ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. (∞∞¿∫ ∆–≈∞¡ˆ≥ªø° ¿÷¥¬∞Õ∏∏æµºˆ¿÷¿Ω)
		
	}

}





314     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\Day03\src\com\exam\Ex011.java

package com.exam;
/*
* a       b
*100+200 = hap
*200 - 100 = sub
*100 * 200 = mul
*200 / 100 = div
*
*/

public class Ex011 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// 1. main methodø° ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ æπ¥œ¥Ÿ.
//	2. µ•¿Ã≈∏ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ : int
		int a;
		int b;
		int hap;
		int sub;
		int mul;
		int div;
//		3. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		a = 100;
		b = 200;

//		4. ø¨ªÍ
		hap = a + b;
		sub = b - a;
		mul = a * b;
		div = b / a;

//		5. √‚∑¬ 

		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d\n", a, b, hap); // ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ »Æ∫∏ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥ + ∞¯∞£ 5∞≥
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", b, a, sub);
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %3d\n", a, b, mul); // ∞¯∞£(3ƒ≠)¿Ã ∫Øºˆ(5ƒ≠)∫∏¥Ÿ ¿€¥ı∂Ûµµ √‚∑¬¿∫ ¡§ªÛ¿˚¿∏∑Œ µ . 
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d\n", b, a, div);
		System.out.printf("'%5d' / %c = %5d\n", b, a, div);

	}

}

		// int a ; //¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ π›µÂΩ√ √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¥Î¿‘«—¥Ÿ.
		// System.out.println(a);

//		int b = 0, c = 100, d = 20, e = 1; // ≥™ø≠µµ ∞°¥…

		int b, c, d, e; // c,d ø÷ æ»∫Œ∏£≥™ «œ¥¬ πÿ¡Ÿ
		b = c = d = e = 0;
		System.out.println(e + ":" + b);

		System.out.println("10¡¯ºˆ 100¿ª 10,8,16¡¯¿« f∑Œ √‚∑¬«œ¿⁄");

		System.out.printf(" 10¡¯ºˆ %d : 8¡¯ºˆ %d : 16¡¯ºˆ%d \n", 100, 100, 100);

	}

}

		System.out.println(a); // a = 127¿Ã µ«æ˙Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.

	  // a = (int) 129 ∞° µ«∏È, ∏« æ’ø° 'byte a = 100'¿∏∑Œ º±æ«— ∞˜±Ó¡ˆ int∑Œ ∫Ø∞Êµ

package com.test;
// char(2byte) : unicode 0 ~65535 , «—πÆ¿⁄∏¶ «•Ω√«“∂© single quote ' '
public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
 
		 char ch = 100; // char∑Œ º±æ«œø¥±‚ ∂ßπÆø° unicode 100ø° «ÿ¥Á«œ¥¬ 'd'∏¶ »£√‚
		 System.out.println("ch="+ch);
		 
		 char ch02= 'd'; // d -> 100 -> d ∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«œ¥¬ ∞˙¡§¿Ã ¥ı ø¿∑°∞…∏≤ but ±◊∑∏¥Ÿ∞Ì ±ª¿Ã 100¿∏∑Œ Ω·¡Ÿ « ø‰∞° æ¯¿Ω. 
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + ch02);
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + ch02 + 100);
		 System.out.println("ch02=" + (ch02 + 100)); // ch02πÊø°¥¬ d∞° µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ.
         System.out.println("ch02=" + ('d' + 100));
		
		
//	   char res = ch + ch02; // +¥¬ ∫∏≈Î ø¨ªÍ«œ∑¡∞Ì «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°  int∑Œ πŸ≤Ÿ∂Û∞Ì µµøÚ∏ª ª˝º∫µ  (char + char = > int ¿Œµ•, øﬁ¬  char res ø°º≠ ¿⁄∑·«¸ type¿ª char∑Œ ¡ˆ¡§, int∏¶ ≥÷¿ª ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ.)
	 char res =  (char) (ch + ch02) ; // 'd'+100 = 100 + 100 = 200 -- > unicode 200∞™, ƒ⁄µÂ ∞™¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È ?	
       System.out.println("res=" + res);
 
         char res02 = 'd' + 2; // 'd' + 2 = 100 + 2 = 102 --> f
         System.out.println("res02=" + res02);
		
		
		
		
	}

}

322     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\Day03\src\com\test\MTest07.java

package com.test;

public class MTest07 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		char ch = '\u0000';
		char end = '\uffff'; // ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ πÆ¿⁄, ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ¿Œ¡Ÿ ∏∏£¥¬ ∞ÊøÏ, ∆˘∆Æø° µ˚∂Ûº≠ ∞™¿Ã æ»≥™ø√ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. int∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«ÿº≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ µÈæÓ∞¨≥™ »Æ¿Œ
		System.out.println("ch=" + (int) ch + "~" + (int) end);
		System.out.println("ch=" + ch + "~" + end);

		char f_name = '——';
		System.out.println(f_name + ":" + (int) f_name);

		char a = '\ubc15', b = '\uc131', c = '\uc544', d='\n';
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C", a, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C%C", a,d, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%%C%C%C%C", a,d, b, c);
		String str = "\n\\ubc15\\uc131\\uc544";
		System.out.println(str);
		String strr = "\n\ubc15\uc131\uc544";
		System.out.println(strr);
		String str01 = null;
		System.out.println(str01);
	
	String str02 = null; // null¿∫ object∏¶ √ ±‚»≠ Ω√ƒ—¡÷¥¬ ≈∞øˆµÂ.	
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // 
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // ¥Ÿ∏• «¡∑Œ±◊∑•ø°º≠¥¬ ∆ØºˆπÆ¿⁄ æ≤∑¡∏È æ’ø° % Ω·æﬂ«“ ºˆµµ ¿÷¿Ω.(% ø¨ªÍ¿⁄∞° ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°)
	
	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ'100%'¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // single quotation¿Ã πÆ¿⁄ø≠∑Œ √‚∑¬ µ  (±◊¿¸ πˆ¿¸ø°º≠¥¬ \'100%\' ¿∏∑Œ ¿€º∫) 

	str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ\"100%\"¿Ã¥Ÿ";
	System.out.println(str02); // double quotation æ≤∑¡∏È æ’ø° \ ∫Ÿø©¡‡æﬂ «‘. (single¿∫ æ»∫Ÿø©µµ§« µ )
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	}

}

324     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\exam\Calc.java

package com.exam;

public class Calc {

	public static void Hap (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d + %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a+b));
	}
	public static void Sub (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d - %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a-b));
	}
	public static void Mul  (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a*b));
	}
	public static void Div (int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf("%5d / %5d = %5d \n", a,b,(a/b));
	}

}







325     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\exam\Exam01.java

package com.exam;
	// æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.
/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
 *  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
 *  √—¡° : ?
 *  ∆Ú±’ : ?
 *   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
 *   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
 */
public class Exam01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String name = "»´±Êµø";      
		int g = 100, m = 78, e = 82;
// 3. ø¨ªÍ
		int tot = 0;
		double av = 0.0;

		tot = g + m + e;
		av = (double) tot / 3;    

		System.out.printf("¿Ã∏ß : %10S\n", name);
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %5d ºˆ«–: %5d"
				+ " øµæÓ: %5d\n", g,m,e); 
		System.out.printf("√—¡° : %5d \n∆Ú±’ : %5.1f", tot, av); 
	
	}

}





326     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\exam\Exam02.java

package com.exam;

// ∞™¿ª πﬁ¿∏∏È √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
public class Exam02 { // class user data type = ¿⁄∑·«¸

	public static void Prn_A(int a) {
		System.out.println("Prn_A: " + a);
	}

	public static void Prn_B(double d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_B: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_C(char c) {
		System.out.println("Prn_C: " + c);
	}

	public static void Prn_D(String d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_D: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_E(char a, String b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_E: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void Prn_F(boolean a, boolean b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_F: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Prn_A(1000);
		Prn_B(90.9);
		Prn_C('A');
		Prn_D("sung-a");
		Prn_E('b', "abab");
		Prn_F(true, false);

	}
}





327     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\exam\Exam03.java

package com.exam;

// æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.
/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
 *  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
 *  √—¡° : ?
 *  ∆Ú±’ : ?
 *   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
 *   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
 */
public class Exam03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// 1. µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘ º±æ , 2. ∞™ ¥Î¿‘ ,
		String name = "»´±Êµø";
		int g = 100, m = 78, e = 82;

		int tot = 0;
		double av = 0.0;

		// 3. ø¨ªÍ (√—¡°, ∆Ú±’)

		// 4. √‚∑¬ (system.out.printf() )

		System.out.printf("¿Ã∏ß : %10S\n", name);
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %5d ºˆ«–: %5d" + " øµæÓ: %5d\n", g, m, e); // «¡∑Œ±◊∑•¿∫ ';'¿ª ∏∏≥™±‚ ¿¸±Ó¡ˆ ≥°≥≠∞‘ æ∆¥‘.
		Score.Prn_tot(g, m, e);
		Score.Prn_avg(g, m, e);

	}

}

329     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\exam\Score.java

package com.exam;

//1. ºº ∞˙∏Ò¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ √—¡°¿ª ±∏«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞Æ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫.
//2. ºº ∞˙∏Ò¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ ∆Ú±’¿ª ±∏«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞Æ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫.
public class Score {
	
	 public static void Prn_tot(int k, int m, int e) {
		 
		 int tot = k + m + e;
		 System.out.printf("√—¡° : %5d \n", tot );
	 }

	 public static void Prn_avg(int k, int m, int e ) {
		  double avg = (double) (k+m+e) / 3;
		  System.out.printf("∆Ú±’ : %5.2f \n", avg );
	 }
}

339     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY04\src\com\test02\MTest03.java

package com.test02;
// ¿⁄πŸ¿« ∏ﬁº“µÂ º±æΩ√ πÆπ˝
// 1. ∏ﬁº“µÂ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄(parameter) ∫Øºˆø° √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¡ˆ¡§«“ ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ. like, public static void Mtest(int a=0) æ»µ .
//     ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥¬ »£√‚Ω√, ∫ÛπÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∞™¿ª ≥÷¿Ω.
// 2. ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿∫ ∏ﬁº“µÂ »£√‚Ω√ø° µø¿œ«— µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È  π¨Ω√«¸ «¸∫Ø»Ø(¿⁄µø«¸∫Ø»Ø)¿Ã ¿œæÓ≥≠¥Ÿ. 
//     (int¥¬ 4byte, 4byte ≥ª¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿∫ ø°∑Øæ¯¿Ã int∑Œ √‚∑¬«‘, boolean¿∫ ¡¶ø‹)
// 		like, public static void Mtest(int a) , Mtest('A'); ∞·∞˙ :65
// 3. Java¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ(overload)∏¶ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.  (ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂøÕ ø¿πˆ∂Û¿ÃµÂ)
//     means ¥‹¿œ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø°(Mtest03)ø°º≠ µø¿œ«— ¿Ã∏ß¿« ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄¿« ≈∏¿‘¿Ã≥™ ∞≥ºˆ∏¶ ¥Ÿ∏£∞‘ º±æ«œ¥¬ ∞Õ. (∏µÁ OOP∞° ¥Ÿµ )
//     cause ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘ ∂ßπÆø°. ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ±‚¥…,∏Ò¿˚¿Ã ∞∞±‚ ∂ßπÆø°

public class MTest03 {

	public static void Mtest(int a) {
		System.out.println(a+"=> int");
	}
	public static void Mtest(char a) {
		System.out.println(a + "=> char"); // method ¿Ã∏ß ∞∞æ∆µµ, ∫Øºˆ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ±∏∫∞∞°¥…«œπ«∑Œ ∞∞¿Ã æµ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
	}
	public static void Mtest(char a,char b) {
		System.out.println(a +" & "+ b+ "=> char");
	}

	public static void Mtest (char a, int b) {
		System.out.println(a +" = " + b);
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Mtest('A');
		Mtest(100);
		Mtest('A','B');
		Mtest ('A', 35) ;
 // System.out.println((int) true); casting ¿⁄√º∞° æ»µ 

	}

}

341     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY05\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

public class MTest01 {

	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static float getF() {
		return 98.7f;
	}

	public static int getRes01() {
		return 'A'; // 4byte int πÊø° 'A' 2byte¥¬ µÈæÓ∞• ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
	}

	public static int getRes02() {
		return (int) 98.7; // = 98 ; ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘¿Ã ∏¬æ∆æﬂ «—¥Ÿ.
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int res = getRes(); // ¡§ºˆ100¿ª return«œ¥¬ getRes() ∏ﬁº“µÂ return 100;
		System.out.println(res); // 100
		float f = getF(); // return 98.7f
		System.out.println(f); // 98.7f
		int res01 = getRes01(); // 'A'¿« int ∞™ 65 ;
		System.out.println(res01); 
		int res02 = getRes02(); // 98.7¿« int∞™ 98;
		System.out.println(res02);
		
		System.out.println(getRes()); // system.out.println(int); = system.out.println(98);
		 // floatø°¥¬ 'A'∞° ø÷ æ»µ«≥™ ? characther¥¬ 0-66535±Ó¡ˆ¿« ∞™, -∞™¿Ã æ¯∞Ì, Ω«ºˆ∞° æ∆¥‘. 65!=65.0
		
		
		
		/// 2∞≥∏¶ π≠æÓº≠ »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄. : µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£∏È String πÆ¿⁄ø≠ ∑Œ √Î±ﬁ.
		System.out.println(getRes()+"¿∫"+getF()+"¿Ã æ∆¥œ¿›æ∆ø‰");
		System.out.println(getRes()+getF()); // ¥ı«œ±‚∞° µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ.
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
	}
}

343     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY05\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;

public class MTest03 {
	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static int getRes(int a) {
		return a * 2; // argument : parameter∏¶ πﬁ¥¬æ÷µÈ.
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int r = getRes();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(getRes()); // so, getRes¥¬ ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤

		int r01 = getRes(2);
		System.out.println(r01);
		System.out.println(getRes(2));

		int r02 = getRes(getRes()); // getRes()=100 --> getRes(int a)= a*2 = 100*2
		System.out.println(r02);

	}

}





344     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY05\src\com\test\MTest04.java

package com.test;
// APIø°º≠ ¡¶∞¯«œ¥¬ return«¸ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ªÁøÎ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
//		1. Interger class ªÁøÎ
		int su = 10; // OS∞° ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ ¿⁄∑·«¸ = ±∏¡∂√º , so, int¥¬ ±‚∫ª«¸. (¿¸ºº∞Ëø°º≠¥Ÿ¿Ã∑∏∞‘æ≤∞Ì¿÷æÓ ∫Ø∞Ê«“ ºˆ æ¯¥¬ ±‚∫ª¿⁄∑·«¸)
		// java¿« ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß¥¬ class, ±‚∫ª¿⁄∑·«¸ø°¥Ÿ∞° ±‚¥…¿ª √ﬂ∞°«“ ºˆ æ¯¿ª±Ó? == wrapper class.
		// so, java¥¬ ¿œπ› ¿⁄∑·«¸(like, int) + ±‚¥…(called method) = Integer = java.lang (¿⁄∑·«¸¿∏∑Œ
		// ¿Ã∑ÁæÓ¡¯ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ¿‹ƒ°)
		// Class Int¥¬ int∏¶ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ æ÷µÈ .

		// 1) C∏∂¿ŒµÂ - ¿⁄πŸ∏¶ ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ¬•∏È ∞®¡°¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.
		String str = Integer.toBinaryString(su); // Cmind ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ø÷ ¿⁄πŸ∏¶ æ≤¥¬∞Õ¿Ã¡ˆø‰ ?
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + str); // () æ»¿« ∞™¿« type¿∫ String ("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :"∏¶ ∆˜«‘«œ∞Ì ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆ

		// 2) ¿⁄πŸ∏∂¿ŒµÂ - πŸ∑Œ »£√‚¿ª «’Ω√¥Ÿ. Integer≤®. static = class.method
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 8¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" +  Integer.toOctalString(su));
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 16¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" +  Integer.toHexString(su));

//	    public static String toBinaryString(int su); // 1. method∏¶ ∞°¡Æø». 2.static »Æ¿Œ . 3. void/return »Æ¿Œ  - return¿œ ∞ÊøÏ ƒ⁄µÂ¿« ∏∂¡ˆ∏∑¡Ÿø£ æ¡¶≥™ {return "" ;}

		// System.out.println("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ."+ );

package com.test;

public class MTest05 { // ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ±‚¥…¿ª »∞øÎ«—¥Ÿ. (¿⁄¡÷æ≤¥¬ ±‚¥…¿ª »∞øÎ ∞°¥…)

	public static void Prn(int su) {
		System.out.println("su∏¶   2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + Integer.toBinaryString(su));
		System.out.println("su∏¶   8¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + Integer.toOctalString(su));
		System.out.println("su∏¶ 16¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + Integer.toHexString(su));

	}

		// public static double sqrt(double a); // double=8byte¿Ãπ«∑Œ ¿Ã«œ æÓ∂≤
		// º˝¿⁄µÁ(int,float,..)¥Ÿ ø√ºˆ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// public static void Prn(A) {} ø©±‚º≠ A∞° super class ¿œ∂ß, Aæ∆∑° ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞° ¥Ÿ µÈæÓø¬¥Ÿ. means
		// A=Ω√¿€¡÷º“
		// (º±¡∂¥¬ π´¡∂∞« 1∞≥, æ∆∫¸∞° 2∞≥¿œ ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ.) A-B-C (O), AB-C (X) : ¥Ÿ¡ﬂªÛº” ∫“∞°¥…

		int su = 100;
		double d = Math.sqrt(su); // Math.sqrt(100.0) ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì ª˝∞¢«‘
		System.out.printf("su = %d  ==> sqrt = %3.1f\n", su, d);

		// πŸ∑Œ √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. cause, println¿Ã double¿ª √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°.

		System.out.println(r + 200);

		r = r + 200; // r=100 + 200
		System.out.println(r);

		r += 200; // r=r-50 ; r-= 50; (-= , +=, *=, /= ªÁ¿Ãø° ∞¯πÈ¿÷¿∏∏È æ»µ ) r¿ª µŒπ¯æ≤±‚ Ω»æÓº≠ø‰..
		System.out.println(r);

		String str02 = Integer.toString(r);

	   //  String str03 = 100; String¿ª int∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ∂Û¥¬ error ∏ﬁºº¡ˆ ª˝±Ë
		
		
	     
	
	}

package com.test01;

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		U_Test u1 = new U_Test();   // ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«œ¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄.
		U_Test u2 = new U_Test(); // ª˝º∫¿⁄¿« ∏Ò¿˚ : ∞¥√º¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ √ ±‚»≠(√ ±‚∞™¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷¥¬ ∞Õ)
					// returnµµ æ¯∞Ì, voidµµ æ¯¿∏∏È method∞° æ∆¥—∞≈¡ˆ ! 
		System.out.println(u1);
		System.out.println(u2);

		u1.a = 2000;
		u1.d = 9.7;
		u2.a = 3000;
		u2.d = 10.7;
		
		System.out.println(u1.a);
		System.out.println(u1.d);
		System.out.println(u2.a);
		System.out.println(u1.d);

		/// u1.a != u2.a , æˆø¨»˜ µ—¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏• ¡÷º“∏¶ ∞Æ¿Ω. 
		// u1 new / u2 new∏¶ ∞¢∞¢ ∏∏≥™¥¬ º¯∞£ º≠∑Œ ¥Ÿ∏• ¡÷º“∏¶ ª˝º∫. heapø° ¥Ÿ∏• πÊ¿Ã ª˝±Ë. u1¿« a/d
		/// , u2¿« a/d
		
		
	}

}

package com.test01;
// ¡Ò∞≈øÓ ª˝º∫¿⁄ Ω√∞£ ><

class Test {

	public int a, b; // ∏‚∏”∫Øºˆ 2∞≥

	public Test() {
		a = 100;
		// ¿Ã∞‘ µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞≈¥Ÿ ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}

	public Test(int a) { // means ∞™¿ª ¡÷∏Èº≠ ª˝º∫.
		// non static ¡÷º“∞° æ¯¥¬ æ÷µÈ¿ª this(classø°º≠ ≥™ø¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, memoryø°º≠ πÊ ¡÷∑¡∞Ì ∏∏µÎ)∑Œ ∏∏µÎ.
		this.a = a; // ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ ª˝º∫¿⁄.(this) : «ˆ¿Á ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ(∞¥√º=t2ø°∞‘ ∞™¿ª ≥—±Ê)∏¶ ¡ˆƒ™«œ¥¬ ø¨ªÍ¿⁄.
		System.out.println(" ¿Ã∞«∞° ≥™±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}

}

public class MTest03 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test t1 = new Test(); // public Test ();
		// ∞˝»£æ»ø° ∞™¿Ã æ¯¥¬(=parameter∞°æ¯¥¬) default ª˝º∫¿⁄.
		// new µ⁄ø°ø¿∏È ¿⁄¿Øøµø™ ∞¯∞£ø° πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		// Testø°¥¬ ∫Øºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.
		// Test() <=æÍ∞° ª˝º∫¿⁄¿Œµ•, new∏¶ ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ∏∂¿⁄ 6line πÊ∏∏µÈ∞Ì, 9 √‚∑¬«— ¥Ÿ¿Ωø° ¡÷º“ ¬¸¡∂ ?
		// what if ,
		System.out.println(t1.a);

		Test t2 = new Test(4000); // t1¿∫ ∫ÛπÊ , t2¥¬ ∞™¿ª ∞°¡¯πÊ
									// public Test(int a)
		System.out.println(t2.a);

	}
}

// MAKER∞° ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫ª¥Ÿ.

// SUMMARY ¡ﬂø° CONSTRUCTOR∞° ¿÷¥¬ ≥.
// non static ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏£∏È ≥≤¿« ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ø√ ºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.

// parameter value∏¶ ¡‡æﬂ ª˝º∫¿⁄ ∞°¥….

// java.util.random (CONSTRUCTOR) : non static π€ø° æ¯¥Ÿ¥¬∞‘ π∫∏ª¿Ãæﬂ 

import java.util.Random;

public class MTest04 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Integer i = new Integer(100);
		System.out.println(i); // ¡ˆ±› inter i πÊø° 100¿Ã µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ.

		Random r = new Random(); // 03ø°º≠ default ª˝º∫¿⁄ ∏ÌΩ√«—∞Õ√≥∑≥ ø©±‚º≠µµ ∏ÌΩ√«ÿ¡ÿ∞Õ.
		System.out.println(r.nextInt(10));

		int ar [] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50}         ;
        System.out.println(ar[2]); 
	}
}

	public static int b=10 ; // MyTest¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿Ã∏Èº≠ static¿Ã∞Ì, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∞° µ»¥Ÿ. ∞¢¿Â ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß∞° classø©º≠ class π€ø° ¿Œºˆ∏¶ º±æ«œ¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	public static int c ; // MyTest¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿Ã∏Èº≠ static¿Ã∞Ì, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∞° µ»¥Ÿ. ∞¢¿Â ±‚∫ª¥‹¿ß∞° classø©º≠ class π€ø° ¿Œºˆ∏¶ º±æ«œ¡ˆ æ ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {

	}

//ex) int a; double d; ==> «—≤®π¯ø° U_Test class∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ. (4+8=12πŸ¿Ã∆Æ¬•∏Æ πÊ) - ªÁøÎ¿⁄ ¿⁄∑·«¸ - class∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓ Ω·∂Û.

	public double d;
}

public class Mytest01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// 1. static¿Ã æ∆¥œ∏È (non_static)¡÷º“∞° æ¯±‚∂ßπÆø° ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ »£√‚.

			 System.out.println( );
			 um=null;  // ∫ÒøÏ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫µ•, ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ «◊ªÛ √ ±‚»≠ «ÿ¡‡æﬂ«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° Null

353     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY05\src\com\test01\Mytest05.java

package com.test01;

public class Mytest05 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// run as - configurations - main¿« directory¿ª »Æ¿Œ - argumentsø° ∞™¿ª ¡ÿ¥Ÿ

		// µŒºˆ∏¶ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆ «’¿ª ±∏«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		int a = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
		int b = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);

		System.out.println(a + "+" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "-" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "*" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "/" + b + "=" + (a + b));

	}
}

356     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test\Address.java

package com.test;
/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address {

	public String name;   // ¿Ã∏ß
	public String Addr;   // ¡÷º“
	public String number; // ¿¸»≠π¯»£
	
	
	
	public Address () {}// µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
	
	
	public Address (String name, String number) { 

		this.name = name;
		this.number= number;
		this.Addr = Addr ; 
		
	}
	public Address (String name, String addr, String number) { 

		this.name = name; 
		this.Addr = addr ; 
		this.number = number ;
		
	}
	
	
// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.
	
@Override
  // toString : ∞Ì¡§∞™¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡‹
	public String toString() { // π∫º“∏∞¡ˆ ∏∏£∞⁄¡ˆ∏∏, ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ ª˝º∫«ﬂ¥Ÿ. source - generate toString (toString¿∫ ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ¿« override)
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", Addr=" + Addr + ", number=" + number + "]"; 
	}


public void Prn() {

	System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
}


public void setName(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}


public void setAddr(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}


public void setnumber(String string) {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
}




}





357     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test\Address2.java

package com.test;
/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address2 {  // √ ±‚»≠∏¶ ∏’¿˙ Ω√≈∞∏Èº≠ πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿œ¥‹ √≥¿Ωø£ ∞™¿Ã æ»µÈæÓ∞®. πÿø° 222∏¶ ∏’¿˙ ≥÷¥¬∞‘ ¥ı ∫¸∏£¥Ÿ¥¬∞« null¿ª ∫∏∏È æÀ ºˆ ¿÷¿›æ∆ø© ?
 // ≥ª∞° ¿⁄¡÷ ªÁøÎ«œ¥¬ ¿⁄∑·«¸/ ∫Øºˆ µÈ¿ª «œ≥™¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ π≠æÓº≠ ∞¸∏Æ«œ∑¡∞Ì «—∞‘ user_data type ¿Ã¡ˆ. ø÷≥ƒ«œ∏È ∞™¿Ã ∏≈π¯ ∫Øµøµ«±‚ ∂ßπÆ¿Ãæﬂ. ∞™¿Ã ∞∞¿∏∏È ªÛºˆ (static final) ∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«¥¬µ• 
	// ±◊∑°º≠, «œ≥™¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ π≠æÓ≥ı¥¬∞≈æﬂ. πÊ∏∏ ∏∏µÂ¥¬ ∞≈∂Û∞Ì. ±◊∞‘ ø¯∑° ≈¨∑°Ω∫∂Û±∏ø© . ±Ÿµ• ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ »Æ∫∏∞° æÓ∑∆¿›æ∆. ±◊∑≥ µø¿˚ «“¥Á¿ª «œ¥¬∞≈¡ˆ. ±‚∫ª √ ±‚ ∞™¿ª ¡÷∞⁄¥Ÿ¥¬ º≠∫ÒΩ∫æﬂ.
	// √≥¿Ω º±æ«“ ∂ß, ∞™¿ª ¡÷∞« ∏ª∞«, ªÛ∞¸¿Ã æ¯¡ˆ∏∏, «¡∑Œ±◊∑°π÷¿∫ ¿€æ˜¿ª 2π¯«œ¥¬ ∞·∞˙∞° ª˝±‚±‚ ∂ßπÆø° . ∞™¿∫ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏µÈ ∂ß ¡ÿ¥Ÿ∞Ì. º±æ«“∂ß ¡÷¡ˆ ∏∂ººø©
	// public static int s ;
	 // static { s = 100 ; } ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ¡÷º≈æﬂ «—¥Ÿ±∏ø© ! in JAVA // C¥¬ ∂« ¥Ÿ∏£¡Æ.
	
	public String name="22222";   // ¿Ã∏ß
	public String Addr;   // ¡÷º“
	public String number; // ¿¸»≠π¯»£
	
	
	
	public Address2 () {
		System.out.println("¿Ã∏ß "+ name);
	} // µ∆˙∆Æ ª˝º∫¿⁄
	
	public Address2 (String name, String number) { // ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ 2∞≥∏∏ «ÿµµ ±¶√· // ¡ﬂø‰«—∞« ∏≈∞≥∫Øºˆ¿« º¯º≠. // ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿« º¯º≠∏¶ ∏¬√Áæﬂ «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
		 // ∞∞¿∫ Ω∫∆Æ∏µ¿Ãø©º≠, æÓ∂≤ ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿ª ¡‡µµ ªÁΩ« ø¿∑˘¥¬ ≥™¡ˆ æ ¡ˆ∏∏, ≥™¡ﬂø° µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘¿Ã ¥ﬁ∂Û¡ˆ∏È ø¿∑˘∞° ≥Ø ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
		this.name = name;
		this.number= number;
		this.Addr = "º≠√ ±∏" ;  // ¡÷º“¥¬ π´¡∂∞« º≠√ ±∏
		
	}
	public Address2 (String name, String addr, String number) { // defaultª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏ÌΩ√ª˝º∫¿⁄∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«ﬂ¿›æ∆ø‰. πŸ∑Œ Ω««‡«œ∏È MTest ø¿∑˘≥≤.
		                                // ±◊∑°º≠ ¿ßø° ∫ÛπÊ¿ª πÃ∏Æ ∏’¿˙ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡‹
		
		this.name = name;  // ¿ßø°º≠ ∏∏µÈæÓ ≥ı¿∫ ∫ÛπÊ¿ª, ø©±‚º≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ √§øˆ ≥÷¿ª∞≈¿”.
		this.Addr = addr ; 
		this.number = number ;
		
	}
	
	
// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.
	
public void Prn() {

	System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
}




}

package com.test;

/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address3 {

	private String name; // ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ ∏µŒ private ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
	private String Addr;  // ∫Øºˆ «œ≥™¥Á set/get «œ≥™æø ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.
	private String number;     

	public Address3() {	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setAddr(String Addr) {
		this.Addr = Addr;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}

	public void setNumber(String number) {
		this.number = number;
	}

	public String getNumber() {
		return number;
	}

	public Address3(String name, String addr, String number) { // defaultª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏ÌΩ√ª˝º∫¿⁄∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«ﬂ¿›æ∆ø‰. πŸ∑Œ Ω««‡«œ∏È MTest ø¿∑˘≥≤.
		// ±◊∑°º≠ ¿ßø° ∫ÛπÊ¿ª πÃ∏Æ ∏’¿˙ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡‹

		this.name = name; // ¿ßø°º≠ ∏∏µÈæÓ ≥ı¿∫ ∫ÛπÊ¿ª, ø©±‚º≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ √§øˆ ≥÷¿ª∞≈¿”.
		this.Addr = addr;
		this.number = number;

	}

// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.

	public void Prn() {

		System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
	}

}

360     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test\Address5.java

package com.test;
/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */
public class Address5 {

	private String name;   // ¿Ã∏ß
	private String Addr;   // ¡÷º“
	private String number; // ¿¸»≠π¯»£


	
public Address5() {
		super();
		// ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ 
	}



public Address5(String name, String addr, String number) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		Addr = addr;
		this.number = number;
	}



public String getName() {
		return name;
	}



	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}



	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}



	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		Addr = addr;
	}



	public String getNumber() {
		return number;
	}



	public void setNumber(String number) {
		this.number = number;
	}
// ø¿∏•¬  πˆ∆∞ - source - generate - getter/setter
// ø¿∏•¬  πˆ∆∞ 	- source - generate - constructor using field.
// static ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° ¥Ÿ∏• ª˝º∫¿⁄øÕ ¥Ÿ∏£¥Ÿ ?

	

// √‚∑¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ
public void Prn() {

	System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, number);
}




}

package com.test;
// this () : ≥ª∫Œª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚ 

class My {
	public String name;

	public My() {
	  this("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆"); // overload »£√‚. (1»∏º∫¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ¥¯¡ˆ¥¬∞≈) øÿ∏∏«œ∏È ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ∏∏µÏ¥œ¥Ÿ.
	   System.out.println("overload ¥Ÿ≥‡ø»");
	  // this.name = "noname" (∏ﬁ∏∏Æ »Æ∫∏«ﬂ¥Ÿ∞° ¡‹) 
	} // 11∂Û¿Œ¿« overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚, .name «œ¥¬∞Õ∞˙ () ¿∫ º”µµ¬˜¿Ã∞° ∏π¿Ã≥≤.
//	 ex) ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø° ø√∏Æ¥¬ Ω√∞£¬˜. ¡˜¥Î¿‘¿∫ Ω√∞£¿Ã ø¿∑°∞…∏Æ¡ˆ æ ¿Ω. 
//  ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ∏¶ »Æ∫∏«œ∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ ªÛ≈¬ø°º≠ ¡÷º“∏¶ √£æ∆∞°º≠ ∞™¿ª ¥Î¿‘«œ¥¬µ• Ω√∞£¿Ã∞…∏≤.
  // ±◊≥… ( )æ»ø° ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿ª ¥¯¡Æ¡÷∞Ì ≥°≥™±‚ ∂ßπÆ. 8∂Û¿Œ¿∫ 1»∏º∫(¡ˆø™∞™), 10∂Û¿Œ¿∫ ¿·Ωƒº∫(my default∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥Ÿ∞° ¡÷¥¬∞Õ).
	// º”µµ¥¬ ∞™¿ª æÓ∂ª∞‘ ¡÷¥¿≥ƒø° µ˚∂Û ¥Ÿ∏ß.default ª˝º∫¿⁄, overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿÷¿ª∂ß, ≥ª∫Œ¿˚¿∏∑Œ 8∂Û¿Œ Ωƒ¿∏∑Œ ∏π¿Ã √≥∏Æ«‘.
	
	public My(String name) {
		this.name = name; 
		// name=name ; ≥ªπÊø° ≥™∏¶ ≥÷∞⁄¥Ÿ. ¡ˆ±›¿∫ "º∫æ∆º∫æ∆" ≥÷∞Ì º“∏Íµ≈. æ¯æÓ¡Æπˆ∑¡. .¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ¥¬ ±◊πÊø°º≠∏∏ ¿÷∞Ì, ø‹∫Œø°º≠ »£√‚¿Ã æ»µ .
		 // ¿⁄±‚∞° ¿⁄±‚∏¶ ∫Œ∏£∞Ì ªÁ∂Û¡Æº≠, ≥™¡ﬂ§∑ §ƒ∫Œ∏¶ ∂ß null ∞™¿Ã µÈæÓ∞°∞‘ µ .
		// this.name ; ¿¸ø™ ∫Øºˆ∞° ø». «ˆ¿Á ∏‚πˆ∏¶ ∏ÌΩ√»£√‚ «—¥Ÿ. my ∞¥√º¿« ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ name = ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ name (¡ˆ±›¿∫)
	}   // overload ª˝º∫¿⁄ //

363     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;
// Address ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫ »ƒ, ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ∞˙ √‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

/* 
 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 * 
 */

public class MTest03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Address a1 = new Address();
		Address a2 = new Address();
		Address a3 = new Address();
		a1.setName("º∫æ∆");
		a1.setAddr("º≠øÔΩ√");
		a1.setnumber("01-01");
		a1.Prn();

		a2.setName(æ∆º∫); //  ¿¸«Ù ∏∏£∞⁄¥¬µ• ?
		
		a2.Addr(¥Î¿¸Ω√);
		a2.number(20-01);
		a2.Prn();

		a3.setName(æ≈æ≈);
		a3.setAddr()±§¡÷Ω√);
		a3.setnumber(31-25);
		a3.Prn();

		System.out.println();

		a1.name = "π⁄º∫æ∆";
		a1.Prn();

		a2.Addr = "∞≈¡¶µµ";

		a3.Prn();
	}

package com.test;
// ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.

// static, non static ¥Ÿ∏£¿›æ∆ø© ? µ—¥Ÿ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest05 {

	public static Address getAddress(Address r) {
//		return r;  ∞·∞˙ ∞™¿Ã    :       »´±Êµø         º≠øÔ      11-11 

		r.name = "¡§±Êµø";
		r.Addr = "∞≈¡¶µµ";
		r.number = "22-22"; // address∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ address ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		return r;
		
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address("»´±Êµø", "º≠øÔ", "11-11");
		Address res = getAddress(a1); /// static , a1 πﬁæ∆º≠ π∫∞° (∏Æ≈Õ∑≤¿Ã «ÿ¥Á µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘¿Ã∂˚ ∏¬æ∆æﬂ)∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		// like, int r = getA() ; int r = 100 ;
		res.Prn(); // πﬁæ∆º≠ ±◊≥… ∏Æ≈œ.

	 
	res = new MTest05().getAddress(a1); // ∞¥√ºª˝º∫«ÿº≠ non static¿∏∑Œ »£√‚«œ∑¡¥¬ ∞≥ºˆ¿€.
	res.Prn();
	
	 Address b1 = new Address("»´±Êµø", "º≠øÔ", "11-11");
	 Address rbs = new MTest05().getAddress01(b1);
	 rbs.Prn();
	
	}

	 public Address getAddress01(Address r) { // ∏Ù∂Û -_- ππæﬂ ¿Ã∞‘  
		 return r;
	 }  // non static »£√‚

}

package com.test;
// Integer ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« non_static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

// lang.integer / Method Summary 4∞≥¿« ≈«  ¡ﬂø° Instance Method = non static
// Constructor Summary : ª˝º∫¿⁄ - ø¿πˆ∑ŒµÂ ª˝º∫¿⁄ 2∞≥ (int / String) 
// µŒπ¯¬∞∑Œ ∞•∞‘
//Integer(String s) 
//Constructs a newly allocated Integer object that represents the int value indicated by the String parameter.
// ø‹∫Œ(≥◊∆Æøˆ≈© ø¨∞·, ∆ƒ¿œ¿‘√‚∑¬, µ•¿Ã≈Õ ∫£¿ÃΩ∫, ¿•º≠∫ÒΩ∫)ø°º≠ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∏¶ ∞Æ¥Ÿ ¿˙¿Â«ﬂ¥ı¥œ, ∏µÁ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∞°String¿∏∑Œ ¿˙¿Âµ∆¥Ÿ∞Ì ∞£¡÷, ==> CSV(comma separated value)ø°º≠ ¿˙¿Â«ﬂ¥Ÿ.
// CSV(excel)ø° ∏µÁ µ•¿Ã≈Õ∞° ¡§ºˆ∞™¿ª String¿∏∑Œ ∞¸∏Æ «œ¥ı∂Û.
// String∞™¿ª ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ ¡§ºˆ∑Œ ø¨ªÍ«ÿº≠ Noqlø° Mongodbø° ¿˙¿Â«ÿº≠ ¡¬«•∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ Ω√≈∞∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ.

public class MTest06 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		String su = "980.007";
		Integer i = new Integer( (int) Double.parseDouble(su));
	
// double d = i.doubleValue();  // double¿Ã integer∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«ÿ¡÷¥¬∞‘ « ø‰«‘.(double classø°∞°º≠ »Æ¿Œ)
		// double ∞™¿ª ªÃæ∆øÕº≠, casting æ»«œ∞Ì class∑Œ «ÿ∞·«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ.
		// 1. String¿ª double∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
		Double d = new Double(su); // Wrapper class
		int r = d.intValue();
		Integer r1 = new Integer(d.intValue());
		System.out.println(r1);
		System.out.println(r);


		int res = new Double(su).intValue();
		System.out.println(res);
		//Integer i = new Integer (su);

		// 2. double¿ª Integer∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê
		//

	}

}

 *     ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 *

public class MTest33 {

		Address a2 = new Address();

		a1.name = "º∫æ∆";
		a1.Addr = "º≠øÔΩ√";
		a1.number = "01-01";
		a1.Prn();

		a2.name = "æ∆º∫";
		a2.Addr = "¥Î¿¸Ω√";
		a2.number = "20-01";
		a2.Prn();

		a3.name = "æ≈æ≈";
		a3.Addr = "±§¡÷Ω√";
		a3.number = "31-25";
		a3.Prn();

		System.out.println();

package com.test;

//Address ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ≈Î«ÿº≠ √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«ÿº≠ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
// ¥‹, ∞¥√º∏¶ √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ πﬁ¿∫ »ƒ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest44 { 
    public static void Disp(Address ar) { // ar = a1¿« ¡÷º“.
    	ar.Prn();
    	ar.name = "what???";
   
    	System.out.println(ar);
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address ("»´±Êµø","º≠øÔ","11-11");
		Address a2 = new Address ("¡§±Êµø","∫ŒªÍ","22-22");
		Address a3 = new Address ("√÷±Êµø","±§¡÷","33-33");
		
		 // secure code ∞° « ø‰ / a1¿∏∑Œ æ≤∏È æ»µ≈ø©. ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘µµ æ¯∞Ì, ∫∏æ»µµ æ˚∏¡¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.

		
		System.out.println("a1 &="+a1);
		System.out.println("a2 &="+a2);
		System.out.println("a3 &="+a3);
		a1.Prn(); // a1 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘) / class( ¿⁄∑·«¸ / ¿Ø¿˙µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘ / ¬¸¡∂«¸ class)¿⁄πŸ¿« »£√‚¥‹¿ß¥¬ method, Ω««‡¥‹¿ß¥¬ class
		a2.Prn(); // a2 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)
		a3.Prn(); // a3 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)

		System.out.println();
		
		Disp(a1); // public static void Disp(Address); // ∞¥√º∏¶ ≥—∞‹º≠ ¥‹¿œ ¿€æ˜¿ª π›∫π Ω√≈≥ ºˆ ¿’¥Ÿ.
		Disp(a2);
		Disp(a3); // ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙.
		
		a3.Prn();
		
		
	}
}
// MTest03∞˙ ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙

//Address ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ≈Î«ÿº≠ √ ±‚∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«ÿº≠ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
// ¥‹, ∞¥√º∏¶ √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ static ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ πﬁ¿∫ »ƒ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.

public class MTest45 { 
    public static void Disp(Address ar) { // ar = a1¿« ¡÷º“.
    	ar.Prn();
    	ar.setName("what???");
   
    	System.out.println(ar);
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Address a1 = new Address ("»´±Êµø","º≠øÔ","11-11");
		Address a2 = new Address ("¡§±Êµø","∫ŒªÍ","22-22");
		Address a3 = new Address ("√÷±Êµø","±§¡÷","33-33");
		
		 // secure code ∞° « ø‰ / a1¿∏∑Œ æ≤∏È æ»µ≈ø©. ≥◊¿”∫ß∑˘µµ æ¯∞Ì, ∫∏æ»µµ æ˚∏¡¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.

		
		System.out.println("a1 &="+a1);
		System.out.println("a2 &="+a2);
		System.out.println("a3 &="+a3);
		a1.Prn(); // a1 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘) / class( ¿⁄∑·«¸ / ¿Ø¿˙µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘ / ¬¸¡∂«¸ class)¿⁄πŸ¿« »£√‚¥‹¿ß¥¬ method, Ω««‡¥‹¿ß¥¬ class
		a2.Prn(); // a2 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)
		a3.Prn(); // a3 = address (µ•¿Ã≈Õ≈∏¿‘)

		System.out.println();
		
		Disp(a1); // public static void Disp(Address); // ∞¥√º∏¶ ≥—∞‹º≠ ¥‹¿œ ¿€æ˜¿ª π›∫π Ω√≈≥ ºˆ ¿’¥Ÿ.
		Disp(a2);
		Disp(a3); // ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙.
		
		a3.Prn();
		
		
	}
}

package com.test;
// ∞¥√ºª˝º∫ ø¨Ω¿ & ¡÷º“∏¶ »Æ¿Œ

public class Mytest01 {
public int a;

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println(new Mytest01().a); 
                            // ∞¥√ºª˝º∫ . ∏‚πˆ»£√‚ 
		                    // means «—π¯∏∏ æ≤∞⁄¥Ÿ. = read only.
		Mytest01 m1 = new Mytest01();
		System.out.println(m1.a+ ": &" + m1);
		m1.a = 100;
		System.out.println(m1.a+":&"+m1);
		System.out.println(new Mytest01()); // ∏Æ≈œ¿∫ printlnø° «—π¯«œ∞Ì ≥°. ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ∞Ì ≥°≥ª∞⁄¥Ÿ¥¬ ∂Ê. 4∞≥¿« πÊ∏∏ ∏∏µÎ.
		 // new Mytest01() ¥¬ ¡÷º“. (ø¿∏•¬ ø° ¿÷¿∏¥œ±Ó, ¡÷º“ = ∞™ = ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤), 
		 // like, disp(color C); disp(new color(255,0,0));  ¡÷º“∏Æ≈œæ»«ﬂ¿∏¥œ±Ó, «—π¯æ≤∞Ì πˆ∏≤.

		// like, color c = new color (255,0,0); ∫Øºˆ ¿÷¿∏¥œ±Ó ∞Ëº” æ≤∞⁄¡ˆ. æ∆∑°¿ß∑Œ ∞∞¿∫ ∞·∞˙∞° ≥™ø».
		// disp(c) ; 
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());
		System.out.println(new Mytest01());

		
	}

}

package com.test02;
// static ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ¡§¿««“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. √ ±‚»≠ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.

class Test {
	public int a;
	public static int s;

	/// ¿œπŸ∏‚πˆ∫ØºˆøÕ static ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ
	static { // static ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¿« √ ±‚»≠∏¶ ¿ß«ÿ ¿Ø¿œ«œ∞‘ class æ»ø° πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ æ∏.
		System.out.println("--------------");
		s = 100;
	} // ¡÷º“∞° ª˝±‚∏Èº≠ ¡¶¿œ∏’¿˙ »£√‚¿Ãµ 

	public Test() {
		System.out.println("ª˝º∫¿⁄æﬂ ≥™¥¬");
		// s = 1000;
	}
}

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test t1 = new Test();
		Test t2 = new Test();
		System.out.println(Test.s); // static∞˙ public test µ— ¡ﬂø° ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ¥¬ static ¿Ã ∏’¿˙ ø¿¿›æ∆, ±◊∑≥ √ ±‚»≠¥¬ static øµø™ø° ¡›¥œ¥Ÿ.
	}

}

// address class∏¶ ∫∏∏È, ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆø° √ ±‚∞™¿ª æ»¡‡. ø÷¡Æ ? (ª˝º∫¿⁄¥¬ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∏¶ √ ±‚»≠ «œ¥¬∞‘ ∏Ò¿˚¿Ã∂Û∏Èº≠ø© ?)

375     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test02\MTest04.java

package com.test02;

class Test02 {
	private int a;
	private int b;

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a; // ø©±‚ æ¯¿∏∏È ¿–±‚ ¿¸øÎ (getter)
	}

	public void setB(int b) { // ∏‚πˆ ∫Øºˆ bø°∞‘ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê
		this.b = b;
	}

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	} // ø©±‚ æ¯¿∏∏È æ≤±‚ ¿¸øÎ (setter)

	public int getB() { // ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ b ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ
		return b;
	}
}

public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// Test02 ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ 1000¿ª ¿‘∑¬«— »ƒ √‚∑¬ «ÿ ∫∏¿⁄.
		Test02 t1 = new Test02(); // a∂Û¥¬ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∞° ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø° «“¥Áµ»¥Ÿ.
		t1.setA(1000); // ∞™¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê
		System.out.println(t1.getA()); // ∏Æ≈œ

		t1.setB(2000);
		System.out.println(t1.getB());
	}

}





376     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY07\src\com\test02\MTest05.java

package com.test02;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Random;

import com.test.Address;

public class MTest05 { // ∏µÁ class¥¬ object¿« ¿⁄Ωƒ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì ª˝∞¢«—¥Ÿ.
	public String toString() { //º±¡∂∞° ∞°¡¯ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ∞° ¡§¿«∏¶ ªı∑Œ «—¥Ÿ.
	return "≥ª≤®æﬂ"	;
	
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		MTest05 m = new MTest05(); // default ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ maker√¯ø°º≠ ¡¶∞¯«ÿº≠ »£√‚ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
		System.out.println(m.toString()); // ∞∞¿∫ ¿«πÃ∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		System.out.println(m); // m æ»ø°¥¬ ¡÷º“∞° µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ. @≈∞øˆµÂ∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ«œø©, hashcode ∞™¿∏∑Œ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡‹.

		/* toString (java.object.method)
		 * https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/index.html
public String toString()
Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read. It is recommended that all subclasses override this method. 
The toString method for class Object returns a string consisting of the name of the class of which the object is an instance, the at-sign character `@', and the unsigned hexadecimal representation of the hash code of the object. In other words, this method returns a string equal to the value of: 
 getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())
 
Returns:
a string representation of the object.
*/
		
		Address ar = new Address();
		System.out.println(ar);
		System.out.println(ar.toString());  // µŒ ∞™¿Ã ∞∞æ∆. ar¿Ã∂Û∞Ì æ≤∏È ªÁΩ« to.string¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª «œ∞Ì ¿÷æ˙¥¯∞≈¡ˆ.
		
		Random r = new Random();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(r.toString());
		
		Runtime rt = Runtime.getRuntime();// ¿⁄±‚ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø° ¿⁄±‚∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ single turn. 
		rt.exec("mspaint");
	}
}

package com.exam;

public class Myclass {
	private int a;

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	}

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public static void View() {
// ∞∞¿∫ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø° ¿÷æÓµµ static¿Ã non static∫Œ∏£∑¡∏È, ¡÷º“ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡‡æﬂ«‘
		
		Myclass m = new Myclass();
		m.setA(100);
		System.out.println(m.getA());
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// new Myclass().View(); æ»µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ. ø÷ æ»µ»¥Ÿ∞Ì ? static¿« »£√‚¿∫ class.method ∑Œ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∫“∑Ø¡‡æﬂ«œ¥œ±Óøµ
		Myclass.View();

	}

}

// æÓ¡¶ «ﬂ∂≤ Tostring¿ª ø¨Ω¿«œ∞Ì ∞•∞‘ø© 
// object¿« ∏‚πˆ (java.lang.object) : ∞¥√º¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ µø¿˚¿∏∑Œ «“¥Áµ» 16¡¯ºˆ ∞™¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ. (object∞° ¡¶∞¯«ÿ¡÷¥¬ ±‚∫ª ∫£º“µÂ)
// getclass, getname,
// ∞¥√º.
// ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø°¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∞°¿÷¥Ÿ.
// ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ≥™¥≠∂ß ±‚∫ª«¸/¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ≥™¥´¥Ÿ.
// ø¯«¸¿∫ static / non static (∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆµµ, ∏ﬁº“µÂµµ )

public class MTest {
	 public String toString() {
		 return "≥™¿«¡÷º“¥¬" + super.toString();
	 } // super∞° æ¯¿∏∏È ≥ª∞° ≥™∏¶ ∫Œ∏ß.
	  // mtestµµ tostring¿Ã ¿÷∞Ì , super¥¬ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ º±¡∂¿« ∏Æ≈œ∞™. 
	 
public static void main(String[] args) {
	System.out.println(new MTest());
	System.out.println(new MTest().toString());

	MTest m1=new MTest();
	System.out.println(m1);
	System.out.println(m1.toString());

}
}

// java beans = getter & setter = ∞™∏∏ ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ¥¬ ValueObject (VO) - voø°¥¬ getset¿« ¿‹ƒ°
//com.kt.vo  : ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∞£ø° ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚
//com.kt.entity : DB¿« ≈◊¿Ã∫Ì ±‚∫ª ¥‹¿ß (attribute = col in DB)ø° ∏¬¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ º±æ«œ∞Ì ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ∏Ò¿˚	
//com.kt.biz : ∫Ò¡Ó¥œΩ∫ ∑Œ¡˜ , ø¨ªÍ«œ¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫
public class MTest02 {

	private Test t1; // class µµ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆµµ ø√∂Ûø√ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.

		t1 = new Test(); // class∏¶ ø©±‚ø° ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ÿ¥Ÿ
	}

	public MTest02(Test t1, Test t2, Test t3) {
		super();
		this.t1 = t1;

	}



	public Test getT1() {
		return t1;
	}

	public void setT1(Test t1) {
		this.t1 = t1;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) { // class∏¶ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞°¡Æ∞°∏È »£√‚¿ª æÓ∂ª∞‘ «œ§ø§§ø© ?

		MTest02 m1 = new MTest02(); // m1¿∫ ¿⁄¿Øøµø™ ∞¯∞£ø° ¿÷¥¬ MTest02∏¶ ¬¸¡∂.
//		 MTest¥¬ t1ø°¥Ÿ∞° new test∂Û∞Ì«ÿº≠ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∏¶ ª˝º∫Ω√ƒ◊æÓ.
		// Mtest 02æﬂ, ≥ ¥¬ m1¿Ãæﬂ. «œ∞Ì µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∫Øºˆ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæ˘¥Ÿ∏È,
		// new mtest 02 ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ public MTest02∑Œ ø√∂Û∞°¥¬µ•, Test t1¿Ã∂Û¥¬ πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∞Ì null¿ª ¡÷¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
// t1¥¬ new test (11), t1¥¬ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬æ÷ (¿⁄¿Øøµø™∞¯∞£ ø∑ø° new Test πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓ ) 
		// = ø¨ªÍ¿⁄∞° πﬂª˝«œ¥œ±Ó, int a¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ Test t1¿Ã ¬¸¡∂∏¶ «œ∞Ì(Mtest02¿« ∞¥√º)

// java beans = getter & setter = ∞™∏∏ ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ¥¬ ValueObject (VO) - voø°¥¬ getset¿« ¿‹ƒ°

package com.test01;

import com.test.Address;

public class MStudent {

	public static void main(String[] args) { 
		Student s1 = new Student (1, new Address("»´±Êµø", "11","11"));
		Student s2 = new Student (2, new Address("¡§±Êµø", "22","22"));
		Student s3 = new Student (3, new Address("π⁄±Êµø", "33","33"));

		System.out.println(s1);
		System.out.println(s2);
		System.out.println(s3);
		
		System.out.println("===================");
		
		// 1π¯ «–ª˝¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ º≠øÔ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ, ¿¸√º √‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		// ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∞°¡¢±Ÿ¿Ã ∫“∞°¥…«— private¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿Ã∏ß¿ª √£¿∏∑¡∏È Address¿« getName¿ª ¬ÔæÓæﬂ »´±Êµø¿Ã ≥™ø». (Address∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ getAddress∏¶ ∏’¿˙ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿæﬂ∞⁄¡ˆ)
		
		System.out.println("no :"+s1.getNo());
		System.out.println("name:"+s1.getAddress().getName());
		System.out.println("addr: "+s1.getAddress().getAddr());
		System.out.println("phone: "+s1.getAddress().getPhone());
			System.out.println();
		System.out.println(s1.getAddress());
		System.out.println(s1.getAddress().toString());
		 // Address ≥ªøÎø° toString¿ª ¿Á¡§¿« «ﬂ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¡÷º“∞° æ∆¥œ∂Û ≥ªøÎ¿Ã ≥™ø…¥œ¥Ÿ.
		Address ar=s1.getAddress();
		System.out.println(ar); // ar.toString ();
		
		
		s1.getAddress().setAddr("º≠øÔΩ√"); // get¿∫ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬∞≈∞Ì, set¿∫ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
		 // get Addressø°º≠ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ setAddr¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ¥¬∞≈¡ˆ (get addressø°º≠ set ¿∏∑Œ √£æ∆∞°¥¬∞≈æﬂ)
		System.out.println(ar);
		s1.getAddress().setPhone("2222");
		System.out.println(ar);

387     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY08\src\com\test01\Student.java

package com.test01;

import com.test.Address;

public class Student {
	private int no;
	private Address address;

	public Student(int no, Address address) {
		super();
		this.no = no;
		this.address = address; // ø¿∏•¬ ø° ª˝±‰ ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
	}

	
	
	public Student() {
		super(); // Address∏¶ ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠, null∑Œ √ ±‚»≠µ«¥œ±Ó, æ»ø° ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ. ??
		          // ¿œ∫Œ∑Ø ∫Òøˆ≥˘¥Ÿ±∏ø© ?
		

	}

	public int getNo() {
		return no;
	}

	public void setNo(int no) {
		this.no = no;
	}
	// Address ∞¥√º¿Œ address ¡Ô ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞Ÿ¥Ÿ.
	
	public Address getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(Address address) {
		this.address = address;
	}




public String toString() {
	String str= String.format("no.%5d", this.getNo());
	return str+ address;
}

	

}

389     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY09\src\com\test\BZ.java

package com.test;

public class BZ extends AZ {
	private int b;
	
	public BZ() {
		
	} // ∏ÌΩ√«œ¡ˆ æ æ“¡ˆ∏∏, default 

	public BZ(int b) {
		super();
		this.b = b;
	}
	
	
public BZ (int a, int b) {  // overrideø° ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄ 2∞≥ πﬁ¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° æ¯æÓº≠ø©. ªı∑Œ ∏∏µÎ.
	super(a); //a¥¬ AA ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞≈ø©º≠ 
 	this.b=b ; // b¥¬ BB ≈¨∑°Ω∫.
}
	public int getB() {
		return b;
	}

	public void setB(int b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
	
	public int getHap() {
//		int hap = a + b ; // æ»µ  , a∞° private¿ÃæÓº≠ πŸ∑Œ »£√‚æ»µ 
		//int Hap = this.getA() + b ; // super∞° ¿÷¥¬µ• ±ª¿Ã object∏¶ b∑Œ µ•∑¡øÕº≠ »£√‚«œ¥¬∞« ∫∞∑Œ ¡¡¡ˆ æ ¿Ω
		//int Hap = this.getA()+ this.getB() ; // µ«±‰«œ¥¬µ•  A¥¬ ±ª¿Ã super∏¶ this∑Œ µ•∑¡ø√ « ø‰∞° æ¯¿Ω  // method¥¬ public¿ÃæÓº≠ »£√‚∞°¥….
		//int Hap = super.getA() + b ; // ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ¥¬ ¿∫¥–»≠«œ∞Ì ø¿«¬µ» ∏ﬁº“µÂ∑Œ »£√‚«œ¥¬∞‘ ¡¶¿œ ¡¡¿Ω.
		int Hap = getA() + getB() ; // æÓ∂≤ ¡∂∞«, validate «ﬁ¿ª∂ß, ∏ﬁº“µÂ »£√‚«œ¥¬∞‘ ∞°¿Â ¡§»Æ«‘. 
		
		return Hap ;
	}
	
	


}





390     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY09\src\com\test\FZ.java

package com.test;

public class FZ extends BZ {

	private int f;

	public FZ() {
	}

	public FZ(int f) { // ¿Ã∞… §¢∏∂∫˝«ﬂæÓ
		this.f=f;
	}

	public FZ(int a, int b, int f) {
		super(a, b); // public BB(int a, intb){super(a);}
		this.f = f;
	}

	

	public int getRes() {
		int r = getHap()-getF(); // get a+ get b ¥¬ ¿«πÃ∞° æ¯±∏ø©  // int res∑Œ º±æ«œΩ√∏È æ»µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ. 
		return r;
	}
	
	public int getF() {
		return f;
	}

	public void setF(int f) {
		this.f = f;
	}
}

package com.test;

// æÓ¡¶ «ﬂ∂≤ Tostring¿ª ø¨Ω¿«œ∞Ì ∞•∞‘ø© 
// 

public class MTest {
	@Override // override¿Œ¡ˆ æ∆¥—¡ˆ »Æ¿Œ «ÿ¡÷¥¬ ¡÷ºÆ±‚¥….
	public String toString() {
		return "≥™¿«¡÷º“¥¬" + super.toString(); // super = object (º±¡∂∞° ≥ª∞° ∏∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡Ÿ∞≈æﬂ)
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		/*
		 * System.out.println(new MTest()); System.out.println(new MTest().toString());
		 * 
		 * MTest m1=new MTest(); System.out.println(m1);
		 * System.out.println(m1.toString());
		 */

		MTest m1 = new MTest ();
		System.out.println(m1.hashCode());
		System.out.println(m1.getClass()); // object¿« ∞ÕµÈ¿ª ¥Ÿ ∞Æ∞Ìø¬¥Ÿ
		System.out.println(m1.getClass().getSimpleName());
		
		MTest m2 = new MTest ();
		System.out.println("µŒ∞≥¿« ∞¥√º∞° ∞∞¿∫¡ˆ ¥Ÿ∏•¡ˆ ¡÷º“ ∫Ò±≥:"+m1.equals(m2)); // equals µµ non static
		// object∞° ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ ±‚∫ª ≈¨∑°Ω∫µÂ∏¶ ΩË¥Ÿ.
		
		

	}

	/*	@Override // ø¿∏•¬ πˆ∆∞ - source - override implement - ¿Á¡§¿««“ method∏¶ √£¥¬¥Ÿ.
	public boolean equals(Object obj) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return super.equals(obj); */
	}






392     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY09\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;
// ¡÷º“∫Ò±≥∏¶ «’Ω√¥Ÿ.

class U_Class {

	String N_Name;

	public U_Class() {
	}

	public U_Class(String N_Name) {
		this.N_Name = N_Name;
	}

	// ø¿∏•¬  - source - hash code & equals : «¡∑Œ±◊∑•¿∫ ±‚∫ª¿˚¿∏∑Œ ¿Ã ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ ¡‡æﬂµ≈. 
	// 1 ¡¶¿œ∏’¿˙ ∞¥√º¿« ¡÷º“(objectø° u_CLASS∞° ¡§»Æ«œ∞‘ π∞∑¡¿÷≥™), 
	// 2 null¿Œ∞° (¬¸¡∂∞°¿÷¥¬¡ˆæ¯¥¬¡ˆ, null ¿Ã∏È ¬¸¡∂«œ¥¬ ∞¸∞Ë∞° æ∆¥‘ = ∞¥√º∞° æ¯¿Ω), 
	// 3 «ÿ¥Á class ≈∏¿‘¿Œ¡ˆ æ∆¥—¡ˆ∏¶(ªÛº”¿Œ¡ˆ ππ æÓ¬æ∞«¡ˆ) ±◊¥Ÿ¿Ωø° override µ∆¿∏¥œ±Ó ∞™¿ª ∫Ò±≥«œ∞Ì µÓµÓµÓ ∫Ò±≥.
	
	// ≥™¡ﬂø° ≥ª∞° ¬ß ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ æœ»£»≠ «œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿ª∂ß, hash ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ∞ÌΩÕ?
	// ªÁΩ«, equasl ∞∞¿∫ ≥ª¿Â«‘ºˆµµ æÓ∂ª∞‘ ƒ⁄µÂ∞° ¬•¡Æ¿÷¥¬¡ˆ ∏∏ß. 
	@Override
	public int hashCode() {
		final int prime = 31;
		int result = 1;
		result = prime * result + ((N_Name == null) ? 0 : N_Name.hashCode());
		return result;
	}

	@Override
	public boolean equals(Object obj) {
		if (this == obj)
			return true;
		if (obj == null)
			return false;
		if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
			return false;
		U_Class other = (U_Class) obj;
		if (N_Name == null) {
			if (other.N_Name != null)
				return false;
		} else if (!N_Name.equals(other.N_Name))
			return false;
		return true;
	}
	
	
/*
// ¡÷º“ ¿Ãø‹ø° ∫Ò±≥∏¶ «“ ∂ß, ¿Á¡§¿«∏¶ ªÁøÎ«—¥Ÿ.
	@Override // ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ∞°∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ ¿Ãƒ˜¡Ó∏¶ ±◊¥Î∑Œ ¿Á¡§¿««œ∞⁄¥Ÿ¥¬ ∂Ê. ¿Ã ππæﬂ -_- æÓ∂≤ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞° øÕµµ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∫Ò±≥«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ¥¬ ∏∂¿Ω∞°¡¸. ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ¿« ∏µÁ
				// ¿⁄ΩƒµÈ¿Ã ø√ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. other words ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫¥¬ ¥Ÿ øÕµµ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿∫ æ»µ 
	public boolean equals(Object obj) { // u3.equals(u4) ¥œ±Ó, ∫Ò±≥«œ¥¬ ¥Á«œ¥¬ æ÷¥¬ U_Class u4
// u3. «œ∏È, u_class∞°µ«¡ˆ. u4.«ÿµµ u_class ¿›æ∆.
		// equals ¥¬ ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∫Ò±≥«œ¥œ±Ó.
//		u4∞° ≥—æÓø√∂ß, objectµµ ∞Æ∞ÌøÕ. u4∏∏ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∫Ò±≥«œ∞ÌΩÕ¿∫µ• ∞˝»£æ»ø°¥¬ u4¿« º±¡∂ ∏µÁ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞° ¥Ÿ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// ¥ŸøÓ ƒ≥Ω∫∆√¿Ã « ø‰«— Ω√¡°. == > u_class∂Û∞Ì ¿˚§°, ∞·∞˙¿˚¿∏∑Œ ≥—æÓø¬ res∏¶ ¿˚∞Ì, ¥ŸøÓƒ≥Ω∫∆√¿∫ ∏ÌΩ√«¸ ƒ≥Ω∫∆√¿Ã¥œ±Ó ∏ÌΩ√∏¶
		// «ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.
		// (U_clasS) obj ; ∂Û∞Ì ∏ÌΩ√«¸ ¥ŸøÓ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ «‘.
		U_Class res = (U_Class) obj;
		if (this.N_Name.equals(res.N_Name)) { // String class¿« ∫Ò±≥
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

//		 ∏∏æ‡ø° ≥ª∞° §°¿⁄∞Ì¿÷¥¬ this.N_Name¿Ã∂˚, res∞° ≥—æÓ∞Ô ∞™¿« N_Namd ∞·∞˙ ∞™¿Ã ∞Æ¥Ÿ∏È ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ∂Û. ±◊∑∏¡ˆ æ ¿∏∏È false.
	// return super.equals(obj); // obj∞° ø¬¥Ÿ±∏ø‰ø  !!

package com.test;
// ªÛº”«“∞‘ø© :)

// ¡§Ω≈¿ª ∂»∂Ï ¬˜∏Æ∞Ì∫∏¿⁄.

class AA {

	// ∏ÌΩ√ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏∞⁄§µ∫Ïµ§ø.
	public AA(int a) {
		System.out.println("AA Constructor");
	}
}

class BB extends AA { //
	public BB() {
		super (100) ;
		// super ∞° AA ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ. ø÷ super≥ƒ∏È, ∏µÁ super∏¶ ∫“∑Øø√ ºˆ ¿÷? æ≤∞«æ»æ≤∞« default∑Œ
		// µÈæÓ¿÷¥Ÿ. ∏Ì§µ«ﬁ¿∏¥œ±Ó ∏ÌΩ√µ» ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ »£√‚«œ∞⁄≥◊ ? ±◊∑°º≠ super∞° ¿÷∞« æ¯∞« error∞° æ»≥≥¥œ¥Ÿ. but if AAø° int a ∫Øºˆ∞° ¿÷¥Ÿ∏È,
		// ¡ˆøÏ∏È πŸ∑Œ errror superø÷ ≥÷æ¸¥¬¡ˆµµ ¿Ã«ÿæ»µ  ππæﬂ. ¿Ã ≈∞øˆµÂ¥¬ §≤≥™µÂΩ√ √π¡Ÿø° Ω· ¡›¥œ¥Ÿ.  
		// this(); µµ √π¡Ÿø° æπ§§µ§ø.
		// super / this µ— ¡ﬂø° «œ≥™∏∏ æπ¥œ¥Ÿ. 
		// extends∂Û¥¬ ∞… º±æ«œ∏È, ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ super∞° ª˝∑´µ» «¸≈¬. ≥ª∫Œ¿˚¿∏∑Œ super∞¥√º(=defaultª˝º∫¿⁄)∞° Ω…æÓ¡Æ ¿÷æÓæﬂ
		// AA∏¶ ∫“∑Øø√ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
		System.out.println("BB Constructor");
	}
} // ¥Ÿ¿ÃæÓ±◊∑•¿ª ∫∏¿⁄. æÓ¡¶ ∫ª ±◊∏≤¿Ã∂˚¿∫ »≠ªÏ√À¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£¥‰¥œ¥Ÿ. ¿Ã≥  ππæÓ¬º∞Ì «ﬂ¿›æ∆ø©.

public class MTest02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		BZ b1 = new BZ(); // AA () -> BB () // ¡÷º“ 2∞≥¬•∏Æ∞° ¬¸¡∂∞° µ«¡Æ. ¬¸¡∂ ¡÷º“¿« Ω√¿€¿Ã AA∂ı ∏ª¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ. ∞¯√•¿ª ∫æ¥œ¥Ÿ. 2p

	System.out.println(b1 instanceof BZ);

	System.out.println(b1 instanceof AA);
	// System.out.println(b1 instanceof Integer); æ»µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ.
	System.out.println(b1 instanceof Object); // super clas∞° object ¿Ã±‚∂ßπÆ.
	
	// class , ªÛº” , ¥Ÿ«¸º∫ ºº∞°¡ˆ ¡ﬂø° µŒ∞°¡ˆ πËøÚ :) ¥Ÿ«¸º∫ «œ∏È øˆ≈©º•¿ª «œ∞⁄∂ﬂ§≥¥œ¥Ÿ.
	// ∞°¿Â ¡ﬂø‰«—∞« class ≥ª¿« ª˝º∫¿⁄. ª˝º∫ «—¥Ÿ∞Ì «œ∏È π´¡∂∞« ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° ¿÷æÓæﬂ «’¥œ¥Ÿ. ª˝º∫¿⁄∂Ûµµ ¿÷æÓæﬂ «’¥œ¥Ÿ. ª˝º∫¿⁄¥¬ «◊ªÛ newøÕ «‘≤≤ «’Ω√¥Ÿ
	
	}
}





395     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY09\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;

public class MTest03 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

	// case 1 : ∞¥√º∏¶ √ ±‚»≠ (∫ÛπÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠), a=100, b=50¿ª ≥÷æÓº≠ «’¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		BZ b1 = new BZ () ; // new BB()∏¶ »£√‚«œ∞Ì new AA »£√‚«œ¥¬ πÊπ˝ . ∞¥√ºª˝º∫¿∫ AA()∞° ∏’¿˙ ª˝º∫, BB()∞° ¥Ÿ¿Ωª˝º∫
		b1.setA(100);
		b1.setB(50);
		
		System.out.println("a="+b1.getA()+ "  b="+b1.getB());
		System.out.println("hap= "+b1.getHap());
		
		// case 2 : √ ±‚∞™ 200, 300¿ª ∞¢∞¢ aøÕ bø° ¥Î¿‘«œ∏Èº≠ «’¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
	BZ b2=new BZ(200,300); // a=200, b=300
	System.out.println(b2.getHap());
	
	 // case 3 : ∫Øºˆ f∏¶ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ FZ∂Û¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ 
	// BB≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ªÛº”πﬁæ∆ (a+b) = f∑Œ ±∏«ˆµ«¥¬ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ¿€º∫«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
	
	FZ f1 = new FZ(300,200,60);//(300+200)-50 =450
	System.out.println(f1.getRes());
		}
}





396     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY09\src\com\test02\DZ.java

package com.test02;

import com.test.AZ;

public class DZ extends AZ{

	private int d ;
	public DZ() {}
	public DZ (int d) {
		this.d=d;
		
	}
	
	// get A()∏¶ »£√‚«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ¿Ã¿±§§ ? ¥Ÿ∏•∆–≈∞¡ˆ¿« º±¡∂, ªÛº”Ω√ get A()¿« ¡¢±Ÿ ¡¶«—¿⁄∞° public¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆ¿Ã¥Ÿ.
	 // protected ¿Ã∏È, πŸ∑Œ ø°∑Ø, ∫“∑Øø√ ºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.
	// protected ¿«πÃ : ¥Ÿ∏• pkgø°º≠ ∞°¡Æ∞•ºˆ æ¯∞‘«œ±‚ ¿ß«ÿº≠. 

	public int getRes() {
		return getA() ^ getD();
	}
	public int getD() {
		return d;
	}
	public void setD(int d) {
		this.d = d;
	}
	
}

public class MTest {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
	// DD∞¥√º∑Œ getA()  ; ∞¯∞≥«¸¿Ã¥œ±Ó ±◊≥… »£√‚«’Ω√¥Ÿ.
		DZ d1 = new DZ () ; // d1¿Ã ªÁøÎ¿⁄, ªÁøÎ¿⁄∞° ªı∑ŒøÓ πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ set«œ∞Ì get «œ¥¬∞≈¡Æ.

package com.test03;
// ¿Á¡§¿«∏¶ «“±Ó«’¥œ¥Ÿ.

// ¡ˆø™/ ¿¸ø™¿« ±‚¡ÿ¿∫ method. // method æ»¿∫ ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ , π€¿∫ ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ
// Ω««‡¿« ¥‹¿ß¥¬ class / ∏Ì∑… ºˆ«‡¿« ¥‹¿ß∞° method.

// ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø°ø√∂Û∞°∏È æÓ∂ª∞‘ µ… ∞Õ¿Œ∞°.

// BTest b1 = new BTest();
//

class ATest {

	public void prn() {
		System.out.println("A Prn"); // super.prn ¿Ã∞Ì
	}
}

class BTest extends ATest {
	public void disp() {
		System.out.println("B disp");
		
	}

	public void prn() {
		 super.prn();
		System.out.println("BB Prn"); // this.prn ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° º≠∑Œ ¥ﬁ∂Ûº≠ ø¿∑˘∞° æ»≥≠¥Ÿ∞Ì ª˝∞¢«ÿ º≠∑Œ. ¿⁄±‚µÈ≥¢∏Æ Ωƒ∫∞¿Ã ∞°¥…«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆ.
		// ¡ˆø™¿Ã∞« ¿¸ø™¿Ã∞« ∂»∞∞¿∫ ±∏ø™ø° Ωƒ∫∞¿⁄ æ≤∏È ±∏∫∞¿Ã æ»µ«¿›æ∆. 
  System.out.println("==================");}
}

public class MTest01 { // ø©±‚º≠ ∞¥√§∏¶ ª˝º∫«œø© ªÁøÎ«œ∞‘µ«∏È, ≥ª∞° ¥©±∏∂Û∞Ì ∏ª«œ¡ˆ æ ¿∏∏È, ¿¸√º ¡÷º“¿« Ω√¿€¡÷º“∏¶ ∞∞¿Ã ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø° Ωƒ∫∞¿◊ §ø§§µ»¥Ÿ.
	// b1.«œ∞‘µ«∏È, ATest øÕ BTest¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ µ—¥Ÿ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, «ˆ¿Á object¿« prn¿Œ this.prn;¿ª ∫“∑Øø¿∞‘µ»¥Ÿ±∏ø©.
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		BTest b1 = new BTest(); // ATest() -> BTest() πÊ«‚¿∏∑Œ ≈Ωªˆ«œ∞‘ µ  // ø©±‚º≠ this¥¬ new BTestæﬂ.
		b1.prn(); // b1.prn = this.prn ¿Ã∂Û¥¬ ∂Ê.«ˆ¿Á ø¿∫Í¡ß∆Æ¿« ¡÷º“∞° b1.prnø° ¿÷¥‰¥œ¥Ÿ (ªÁΩ«¿Ã∞«æ∆¥“ºˆµµ¿÷¥Ÿ)
		// ATest().Prn ->BTest().Prn () µøΩ√ø° »£√‚«ÿº≠ ∏Ì∑…¿ª Ω««‡«œ¥¬µ• º¯º≠¥Î∑Œ «œ¥ı∂Û. ±◊∑°º≠ duplicate.√Îº“∞° µ«µµ∑œ ∏∏µÈæ˘¥Ÿ.
// ø÷ override∂Û∞Ì«“±Ó.
// º±¡∂∂˚ ∞∞æ∆æﬂ«œ¥œ±Ó. 
// ¥©±∫∞°∞° ¡§¿««— ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ¡§¿«∏¶ ªı∑Œ«œ¥¬∞…, annotation¿ª ∞…∏È, º±¡∂∞° ∞°¡¯ prn∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ »£√‚«ÿº≠ »ƒº’¿« ¡÷º“∑Œ ¡§¿«∏¶ ¥ŸΩ√ «—∞Õ.
///
		ATest a1 = new ATest();
		a1.prn();
		
		ATest a2 = new BTest(); // 
		a2.prn();
		//a2.disp(); // æÍ¥¬ ∞Æ∞Ì ø√ ºˆ∞° æ¯¿Ω. ∏ﬁ∏∏Æ ∞Æ∞Ì ø√∂Û∞•∂ß, »ƒº’∞≈ prn∏∏ ªÏ∑¡º≠ Aø° ø√∑¡º≠ A.prn¿∫ AµÁ BµÁ ªÛ∞¸æ¯¿Ã ¥Ÿ µÈ∞Ìø».
		 // A¿Ã∏ß¿ª ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ∞° ¥Ÿ∏£∞‘ ΩË±‚ ∂ßπÆø° A¥¬ B¿« prn¿Ã ¿⁄±‚≤®∂Û∞Ì ª˝∞¢«‘. 
		// ¥ŸøÓƒ≥Ω∫∆√ ππ ±◊µ˝∞≈ æ¯¿Ω. Ωƒ∫∞«“ºˆæ¯¿ª ∂ß¥¬ 
		b1.prn();
		b1.disp();
		
		
	}
}

package com.test03;

class My {

	public void Myprn() {
		System.out.println("My prn()");
	}
}

public class MTest02 {
	public static void Disp(My m) { // My m = new My (); «ÿæﬂµ«¿›æ∆. ±Ÿµ• ø∑ø° My m ∑Œ πÊ¿ª ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ new my∏¶ πﬁ¿∏∏È æÓ¬˜«« ∂»∞∞¿Ã µ«¿›æ∆.
									// æÀ∞⁄≥ƒ∞Ì
		m.Myprn(); // ¡ˆ±›∫∏∞Ì ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ µ«≥™∫∏¥Ÿ «œ¿⁄.
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Disp(new My() {

			@Override
			public void Myprn() { // «—π¯¬Î¿∫ ¿⁄±‚ ¿⁄Ω≈¿ª ¿Á¡§¿««ÿº≠ æµ ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ «ÿ¡ÿ¥‰¥œ¥Ÿ. ø¯∑°¥¬ ¿ß∏¶ √‚∑¬«ÿæﬂµ«¥¬µ• ªı∑Œ ¿Á¡§¿««“∞≈æﬂ. ø÷ ±◊∑±¡ˆ ∏∏£∞⁄¥¬µ•ø©.

				// ø¿πˆ∂Û¿ÃµÂ¥¬ ªÛº”∞˙ ªÛ∞¸æ¯¿Ã ±◊≥… ∏ﬁº“µÂ ¿Á¡§¿«.
				// ¿Ã∏ß¿∫ µø¿œ«—µ• ∏Ì∑…ºˆ«‡¿ª ¥ŸΩ√«—¥Ÿ¥¬∞≈æﬂ. ø÷ ? ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ªı∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∏È§∑ §ø§§µ«≥™ø© ?
				 // ¿Ã∏ß(¡÷º“)¿ª ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ ¡§¿«∏∏ ªı∑”∞‘. ¿Œ§ß§°Ω∫ø° ¿˙¿Âµ» æ÷∏¶ µ•∑¡¥Ÿ∞° ªı∑”∞‘ ±‚¥…¿ª ¿Á¡§¿« «ﬁ¿∏¥œ±Ó æÍ∏¶ »£√‚«“ ºˆ π€ø°.

400     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.Frame; // FRAME class∏¶ ªÛº”πﬁæ“¥Ÿ. Layout πËƒ°«œ¥¬ æ÷∞° ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì «ÿº≠ »Æ¿Œ¿ª «ﬂ¥Ÿ. ≥°.
import java.awt.Button;
import java.awt.FlowLayout;

public class MTest extends Frame {

	Button button1, button2, button3;

	public void init() {
	         button1 = new Button("Ok");
	         button2 = new Button("Open");
	         button3 = new Button("Close");
	         add(button1); // add¥¬ Frame¿ßø° ¿÷¥¬ º±¡∂¿« ∞Õ.
	         add(button2);
	         add(button3);
	         setLayout(new FlowLayout()); // ≥≤¿«≈¨∑°Ω∫∞Æ∞Ìø√∂©ª˝º∫¿⁄ (APIø°º≠ CONTR¿ª µ⁄¡Æ∫∏¿⁄)
setSize(200,200);
setVisible(true);
}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
MTest a1 = new MTest();
a1.init();
System.out.println(a1.getLayout()); // ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê¿∫ setlayout¿Õ§∂¡ˆ.
	
	
	}
	}





401     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;

public class MTest01 extends Frame { // ≥™∏∏¿« ∑π¿Ãæ∆øÙ¿ª ∏∏µÈ±‚ ¿ß«ÿ Frame¿ª ªÛº”πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.

	Panel p1, p2, p3;

	public MTest01() { // ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄
		// super(); frame¿« ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∞°∏£≈µ¥œ¥Ÿ. = frame();
		// CONSTR∏¶ ∫∏¥œ±Ó ¬™¿∫æ÷∏¶ ∫ª¥Ÿ Frame(String title)
		super("≥ª∞°∏∏µÁ «¡∑π¿”");// º±¡∂∏¶ »£√‚«œ¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄. super
		p1 = new Panel();
		p2 = new Panel();
		p3 = new Panel();

	}

	public void go() {// component ¿€æ˜¿ª ø©±‚º≠ «ÿ∫æΩ√¥Ÿ.
		//// panel
		p1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);
		p2.setBackground(Color.red);
		p3.setBackground(Color.GRAY);
		//// Frame
		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(1, 3));
		setSize(2000, 200);
		setVisible(true);

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

//		new MTest01 ();  ∏∏«œ∏È ∏∏µÈ∞Ì æ»∫∏ø©¡‹. ∫∏ø©¡÷¥¬ ∏Ì∑…æÓ∞° æ¯¿›æ∆ø© 
		new MTest01().go(); // ±Ó¡ˆ «ÿæﬂ ∫∏ø©¡‹.vsibla

	}
}





402     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest02.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;

public class MTest02 extends Frame {

	////// panel
	Panel p1, p2, p3; // 1 º±æ«œ∞Ì ª˝º∫¿⁄∞°º≠ ª°∏Æ ª˝º∫«—¥Ÿ.
	/////// p1
	Label lbName, lbAddr, lbPhone;
	TextField txtName, txtAddr, txtPhone; // º±æ º±æ

	/////// p2
	Button btok, btcn;

	////// p3
	TextArea textview;

	public MTest02() {

		super("¡÷º“∑œ");
		p1 = new Panel(); // 2 ø©±‚¥Ÿ ª˝º∫¿ª «—¥Ÿ. ¿ﬂ«ﬂΩ¿¥œ¥Ÿ ¬¶¬¶¬¶ :) API - CONSTR
		p2 = new Panel();
		p3 = new Panel();
		//////////////// label ¿⁄∏Æ "A label displays a single line of read-only text."
		lbName = new Label(" ¿Ã  ∏ß  "); /// Label(String text) constrø° ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ æ≤∂Û∞Ì ≥™øÕ¿÷æ˙¿›æ∆.
		lbAddr = new Label("¡÷ º“");
		lbPhone = new Label("¥œπ¯»≠π¯»£");

		//////////////// text field ¿⁄∏Æ (API - CONSTR - TextField(String text, int
		//////////////// columns)
		txtName = new TextField("", 30);
		txtAddr = new TextField("", 30);
		txtPhone = new TextField("", 30);
		//////////////////////// Button API - CONSTR Button(String label)
		btok = new Button("»Æ¿Œ");
		btcn = new Button("√Îº“");
		////////////////////// TextArea TextArea(String text)
		textview = new TextArea("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Á", 5, 100);

	}

	public void go() {
		////// panel

		/////// p1
		p1.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2)); // ∑π¿Ãæ∆øÙ ª˝º∫
		p1.add(lbName);
		p1.add(txtName); // ª˝º∫«—∞… panelø° ø√∏∞¥Ÿ.
		p1.add(lbAddr);
		p1.add(txtAddr);
		p1.add(lbPhone);
		p1.add(txtPhone);

		/////// p2

		p2.add(btok);
		p2.add(btcn);

		////// p3
		p3.add(textview);

		////// Frame
		setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 1));
		add(p1);
		add(p2);	
		add(p3);
		
		setSize(1500, 1000);
		setVisible(true);
		setFont(new Font("µ∏øÚ", Font.BOLD, 25)); // java.awt.Font constructor : Font(String name, int style, int size)
		p1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);
	
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		new MTest02().go();

	}
}

404     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest031.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;


public class MTest031 extends Frame {
	Panel p1;
	TextField A, B, Res;
	List mcalc;
	Button ok;

	public MTest031() {

		super("Calc");
		p1 = new Panel();
	

		
		A = new TextField("",5);
		B = new TextField("",5);
		Res = new TextField("",5);
		mcalc = new List(4, false);
		mcalc.add("      +");
		mcalc.add("      -");
		mcalc.add("      x");
		mcalc.add("      /");

		ok = new Button("=");

	}

	public void go() {
		
	
		p1.add(A);

		
		p1.add(mcalc);
		
	
		p1.add(B);
		
		
		p1.add(ok);
		
		
		
		p1.add(Res);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(1, 1));
		add(p1);
		

		setSize(500, 200);
		setVisible(true);
	
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		new MTest031().go();
	}
}





405     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest04.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*; // Gui ¿Ã∫•∆Æ ø¨µø 4∞°¡ˆ  1. inner class∑Œ ¿Á¡§¿« (¡ˆ±›«ﬂ∂«)
//¡ˆ±› √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫«œ≥™∞°¡Æø¿∑¡∞Ì«’¥œ¥Ÿ∏∏.
// listener∏¶ æ≤∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿ (addWindowListener) / 
// windowClosing(WindowEvent e) - √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∞° ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ ¿œπ› ∏ﬁº“µÂ(public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e)): ªÛº”¿ªπﬁæ∆º≠, ¿Á¡§¿«∏∏«ÿº≠ æ≤∏Èµ 
import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;

public class MTest04 extends Frame {

	public MTest04() {
		super("Calc");
	}

	public void go() {
		addWindowListener(new MyEvent()); // means MyEventø°¥¬ window close ¿Ã∫•∆Æ∞° ¿÷¥Ÿ. ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄. class∏¶.
		setSize(300, 200);
		setVisible(true);
	}

	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter { // µø¿œ«— ∏ﬁº“µÂ∑Œ ¥Ÿ«‚«— ø¯«¸¿ª ∞Æ¥¬¥Ÿ. √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫∞° ∞Æ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ¿Á¡§¿««ÿº≠ ªÁøÎ«‘. ¥Ÿ∏•øÎµµ*¥ŸæÁ«—«¸≈¬¿«º∫¡˙*∑Œ ªÁøÎ«œ±‚ ¿ß«ÿº≠.

		// ªÁøÎ¿⁄∏∂¥Ÿ ª˝∞¢¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏£±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ±‚¥…¿∫ ∞Æ¥ı∂Ûµµ Ω««‡µ«¥¬ ∞ÕµÈ¿Ã ¥Ÿ∏¶∂ß √ﬂªÛ»≠ ? §ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª§ª
		// ππ ±◊∑°º≠ event¥¬ ¿¸∫Œ √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿Ã¥Ÿ. ∂Û∞Ì «œ¥ı¿Ã¥Ÿ.

		// public abstract class WindowAdapter
		// An abstract adapter class for receiving window events. The methods in this
		// class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener
		// objects.

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent arg0) {
			System.exit(0);

			// windowClosing(WindowEvent e)
			//Invoked when a window is in the process of being closed.

		}

	} // close »£√‚«œ¿⁄.

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest04().go();
	}

}

package com.test02;

import javax.swing.*;
import java.awt.*;
	

public class MyAddress extends JFrame {

	////// panel
	JPanel p1, p2, p3; // 1 º±æ«œ∞Ì ª˝º∫¿⁄∞°º≠ ª°∏Æ ª˝º∫«—¥Ÿ.
	/////// p1
	JLabel lbName, lbAddr, lbPhone;
	JTextField txtName, txtAddr, txtPhone; // º±æ º±æ

	/////// p2
	JButton btok, btcn;

	////// p3
	JTextArea textview;

	public MyAddress() {

		super("¡÷º“∑œ");
		p1 = new JPanel(); // 2 ø©±‚¥Ÿ ª˝º∫¿ª «—¥Ÿ. ¿ﬂ«ﬂΩ¿¥œ¥Ÿ ¬¶¬¶¬¶ :) API - CONSTR
		p2 = new JPanel();
		p3 = new JPanel();
		//////////////// label ¿⁄∏Æ "A label displays a single line of read-only text."
		lbName = new JLabel(" ¿Ã  ∏ß  "); /// Label(String text) constrø° ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ æ≤∂Û∞Ì ≥™øÕ¿÷æ˙¿›æ∆.
		lbAddr = new JLabel("¡÷ º“");
		lbPhone = new JLabel("¥œπ¯»≠π¯»£");

		//////////////// text field ¿⁄∏Æ (API - CONSTR - TextField(String text, int
		//////////////// columns)
		txtName = new JTextField("", 30);
		txtAddr = new JTextField("", 30);
		txtPhone = new JTextField("", 30);
		//////////////////////// Button API - CONSTR Button(String label)
		btok = new JButton("»Æ¿Œ");
		btcn = new JButton("√Îº“");
		////////////////////// TextArea TextArea(String text)
		textview = new JTextArea("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Á", 5, 100);

	}

	public void go() {
		////// panel

		/////// p1
		p1.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2)); // ∑π¿Ãæ∆øÙ ª˝º∫
		p1.add(lbName);
		p1.add(txtName); // ª˝º∫«—∞… panelø° ø√∏∞¥Ÿ.
		p1.add(lbAddr);
		p1.add(txtAddr);
		p1.add(lbPhone);
		p1.add(txtPhone);

		/////// p2

		p2.add(btok);
		p2.add(btcn);

		////// p3
		p3.add(textview);

		////// Frame
		setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 1));

		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		setSize(1500, 1000);
		setVisible(true);
		setFont(new Font("µ∏øÚ", Font.BOLD, 25)); // java.awt.Font constructor : Font(String name, int style, int size)
		p1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);
		p2.setBackground(Color.red);
		p3.setBackground(Color.GRAY);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		new MyAddress().go();

	}
}





408     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY10_WS\src\com\exam\Mtest05.java

package com.exam;

import java.util.*;

public class Mtest05 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘ ∫Œ≈Õ º±æ ∏’¿˙ «’Ω√¥Ÿ.
		String name = null;
		int kor =0, eng = 0, mat=0 , hap = 0;
		double avg = 0.0;
		
		// ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("¥ÁΩ≈¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿∫ π´æ˘¿‘¥œ±Ó ?");
		name = sc.nextLine();
		System.out.println("±πæÓ ¡°ºˆ∏¶ ¿‘∑¬«ÿ");   // nextint ∑Œ «ÿµµ µ»¥Ÿ
		kor = sc.nextInt();
				System.out.println("øµæÓ ¡°ºˆ∏¶ ¿‘∑¬«ÿ");
		eng = sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("ºˆ«– ¡°ºˆ∏¶ ¿‘∑¬«ÿ");
		mat = sc.nextInt();

		hap = kor + eng + mat;
		avg = (double)hap / 3;
		
		//√‚∑¬
		System.out.println("¿Ã∏ß: " + name);
		System.out.printf("«’∞Ë¡°ºˆ : %10d ¡° ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ. √‡«œ«’¥œ¥Á><\n", hap);
		System.out.printf("∆Ú±’¡°ºˆ : %10.1f ¡° ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ. √‡«œ«’¥œ¥Á><", avg);
	}
}

package com.exam;

public class Test011 {

	public static void MyView(String a, String b) { // ø©±‚µµ ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ
		// String a = 90; // ø©±‚µµ ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆø©º≠ πÊ µŒ∞≥ ∏∏µÁ∞Õ√≥∑≥ µ»¥Ÿ.

		int b1 = Integer.parseInt(b);

		// System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %5d",a1,b1,(a1*b1));

		String str = String.format("%5d * %5d = %5d", a1, b1, (a1 * b1));
		System.out.println(str);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
// ∏ﬁ¿Œ¿∏∑Œ∫Œ≈Õ µŒ ∞≥¿« ∞™¿ª πﬁæ∆ aøÕ b¿« ¥Î¿‘¿ª «œ∞Ì a*b = ?

		MyView(a, b); // public static void MyVew(a,b)
					  // public static String MyView02(a,b)

	}

}

// non_static¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
public class Test013 {
	
	public String MyView 03(String a, String b) { 

		int a1 = Integer.parseInt(a);
		int b1 = Integer.parseInt(b);

		String str = String.format("%5d * %5d = %5d", a1, b1, (a1 * b1));
		return str;	}
	
	public static String MyView(String a, String b) { // ø©±‚µµ ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆ
		// String a = 90; // ø©±‚µµ ¡ˆø™∫Øºˆø©º≠ πÊ µŒ∞≥ ∏∏µÁ∞Õ√≥∑≥ µ»¥Ÿ.
		// String b = 80;

		int b1 = Integer.parseInt(b);

		// System.out.printf("%5d * %5d = %5d",a1,b1,(a1*b1));

		String str = String.format("%5d * %5d = %5d", a1, b1, (a1 * b1));
		return str;	}

	
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
// ∏ﬁ¿Œ¿∏∑Œ∫Œ≈Õ µŒ ∞≥¿« ∞™¿ª πﬁæ∆ aøÕ b¿« ¥Î¿‘¿ª «œ∞Ì a*b = ?

		// String b = "80";

		String b = args[1]; // Ω««‡«“∂ß, run as configuration / argument $(String_prompt)

//		MyView(a, b); // public static void MyVew(a,b)
					  // public static String MyView02(a,b)
 String res = MyView(a,b);
 System.out.println("∞·∞˙ : " + res);

 System.out.println("non_static »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.");
 new Test01().Myview03(a,b);
  String res02 = new Test01().Myview04(a,b);
 System.out.println("∞·∞˙ : " + res);
 
	}

package com.exam;
/*
 * [πÆ¡¶2]65430ø¯¿ª ∏∏µÈ±‚ ¿ß«— »≠∆Û¿« ∞πºˆ∏¶ ±∏«œΩ√ø¿._ ¥‹º¯ ªÁƒ¢ø¨ªÍ¿∏∑Œ∏∏.!
money = 65430ø¯
∏∏ø¯ = 6
√µø¯ = 5
πÈø¯ = 4
Ω ø¯ = 3
 * */
public class Test02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int money = 65430 ;
		int man = (int) (money/10000);
		int ch = (int) (money-(man*10000) )/1000;
		int bg = (int) (money-(man*10000 + ch*1000)) /100;
		int sp = (int) (money-(man*10000 + ch*1000+ bg*100))/10;
 		System.out.println("∏∏ø¯ : " + man);
		System.out.println("√µø¯ : " +ch);
		System.out.println("πÈø¯ : " +bg);
		System.out.println("Ω ø¯ : " + sp);
	}

}

427     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\JAVAWORK2\DAY11\src\com\test\MTest02.java

package com.test;

abstract class AA {

	public abstract void Prn(); // ¿ΩΩƒ¡°¿« ∏ﬁ¥∫∞∞¿∫ ¡∏¿Á. ≥™¡ﬂø° »ƒº’¿Ã ¿Á¡§¿««ÿº≠ æµ∞Õ. º±æ∏∏«‘.

} // æ∆¡˜ æ» ∏∏µÂ∑Ø¡¯∞≈, ±‚¥…±∏«ˆ ∏¯«‘. // UMLø°º≠ ¿Ã≈≈∏Ø√§∑Œ ¥©øˆ∞ËΩ…. & Cø° aµµ ∫ŸæÓ¿÷æÓ.

class BB extends AA {

	// AA¥¬ ∞¥√ºª˝º∫¿Ã æ»µ«±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, »ƒº’¿ª ≈Î«ÿ ∞¥√º∏¶ ∏∏µÈ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
	@Override
	public void Prn() {
		System.out.println("BB'Prn");

	}
}

class DD extends AA {

	@Override
	public void Prn() {
		System.out.println("DD'Prn");
	}
}

public class MTest02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// System.out.println(new AA()); // toString¿Ãæ˙¥¬µ•, abstract ≥÷¿∏∏È "cannot
		// instantiate the type AA" ∂Û∞Ì ∂‰. æﬂ ≥  ∞¥√º ∏¯∏∏µÈ¿›æ∆ !
		// like ¿©µµøÏ¿« Ω√∞Ë. --> 0000¿∏∑Œ √ ±‚»≠ ∏¯«‘. √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ∞¥√º ∏¯ ∏∏µÎ. ±‚¥…¿ª ±∏«ˆ«ﬂ¥Ÿ æ»«ﬂ¥Ÿ∞Ì ∏∏µÈæ˙¥Ÿ æ»«ﬂ¥Ÿ∞Ì
		// ±∏∫–.
 System.out.println("¡§¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘");// ¡§¿˚ πŸ¿Œµ˘ (¥Ÿø√∑¡≥ı∞Ìæ≤¥¬∞≈)
		BB b1 = new BB();  // : ¡÷º“∞° ∞¢¿⁄ µŒ∞≥ (BB/DD)
		b1.Prn();

		DD d1 = new DD(); // µ—¥Ÿ AA∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠, ∞¢¿⁄ ¿Á¡§¿««— ¡§¿˚ πŸ¿Œµ˘
		d1.Prn();

		System.out.println("µø¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘"); // ¡÷º“∞° 1∞≥ (a1) => µø¿˚ πŸ¿Œµ˘¿∏∑Œ ¬•æﬂ ∆Ì«œ¥Ÿ. // « ø‰«“∂ß ∞¥√º∏∏µÈæÓº≠ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ.
		 // √ﬂªÛ«œ∏È, ¥Ÿ«¸º∫¿∫ µø¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘¿∏∑Œ «œº≈æﬂ «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
		// OOP ∆Ø¬° ºº∞≥

package com.test;

abstract class ATest { // abstract∞° ¿÷æÓº≠ √ﬂªÛ class¿Ã¡ˆ, √ﬂªÛ∏ﬁº“µÂ∞° ¿÷æÓº≠ √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿Œ∞« æ∆¥’¥œ¥Ÿ. JAVA¥¬ ±◊∑∏Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ. C¥¬ æ»±◊∑∏∞⁄¡Æ

	public final void Prn() {

	public void Disp2() {}

package com.test;

public class My_Sub extends U_Super { // getName «œ∑¡∞Ì ªÛº”

	private int age; // ∫Øºˆ«œ≥™º±æ

	public My_Sub() {
	}

	// super∞° ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄¡Í?
	public My_Sub(String name, int age) {
		super(name); // 2∞≥ πﬁæ∆º≠ «œ≥™¥¬ superø° ≥—±‚∞Ì «œ≥™¥¬ ≥™«—≈◊ ¿˙¿Â
		this.age = age;
	}

	@Override
	public void Prn() {// ªÛº”¿ª πﬁæ∆∫∏¥œ, super¥¬ √ﬂªÛ¿Ãæﬂ. ¿Á¡§¿««ÿæﬂ¡ˆ.
		System.out.println("name :" + getName() + "age:" + age);
	}

	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}

	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		U_Super u1 = new My_Sub("»´±Êµø", 20); // ª˝º∫¿⁄∑Œ ∞™¿ª ¿˙¿Â«œ∞Ì, ∏Æ≈œ πﬁ¿ª ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ¿÷¥Ÿ¿÷¥Ÿ ? // My_sub class∑Œ ∞°º≠ super∏¶ »£√‚«œ∞Ì, »´±Êµø≥—±‚∞Ì,

		// ¿Ã∏ß∫Ø∞Ê∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄. U_Superø°¥Ÿ∞° setter∏¶ √ﬂ∞°«ÿ∫¡.
