736     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\pms\biz\PmsBiz.java

package pms.biz;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import pms.dao.PmsDao;
import pms.entity.PmsEntity;
import pms.vo.PmsVo;

@Service
public class PmsBiz {
	
	@Autowired
	PmsDao pmsDao;
	
	public List<PmsEntity> getAll(int pms_pmno){
		List<PmsEntity> list = pmsDao.getAll(pms_pmno);
		Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<PmsEntity>() {

			@Override
			public int compare(PmsEntity o1, PmsEntity o2) {
				return o2.getPms_no() - o1.getPms_no();
			}
		});
		return list;
	}
	
	public int getInsertPms(String pms_id, int pms_pmno, PmsVo vo) {
		PmsEntity entity = new PmsEntity();
		entity.setPms_id(pms_id);
		entity.setPms_pmno(pms_pmno);
		entity.setPms_mission(vo.getPms_mission());
		entity.setPms_st(vo.getPms_st());
		entity.setPms_end(vo.getPms_end());
		entity.setPms_color(vo.getPms_color());
		
		return pmsDao.getInsertPms(entity);
	}
	
	public int getDeletePms(int pms_no) {
		return pmsDao.getDeletePms(pms_no);
	}
	
	public int getUpdatePms(int pms_no, PmsVo vo) {
		PmsEntity entity = new PmsEntity();
		entity.setPms_no(pms_no);
		entity.setPms_mission(vo.getPms_mission());
		entity.setPms_st(vo.getPms_st());
		entity.setPms_end(vo.getPms_end());
		entity.setPms_color(vo.getPms_color());
		
		return pmsDao.getUpdatePms(entity);
	}
}





737     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\pms\controller\PmsServlet.java

package pms.controller;

import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import pms.biz.PmsBiz;
import pms.entity.PmsEntity;
import pms.vo.PmsVo;

@Controller("PmsController")
public class PmsServlet {
	
	@Autowired
	PmsBiz pms_biz;
	
	@RequestMapping("/selectAllPms.do")
	public ModelAndView selectAllPms(@RequestParam(value="pms_pmno") int pms_pmno) {
		List<PmsEntity> all = pms_biz.getAll(pms_pmno);
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("", "AllPms", all);
		return mav;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/insertPms.do")
	public String insertPms( HttpSession session, @RequestParam(value="pms_pmno") int pms_pmno,@RequestParam(value="vo") PmsVo pmsVo) {
		String userID = (String) session.getAttribute("userID");
		if(userID == null) {
			return "" + pms_pmno;
		} else { 
			int r = pms_biz.getInsertPms(userID, pms_pmno, pmsVo);
			System.out.println(r);
		}
		return null;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/deletePms.do")
	public int deletePms(@RequestParam(value="pms_no") int pms_no) {
		int r = pms_biz.getDeletePms(pms_no);
		return 0;
	}
	
	@RequestMapping("/updatePms.do")
	public String updatePms(@RequestParam(value="vo") PmsVo pmsvo, @RequestParam(value="pms_no") int pms_no) {
		int r = pms_biz.getUpdatePms(pms_no, pmsvo);
		return null;
	}
}





738     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\pms\dao\IPms.java

package pms.dao;

public interface IPms {
	String all_pms = "select * from pms where pms_pmno = ?";	
	
	String insert_pms = "insert into pms (pms_seq,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
	
	String delete_pms = "delete form pms where pms_no = ?";
	
	String update_pms = "update pms set (pms_id, pms_st, pms_end, pms_color) = (?,?,?,?) where pms_no = ?";
}





739     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\pms\dao\PmsDao.java

package pms.dao;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import pms.entity.PmsEntity;

@Repository
public class PmsDao implements IPms {
	
	@Autowired
	JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

	public List<PmsEntity> getAll(int pms_pmno) {
		List<PmsEntity> all = jdbcTemplate.query(all_pms, new Object[] { pms_pmno }, new RowMapper<PmsEntity>() {

			@Override
			public PmsEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new PmsEntity(rs.getInt("pms_no"), rs.getString("pms_id"), rs.getInt("pms_pmno"),
						rs.getString("pms_mission"), rs.getString("pms_st"), rs.getString("pms_end"),
						rs.getString("pms_color"));
			}
		});
		return all;
	}
	
	public int getInsertPms(PmsEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(insert_pms, new Object[] {
				entity.getPms_id(), entity.getPms_pmno(), entity.getPms_mission(), entity.getPms_st(), entity.getPms_end(), entity.getPms_color()
		});
	}
	
	public int getDeletePms(int pms_no) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(delete_pms, new Object[] {pms_no});
	}
	
	public int getUpdatePms(PmsEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(update_pms, new Object[] {
				entity.getPms_mission(), entity.getPms_st(), entity.getPms_end(), entity.getPms_color(), entity.getPms_no()
		});
	}
}





740     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\pms\entity\PmsEntity.java

package pms.entity;

public class PmsEntity {

	private int pms_no;
	private String pms_id;
	private int pms_pmno;
	private String pms_mission;
	private String pms_st;
	private String pms_end;
	private String pms_color;

	public PmsEntity() {
		super();
	}

	public PmsEntity(int pms_no, String pms_id, int pms_pmno, String pms_mission, String pms_st, String pms_end,
			String pms_color) {
		super();
		this.pms_no = pms_no;
		this.pms_id = pms_id;
		this.pms_pmno = pms_pmno;
		this.pms_mission = pms_mission;
		this.pms_st = pms_st;
		this.pms_end = pms_end;
		this.pms_color = pms_color;
	}

	public int getPms_no() {
		return pms_no;
	}

	public void setPms_no(int pms_no) {
		this.pms_no = pms_no;
	}

	public String getPms_id() {
		return pms_id;
	}

	public void setPms_id(String pms_id) {
		this.pms_id = pms_id;
	}

	public int getPms_pmno() {
		return pms_pmno;
	}

	public void setPms_pmno(int pms_pmno) {
		this.pms_pmno = pms_pmno;
	}

	public String getPms_mission() {
		return pms_mission;
	}

	public void setPms_mission(String pms_mission) {
		this.pms_mission = pms_mission;
	}

	public String getPms_st() {
		return pms_st;
	}

	public void setPms_st(String pms_st) {
		this.pms_st = pms_st;
	}

	public String getPms_end() {
		return pms_end;
	}

	public void setPms_end(String pms_end) {
		this.pms_end = pms_end;
	}

	public String getPms_color() {
		return pms_color;
	}

	public void setPms_color(String pms_color) {
		this.pms_color = pms_color;
	}
}

742     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\re\biz\ReBiz.java

package re.biz;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import re.dao.ReDao;
import re.entity.ReEntity;
import re.vo.ReVo;

@Service
public class ReBiz {
	@Autowired
	ReDao reDao;

	public List<ReEntity> getEntity(int no) {
		return reDao.getEntity(no);
	}

	public int getInsertRe(int bno, ReVo vo, String userID) {
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_bno(bno);
		entity.setRe_exp(vo.getRe_exp());
		entity.setRe_id(userID);
		System.out.println("BIZ : " + entity);
		return reDao.getInsertRe(entity);
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getAll() {
		List<ReEntity> list = reDao.getAll();
		Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public int compare(ReEntity o1, ReEntity o2) {
				return o2.getRe_no() - o2.getRe_no();
			}
		});
		return list;
	}

	public int getDeleteRe(int re_no) {
		System.out.println(re_no + " = Biz");
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_no(re_no);
		return reDao.getDeleteRe(entity);
	}

	public int getUpdateRe(String exp, int re_no) {
		ReEntity entity = new ReEntity();
		entity.setRe_no(re_no);
		entity.setRe_exp(exp);
		return reDao.getUpdateRe(entity);
	}

}

package re.controller;

import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import re.biz.ReBiz;
import re.entity.ReEntity;
import re.vo.ReVo;

@Controller("ReController")	
public class ReServlet {
	@Autowired
	ReBiz re_biz;

	@RequestMapping("/selectAllRe.do")
	public ModelAndView selectAllRe() {
		List<ReEntity> all = re_biz.getAll();
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView("WEB-INF/view/re/re.jsp", "AllRe", all);
		return mav;
	}



	@RequestMapping("/reply/view.do")
	public ModelAndView view(@RequestParam int re_no) {
		List<ReEntity> entity = re_biz.getEntity(re_no);
		return new ModelAndView("/WEB-INF/view/re/reView.jsp", "entity", entity);
	}

	@RequestMapping("/reply/write.do")
	public String wirteRedirect() {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/reWrite.jsp";
	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/reply/update.do", method = RequestMethod.GET)
	public String updateRedirect() {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/rewrite.jsp";
	}

	@RequestMapping(value = "/reply/update.do", method = RequestMethod.POST)
	public String updateReply(@ModelAttribute ReVo reVo) {
		return "/WEB-INF/view/re/rewrite.jsp";
	}
	
	

}





744     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\re\dao\IRe.java

package re.dao;

public interface IRe {
	String all_re = "select * from re";
	
	String select_re = "select * from re where re_bno = ? order by re_no";
	String select_re01 = "select * from re_id = ? and re_bno = ?";
	
	String insert_re = "insert into re values (reno.nextval,?,?,?,sysdate)";
	
	String delete_re = "delete re where re_no = ?";
	
	String update_re = "update re set re_exp = ? where re_no = ?";
	
}





745     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\re\dao\ReDao.java

package re.dao;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import re.entity.ReEntity;

@Repository
public class ReDao implements IRe {

	@Autowired
	JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

	public int getInsertRe(ReEntity entity) {
		System.out.println("DAO : " + entity);
		return jdbcTemplate.update(insert_re,
				new Object[] { entity.getRe_bno(), entity.getRe_exp(), entity.getRe_id() });
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getAll() {
		List<ReEntity> all = jdbcTemplate.query(all_re, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("revo"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re_day"));
			}

		});
		return all;
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getEntity(int no) {
		List<ReEntity> entity = jdbcTemplate.query(select_re, new Object[] { no }, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				ReEntity e = new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("re_exp"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re_day"));
				return e;
			}
		});
		return entity;
	}

	public List<ReEntity> getSelect(ReEntity entity) {
		Object[] a = new Object[] {};
		if (entity.getRe_id().isEmpty()) {
			entity.setRe_id("");
		}

		a = new Object[] { entity.getRe_bno(), entity.getRe_id() };

		List<ReEntity> sel = jdbcTemplate.query(select_re01, a, new RowMapper<ReEntity>() {

			@Override
			public ReEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				return new ReEntity(rs.getInt("re_no"), rs.getInt("re_bno"), rs.getString("re_exp"),
						rs.getString("re_id"), rs.getString("re.day"));
			}
		});
		return sel;
	}

	public int getDeleteRe(ReEntity entity) {
		System.out.println(entity.getRe_no() + " = Dao");
		Object[] a = new Object[] { entity.getRe_no()};

		int r = jdbcTemplate.update(delete_re, a);
		return r;
	}

	public int getUpdateRe(ReEntity entity) {
		return jdbcTemplate.update(update_re, new Object[] { entity.getRe_exp(), entity.getRe_no() });
	}
}





746     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\ITformation0412\src\re\entity\ReEntity.java

package re.entity;

public class ReEntity {

	private int re_no;
	private int re_bno;
	private String re_exp;
	private String re_id;
	private String re_day;

	public ReEntity() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public ReEntity(int re_no, int re_bno, String re_exp, String re_id, String re_day) {
		super();
		this.re_no = re_no;
		this.re_bno = re_bno;
		this.re_exp = re_exp;
		this.re_id = re_id;
		this.re_day = re_day;
	}

	public int getRe_no() {
		return re_no;
	}

	public void setRe_no(int re_no) {
		this.re_no = re_no;
	}

	public int getRe_bno() {
		return re_bno;
	}

	public void setRe_bno(int re_bno) {
		this.re_bno = re_bno;
	}

	public String getRe_exp() {
		return re_exp;
	}

	public void setRe_exp(String re_exp) {
		this.re_exp = re_exp;
	}

	public String getRe_id() {
		return re_id;
	}

	public void setRe_id(String re_id) {
		this.re_id = re_id;
	}

	public String getRe_day() {
		return re_day;
	}

	public void setRe_day(String re_day) {
		this.re_day = re_day;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "ReEntity [re_no=" + re_no + ", re_bno=" + re_bno + ", re_exp=" + re_exp + ", re_id=" + re_id
				+ ", re_day=" + re_day + "]";
	}

}

package com.test;
//NCS ÏßÅÎ¨¥?†ïÎ≥? : (Career - Tree - ??Î∂ÑÎ•ò - ÏßÅÎ¨¥Î≥? ?óÖÎ¨¥ÏÜåÍ∞?) NCS ?ÜåÎ∂ÑÎ•ò  - ÏßÅÎ¨¥?†ï?ùò 

import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLEncoder;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import java.io.IOException;

public class NCS_Job { // https://rwd337.tistory.com/183

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException { 
		 String dutyCd = "20010102";/// Î∞õÏïÑ???ïº?èº !!! 
		 NCS_Job job = new NCS_Job();
		 
			
		 System.out.println(job.ncsJob(dutyCd));}


	public String ncsJob(String dutyCd) throws IOException {
		String sKey = "PRnYzsnaXuiD1mD8L8MdBgvuLCwMM%2FX3GD4g4SjOquDDgoaTDn%2BB4nnKDc4lLCGKVVFTsKUdaSy4yRRIFk9yIA%3D%3D";

		StringBuilder urlBuilder = new StringBuilder("http://www.ncs.go.kr/api/openapi02.do"); /* URL */
		urlBuilder.append("?" + URLEncoder.encode("ServiceKey", "UTF-8") + "=" + sKey); /* Service Key */
		urlBuilder.append("&" + URLEncoder.encode("ServiceKey", "UTF-8") + "=" + URLEncoder.encode(sKey, "UTF-8"));
		urlBuilder.append("&" + URLEncoder.encode("pageNo", "UTF-8") + "=" + URLEncoder.encode("1", "UTF-8"));
		urlBuilder.append("&" + URLEncoder.encode("numOfRows", "UTF-8") + "=" + URLEncoder.encode("10", "UTF-8"));
		urlBuilder.append("&" + URLEncoder.encode("returnType", "UTF-8") + "=" + URLEncoder.encode("xml", "UTF-8"));
		urlBuilder.append("&" + URLEncoder.encode("dutyCd", "UTF-8") + "=" + URLEncoder.encode(dutyCd, "UTF-8"));
		URL url = new URL(urlBuilder.toString());
		System.out.println(urlBuilder.toString());
		Document doc = Jsoup.connect(urlBuilder.toString()).get();
	 

		return doc.select("dutyDef").text();
		
		
	}
}

751     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyBatisAno\src\dao\ProductDao.java

package dao;

import java.util.List;

import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;

import entity.Product;
import mybatis.MybatisUtil;

// dao/ProductDao¿« SqlSession¿« java ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ ∏≈∆€∏¶ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ.
// ∞∞¿∫ pkgæ»ø° ¿÷¥¬ productmapperjava∏¶ »£√‚
public class ProductDao { // dao¥¬ ªÛº”∞¸∞Ë∞° æ∆¥‘.

	// ¿¸√º√‚∑¬
	public List<Product> selectAllProduct() {
		// 1. ººº«¿ª ∏Æ≈œ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
		SqlSession session = MybatisUtil.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession();

		// 2. session¿« getMapper()∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ sql∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
		ProductMapper pro = session.getMapper(ProductMapper.class);

		// 3. ∏≈∆€¿« sql¡ﬂ »£√‚«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫ sql¿« ¿˚øÎµ» ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ.
		List<Product> all = pro.selectAllProduct();
		session.close();
		return all;
	}

	public Product getSelectProduct(Integer no) {
		SqlSession session = MybatisUtil.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession();
		ProductMapper mapper = session.getMapper(ProductMapper.class);
		Product myproduct = mapper.getSelectProduct(no);
		session.close();
		return myproduct;
	}

	public void ProductInsert(Product product) {
		SqlSession session = MybatisUtil.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession();
		ProductMapper mapper = session.getMapper(ProductMapper.class);
		mapper.insertProduct(product);// product mapper¿« insert ∏ﬁº“µÂ
		session.commit();
		session.close();

	}
	public void ProductDelete(Integer no) {
		SqlSession session = MybatisUtil.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession();
		ProductMapper mapper = session.getMapper(ProductMapper.class);
		mapper.deleteProduct(no); 
		session.commit();
		session.close();

	}	public void ProductUpdate(Product product) {
		SqlSession session = MybatisUtil.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession();
		ProductMapper mapper = session.getMapper(ProductMapper.class);
		mapper.updateProduct(product);
		session.commit();
		session.close();

	}}





752     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyBatisAno\src\dao\ProductMapper.java

package dao;

import java.util.List;

import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Arg;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.ConstructorArgs;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Delete;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Insert;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Mapper;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Result;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Results;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Select;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.SelectKey;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Update;
import org.apache.ibatis.type.JdbcType;

import entity.Product;

// sql ±∏πÆ @ = mybatis/ProductMapper.xml
@Mapper
public interface ProductMapper {
	// These examples show how to name a ResultMap by specifying id attribute of @Results annotation.
	@Results({ @Result(property = "no", column = "no"), @Result(property = "item", column = "item"),
			@Result(property = "price", column = "price"), @Result(property = "regdate", column = "regdate") })

	
	
/*	// annotation ∞…∂ß π›µÂΩ√ √ﬂªÛ¿ÃæÓæﬂ«ÿ .
	@Select("select * from Product where no = #{no}")
	public Product getSelectProduct(int no); // æÓ¡¶¥¬ id ø¿¥√¿∫ mapper¿« method∑Œ »£√‚«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ. 
*/
	// @Results(id="my")
	@Select("select * from Product where no = #{no}")
	@ConstructorArgs (value= {@Arg(column = "no", jdbcType=JdbcType.INTEGER) , 
			// javaType = Integer.class), // jdbcType¿Ã∂Û∞Ìæ≤∏È conversion¿Ã æ»µ»¥Ÿ ? java.lang¿Ã object type¿∏∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ¿Ã µ»¥Ÿ. æ»πﬁæ∆ æ»πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
			// int ∞™¿Ã »£»Ø¿Ã æ»µ .  typeHandlers (http://www.mybatis.org/mybatis-3/configuration.html) ¬¸§°
			@Arg(column = "item", javaType = String.class)}) // public Product(Integer no String item){
	public List<Product> getSelectProduct();
	
	@Select ("select * from product")
	public List<Product> selectAllProduct();

	@Insert("insert into product (no, item, price, date) values(seq_no.nextval,#{item}, #{price},#{regdate})")
	public void insertProduct(Product product); // XML tagø° ∏Æ≈œ¿Ã æ¯¿∏∏È void

	@Delete("delete from Product where no = #{no}")
	public void deleteProduct(int no);

	@Update("Update product set price = #{price} where no = #{no}")
	public void updateProduct(Product product);

}





753     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyBatisAno\src\entity\Product.java

package entity;

import java.util.Date;

public class Product {
	
	private int no;
	private String item;
	private int price;
	private Date regdate;
	public Product() {
		super();
	}
	
 public Product (Integer no, String item) { // ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡÷¥¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, √£æ∆∞°¥¬∞Õ. intæ»µ«∞Ì Integer∂Û∞Ì ¡÷¥¬∞≈æﬂ. 
	 // http://www.mybatis.org/mybatis-3/configuration.html ø° typeAliases∏¶ ¬¸∞Ì 
		super();
		this.no= no;
		this.item = item;
		System.out.println("∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ≤¿ ∫“∑Øæﬂ «“ ∂ß");
	}
	
	
	public Product(int no, String item, int price, Date regdate) {
		super();
		this.no = no;
		this.item = item;
		this.price = price;
		this.regdate = regdate;
	}
	public int getNo() {
		return no;
	}
	public void setNo(int no) {
		this.no = no;
	}
	public String getItem() {
		return item;
	}
	public void setItem(String item) {
		this.item = item;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	public Date getRegdate() {
		return regdate;
	}
	public void setRegdate(Date regdate) {
		this.regdate = regdate;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Product [no=" + no + ", item=" + item + ", price=" + price + ", regdate=" + regdate + "]";
	}
	
	

}

755     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyBatisAno\src\mybatis\MybatisUtil.java

package mybatis;

import java.io.InputStream;

import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;

public class MybatisUtil {
	
	 // ∏Æº“Ω∫∏¶ ∫ÙµÂ«— »ƒ, SqlSessionFactory ∏Æ≈œ«œ∞‘ µ«∏È - SqlSession¿ª ≈Î«ÿº≠ dao¿« §±º“µÂ∏¶ »£√‚, ProductDao.javaø°º≠ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ.
	
	private static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
	static {
		String resource = "mybatis/mybatis-config.xml"; // oracle /  mapper
		InputStream  inputStream;
		
		
		try {
			inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(resource);
			sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	 public static SqlSessionFactory getSqlSessionFactory() {
		 return  sqlSessionFactory; 
	 }
}

package test.annotations;

import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
import java.lang.annotation.Target;

@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@Target(ElementType.FIELD) // Feildø° annotion¿ª ∞«¥Ÿ, ±◊∑≥ ¥Ÿ∏•µ•º≠ ∏¯∫Œ∏£∞‘ «—¥Ÿ.
public @interface PrintToString {

}

package test;

import test.annotations.PrintToString;
import test.reflect.ToStringHelper;

public class Person {
	@PrintToString // setget¿ª «œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫∞˜ø° @PrintToString¿ª ∞«¥Ÿ.
	private String name;
	
	@PrintToString
	private int age;
	
	// @PrintToString
	private String remark;
	
	
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	public String getRemark() {
		return remark;
	}
	public void setRemark(String remark) {
		this.remark = remark;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return ToStringHelper.toString(this); // @PrintToString µ≈¿÷¥¬ æ÷µÈ¿« ∞™∏∏ ¿¸¥ﬁ , æ¯¿∏∏È ∞™¿¸¥ﬁπ◊√‚∑¬¿Ãæ»µ 
	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Person person = new Person();
		
		person.setName("±Êµø");
		person.setAge(26);
		person.setRemark("ø¿¥√¿Ãºˆø‰¿œ¿Ã∏È ø£µÂ∞‘¿”¿ª ∫∏∑Ø∞°æﬂ«œ¥¬∞≈ æ∆¥’¥œ±Ó ?");

	}

}





758     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam030424\src\test\reflect\BeansHelper.java

package test.reflect;

import java.lang.reflect.*;

// ≈¨∑°Ω∫æ»ø° º±æµ«¥¬ setter & getter∏¶ √£æ∆ ¡¶æÓ«“ ºˆ ¿÷µµ∑œ  ≈∏¿‘¿ª ¡ˆ¡§«œø© method∏¶ ¡∂«’«œ∞Ì ∏Æ≈œ«—¥Ÿ.

public class BeansHelper { // getter setter ¡¶æÓ«œ¥¬ æ÷

// getter∏¶ method // name = getName()¿Ã¥œ±Ó. 
	// field∞°, isType, isUpper()∏È, type¿Ã boolean¿Ã∞⁄¡ˆ.
	// ±◊∑≥ prefix∞° is,
	// getbeansmethod¥¬ method∑Œ ¡∂«’«ÿº≠ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷¥¬æ÷ (class+filed+prefix) // « µÂøÕ prefix∏¶ ≥—±‰¥Ÿ.
	// .getGetterMethod(My,"name") -----------> getBeansMethod(My,name,get) ====>
	// getName() ¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈ∑¡¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
	// .getSetterMethod(my,"name","set",String abc) ==> setName("abc")

	public static Method getGetterMethod(Class clazz, Field field) throws Exception {
		String prefix = "get";
		if (Boolean.class == field.getType() || boolean.class == field.getType()) // ∫–∏Æ«œ¥¬ code ∏∏µÂ¥¬ ¡ﬂ
			prefix = "is";
		return getBeansMethod(clazz, field, prefix);
	}

//set¿Ã∏È ¿Ã∑∏∞‘
	public static Method getSetterMethod(Class clazz, Field field, Class... paramtype) throws Exception {

		return getBeansMethod(clazz, field, "set", paramtype);
	}

	private static Method getBeansMethod(Class clazz, Field field, String prefix, Class... params) throws Exception {
		String fieldName = field.getName();
		fieldName = prefix + fieldName.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + fieldName.substring(1);

		Method method = clazz.getMethod(fieldName, params);
		return method;
	}

	public String name;

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

		Field f = BeansHelper.class.getField("name");
		Method r = getGetterMethod(BeansHelper.class, f); // ≥ª∞°∏∏µÁ methodø°º≠ class∂˚ field πﬁæ∆º≠ get∞˙ name¿ª ∏Æ≈œ.
		System.out.println(r);
	}
}





759     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam030424\src\test\reflect\ToStringHelper.java

package test.reflect;

import java.lang.reflect.Field;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

import test.Person;
import test.annotations.PrintToString;

public class ToStringHelper {

	public static String toString(Object obj) { // Person¿Ã ≥—æÓø¬¥Ÿ. ToStringHelper.toString(this) ¥œ±Ó.
		StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
		
		try {
			Class clazz = obj.getClass(); // Person.class «—∞≈∂˚ ∞∞¥Ÿ.
			buffer.append(clazz.getName()).append("{ ");
			 for(Field field: clazz.getDeclaredFields()) {
				 PrintToString pts = field.getAnnotation(PrintToString.class);
				 
				 if(pts != null) {
					 Method getter = BeansHelper.getGetterMethod(clazz, field);
					 Object value = getter.invoke(obj); // ∫∞∞≈ æ¯æÓ, æÍ∏∏ƒ⁄µÂ¡ˆ !
					 System.out.println("!!!!========>" + value);
					 buffer.append(field.getName()).append("=").append(value).append(",");
				 }
			 } //end for
			 buffer.append("}");
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
		
		// bufferø° 
		// annotation¿Ã∞…∑¡¿÷¥¬ « µÂ √ﬂ√‚
		// null¿Ã æ∆¥—∏È, gettermethod »£√‚«œø© Ω««‡ & √ﬂ∞° & ¥›¿⁄.
		// ∞·∞˙¥¬ test.Person{ name, age}
		return buffer.toString();
	} // Ω«¡¶ test«œ¥¬ page

	
	// ∫∞∞≈ æ¯¿Ω, ±◊≥… filed∏¶ ªÃæ∆º≠ @∞…∑¡¿÷¿Ω (nullæ∆¥œ∏È) Ω««‡«ÿ∂Û.

	
	
	
	
	
	
}

package bbb.Test.Annotation;

import java.lang.annotation.*;

// ∑±≈∏¿”Ω√ø° ¡§∫∏∏¶ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ø° ¿˙¿Â«œ∞‘ µ»¥Ÿ.
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@Target(ElementType.METHOD) // method ¿ßø° @Test∏¶ º±æ«œ∞‘ µ»¥Ÿ. // 
public @interface Test {

}





761     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\bbb\Test\AnnotationTest.java

package bbb.Test;

import java.lang.reflect.Method;

import bbb.Test.Annotation.Test;

public class AnnotationTest {
	public static void test(Class clazz) throws Exception {
		int passed = 0;
		int failed = 0;
		//

		for (Method m : clazz.getMethods()) {// ¿¸√ºmethod ¡ﬂø°º≠
			// annotation¿Ã ∞…∑¡¿÷¥¬∞… √£æ∆.
			if (m.isAnnotationPresent(Test.class)) { // @Test∞° ¡ˆ¡§µ» method∂Û∏È
				try {
					m.invoke(null); // method Ω««‡¿ª «—¥Ÿ. Exception πﬂª˝ Ω√, catch∑Œ ≥—æÓ∞®
					passed++; // Exception¿Ã πﬂª˝«œ¡ˆ æ ¿∫ method ƒ´øÓ∆Æ

				} catch (Throwable e) { // Exception¿Ãπﬂª˝«— method∏¶ catch«ÿº≠
					System.out.println("Method test Ω«∆–  : " + e.getCause()); // ≥ªøÎ¿ª √‚∑¬
					failed++; // failed ƒ´øÓ∆Æ }

				} // if
			} // for

			System.out.printf("º∫∞¯  %d, Ω«∆–  %d", passed, failed);
		}
	}
}

	public static void prn5() throws Exception {
	}

763     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\com\ann\Meta01.java

package com.ann;

import java.lang.annotation.*;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@interface MyAnno {
	String str() default "Testing";

	int val() default 9000;
}

public class Meta01 {
	@MyAnno()
	public static void myPrn() {
		// annotation ∞Æ∞ÌøÕ
		// str val¿ª √£¿∏∏Èµ«¡ˆ.

		try {
			Method m = Meta01.class.getMethod("myPrn");
			MyAnno anno = m.getAnnotation(MyAnno.class);
			System.out.println(anno.str() + " " + anno.val());
		} catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
			System.out.println("Method Not Found");
		}
	}

	@MyAnno(str = "abc", val = 10000)
	public static void myMeth() {
		// annotation ∞Æ∞ÌøÕ
		// str val¿ª √£¿∏∏Èµ«¡ˆ.

		try {
			Method m = Meta01.class.getMethod("myMeth");
			MyAnno anno = m.getAnnotation(MyAnno.class);
			System.out.println(anno.str() + " " + anno.val());
		} catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
			System.out.println("Method Not Found");
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
	
		myPrn();
		myMeth();
	}
}





764     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\com\ann\Meta02.java

package com.ann;

import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

public class Meta02 { // «œ≥™¿« annotation ∆ƒ¿œø° ø©∑Ø∞≥ annotation¿ª ªÁøÎ«ÿº≠ ∞™¿ª check «ÿ∫∏¥¬∞… «“∞‘
	@What(description = "methodø° ¡ÿ ∞™")
	@MyAnnotation(stringValue = "ø¨Ω¿", intValue = 500)
	public static void myMethod() {

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		try { 
		//myMethod∞° ∞…∑¡¿÷¥¬ annotation¿ª ∞°¡Æ¥Ÿ∞° √‚∑¬«œ¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
		
		Meta02 ob = new Meta02();
		Method m = ob.getClass().getMethod("myMethod");
		Annotation[] annos = m.getAnnotations();
		System.out.println("annotation¿ª √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.");
			for(Annotation r : annos) {
				System.out.println(r);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}

	}
}

package com.ann;

import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;

@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@interface MyAnnotation { // µŒ∞≥∏∏µÈ∑¡∏È ¡¢±Ÿ¡¶«—¿⁄ public ¡¶ø‹
String stringValue();
int intValue();
}

@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@interface What {
	String description();
}




766     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\com\ano\AnnotationTester.java

package com.ano;

import java.lang.reflect.Field;

public class AnnotationTester {
	
	@MyAnnotation(columnName="test", methodName="setTest")
	public String test;
	
	@MyAnnotation(columnName="grpid")
	public String grpid;
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Field[] F = AnnotationTester.class.getFields();
		for(Field a : F) {
			MyAnnotation m = a.getAnnotation(MyAnnotation.class);
			System.out.println(m.columnName()+ " " + m.methodName());
		}
	}

}

import java.lang.annotation.*;

@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.FIELD, ElementType.METHOD, ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface MyAnnotation {
String columnName(); // Annotation πÆπ˝, ∫Øºˆ√≥∑≥ ∞Æ¥Ÿæ≤±‚

package com.test;

import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;

@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface maker { // interface : ªÛºˆ & º±æøÎ method
	// ≥ª∞°∏∏µÁ custom annotation <√ﬂªÛmethod∑Œ«œ≥™∏∏µÈæ˘¥Ÿ.>
//Annotation retention policy. The constants of this enumerated type describe the various policies for retaining annotations. They are used in conjunction with the Retention meta-annotation type to specify how long annotations are to be retained.

	int num();

	String name();

	String id();

	String date() default "qqq";

}





769     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\com\test\MakerTest.java

package com.test;

import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
import java.lang.reflect.Field;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

@maker(id = "111", num = 1, name = "»´±Êµø")
public class MakerTest {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		for (Annotation a : MakerTest.class.getAnnotations()) {
			System.out.println("a" + " " + a);
			System.out.println("a.annotationType" + "   " + a.annotationType());
			System.out.println("a.getClass    " + a.getClass());

		}

		// String ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« ª˝º∫¿⁄ ,method, field∏¶ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		// annotationsµµ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		System.out.println("String ª˝º∫¿⁄");
		for (Constructor c : String.class.getConstructors()) {
			System.out.println(c);
		}

		System.out.println("String Method");
		for (Method m : String.class.getMethods()) {
			System.out.println(m);
		}
		System.out.println("String field");
		for (Field f : String.class.getFields()) {
			System.out.println(f);
		}
		System.out.println("String Annotation");

		for (Annotation a : String.class.getAnnotations()) {
			System.out.println("a" + " " + a);
		}
	}
}





770     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyExam0424\src\com\test\MyTest.java

package com.test;

import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.lang.reflect.Modifier;

public class MyTest {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

		Class res = Class.forName("java.lang.String"); // æ≤¿⁄∏∂¿⁄ ª°∞£¡Ÿ¿Ã ª˝±‚¥¬∞… ∫∏∏È chcekd exeption¿ª ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// javalang¿« class∏¶
		System.out.println(res);

		// res = Class.forName("java.lang.reflect.Member"); // " " ≥ª¿« class∏¶ ¬¸¡∂«œø© class∏¶
		// ¥ŸΩ√ return
		System.out.println(res);

		// String class¿« ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		PrintConstruct(res);

		// class¿« method∏¶ √‚∑¬«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		PrintMethod(res);
		PrintModi(res);
	}

	private static void PrintModi(Class res) {
		Method[] md = res.getMethods();
		int scnt =0 , ncnt = 0;
		
		for (Method r : md) {
			System.out.println(r.getModifiers()+":"+r);
			// ¿Ã static
			if(r.getModifiers()==9||r.getModifiers()==137) { scnt++ ;}
			// static¿Ã æ∆¥œ∏È
			else {ncnt++;}

		}
		System.out.println("method : cnt = "+ md.length);
		System.out.println("method : STATIC = "+ scnt);
		System.out.println("method : NonSTATIC = "+ ncnt);

		
		
	}

	private static void PrintMethod(Class res) {

		Method[] md = res.getMethods();
		for (Method r : md) {
			System.out.println(r);
		}
		System.out.println("method : cnt = "+ md.length);
	}

	private static void PrintConstruct(Class res) {
		// Constructor<T>
		// getConstructor(Class<?>... parameterTypes)
		// Returns a Constructor object that reflects the specified public constructor
		// of the class represented by this Class object.

		Constructor[] con = res.getConstructors();
		for (Constructor r : con) {
			System.out.println(r);
		}
	}

}

package com.test;


import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoTemplate;

import com.mongodb.MongoClient;

@Configuration
public class AppConfig { // DBø¨∞·

	 public@Bean
	  MongoTemplate mongoTemplate() throws Exception {
		
		 MongoTemplate mongoTemplate =
				  new MongoTemplate(new MongoClient("127.0.0.1"),"mytest");
		 return mongoTemplate;
	 }
}





772     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo\src\com\test\MTest.java

package com.test;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.AnnotationConfigApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoOperations;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Criteria;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query;

/*
 * 1. MongoTemplate : MongoClient()∏¶ ≈Î«ÿº≠ ¡¢º”«—¥Ÿ. db∏¶ª˝º∫ or √£æ∆ø»
 * 2. MongoOperations : Ω«¡¶ ƒı∏Æ∏¶ Ω««‡
 * */

public class MTest {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ApplicationContext ac = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(AppConfig.class); // æÍ∞° appconfig¿«
																							// @configuration∞˙ ø¨∞·µ»¥Ÿ. ≤¿
																							// annotation ¿÷æÓæﬂ«‘.
		// get bean »£√‚«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		MongoOperations mo = (MongoOperations) ac.getBean("mongoTemplate"); // beanfacotyr ∞Æ∞Ìø¿¥¬æ÷¿Œµ•, mongo template ∏Æ≈œ.
																			// æÍ¿« º±¡∂¥¬ mongooperation.
		// ø¨∞·»ƒ ∏µÁ operation¿ª mongo operation¿Ã «—¥Ÿ.
		// operation¿Ã¿’æÓæﬂ query∏¶ æµ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// ø¨∞· --> mongoOperations ∞°∏È query æµ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.

		// org.springframework.data.mongodb.core Interface MongoOperations
		// save <T> T save(T objectToSave)

		/*
		 * System.out.println("Case 1"); MyUser user = new MyUSer("222","π⁄º∫æ∆", 30, new
		 * Date()); mo.insert(user);
		 */

		/*
		 * System.out.println("Case 2"); MyUser user = new MyUSer("200","apple", 30, new
		 * Date()); mo.insert(user);
		 */

		/*
		 * System.out.println("Case 3"); MyUser user = new MyUSer("3000","orange", 60,
		 * new Date()); mo.save(user);
		 */

		/*
		 * MyUser user = new MyUSer("111", "»´±Êµø", 30, new Date()); mo.save(user);
		 */
		
		//	<T>List<T> find (Query(Criteria), Class<T> entityClass)
		System.out.println("case 4, name¿Ã orange¿Œ ∑πƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ √£æ∆º≠ √‚∑¬ ");
		// query∑Œ √£æ∆º≠ µ⁄ø° ¿÷¥¬ ∞¥√ºø° ≥÷±‚.
		List<MyUser> res = mo.find(new Query(Criteria.where("name").is("orange")), MyUser.class);
		
		for(MyUser r :res) {
			System.out.println(r);
		}
		
		 System.out.println("¿¸√º√‚∑¬");
		 
		  res = mo.findAll(MyUser.class);
		  for(MyUser r:res) {
			  System.out.println(r);
		  }
		 
		  System.out.println("age∞° 30¿Œ ∞˙¿œ¿ª √‚∑¬ «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.");
		 res = mo.find(new Query(Criteria.where("age").is(30)), MyUser.class);
		 for(MyUser r:res) {
			 System.out.println(r);
		 }
		 
		 System.out.println("apple¿ª ªË¡¶");
		 mo.remove(new Query(Criteria.where("name").is("apple")), MyUser.class);

		  
		((AbstractApplicationContext) ac).close();

	}

}





773     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo\src\com\test\MyUser.java

package com.test;

import java.util.Date;

import org.springframework.data.annotation.Id;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.mapping.Document;
import org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat;
import org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat.ISO;

@Document(collection="MyUser") // annotation document¥¬ «◊ªÛ ∞…æÓ¡‡æﬂ «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
public class MyUser {
	@Id
	private String id;
	
	//@Indexed
	private String ic;
	
	private String name;
	private int age;

	@DateTimeFormat(iso=ISO.DATE)
	private Date createDate;


	
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MyUser [id=" + id + ", ic=" + ic + ", name=" + name + ", age=" + age + ", createDate=" + createDate
				+ "]";
	}

	public MyUser(String id, String name, int age, Date createDate ) {
		super();
		this.id = id;
		this.name = name;
		this.age = age;
		this.createDate = createDate;
	}

	public MyUser(String id, String ic, String name, int age, Date createDate) {
		super();
		this.id = id;
		this.ic = ic;
		this.name = name;
		this.age = age;
		this.createDate = createDate;
	}

	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}

	public String getIc() {
		return ic;
	}

	public void setIc(String ic) {
		this.ic = ic;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}

	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	public Date getCreateDate() {
		return createDate;
	}

	public void setCreateDate(Date createDate) {
		this.createDate = createDate;
	}
	
	

}

775     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo\src\com\test02\MTest.java

package com.test02;

import static org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Criteria.where;
import static org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Update.update;
import static org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query.query;

import java.util.List;

import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoOperations;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoTemplate;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.SimpleMongoDbFactory;

import com.mongodb.MongoClient;

public class MTest {
// 10.5. Saving, Updating, and Removing Documents // ø©±‚«—π¯∫π∫Ÿ«ÿº≠ «ÿ∫¡∂Û
	// https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/mongodb/docs/2.1.6.RELEASE/reference/html/#mongo-template

	private static final Log log = LogFactory.getLog(MTest.class);

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		MongoOperations mongoOps = new MongoTemplate(new SimpleMongoDbFactory(new MongoClient(), "database"));

		Test105 p = new Test105("Joe", 34);

		// Insert is used to initially store the object into the database.
		mongoOps.insert(p);
		log.info("Insert: " + p);

		// Find
		p = mongoOps.findById(p.getId(), Test105.class);
		log.info("Found: " + p);

		// Update
		mongoOps.updateFirst(query(where("name").is("Joe")), update("age", 35), Test105.class);
		p = mongoOps.findOne(query(where("name").is("Joe")), Test105.class);
		log.info("Updated: " + p);

		// Delete
		mongoOps.remove(p);

		// Check that deletion worked
		List<Test105> people = mongoOps.findAll(Test105.class);
		log.info("Number of people = : " + people.size());

		mongoOps.dropCollection(Test105.class);
 System.out.println("º∫∞¯");
	}
}





776     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo\src\com\test02\Test105.java

package com.test02;

public class Test105 {

	  private String id;
	  private String name;
	  private int age;

	  public Test105(String name, int age) {
	    this.name = name;
	    this.age = age;
	  }

	  public String getId() {
	    return id;
	  }
	  public String getName() {
	    return name;
	  }
	  public int getAge() {
	    return age;
	  }

	  @Override
	  public String toString() {
	    return "Person [id=" + id + ", name=" + name + ", age=" + age + "]";
	  }

	}




777     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo0422\src\com\DAOBOOK\NewMyDAO.java

package com.DAOBOOK;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoOperations;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.mapreduce.MapReduceOptions;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.mapreduce.MapReduceResults;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Criteria;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.CriteriaDefinition;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Update;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
// CRUD∏¶ ¥„¥Á«œ¥¬ CLASS

import com.DTO.Address;
import com.DTO.Book;
import com.DTO.Person;
import com.DTO.ValueObject;
import com.mongodb.WriteResult;
import com.mongodb.client.result.UpdateResult;

@Repository
public class NewMyDAO { // List ∞¥√ºø° ¥„æ∆º≠ ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ ø™«“.

	@Autowired
	MongoOperations mongoOperations;

	public void Save() { // ∞¥√º ª˝º∫«œ±‚ ¿¸ø°, ¿Ã mongooperations∏¶ ≈Î«ÿº≠ CRUD∏¶ «—¥Ÿ.
		// personclass∞° ¿÷¿∏∏È drop¿ª«œ∞Ì
		if (mongoOperations.collectionExists(Person.class)) {
			mongoOperations.dropCollection(Person.class);
		}

		Person p = new Person();
		p.setName("aaa");
		p.setAge(20);

		List<Address> list = new ArrayList<Address>();
		list.add(new Address("a@a.com", "aaa", "aaa", Address.Type.SAVINGS));
		list.add(new Address("b@b.com", "bbb", "bbb", Address.Type.SAVINGS));
		list.add(new Address("c@c.com", "ccc", "ccc", Address.Type.SAVINGS));
		list.add(new Address("d@d.com", "ddd", "ddd", Address.Type.SAVINGS));

		List<Book> list02 = new ArrayList<Book>();
		list02.add(new Book("¿⁄πŸ", 20000));
		list02.add(new Book("jsp", 30000));
		list02.add(new Book("Srping", 40000));

		p.setBook(list02);
		p.setAddress(list);

		mongoOperations.save(p);
	}

	public void Show_ALL() {

		List<Person> p_list = mongoOperations.find(new Query(), Person.class);
		for (Person pm : p_list) {
			for (Address res : pm.getAddress()) {
				System.out.println(pm.getName() + "  :  " + res);
				// System.out.println(pm);
			}
			for (Book res : pm.getBook()) {
				System.out.println(pm.getName() + "  :  " + res);
			}
		}
	}

	public void Update() { // ¿Ã∏ß¿Ã aaa¿Œ ¡÷º“ ccc∏¶ √£æ∆º≠ º≠øÔ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ∞Ì, ¿⁄πŸ√•¿ª √£æ∆º≠ mongodb∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«—¥Ÿ.
		Person results = mongoOperations.findOne(new Query(Criteria.where("name").is("aaa")), Person.class);
		for (Address ar : results.getAddress()) {
			if (ar.getAddr().equals("ccc")) {
				ar.setAddr("º≠øÔ");
			}
			for (Book bk : results.getBook()) {
				if (bk.getTitle().equals("¿⁄πŸ")) {
					bk.setTitle("MongoDB");
				}
			}
			mongoOperations.save(results);
		}

	}

	public void Find() {
		WriteResult r = mongoOperations.updateFirst(new Query(Criteria.where("name").is("aaa")),
				Update.update("book.1.title", new String("¿•")), Person.class);
// WriteResult p= mongoOperations.updateFirst(new Query(Criteria.where("addr").is("ccc")), new Update().set("addr","seoul"), Person.class);
		// System.out.println(r.getLastConcern);
	}

	public void test() { // 10.8. Map-Reduce Operations - 10.8.1. Example Usage

		MapReduceResults<ValueObject> results = mongoOperations.mapReduce("mrtest", "classpath:map.js",
				"classpath:reduce.js", new MapReduceOptions().outputCollection("res_out"), ValueObject.class);

/*Query query = new Query(where("x").ne(new String[] { "a", "b" }));
MapReduceResults<ValueObject> results = mongoOperations.mapReduce(query, "jmr1", "classpath:map.js", "classpath:reduce.js",
 options().outputCollection("jmr1_out"), ValueObject.class); // Queryø° ∏∏¡∑«œ¥¬∞Õ.
 * */
		
	}

}





778     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyMongo0422\src\com\DTO\Address.java

package com.DTO;

public class Address {

	private String email;
	private String addr;
	private String tel;

	private Address.Type addressType;

	// enum(≥™ø≠«¸ªÛºˆ) => ªÛºˆ∏¶ ≥™ø≠«ÿº≠ «œ≥™¿« ¡§ºˆ∑Œ ∞¢ ∞™¿ª ∞¸∏Æ
	// Saving = 1 / Checking = 2 (≥™ø≠«—º¯º≠¥Î∑Œ ªÛºˆ∏¶ πË¡§ - ∞¢ ææÓ∫∞∑Œ ¿÷¿Ω.)
	
	public Address() {
		super();
	}

	public Address(String email, String addr, String tel, Type addressType) {
		super();
		this.email = email;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.tel = tel;
		this.addressType = addressType;
	}

	public enum Type {
		SAVINGS, CHECKING
		// ∞™∞¸∏Æ«“∂ß, TRUE FALSE / ENUM / ªÛºˆ 123456 µÓµÓ¿« πÊπ˝¿∏∑Œ ∞¸∏Æ«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		// ex) ø˘-¿œ ø‰¿œ ¿œ∂ß(∞™¿Ã 7∞≥), DAY(1~31), ∫Øºˆ¥¬ «œ≥™, ∞™¿Ã ø©∑Ø∞≥ ¿œ∂ß, ENUM¿ª æ¥¥Ÿ.
		//
	}

	public String getEmail() {
		return email;
	}

	public void setEmail(String email) {
		this.email = email;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}

	public String getTel() {
		return tel;
	}

	public void setTel(String tel) {
		this.tel = tel;
	}

	public Address.Type getAddressType() {
		return addressType;
	}

	public void setAddressType(Address.Type addressType) {
		this.addressType = addressType;
	}
	
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [email=" + email + ", addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}

}

package com.DTO;

public class Book {
	
	private String title;
	private int price;
	
	public String getTitle() {
		return title;
	}
	public void setTitle(String title) {
		this.title = title;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Book [title=" + title + ", price=" + price + "]";
	}
	public Book() {
		super();
	}
	public Book(String title, int price) {
		super();
		this.title = title;
		this.price = price;
	}


	
	

}

package com.DTO;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.data.annotation.Id;
import org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.mapping.Document;

@Document
public class Person {
	@Id
	private String id; // makerø°º≠ ¡÷¥¬ id∏¶ πﬁæ∆ø¬¥Ÿ.
	private String name;
	private int age;

	private List<Address> address = new ArrayList<Address>(); // æÍ≥◊∞° ∏ﬁ¿Œ
	 
	private List<Book> book = new ArrayList<Book>();  // æÍ≥◊∞° ∏ﬁ¿Œ

	public List<Address> getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(List<Address> address) {
		this.address = address;
		// data∏¶ ¿‘∑¬«œ∏È ,addressø° [] ª˝º∫µ»¥Ÿ / List¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°ø‰.
		// value∞° List∞¥√º∑Œ µÈæÓ∞®.
		// §§means ∫Ò¡§«¸µ•¿Ã≈Õø°µµ ¿œ¡§«— pattern¿Ã ¡∏¿Á«—¥Ÿ
	}

	public List<Book> getBook() {
		return book;
	}

	public void setBook(List<Book> book) {
		this.book = book;
		// data∏¶ ¿‘∑¬«œ∏È ,bookø° []∑Œ ª˝º∫µ»¥Ÿ / List¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°ø‰.
		// value∞° List∞¥√º∑Œ µÈæÓ∞®.
	}

	public Person(String name, int age) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.age = age;
		// id¥¬ ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ ª˝±‚±‚∂ßπÆø° æ» ≥÷¿Ω.
	}

	public Person() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}

	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Person [id=" + id + ", name=" + name + ", age=" + age + ", address=" + address + ", book=" + book + "]";
	}
	
	public void addAddress(Address addr) {
		
	}

}

public class ValueObject {

	  private float value;

	    return id;
	  }

	  public float getValue() {
	    return value;
	  }

	  public void setValue(float value) {
	    this.value = value;
	  }

	  @Override
	  public String toString() {
	    return "ValueObject [id=" + id + ", value=" + value + "]";
	  }

}

package com.test;

public class Addr {

private String name;
private String addr;

public Addr(String name, String addr , int age) {
	super();
	this.name = name;
	this.addr = addr;
	this.age = age;
}


@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Addr [name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", age=" + age + "]";
}

	return name;
}


public void setName(String name) {
	this.name = name;
}


public String getAddr() {
	return addr;
}


public void setAddr(String addr) {
	this.addr = addr;
}


public int getAge() {
	return age;
}


public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}

package com.test;

import java.util.function.Function;

public class FTest01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		 Function<Integer,Integer> f1 = t -> t*2;   //applyæ»ø° ¡÷æÓ¡¯ data type¿Ã ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì ∞£¡÷.
		 Function<Integer,Integer> f2 = t -> t+2;

		 System.out.println( f1.compose(f2).apply(2));
		 System.out.println( f1.andThen(f2).apply(4));

	}

}





785     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyTest0425\src\com\test\FTest02.java

package com.test;

import java.util.function.BiFunction;
import java.util.function.Function;

public class FTest02 {
	
	//πÆ¿⁄∏¶ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆ ±Ê¿Ã∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄. <T,R>
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("πÆ¿⁄∏¶ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆ ±Ê¿Ã∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄");
		Function<String ,Integer> f1 =(a) -> a.length();
		String str = "πÆ¿⁄∏¶ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆ ±Ê¿Ã∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄";
		System.out.println(f1.apply(str));
		

		System.out.println("str¡ﬂ 'æ∆'¿« ¿ßƒ°∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.");
		Function<String ,Integer> f2 =(a) -> a.indexOf("æ∆");
		System.out.println(f2.apply(str));

		System.out.println("∆ØºˆπÆ¿⁄∏¶ ∫Ÿø©∫∏¿⁄");
		Function<String ,String> f3 =(a) -> a+" :) ";
		System.out.println(f3.apply(str));
		
		//  Interface BiFunction<T,U,R> - default <V> BiFunction<T,U,V> andThen(Function<? super R,? extends V> after)  Ω·∫∏¿⁄.
		// ∏Òø‰¿œ¿Ã¥Ÿ ø¿¥√¿∫ æ∆«œ«œ.
	 		
		System.out.println("BiFunction<T,U,R> - default <V> BiFunction<T,U,V> andThen(Function<? super R,? extends V> after)  Ω·∫∏¿⁄.");
		BiFunction<String ,String,String> bi = (a,b) -> {return b+a;} ;
		System.out.println(bi.apply("∏Òø‰¿œ¿Ã¥Ÿ","ø¿¥√¿∫ "));
		
	}

}





786     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyTest0425\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

// void ∂˜¥Ÿ

@FunctionalInterface
public interface MyInterface02 {
	public void View(String name); // @FunctionalInterface ∞…∑¡¿÷¿∏π«∑Œ ¿Ã¡¶ ¿Õ∏Ì¿∏∑Œ ªÁøÎ«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. means ∂˜¥Ÿ !
} // æ»ø°¿÷æÓµµ µ»¥Ÿ.

public class MTest01 {

	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface MyInterface {
		public void Prn(int a); // @FunctionalInterface ∞…∑¡¿÷¿∏π«∑Œ ¿Ã¡¶ ¿Õ∏Ì¿∏∑Œ ªÁøÎ«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. means ∂˜¥Ÿ !
	}


	
	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface MyInterface03{
		public void Prn();
	}

	class U implements MyInterface02 { // ªÛº”«ÿ∫∏¿⁄. ¿Ã∞≈ æ»«œ∑¡∞Ì ¿Õ∏Ì«‘ºˆ æ≤¥¬∞«µ•ø© ?

		@Override
		public void View(String name) {
			System.out.println(name);
		}

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// How to Use : (±∏«ˆ«œ¥¬ method ¿Œºˆ) -> (√≥∏Æ∏Ì∑…)

		MyInterface my = (a) -> System.out.println("a=" + a);
		my.Prn(100);

		MyInterface02 ab = (name) -> System.out.println("æ»≥Á«œººø‰, ¡¶ ¿Ã∏ß¿∫ " + name);
		ab.View("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆ π⁄º∫æ∆");
		ab.View("ø°¿ÃπÃ");
		my.Prn(50000);

		// ªÛº”πﬁ¿ª ºˆ ¿÷¿ª±Ó ? --> µ»¥Ÿ
		
		MyInterface03 prn = () -> System.out.println("03¿∫ ππ∂Û∞Ì ∏ª«“±Ó");
		prn.Prn();
		prn.Prn();
		prn.Prn();

	}
}

package com.test;
// Case02 : return ∂˜¥Ÿ

public class MTest02 {
	
	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface My01  {
		public String Prn( ); }

	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface My02  {
		public String Prn(int a, int b); }
	
	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface My03  {
		public int Prn(int a, int b); }
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		My01 m = ()->  "±Êµø¿Ã±∏≥∂";
		System.out.println(m.Prn());
		
		My02 mm= (a,b) -> a +"&"+ b ;
		System.out.println(mm.Prn(500, 200));
		
		My03 mmm = (a,b) -> a+b;
		System.out.println(mmm.Prn(200, 5));
		
		mmm = (a,b)-> a-b;
		System.out.println(mmm.Prn(200, 5)); // ø¿ ¿Á¡§¿«µµ µ«≥◊


		
		
	}
	
	
	}





788     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyTest0425\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;

public class MTest03 {

	@FunctionalInterface
	public interface Calc {
		public int res(int a, int b); 
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		Calc add = (int a, int b) -> { System.out.println("µ«≥™µ«≥™");
		return (a+b); };
				System.out.println(add.res(50, 100));
				
		Calc sub = (int a, int b) -> a-b;
		Calc mul = (int a, int b) -> a*b;
		Calc div = (int a, int b) -> a/b;
		
		System.out.println("add= " + add.res(100, 50));
		System.out.println("sub= " + sub.res(100, 50));
		System.out.println("mul= " + mul.res(100, 50));
		System.out.println("div= " + div.res(100, 50));
		
				
				
	}
}





789     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyTest0425\src\com\test\PTest01.java

package com.test;

import java.util.function.Consumer;
import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
import java.util.function.IntSupplier;
import java.util.function.Predicate;
import java.util.function.Supplier;

public class PTest01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Predicate<Integer> p1 = (i) -> i >= 10;
		Predicate<Integer> p2 = (i) -> i >= 20; // return ∞™¿Ã ¿÷æÓæﬂ«œ¡ˆø‰.

		System.out.println(p1.test(100)); // boolean test(T t)
		System.out.println(p1); // methodæ∆¥œ∞Ì, interface¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ¡÷º“∞™¿Ã ≥™≈∏≥≤
		System.out.println(p1.and(p2));// methodæ∆¥œ∞Ì, interface¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ¡÷º“∞™¿Ã ≥™≈∏≥≤
		// default Predicate<T> and(Predicate<? super T> other) -----> return ∞™¿Ã « ø‰«œ¡ˆ.

		System.out.println(p1.and(p2).test(20)); // p1, p2ø° 20¿ª ≥÷∞Ì µ—¥Ÿ 10∫∏¥Ÿ≈©∞Ì 20∫∏¥Ÿ ≈©∏È true

		System.out.println("================Consumer=============");

		Consumer<String> con = (i) -> System.out.println(i);
		con.accept("abc");
		
		System.out.println("================Supplier=============");
		 //  ∂Û. Supplier<T>	: T get() 		results Type¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ
		Supplier<Integer> s = () -> 100;
		System.out.println(s.get());
		
		Supplier <Addr> adr = () -> new Addr("º∫æ∆", "º≠øÔº≠øÔ", 15);
		System.out.println(adr.get());
		
		// Interface IntSupplier >> int 		getAsInt() 
		 IntSupplier i = () -> 200; // "200" , 200.3 >> Type mismatch: cannot convert from String to int
		 System.out.println(i.getAsInt()+200);

		 DoubleSupplier a = () -> 90.0; 
		 System.out.println(a.getAsDouble()+200);

	}
}





790     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\MyTest0425\src\com\test02\ZTest.java

package com.test02;

import java.security.cert.PKIXRevocationChecker.Option;
import java.util.*;
import java.util.function.*;
import java.util.stream.*;

import com.test.Addr;

public class ZTest {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		List<String> list = Arrays.asList("¥ŸΩΩ", "≥™∑°", "±π«ˆ", "ªÛ¡ÿ", "¿±±‚");
		// æÍ∏¶ stream¿∏∑Œ πŸ≤„∫∏¿⁄.
		String r_find = list.stream().findFirst().get();
		System.out.println(r_find);

		// ªÛ¡ÿ¿Ã∞° ¿÷¿∏∏È, æ¯¿∏∏È ?
		Predicate<String> r_SJ = (i) -> i.equals("ªÛ¡ÿ");
		if (list.stream().anyMatch(r_SJ)) {
			System.out.println("¿÷¿÷");
		} else
			System.out.println("æ¯æ¯");
		// ºæºº //«‘ºˆ«¸ interface¥¬ method∏¶ ¡÷¡ˆæ ∞Ì ∞™¿ª »£√‚«œ∏È ±‚∫ª method¿Œ test(boolean)¿Ã »£√‚µ»¥Ÿ //
		// means ∞™¿ª πŸ∑Œ ¡‡µµ µ»¥Ÿ
		// boolean test(T t)
		/*
		 * list.stream().allMatch(predicate) list.stream().anyMatch(predicate)
		 * list.stream().noneMatch(predicate)
		 */
		System.out.println(list.stream().anyMatch(s -> s.equals("ªÛ¡ÿ")));
		System.out.println("=============================");

		// ¡˝∞Ë
		Optional<String> o_min = list.stream().min(Comparator.naturalOrder());
		Optional<String> o_max = list.stream().max(Comparator.naturalOrder());
		Optional<String> findone = list.stream().findAny();

		System.out.println(o_min + "  " + o_min.get());
		System.out.println(o_max + "  " + o_max.get());
		System.out.println(findone);

		System.out.println("=============================");

		int cnt = (int) IntStream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5).count();
		System.out.println(cnt);
		OptionalInt o = IntStream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5).max();
		System.out.println(o);
		int su = IntStream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5).sum();
		System.out.println(su);
		OptionalDouble av = IntStream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5).average();
		System.out.println(av);

		System.out.println("=============================");

		// ex) 1. Address ∞¥√º∏¶ ºº∞≥ ª˝º∫«—¥Ÿ. : com\test\Addr.java

		List<Addr> adl = Arrays.asList(new Addr("º∫æ∆", "º≠øÔº≠øÔ", 15), new Addr("±Êµø", "¿Œ√µ¿Œ√µ", 20),
				new Addr("∏ﬁ∑’", "øÏ∏Æ¡˝", 25));

		// List<Addr> adl = Arrays.asList(new Addr[{"º∫æ∆", "º≠øÔº≠øÔ", 15}, {"±Êµø", "¿Œ√µ¿Œ√µ",
		// 20}, {"∏ﬁ∑’", "øÏ∏Æ¡˝", 25}]);

		// 2. Listø° ¥„æ∆ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬«œ∞Ì
		// System.out.println(adl);
		System.out.println(adl);
		adl.forEach(System.out::println); // consumer
		
		// 3. stream()¿ª ¿ÃøÎ«ÿº≠ Address ∞¥√º¿« ¿Ã∏ß ¡ﬂ, »´±Êµø¿ª √£æ∆ ≥™¿Ã∏¶ √‚∑¬«œ≥Æ.
		// if(adl.stream().anyMatch(a -> a.getName() == "º∫æ∆")) {System.out.println(a.);}
		// adl.stream().forEach(action);

		OptionalInt r = adl.stream().filter(s -> s.getName().equals("±Êµø")).mapToInt(s -> s.getAge()).findAny();
		System.out.println(r);
		// maptoint : list ∞¥√º∞Æ∞ÌøÕº≠ int ∞™¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«ÿ¡÷¥¬ æ÷

		// 4. ¿¸√º ∞¥√º¿« ≥™¿Ã∏¶ ∆Ú±’¿ª ≥Ω¥Ÿ.

		// OptionalDouble av = IntStream.of(adl).average();
		OptionalDouble avg = adl.stream().mapToInt(s -> s.getAge()).average();
		System.out.println(avg);
	}
}





791     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\Aop01\Man.java

package Aop01;

public class Man { // ¥Ÿº∏∞≥¿« joinpoint. «¡∑ŒΩ√µÂ «— Ω√¡°¿Ã point cut.
	public void work() {
		System.out.println("Hello world , Man , æœøÁ∏« :) ");
		try {
			System.out.println("TRY : Ok, Bye ! æœøÁ∏«");
		} catch (Exception e) {
	System.out.println(" CATCH : HAVE A GOOD TIME æœøÁ∏«");
		} finally { System.out.println(" FINALLY : ƒ´µÂ¥¬ ≤¿ ¬Ô∞Ì ∞°¿⁄ æœøÁ∏«");}
		System.out.println(" HAVE A GOOD sleep æœøÁ∏«");
	} 

}

795     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\Aop02\MyAspect.java

package Aop02;

import org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor;
import org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInvocation;

public class MyAspect implements MethodInterceptor {

	@Override
	public Object invoke(MethodInvocation invocation) throws Throwable {
		Object myres = null;
			System.out.println("Hello world , Man  :) "); // 1
			try { myres = invocation.proceed(); // æÍ∏¶ ¥©∞° ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷æÓ ? pointcut¿Ã ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥Ÿ. (AspectJExpressionPointcut) says " æ¡¶ ∞°∑Œ√§±‚ «ÿæﬂµ≈ ?" // 2 joinpoint
			 /// ø©±‚∞° «ŸΩ… ---> joinpoint ∞¢∞¢¿Ã advice¿« ∆˜¿Œ∆Æƒ∆¿ª ¿ÃøÎ«ÿº≠ «ŸΩ…ªÁ«◊¿ª ∞°∑Œ√§±‚ «“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ∆˜¿Œ∆Æ∞° µ… ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. = ∫Ø«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ¿ßƒ° 
			System.out.println("TRY : Ok, Bye ! ");// 3 joinpoint
			} catch (Exception e) {
		System.out.println(" CATCH : HAVE A GOOD TIME ");// 4 joinpoint
			} finally { System.out.println(" FINALLY : ƒ´µÂ¥¬ ≤¿ ¬Ô∞Ì ∞°¿⁄ ");}System.out.println(" HAVE A GOOD sleep "); // 5 joinpoint

		
		return myres;
	}
	
	

}

800     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\Aop03\MyAspect.java

package Aop03;

import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.After;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.AfterThrowing;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;

@Aspect
public class MyAspect {

	@Before("execution( public void Aop03.*.*(..))" ) // ∏ﬁ¿Ãƒø¥¬ before∞° π∫ ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿Œ¡ˆ ∏∏£¥œ±Ó, ¥œ∞° æ»§©∞Ì ¿÷¥¬ before∂Û∞Ì ∏ﬁº“µÂ¿« ¿Ø«¸(pattern)¿ª ¿˚æÓ¡‡æﬂ æ»¥Ÿ.
	// execution( public void Aop03.*.*(..))∏¶ Ω««‡«œ±‚ ¿Ã¿¸ø° ∏’¿˙ «œ¿⁄.
	public void before(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("before : Hello world , Man  :) ");
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp +"    ππ ≤ø    " +  jp.toLongString() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getKind() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getArgs());
	}
	
	@AfterThrowing(pointcut = "execution( public void Aop03.*.work(..))" , throwing = "e" ) // point cut¿ª ¡‡µµ ªÛ∞¸¿∫ æ¯¥Ÿ.
	public void excpetion(JoinPoint jp , Throwable e) {
		System.out.println(" ERRoR: CATCH : HAVE A GOOD TIME " + e.getMessage());
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp);
	}
	
	@After("execution( public void Aop03.*.work(..))") // execution( public void Aop03.*.*(..))∏¶ Ω««‡«— »ƒø°æﬂ 
	public void after(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("AFTER : HAVE A GOOD sleep ");
		System.out.println("ππ«œ¥Ÿø‘≥Î ? " + jp);
	}
}

		my.work();

	}

805     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\aop04\MyAspect.java

package aop04;

import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.After;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.AfterThrowing;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;

@Aspect
public class MyAspect {

	public void before(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("before : Hello world , Man  :) ");
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp +"    ππ ≤ø    " +  jp.toLongString() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getKind() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getArgs());
	}
	
	public void excpetion(JoinPoint jp , Throwable e) {
		System.out.println(" ERRoR: CATCH : HAVE A GOOD TIME " + e.getMessage());
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp);
	}
	
	public void after(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("AFTER : HAVE A GOOD sleep ");
		System.out.println("ππ«œ¥Ÿø‘≥Î ? " + jp);
	}
}

809     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\aop05\MyAspect.java

package aop05;

import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.After;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.AfterThrowing;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Pointcut;


public class MyAspect {
@Pointcut("execution(* work())")  // point cut¿Ã ∫∏∑Á≈‰
private void Boruto() { // ø©±‚ø° ƒ⁄µÂ ¡÷¥¬∞≈ æ∆¥’¥œ¥Ÿ. 
	}	
	@Before("Boruto()")
	public void before(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("before : Hello world , Man  :) ");
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp +"    ππ ≤ø    " +  jp.toLongString() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getKind() + "    ππ ≤ø    " + jp.getArgs());
	}
	
	public void excpetion(JoinPoint jp , Throwable e) {
		System.out.println(" ERRoR: CATCH : HAVE A GOOD TIME " + e.getMessage());
		System.out.println("ππ«ﬂ∂«? " + jp);
	}
	
	@After("Boruto()")
	public void after(JoinPoint jp) {
		System.out.println("AFTER : HAVE A GOOD sleep ");
		System.out.println("ππ«œ¥Ÿø‘≥Î ? " + jp);
	}
}

package aop06;

import java.sql.SQLException;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

import controller.MemberController;
import data.MemberDTO;
// 5.10.4. Load-time Weaving with AspectJ in the Spring Framework ø©±Ê «ÿ∫ª∞«µ•

public class AopTest {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws SQLException {
		ApplicationContext context = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("aop06/applicationContext.xml");
		
		MemberController control = context.getBean("memberController", MemberController.class);
		
		MemberDTO dto = new MemberDTO();
		dto.setName("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆");
		dto.setId("sunga.generous.park");
		
		int cnt= control.insertMember(dto);
		System.out.println("insert cnt = " + cnt);
	}

}





812     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\aop06\PerformanceTraceAdvice.java

package aop06;

import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;

//aop∏¶ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ ¿Œ≈Õ∆‰¿ÃΩ∫ : ProceedingJoinPoint(»ƒº’) -> Join Point (º±¡∂)


//http://www.eclipse.org/aspectj
public class PerformanceTraceAdvice {
	
	public Object trace(ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint) throws Throwable {

		String signature = joinPoint.getSignature().toShortString();
		System.out.println("PerformanceTraceAdvice : "+signature);
		long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
		
		
		try {
			Object result = joinPoint.proceed();
			return result;
		} finally {
			long finish = System.currentTimeMillis();
			System.out.println("PerformanceTraceAdvice : "+ signature + "Ω««‡Ω√∞£ - " + (finish - start) + "ms");
		}

}
}

815     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\dao\MemberDAOImpl.java

package dao;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.sql.DataSource;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import data.MemberDTO;

@Repository
public class MemberDAOImpl implements MemberDAO {

	@Autowired
	private DataSource dataSource;

	public MemberDAOImpl() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

/*	public void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource) {
		this.dataSource = dataSource;
	}
*/ 
	@Override
	public int insertMember(MemberDTO dto) throws SQLException {
		Connection conn = dataSource.getConnection();
		String sql = "";
		sql += "insert into springtest(name,id,joindate) values(?,?,sysdate)";
		PreparedStatement pstmt = conn.prepareStatement(sql);
		pstmt.setString(1, dto.getName());
		pstmt.setString(2, dto.getId());
		int cnt = pstmt.executeUpdate();
		pstmt.close();
		conn.close();
		return cnt;
	}

	@Override
	public List<MemberDTO> getList(Map<String, String> map) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return null;
	}

	@Override
	public MemberDTO getMember(String member) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return null;
	}

	@Override
	public int updateMember(MemberDTO dto) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return 0;
	}

	@Override
	public int deleteMember(String member) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return 0;
	}

}





816     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringAOP\src\data\MemberDTO.java

package data;

public class MemberDTO {
	
	private String name;
	private String id;
	private String joindate;
	public MemberDTO() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getJoindate() {
		return joindate;
	}
	public void setJoindate(String joindate) {
		this.joindate = joindate;
	}
	
	

}

	@Override

	}

	}

package sample01.Ano;

@Component("MyPrn") // id∏¶ ¡ÿ¥Ÿ. (getBean¿Ã »£√‚«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ id) xmlø° ƒ⁄µÂ∞° æ¯¿›æ∆ø‰ ?

	Nic_name nic_name; // HAS-A ∞¸∞Ë (Has-A∞¸∞Ë ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ æ¯æÓµµ, xmlø°º≠ beans∏¶ º±æ«œ∞Ì set∏∏ ¿÷¿∏∏È has-a∞¸∞Ë∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ & ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∞° ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì ª˝∞¢)

	@Override

public class Nic_namePrn {

826     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample02\School.java

package sample02;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

//@Component("myschool") component∏¶ æ»∞≈¥¬ ¿Ã¿Ø¥¬, beansø°º≠ ∞¥√º ≥÷¿∏∑¡±∏ø©
 // means >>> School school = new School(); <bean id="school" class="School">
public class School {
	
	private int grade;
	@Autowired(required=true) // true«œ∏È, beansø° ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ«œ¥¬ æ÷∞° ≤¿ ¿÷æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.
	// public School(Student person) { this.person = person;} & public void setStudent (Student person) {this.person=person;} autowired∑Œ ¿Ã µŒ∞°¡ˆ∞°  ª˝∑´µ 
	private Student person;
	public School() {
		super();
	}
	public int getGrade() {
		return grade;
	}
	public void setGrade(int grade) {
		this.grade = grade;
	}
	public Student getPerson() {
		return person;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "School [grade=" + grade + ", student=" + person + "]";
	}


}





827     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample02\Student.java

package sample02;

public class Student {
	private String name;
	private String addr;
	private int age;
	public Student() {
		super();
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}
	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Student [name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", age=" + age + "]";
	}
	
	
	

}

package sample03;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component()
//LgTV lgTv = new LgTV(); <bean id ="lgTv" class=LgTv/>
public class LgTV implements TV{

	public LgTV() {
		super();
		System.out.println("¬•¿‹, ªÁ∂˚«ÿø‰ ªÁ∂˚«ÿø‰ ªÁ∂˚«ÿø‰ LG");
	}

	@Override
	public void powerOn() {
System.out.println("LG TV - ¿¸ø¯¿ª ƒ“¥Ÿ .");		
	}

	@Override
	public void powerOff() {
		System.out.println("LG TV - ¿¸ø¯¿ª ≤ˆ¥Ÿ .");		
		
	}

	@Override
	public void volumnUp() {
		System.out.println("LG TV - ∫º∑˝æ˜");		
		
	}

	@Override
	public void volumnDown() {
		System.out.println("LG TV - ∫º∑˝≥∑√„");		
	
	}

	
}

package sample03;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;



public class MTest1 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample03/applicationContext.xml");

		System.out.println("Spring IOC ƒ¡≈◊¿Ã≥  √ ±‚»≠ ================= ");

		TV tv = (TV) factory.getBean("lgTV");
		// Compoenent ∞˝»£ æ»ø°  lgtv∞∞¿∫ id∏¶ æ» ∏∏µÈæÓ ≥÷æÓµµ æÀæ∆º≠  lgTV∂Û∞Ì ¿ŒΩƒ
		tv.powerOn();
		tv.volumnUp();
		tv.volumnDown();
		tv.powerOff();
		
//		 tv = (TV) factory.getBean("mysamsung"); // annotation Componentø° ID ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ≥÷¿ª∂ß
		 tv = (TV) factory.getBean("samsungTV"); // annotation Component ∞˝»£∞° ∫Ûƒ≠¿œ∂ß,
		tv.powerOn();
		tv.volumnUp();
		tv.volumnDown();
		tv.powerOff();

	}
}

@Component
//SamsungTV samsungTV = new SamsungTV(); <bean id ="samsungTV" class=SamsungTV/> 
public class SamsungTV implements TV{

	public SamsungTV() {
		super();
	System.out.println("ªÔº∫");
	}

	@Override
	public void powerOn() {
		System.out.println("Ω‹Ωˆ TV - TV∏¶ƒ“¥Ÿ");		

		
	}

	@Override
	public void powerOff() {
		System.out.println("Ω‹Ωˆ TV - TV∏¶≤ˆ¥Ÿ");		
		
	}

	@Override
	public void volumnUp() {
		System.out.println("Ω‹Ωˆ TV - ∫º∑˝æ˜");		
	}

	@Override
	public void volumnDown() {
		System.out.println("Ω‹Ωˆ TV - ∫º∑˝≥∑√„");		
		
	}

package sample04;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class MainUser {

	public MainUser() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample04/beans.xml");
		MessageBean bean = (MessageBean) factory.getBean("mybean");
		bean.sayHello();
		bean.sayHello("øÎ∞˙", 20000);
		((ClassPathXmlApplicationContext)factory).close();
	}

}

834     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample04\MessageBeanImpl.java

package sample04;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component("mybean")
public class MessageBeanImpl implements MessageBean {

	private String fruit;
	private int cost;

	public MessageBeanImpl() { // default ª˝º∫¿⁄ø° ∞™ Ω…æÓ≥ı∞Ì Ω««‡«œ∏È, ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚«“∂ß, Ω…æÓ≥ı¿∫ ∞™¿Ã µÈæÓ∞°¡Æ.
		super();
this.fruit = "a";
this.cost= 1000;
System.out.println("1π¯");
	}

	public MessageBeanImpl(String fruit, int cost) {
		super();
		this.fruit = fruit;
		this.cost = cost;
		System.out.println("2π¯");
	}

	@Override
	public void sayHello() {
		System.out.println(fruit + "\t" + cost);
	}

	@Override
	public void sayHello(String fruit, int cost) {
		this.fruit = fruit;
		this.cost = cost;
		System.out.println(fruit + "\t" + cost);

	}

}

		super();

package sample06;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component("my") // my∏¶ √£æ∆ø¿∂Û±∏ø© -_-? π´æﬂ ææπﬂ 
@Scope("prototype")
public class MyMessage {

	String message;
	public MyMessage() {
		message = "myTest Message :";
	}
	
	public String getMessage() {
		return message;
	}
	
	public void setMessage(String message) {
		this.message = message;
	}
}





840     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample06\MyTest.java

package sample06;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class MyTest {
public static void main(String[] args) {
	
	ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample06/beans.xml");
	
	MyMessage ob1 = (MyMessage) factory.getBean("mymessage");
	System.out.println(" =>  :  "+ob1.getMessage());
	MyMessage ob2 = (MyMessage) factory.getBean("mymessage");
	System.out.println(" =>  :  "+ob1.getMessage());

	MyMessage ob3= (MyMessage) factory.getBean("mymessage");
	System.out.println(" =>  :  "+ob1.getMessage());
	
	System.out.println(ob1);
	System.out.println(ob2);
	System.out.println(ob3);
	System.out.println();
	
	System.out.println("proto type");
	System.out.println((MyMessage) factory.getBean("abc"));
	System.out.println((MyMessage) factory.getBean("abc"));
	System.out.println((MyMessage) factory.getBean("abc"));

}
}

package sample07;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component("mymessage")
@Scope("prototype")
public class MyMessage {

	String message;
	public MyMessage() {
		message = "myTest Message :";
	}
	
	public String getMessage() {
		return message;
	}
	
	public void setMessage(String message) {
		this.message = message;
	}
}

	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MyTestImple [getClass()=" + getClass() + ", hashCode()=" + hashCode() + ", toString()="
