847     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample08\MyTest.java

package sample08;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.PropertySource;
import org.springframework.context.support.PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component
@PropertySource(value= {"sample08/test.properties"})
public class MyTest {

	@Value("${test.id}")
	private String name;

	@Value("${test.password}")
	private int age;

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MyTest [name=" + name + ", age=" + age + "]";
	}

}





848     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample08\testConfig.java

package sample08;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.PropertySource;
import org.springframework.context.support.PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer;

@Configuration
@ComponentScan
@PropertySource(value= {"sample08/test.properties"})
public class testConfig {

@Bean
public static PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer abc() {
	return new PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer();
}
	
	
}





849     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample09\AppConfig.java

package sample09;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.DependsOn;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.PropertySource;

@Configuration
@PropertySource(value="sample09/a.properties") // properties∏¶ ∑Œ ¥Á∞‹ø√ ∂ß ø©±‚ø° ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰.
public class AppConfig {
	
	@Bean(name="school")
	@DependsOn("student") // æÓ∂≤∞≈ ∏’¿˙ µ•∑¡ø√¡ˆ º±≈√«—¥Ÿ
	public School getSchool() {
		School sm = new School();
		sm.setGrade(3);
		return sm;
	}
	
	@Bean(name="student")
	public Student getStudent() {
		Student s = new Student();
		s.setAddr("@beansø° ¿÷¥¬º≠øÔº≠øÔ");
		s.setAge(202020);
		return s;
	}

}





850     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample09\MTest.java

package sample09;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.AnnotationConfigApplicationContext;

public class MTest {
public static void main(String[] args) {
	AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
	ctx.register(AppConfig.class); //	ª˝º∫¿⁄ø° ≥÷æÓº≠ «œ¥¯¡ˆ, register∏¶ Ω·º≠ «œ¥¯¡ˆ µ∂∞∞¥Ÿ.
	// means new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext("AppConfig.class") ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ «œ∞≈≥™, ctx.register(AppConfig.class); ¿Ã∞… æ≤∞≈≥™ µ—¡ﬂø° «œ≥™∏∏ «œ∂Û∞Ì.
	
	ctx.refresh();
	School st=(School) ctx.getBean("school");
	System.out.println(st.toString());
	// 1. student.javaø° µÈæÓ¿÷¥¬∞≈ ∏’¿˙ ¥Á∞‹ø¿∞Ì
	// 2. 1π¯ æ¯¿∏∏È beansø° ¿÷¥¬∞‘ ø¿≥◊ø© ¿œ¥‹.
	// 3. ººπ¯¿Á∑Œ properties«ÿ∫∏¿⁄. a.properties
}
}





851     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample09\School.java

package sample09;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

public class School {
	
	private int grade;
	
	@Autowired // autowired ∞…∏È set æ¯æÓµµ µ«¿›æ∆ 
	private Student person;
	
	public School() {
		super();
	}
	public int getGrade() {
		return grade;
	}
	public void setGrade(int grade) {
		this.grade = grade;
	}
	public Student getPerson() {
		return person;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "School [grade=" + grade + ", student=" + person + "]";
	}


}





852     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDI2\src\sample09\Student.java

package sample09;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.PropertySource;

@PropertySource(value = "a.properties")
public class Student {
//	@Value("sudent.javaø° ªÏ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ »´±Êµø»´±Êµø")
	@Value("${my.a}")
	private String name;
//	@Value("student.javaø° ¿÷¥¬ º≠øÔΩ√")
	@Value("${my.b}")
	private String addr;
	@Value("${my.c}")
	private int age;

	public Student() {
		super();
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}

	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}

	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Student [name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", age=" + age + "]";
	}

}





853     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample1\MessageBean.java

package sample1;

public interface MessageBean {
	
	void prn();


	

}





854     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample1\MessageBeanImpl.java

package sample1;

public class MessageBeanImpl implements MessageBean {

	private String message ;
	private String id;
	
	
	public MessageBeanImpl(String message, String id) {
		super();
		this.message = message;
		this.id = id;
	}

	public MessageBeanImpl() {
		this.message = "spring exec";
		this.id = "a1111";
	}


	public void prn() {
		System.out.println("MessageBeanImpl");
		System.out.println(this.message +":"+ id);
	}
}

import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class SMain01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		//  beanµÈ¿Ã ∏ﬁ∏∏Æø° ¡¶¿œ∏’¿˙ ∑Œµ˘µ≈º≠ ∞¥√º(=object)∏¶ ª˝º∫ so, ∏ﬁ¿Œø°º≠ ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«œ¥¬ ∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û √£æ∆ø¿¥¬ ∞Õ
		 ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample1/mybean.xml");
		 MessageBean bean = (MessageBean) factory.getBean("my01");
		 bean.prn();
		 System.out.println("-----------«‘≥ƒ«‘≥ƒ-------------");
		 bean = (MessageBean) factory.getBean("my02");
		 bean.prn();
		 System.out.println("-----------«‘≥ƒ«‘≥ƒ-------------");
		 bean = (MessageBean) factory.getBean("my03");
		 bean.prn();
		 System.out.println("-----------«‘≥ƒ«‘≥ƒ-------------");
		 bean = (MessageBean) factory.getBean("my04");
		 bean.prn();

		 
	}
}





856     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample10\BeanFactory.java

package sample10;

public class BeanFactory {
	//Factory pattern - ∏µÁ ∫ÛµÈ¿ª ¡¶æÓ , ∏Æ≈œ¿ª Object.
	/*∆—≈‰∏Æ ±∏«ˆ ø¨µø - Bean factofy∑Œ ø¨µø 
	: BeanµÈ¿« ∞¥√º∏¶ Ωƒ∫∞«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ¿Ã∏ß, id∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ ∞¥√º∏¶ ∆—≈‰∏Æ pattern¿ª ±∏«ˆ«—¥Ÿ. ∂Û∞Ì «—¥Ÿ.
	∞¥√º ª˝º∫ »ƒ OBject∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ¡§¿«∞° µ«æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.*/

	public BeanFactory() {
		super();
	}

	public Object getBean(String bean) { // ApplicationContext¿Ã ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¯ getBean()¿Ã∂Û¥¬ method∞° ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ø¨µø¿Ã µ»¥Ÿ. 
		if(bean.equals("samsung")) { return new SamsungTV();}
		else if(bean.equals("lg")) return new LgTV();
		return null;
	}

}

package sample11;

public class BeanFactory {
	//Factory pattern - ∏µÁ ∫ÛµÈ¿ª ¡¶æÓ , ∏Æ≈œ¿ª Object.
	/*∆—≈‰∏Æ ±∏«ˆ ø¨µø - Bean factofy∑Œ ø¨µø 
	: BeanµÈ¿« ∞¥√º∏¶ Ωƒ∫∞«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ¿Ã∏ß, id∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∞¸∏Æ«œ¥¬ ∞¥√º∏¶ ∆—≈‰∏Æ pattern¿ª ±∏«ˆ«—¥Ÿ. ∂Û∞Ì «—¥Ÿ.
	∞¥√º ª˝º∫ »ƒ OBject∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ¡§¿«∞° µ«æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.*/

	public BeanFactory() {
		super();
	}

	public Object getBean(String bean) { // ApplicationContext¿Ã ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¯ getBean()¿Ã∂Û¥¬ method∞° ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ ø¨µø¿Ã µ»¥Ÿ. 
		if(bean.equals("samsung")) { return new SamsungTV();}
		else if(bean.equals("lg")) return new LgTV();
		return null;
	}

}

867     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample12\Foo.java

package sample12;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Set;

public class Foo { // HAS-A ∞¸∞Ë∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.

	private Bar bar;

	public Foo() {
		System.out.println("π›∞©Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ, ¿˙¥¬ Foo¿« ±‚∫ª ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ :) ");
	}

	public void setNumber(int number) {
		System.out.println("setNumber: " + number);
	}
	
	public void setList(List<String> item) {
		System.out.println("List »£√‚");
		for (String r : item) { System.out.println(r);}
	}

	public void setArray(String[] item) {
		System.out.println("Array »£√‚");
		for (String r : item) { System.out.println(r);}
	}

	public void setSet(Set<String> item) {
		System.out.println("Set »£√‚");
		for (String r : item) { System.out.println(r);}
	}
	
	public void setMap(Map<String,String> item) {
		System.out.println("Map »£√‚");
		Set<String> keys=item.keySet();
		for (String key : keys) { System.out.println ( key + " ¿« ¿¸»≠π¯»£" + item.get(key));}
	}

	public void setDate(Date date) { // HAs-A ∞¸∞Ë∞° ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì §°∞£¡÷«—¥Ÿ. æÍ∞° æ¯¿∏∏È »£√‚¿◊ §ø§§µ . setter∑Œ ∞£¡÷«—¥Ÿ.
		System.out.println("Date Setter " + date);
	}

	public void setBar(Bar bar) {
		this.bar = bar;
		System.out.println("Bar Setter : " + bar);
	}

	public void footMethod() {
		bar.pr();
	}

}

869     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample13\AcTestApp.java

package sample13;

import java.util.Locale;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class AcTestApp {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample13/applicationContext.xml");
		MemberInfo obj = (MemberInfo) factory.getBean("member");

		int num = (int) (Math.random() * 2);
		if (num == 0) {
			String message = factory.getMessage("title", null, "±‚∫ª∏ﬁΩ√¡ˆ", Locale.getDefault());
			System.out.println(message);
			obj.display(Locale.getDefault());

		} else {
			String message = factory.getMessage("title", null, "±‚∫ª∏ﬁΩ√µ", Locale.ENGLISH);
			System.out.println(message);
			obj.display(Locale.ENGLISH);

		}

	}
}





870     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample13\MemberInfo.java

package sample13;

import java.util.Locale;

import org.springframework.context.MessageSource;
import org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware;

public class MemberInfo implements MessageSourceAware {
	private MessageSource messages;

	@Override
	public void setMessageSource(MessageSource messageSource) {
		System.out.println("CONTAINER∞° ∏ﬁΩ√¡ˆ º≥¡§¿ª ºˆ«‡«œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ.");
		messages = messageSource;
	}

	public void display(Locale locale) {
		//getMessage(java.lang.String code, java.lang.Object[] args, java.util.Locale locale) 
		/*code - the code to lookup up, such as 'calculator.noRateSet'
		args - an array of arguments that will be filled in for params within the message (params look like "{0}", "{1,date}", "{2,time}" within a message), or null if none.
		locale - the locale in which to do the lookup*/
		
		String name = messages.getMessage("member.name", null, locale);
		String birthplace = messages.getMessage("member.birthplace", null, locale);
		String hobby = messages.getMessage("member.hobby", null, locale);
		String age = messages.getMessage("member.age", new Object[] { "13" }, null, locale);

		System.out.println(name);
		System.out.println(birthplace);
		System.out.println(hobby);
		System.out.println(age);
	}
}

package sample14;

public class Food {

	private String foodName;
	private int foodPrice;
	
	public Food() {
		super();
	}
	public void setFoodName(String foodName) {
		this.foodName = foodName;
	}
	public void setFoodPrice(int foodPrice) {
		this.foodPrice = foodPrice;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Food [foodName=" + foodName + ", foodPrice=" + foodPrice + "]";
	}

	
}

public class MyFoodMgr {

	private Food unFavoriteFood;
	
	public MyFoodMgr() {
		super();
	}

	public MyFoodMgr(Food favoritefood, Food unFavoriteFood) {
		super();
		this.favoritefood = favoritefood;
		this.unFavoriteFood = unFavoriteFood;
	}

	public void setFavoritefood(Food favoritefood) {
		this.favoritefood = favoritefood;
		System.out.println("¡¡æ∆«œ¥¬¿ΩΩƒ¿∫ ∂±∫∫¿Ã »£√‚ !");
	}

	public void setUnFavoriteFood(Food unFavoriteFood) {
		this.unFavoriteFood = unFavoriteFood;
		System.out.println("Ω»æÓ«œ¥¬¿ΩΩƒ");
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MyFoodMgr [favoritefood=" + favoritefood + ", unFavoriteFood=" + unFavoriteFood + "]";

874     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample15\MemberDAO.java

package sample15;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.SQLException;

import javax.sql.DataSource;

public class MemberDAO { // CRUD «œ¥¬ ≥

	private DataSource dataSource;

	public MemberDAO() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public DataSource getDataSource() {
		return dataSource;
	}

	public void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource) {
		this.dataSource = dataSource;
	}

	public void Res() throws SQLException {
		Connection conn = dataSource.getConnection();
		System.out.println("Connected !");
		conn.close();
	}

	public int getInsert(MemberDTO mdto) throws SQLException {
		Connection conn = dataSource.getConnection();
		String sql = "insert into springtest values(?,?,?)";
		PreparedStatement pstm = conn.prepareStatement(sql);
		pstm.setString(1, mdto.getName());
		pstm.setString(2, mdto.getId());
		pstm.setString(3, mdto.getDate());
		
		int r = pstm.executeUpdate();
		pstm.close();
		conn.close();
return r;		

	}
	

}






875     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample15\MemberDTO.java

package sample15;

public class MemberDTO {
	/*create table springtest(
			name varchar2(20),
			id varchar2(20),
			joindate varcahr2(20)
			);*/
	
	private String name;
	private String id;
	private String date;

	public MemberDTO() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public MemberDTO(String name, String id, String date) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.id = id;
		this.date = date;
	}



	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}

	public String getDate() {
		return date;
	}

	public void setDate(String date) {
		this.date = date;
	}
	

	
}

package sample15;

import java.sql.SQLException;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class MTestaa {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample15/applicationContext.xml");
		
		MemberDAO memberDAO = factory.getBean("memberDAO" , MemberDAO.class);
		
		MemberDTO m = new MemberDTO("11","11","11");
		
		try {
			int r = memberDAO.getInsert(m);;
			if(r>0) { System.out.println("¿‘∑¬¿ª «œºÃ±∫ø‰ !");}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
				
	}

}





877     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample16\MemberDAOFactory.java

package sample16;

import javax.sql.DataSource;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.SimpleDriverDataSource;

import sample15.MemberDAO;

@Configuration
public class MemberDAOFactory {

	@Bean
public DataSource getDataSource() {
		SimpleDriverDataSource dataSource = new SimpleDriverDataSource();
		dataSource.setDriverClass(oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver.class);
		dataSource.setUrl("jdbc:oracle:thin:@127.0.0.1:1521:XE");
		dataSource.setUsername("bigdata");
		dataSource.setPassword("admin1234");
	return dataSource;}

	@Bean
public MemberDAO getMemberDAO() {
	MemberDAO dao = new MemberDAO();
	dao.setDataSource(getDataSource()); // ¿Ã¿⁄∏Æ∞° ref id , mainø°º≠ bean¿ª √£æ∆ø√∂ß, getMemberDAO∑Œ √£æ∆ø¿∏Èµ»¥Ÿ. 
	return dao;}
}





878     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample16\MemberMain.java

package sample16;

import java.sql.SQLException;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.AnnotationConfigApplicationContext;
import sample15.MemberDAO;
import sample15.MemberDTO;

public class MemberMain {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws ClassNotFoundException {

		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext context = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(MemberDAOFactory.class);
		// ¿Ã∞≈ «“∂ß, ≤¿ Annotation configuration¿Ã ¿÷æÓæﬂ ¿–æÓø√ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω.
		MemberDAO memberDAO = context.getBean("getMemberDAO", MemberDAO.class);

		MemberDTO m = new MemberDTO("11", "11", "11");

		try {
			int r = memberDAO.getInsert(m);
			;
			if (r > 0) {
				System.out.println("¿‘∑¬¿ª «œºÃ±∫ø‰ !");
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}

}





879     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample2\Address.java

package sample2;

public class Address {
	
	private String name;
	private String addr;
	private String tel;
	
	public Address() {

}

	public Address(String name, String addr, String tel) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.tel = tel;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}

	public String getTel() {
		return tel;
	}

	public void setTel(String tel) {
		this.tel = tel;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}
	
	
	

}





880     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample2\ListAddress.java

package sample2;

public class ListAddress extends Address {
	Address address = new Address();

	public ListAddress() {
		super();
		address = new Address();
	}

	public ListAddress(Address address) {
		super();
		this.address = address;
	}

	public Address getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(Address address) {
		this.address = address;
	}
}





881     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample2\MTest2.java

package sample2;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class MTest2 {
	public static void main(String[] args) { // Constructor DI
		
		ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample2/applicationContext.xml");
		// 01 Address ar = app.getBean("myaddr01",Address.class); // return ∞™ object¿Œ∞°∫∏¥Ÿ., √ππ¯¬∞ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄¥¬ «¸∫Ø»Ø, µŒπ¯¬∞ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄¥¬ « ø‰æ¯≥™∫¿∞° (address) // µŒ∞≥¬•∏Æ¥¬ getBean (id , id¿« type)
		// bean ¿∫ ±◊≥… bean. return ∞™¿Ã ¡¶¿œ ≈´ object. µ⁄ø° id ≈∏¿‘¿ª ∏ÌΩ√«œ¥¬ over∑ŒµÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈ∏È, «¸∫Ø»Ø¿ª ∏ÌΩ√«œ¡ˆ æ æ∆µµ µ»¥Ÿ.
		// 02 getBean(id) = Object  1. Address¿« ±‚∫ª ª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚

		System.out.println("1. Address¿« ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚ ");
		Address ar = (Address) app.getBean("myaddr01");
		System.out.println(ar);
		
		System.out.println("2. Address¿« ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄ ¥Î¿‘ ª˝º∫¿⁄");
		 ar = (Address) app.getBean("myaddr02");
		 System.out.println(ar); // ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄ ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ "»´±Êµø º≠øÔΩ√ 02-000"

		 System.out.println("3. ListAddress¿« ±‚∫ªª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚");

		 System.out.println(list);
		 System.out.println(list.getAddress());

		 System.out.println("4. ListAddress¿« ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄ »£√‚");
		  list = app.getBean("mylist02", ListAddress.class);
		 System.out.println(list);
		 System.out.println(list.getAddress()); // myaddr02∏¶ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ πﬁ¿Ω. Address¥¬ ListAddressø° ¿«¡∏«ÿº≠ ªÁøÎ // ¿Ã∞‘πŸ∑Œ ∞·«’µµ∏¶ ≥∑√Áº≠ ªÁøÎ«œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ. ππæﬂ ±◊∞‘ .

	}

package sample3;

import java.util.*;

public class MTest {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Properties per = new Properties();

		per.setProperty("1", "1111");
		per.setProperty("2", "2222");
		per.setProperty("3", "3333");
		System.out.println(per);
		System.out.println();
		
		Enumeration<String> res = (Enumeration<String>) per.propertyNames();
		while(res.hasMoreElements()) {
			
			String key = res.nextElement();
			System.out.println( key + ":" + per.getProperty(key));
			
/*			System.out.println(res.nextElement()); // key, value ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ¡§∑ƒ¿« ¿«πÃ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.
			System.out.println(per.getProperty(res.nextElement()));
*/			
		}
	}

}

887     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample3\UserVo.java

package sample3;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Properties;

public class UserVo {

	private String UserName;
	private Properties per;
	private Date my_date = new Date();
	
	public UserVo() {
		super();
	}

	public UserVo(String userName) { // username∏∏ Constructor Injection«“ ºˆ ¿÷∞Ì, ≥™∏”¡ˆ¥¬ ª˝º∫¿⁄∑Œ Constructor Injection¿Ã æ»µ«∞⁄¡ˆ.
		super();					// date, properties∏¶ ø¨∞·«ÿæﬂµ«¥¬∞≈æﬂ ππæﬂ ? 
		UserName = userName;
	}

	public Properties getPer() {
		return per;
	}

	public void setPer(Properties per) {
		this.per = per;
	}

	public Date getMy_date() {
		return my_date;
	}

	public void setMy_date(Date my_date) {
		this.my_date = my_date;
	}

	public String getUserName() {
		return UserName;
	}
	
	
	
}





888     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample4\AbstractTest.java

package sample4;

import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

public abstract class AbstractTest { // DI , ª˝º∫¿⁄ , set method ππ ±◊∑±∞… «œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ∞Ì «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
	/*  ΩÃ±€≈Ê ∆–≈œ¿ª ∏ÌΩ√¿˚¿∏∑Œ ±∏«ˆ «ÿ ∫∏¿⁄. IN JAVA.
	  Class Calendar >>> Calendar rightNow = Calendar.getInstance();
							AbstractTest r = AbstractTest.getInstance(); 
							System.out.println(r.dayInfo()); >> " »≠ø‰¿œ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ. "
							
	 POINT IS,
	  BEAN ∞¥√º∞° ∏¯µ•∑¡øÕ. ø÷ ?
	  √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« ø¯«¸¿Ã ¿⁄±‚¿⁄Ω≈¿« ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ ∞Õ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ΩÃ±€≈Ê¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ. (1. ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° hidden, 2. ¿⁄±‚¿⁄Ω≈¿« ∞¥√º∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷¥¬ static method∞° ¿÷æÓæﬂ «‘ = getInstance. µŒ∞≥¿« ¡∂∞«¿ª ∏∏¡∑«ÿæﬂ ΩÃ±€≈œ)
	  ∞°¡ˆ∞Ì øÕ∫∏¿⁄, from XMl
	 factory-method∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ«ÿº≠ == > getInstance ¥¬ ¿⁄±‚¿⁄Ω≈ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ æ÷¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ΩÃ±€≈œ¿∏∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ 
	  
	  
	*/
	abstract public String dayInfo();
	
	public static AbstractTest getInstance() {
		GregorianCalendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
		int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);
		switch(day)
		{
		case 1 : return new Sunday();
		case 2 : return new Monday();
		case 3 : return new Tuesday();
		case 4 : return new Wednesday();

		}
		return null;
	}

}

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;

public class Testapp {

		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample4/app.xml");

		AbstractTest bean = (AbstractTest) factory.getBean("test");

		System.out.println("ø¿¥√¿∫" + bean.dayInfo());
		System.out.println("ø¿¥√¿∫" + bean.dayInfo()+":"+ factory.getId()); // ∞∞¿∫ xml∆ƒ¿œ¿Ã ∏¬≥◊øÎ :)
		
		
		Calendar cl = factory.getBean("myCalendar",Calendar.class);
		System.out.println(cl.getTime());
		
		((ClassPathXmlApplicationContext) factory).close(); // ∏ÌΩ√¿˚¿∏∑Œ ≥ª∏≤

	}

package sample6;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class EmpMain {

	public EmpMain() {
		super();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("sample6/beans.xml");

		// Emp b1 = new Developer("ºº¡æ¥Îø’", 1500000, "∞≥πﬂ1∆¿");
		Emp b1 = (Emp) factory.getBean("developer");
		System.out.println(b1);

		// Emp b2 = new Developer("¿Œº¯¿Ã", 2500000, "±‚º˙1∆¿");
		Emp b2 = (Emp) factory.getBean("engineer");
		System.out.println(b2.toString());

		
		Emp b3 = factory.getBean("myemp",Developer.class);
		System.out.println(b3.toString());
		
		MyRes r = factory.getBean("myres", MyRes.class);
		System.out.println(r.getEmp());
		
		((ClassPathXmlApplicationContext) factory).close();
	}

}

901     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample7\FileOutput.java

package sample7;

import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class FileOutput implements Outputter {
	
	private String filePath ;
	
// <bean id="fo" class = sample7/FileOutput">
// <property name = filepath value = "a.data.txt">
//  </bean>

	public void setFilePath(String filePath) {
		this.filePath = filePath;
	}

	@Override
	public void output(String message) throws IOException {
		FileWriter out = new FileWriter(filePath);
		out.write(message);
		out.close();
	}
	
	

}

public interface MessageBean {

	 void helloCall();
}





903     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringDl\src\sample7\MessageBeanImpl.java

package sample7;

import java.io.IOException;

public class MessageBeanImpl implements Outputter, MessageBean {

	private String name;
	private String phone;
	private Outputter outputter;

	public MessageBeanImpl(String name) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
	}

	public void setPhone(String phone) {
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	public void setOutputter(Outputter outputter) {
		this.outputter = outputter;
	}

	@Override
	public void helloCall() { // æ≤±‚ ¿€æ˜
		String message = name + ":" + phone;

		try {
			outputter.output(message);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	@Override
	public void output(String message) throws IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}

}

913     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringEL\src\com\test\Address.java

package com.test;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

//<bean id = myaddress class = com.test.Address/>
@Component("myaddress") // Component«œ∏È πŸ∑Œ ∞¥√º ª˝º∫«—∞≈∂˚ ∞∞¿Ω
public class Address {
	
	@Value("«√∑π¿Ãµ•¿Ã≈Õ")
	private String addr ; // private¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° »£√‚«“∂ß, æÍ∞° »£√‚µ«§§¥¿∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û ,getmethod∑Œ »£√‚µ«¥¬∞≈¿”.
	
	@Value("02-754-0000")
		private String tel;
	
	public Address() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}
	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}
	public String getTel() {
		return tel;
	}
	public void setTel(String tel) {
		this.tel = tel;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}
	
	

}

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component("my_person")
public class Person {

	@Value("#{myaddress}")
	private Address address;
	@Value("»´±Êµø")
	private String name;
	
	public Person() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public Address getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(Address address) {
		this.address = address;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Person [address=" + address + ", name=" + name + "]";
	}
	
	
}

@Component("u_ctn")
public class U_Collection {
	
	@Value("#{testBean.map['4']}")
	private String map;
	@Value("#{testBean.list[0].toUpperCase()}")
	private String list;

	public U_Collection() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "U_Collection [map=" + map + ", list=" + list + "]";
	}

package com.test02;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component("my_calc")
public class Calc {

	@Value("300")
	private int a;
	@Value("50")
	private int b;

	public Calc() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	}

	public int getB() {
		return b;
	}

	public int getHap(int a, int b) {
		return (a + b);
	}

	public int getSub(int a, int b) {
		return (a - b);
	}
}

package com.test02;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.expression.Expression;
import org.springframework.expression.ExpressionParser;
import org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpressionParser;

public class Mtest01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ApplicationContext context = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("com/test02/application.xml");

		MyTest mt = context.getBean("my_test", MyTest.class);
		System.out.println("a∞™¿« π¸¿ß : " + mt.isA_test());

		System.out.println("Hap : " + mt.getHap());

		System.out.println("Sub : " + mt.getSub());
		System.out.println("a∞™¿« π¸¿ß : " + mt.isA_test());
		System.out.println();
		MyString str = context.getBean("my_string", MyString.class);
		System.out.println("What ur name ? " + str.getName());
		System.out.println("String has 5Leetters ? " + mt.isString_test());

		ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
		String message = (String) parser.parseExpression("'Hello World'").getValue();
		System.out.println(message);

		Double d = (Double) parser.parseExpression("990909.90").getValue(); // «¸∫Ø»Ø¿Ã æ∆¥œ∞° parsing¿« ∞≥≥‰
		System.out.println(d);
		
		 parser = new SpelExpressionParser();

		// invokes 'getBytes()'
		Expression exp = parser.parseExpression("'Hello World'.bytes"); 
		byte[] bytes = (byte[]) exp.getValue();
		
		

	}
}

package test01;

public interface FirstJdbcDao {
	// entity∞° æ¯æÓº≠ ±◊≥… ≥÷¿ª∞‘ø‰ .
	// entity¥¬ ¿œ¥‹ ºº∞≥ method∑Œ ∞©¥œ¥Ÿ.
	
	public void execute(String sql) ;
	// ¡ﬂ√∏≈¨∑°Ω∫ (inner class = ≈¨∑°Ω∫ æ»ø°º≠ ¥Ÿ∏• ≈¨∑°Ω∫∏¶ ∏∏µÎ)
	public int insert(String code, String name, int price, String maker);
	public int delete(String name);

}





924     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringJDBC\src\test01\FirstJdbcDaoImple.java

package test01;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;

import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport;

public class FirstJdbcDaoImple extends JdbcDaoSupport implements FirstJdbcDao {

	@Override
	public void execute(String sql) {
		System.out.println("±≥¿Áƒ⁄µÂ    ±≥¿Á¿Ã∏ß    ∞°∞›    √‚∆«ªÁ");
		System.out.println("================");
		getJdbcTemplate().query(sql, new GoodsRowMapper<Object>());

	}

	//

	public class GoodsRowMapper<T> implements RowMapper<T> {

		public T mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
			String code = rs.getString("code");
			String name = rs.getString("name");
			int price = rs.getInt("price");
			String maker = rs.getString("maker");
			System.out.println(code + name + price + maker);
			return null;
		}

	}

	@Override
	public int insert(String code, String name, int price, String maker) {
		JdbcTemplate jdbc = getJdbcTemplate();
		// int update(java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... args)
		int r = jdbc.update("insert into goodsinfo(code ,name, price,maker) values(?,?,?,?)",
				new Object[] { code, name, price, maker });
		return r;

		/*
		 * return getJdbcTemplate().
		 * update("insert into goodsinfo(code ,name, price,maker) values(?,?,?,?))") ,
		 * new Object[] {code ,name, price,maker} );
		 */ }

	@Override
	public int delete(String name) {
		JdbcTemplate jdbc = getJdbcTemplate();
		int res = jdbc.update("DELETE FROM GOODSINFO WHERE NAME = ?", name);
		return res;
		/*
		 * return getJdbcTemplate().update("DELETE FROM GOODSINFO WHERE NAME = ?" , name
		 * );
		 */

	}

}

		dao.execute("select * from goodsinfo");
		// insert into goodsinfo values('p0001' , 'JDK8', 30000,'ø£ƒ⁄æ∆');
		int r = dao.insert("p0001", "JDK8", 30000, "ø£ƒ⁄æ∆");
		if (r>0) {System.out.println("update º∫∞¯");}
		
		System.out.println("ªË¡¶ º∫∞¯ ?");
	}
}

package test02;
// 3.3.5∏¶ «œ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ. 3.5. JDBC Batch Operations
//https://docs.spring.io/spring/docs/5.1.5.RELEASE/spring-framework-reference/data-access.html#jdbc-advanced-jdbc
import java.util.List;

public interface FirstJdbcDao {
 public GoodsEntity findGoods(String code); // find
 public List<GoodsEntity> listGoods(); // SelectAll
  // makerø°º≠ ∏∏µÁ type t. ∏Æ≈œ∞™¿Ã t ¿Ã∞Ì, List t ø©æﬂ«—¥Ÿ.
  // jdbc templete¿∏∑Œ∞°º≠,

927     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringJDBC\src\test02\FirstJdbcDaoImple.java

package test02;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport;

public class FirstJdbcDaoImple extends JdbcDaoSupport implements FirstJdbcDao {

	@Override
	public GoodsEntity findGoods(String code) {
		String sql = "SELECT * FROM GOODSINFO WHERE CODE = ?";
		RowMapper<GoodsEntity> mapper = new RowMapper<GoodsEntity>() {

			@Override
			public GoodsEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {

				GoodsEntity res = new GoodsEntity(rs.getString(1), rs.getString(2), rs.getInt(3), rs.getString(4));
 // or setcode¿ÃøÎ«ÿº≠ ≥÷æÓµµ µ 
				return res;
			}
		};

		JdbcTemplate jdbc = getJdbcTemplate();
		GoodsEntity res = jdbc.queryForObject(sql, mapper, new Object[] { code });
		return res;
	}

	@Override
	public List<GoodsEntity> listGoods() {
		RowMapper<GoodsEntity> rowmapper = new GoodsRowMapper();
		return getJdbcTemplate().query("SELECT CODE, NAME, PRICE, MAKER FROM GOODSINFO", rowmapper);
	}
	
	public class GoodsRowMapper implements RowMapper<GoodsEntity> {
		public GoodsEntity mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum ) throws SQLException {
			GoodsEntity res = new GoodsEntity();
			res.setCode(rs.getString("Code"));
			res.setName(rs.getString("name"));
			res.setPrice(rs.getInt("price"));
			res.setMaker(rs.getString("maker"));
			System.out.println("row num : " + rowNum);
			return res;
			
		}
	}

}





928     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringJDBC\src\test02\GoodsEntity.java

package test02;

public class GoodsEntity {

	private String code;
	private String name;
	private int price;
	private String maker;
	
	public GoodsEntity() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
	
	
	public GoodsEntity(String code, String name, int price, String maker) {
		super();
		this.code = code;
		this.name = name;
		this.price = price;
		this.maker = maker;
	}



	public String getCode() {
		return code;
	}
	public void setCode(String code) {
		this.code = code;
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	public String getMaker() {
		return maker;
	}
	public void setMaker(String maker) {
		this.maker = maker;
	}
	
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "GoodsEntity [code=" + code + ", name=" + name + ", price=" + price + ", maker=" + maker + "]";
	}
	
	
}

package test02;

import java.util.List;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class JdbcExampe1 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		ApplicationContext ctx = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("test02/applicationContext.xml");
		FirstJdbcDao da = (FirstJdbcDao)ctx.getBean("test1");
		
		List<GoodsEntity> res = da.listGoods();
		for(GoodsEntity ge : res) {
			System.out.println(ge);
		}
	}

}

931     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringWeb\src\step02\controller\HelloController02.java

package step02.controller;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import step02.model.Hello;
import step02.service.HelloService;

@Controller 
public class HelloController02 {

	@Autowired
	private HelloService service;

	/*
	 * @Autowired private HelloService service; æ∆∑°∞° autowiredøÕ ∞∞Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.
	 * 
	 * public HelloController(HelloService service) { this.service = service; // }
	 * public void setService(HelloService service) { this.service = service // æÍ¥¬
	 * dao∏¶ ∫Œ∏•¥Ÿ. }
	 */

	@RequestMapping("/step02/hello.do")
	public ModelAndView hello() {
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView();
		Hello hello = service.getMessage();
		mav.setViewName("hello");
		mav.addObject("message", hello);
		return mav;
	}
}

933     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringWeb\src\step02\dao\HelloDAOImple.java

package step02.dao;

import java.util.Calendar;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import step02.model.Hello;

@Repository
public class HelloDAOImple implements HelloDAO{

	@Override
	public Hello GetMessage() { // model¿Ã ∞Æ¥¬ hello class return.
		int hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY);
		Hello hello = new Hello();
		if (hour >= 6 && hour <=10) {
			hello.setMessage("Good morning , sir :) step02"); 
		} else if (hour >= 12 && hour <= 15) {
			hello.setMessage("Good Afternoon , madam :) step02"); 
		} else if (hour >= 18 && hour <= 22) {
			hello.setMessage("Good Evening , sir :) step02"); 
		} else {hello.setMessage("Sweet dream :) step02");}
		
		return hello;	
	}


}

package step03.dao;

import java.util.List;

import step03.model.MemberDTO;

public interface MemberDAO {

939     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\SpringWeb\src\step03\dao\MemberDAOImple.java

package step03.dao;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.sql.DataSource;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

import step03.model.MemberDTO;

//@Repository // ≥™¥¬ ¥Ÿø¿¥Ÿ !!
public class MemberDAOImple extends JdbcDaoSupport implements MemberDAO {

	//@Autowired // ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ ∞™¿ª ø¯»∞«œ∞‘ ∞°¡Æø¿±‚ ¿ß«ÿº≠, dataSource = Bean id ¿« dataSource∞° ¿œƒ°«ÿæﬂ«—¥Ÿ.
	private DataSource dataSource; // ø©±‰¿ﬂ¿Ã«ÿ∏¯«ﬂ¿Ω ? - JDBC æÓ¬º∞Ì¿Œ∞Õ∞∞¿∫µ•...

	/*
	 * public void setDatasource(DataSource dataSource) { this.dataSource =
	 * dataSource; // datasource ø¨∞·«ﬂ¡ˆ ? JDBC template √£æ∆ø√ºˆ¿÷µ˚æ¯¥Ÿ ? ¿÷¥Ÿæ∆. æÓ∂ª∞‘¡Æ ?
	 * 
	 * }
	 */
	@Override
	public MemberDTO getMember(String mem) {
		String sql = "SELECT * FROM  SPRINGTEST where id = ?";

		MemberDTO res = getJdbcTemplate().queryForObject(sql, new Object[] { mem }, new RowMapper<MemberDTO>() {

			@Override
			public MemberDTO mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				MemberDTO r = new MemberDTO();
				r.setName(rs.getString(1));
				r.setId(rs.getString(2));
				r.setJoindate(rs.getString(3));
				return r;
			}
		});
		return res;
	}

	public MemberDAOImple() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	@Override
	public int insertMember(MemberDTO dto) {

944     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\Test03\src\com\test\MDao.java

package com.test;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;

@Repository
public class MDao { // π´¡∂∞« jdbc template¿ª µ•∑¡øÕæﬂµ≈. template¥¬ π´¡∂∞« datasource∞° ¿÷æÓæﬂ«—¥Ÿ.
	@Autowired
	private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

	public String getString() {
		return "MDAO ===>  " + getMember("b").toString();
	}

	public MemberDTO getMember(String mem) {
		String sql = "SELECT * FROM  SPRINGTEST where id = ?";

		MemberDTO res = jdbcTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new Object[] { mem }, new RowMapper<MemberDTO>() {
			public MemberDTO mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
				MemberDTO r = new MemberDTO();
				r.setName(rs.getString(1));
				r.setId(rs.getString(2));
				r.setJoindate(rs.getString(3));
				return r;
			}
		});
		return res;
	}
}

947     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestAOP\src\com\edu\entity\MyAspect.java

package com.edu.entity;

import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.After;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Pointcut;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Aspect
public class MyAspect {
	
	@Pointcut("execution(* viewSize())")
	public void calc() {}
	
	@Before("calc()")
	public void sayBefore() {
		System.out.println("µµ«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã∏¶ ±∏«—¥Ÿ. ±‚¥Ÿ∑¡∂Û. ");
	}

	@After("calc()")
	public void sayAfter() {
		System.out.println("µµ«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã∏¶ √‚∑¬«—¥Ÿ.");
	}
}

	public Rectangle() {
		super();

	}

	public Rectangle(String title, int data1, int data2) {
		super(title, data1, data2);
	}

	@Override
	void viewSize() {
System.out.println("ªÁ∞¢«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã : "+ ( super.data1 * super.data2));		
	}

}





949     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestAOP\src\com\edu\entity\Shape.java

package com.edu.entity;

public abstract class Shape {
	
	public String title;
	public int data1;
	public int data2;
	public Shape() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public Shape(String title, int data1, int data2) {
		super();
		this.title = title;
		this.data1 = data1;
		this.data2 = data2;
	}
	
	abstract void viewSize();

}

package com.edu.entity;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

public class ShapeMain {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("com/edu/entity/aopBean.xml");
		
		Shape sh1 = (Shape) factory.getBean("rect");
		sh1.viewSize();
		
		Shape sh2 = (Shape) factory.getBean("tri");
		sh2.viewSize();
		
		((ClassPathXmlApplicationContext)factory).close();
	}
}

958     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestMybatis\src\dao\ProductDAO.java

package dao;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.List;

import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;

import entity.Product;

public class ProductDAO {
	static SqlSessionFactory factory;

	static {
		String resource = "conf/mybatis-config.xml";
		InputStream inputStream;

		try {
			inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(resource);
			// resource (xml¿Ã¿›æ∆), ¿Ã∞… ¿⁄πŸ¿« ioø° ¿÷¥¬ stream¿∏∑Œ πŸ≤€¥Ÿ¿Ωø° ±◊∞… ∆ƒ¿œ¿Œ∞Õ√≥∑≥ build«ÿº≠ æ≤∞Ì¿÷¥¬∞Õ.
			// ∏∏æ‡ø° proeprties∑Œ ∞≥∫∞¿˚¿∏∑Œ ∞Æ∞Ìø¿∞Ì ΩÕ¥Ÿ∏È,
			// º”º∫¿∫ SqlSessionFactoryBuilder.build() ∏ﬁº“µÂø° ¿¸¥ﬁµ… ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ. øπ∏¶µÈ∏È:¿« ≥ªøÎ¿ª ¬¸∞Ì
			// SqlSessionFactory factory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(reader,
			// environment, props); «“ ºˆµµ ¿÷¥Ÿ¥¬ ∞≈¡ˆ.

			factory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);

			// factory¥¬ ø©∑Ø∞≥ ¥„¥¬æ÷µÈ, SqlSessionFactoryBuilderµµ ø©∑Ø∞≥ ¥„∞Ì ¿÷¿ª ∞Õ.
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}// static end

	public List<Product> getAll() {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		List<Product> all = null; // «œ∞Ì≥™º≠ π›µÂΩ√ ≈¨∑Œ¡Ó
		try {
			all = session.selectList("ProductMapper.productAll");

		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;
	}

	// insert
	public int getInsert(Product pro) {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;

		try {
			all = session.insert("ProductMapper.productInsert", pro);
			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}

	// delete
	public int getDelete(int no) {
		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;

		try {
			all = session.delete("ProductMapper.productDelete", no);
			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}

	// update
	public int getUpdate(Product pro) {

		SqlSession session = factory.openSession();
		int all = 0;

		try {
			all = session.update("ProductMapper.productUpdate", pro);
			if (all > 0)
				session.commit();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			session.rollback();
		} finally {
			session.close();
		}
		return all;

	}
}





959     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestMybatis\src\entity\Product.java

package entity;

import java.util.Date;

public class Product {
	
	private int no;
	private String item;
	private int price;
	private Date regdate;
	public Product() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public Product(int no, String item, int price, Date regdate) {
		super();
		this.no = no;
		this.item = item;
		this.price = price;
		this.regdate = regdate;
	}
	public int getNo() {
		return no;
	}
	public void setNo(int no) {
		this.no = no;
	}
	public String getItem() {
		return item;
	}
	public void setItem(String item) {
		this.item = item;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	public Date getRegdate() {
		return regdate;
	}
	public void setRegdate(Date regdate) {
		this.regdate = regdate;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Product [no=" + no + ", item=" + item + ", price=" + price + ", regdate=" + regdate + "]";
	}

}





960     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestMybatis\src\view\productView.java

package view;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Scanner;

import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.support.ClassPathXmlApplicationContext;

import dao.ProductDAO;
import entity.Product;

public class productView {

	static Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

	public static int menu() {

		StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
		sb.append("============= º±≈√ \n");
		sb.append("1. ¿¸√º√‚∑¬ \n");
		sb.append("2. √ﬂ∞°√ﬂ∞° \n");
		sb.append("3. ªË¡¶ªË¡¶ \n");
		sb.append("4. ºˆ¡§ºˆ¡§ \n");
		sb.append("5. ¡æ∑·¡æ∑·  \n");

		System.out.println(sb);
		System.out.println("π´æ˘¿ª «œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∏Ω≈∞°ø© ?");
		int no = sc.nextInt();
		return no;

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		ApplicationContext factory = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("view/beans.xml");

		ProductDAO dao = factory.getBean("mydao", ProductDAO.class);
		String item;
		int price;
		Date regdate;
		Product pro = new Product();

		int no = 0;
		do {
			no = menu();
			switch (no) {
			case 1:
				System.out.println("¿¸√º√‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ ∫∏∞⁄Ω∫¥œ¥Ÿ.");
				System.out.println("¡§¿Ã¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ ≥Œ øÎº≠«œ¡ˆ æ ƒ…µ˚ !");
				List<Product> all = dao.getAll();
				for (Product p : all) {
					System.out.println(p.toString());
				}
				break;

			case 2:
				System.out.println("√ﬂ∞°√ﬂ∞° µ•Ω∫≥◊");
				System.out.println("ITEM, price, date∏¶ ¬˜∑ ¥Î∑Œ ≥÷¡ˆæ ¿∏∏È ±∏øˆ∏‘¿∏∏Æ ");
				System.out.println("item¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰");
				item = sc.next();
				System.out.println("∞°∞›¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰ ");
				price = sc.nextInt();
				System.out.println("≥Ø¬•∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰ ");
				int y, m, d;
				y = sc.nextInt();
				m = sc.nextInt();
				d = sc.nextInt();

				pro.setItem(item);
				pro.setPrice(price);
				regdate = new Date(y, m, d);
				pro.setRegdate(regdate);
				int r = dao.getInsert(pro);
				if (r > 0) {
					System.out.println("¿‘∑¬º∫∞¯ ! ");
				}
				break;

			case 3:
				System.out.println("ªË¡¶");
				System.out.println("item ∏Ó π¯¿ª ªË¡¶«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫∞° ?");
				System.out.println("ªË¡¶ \n no : ");
				int number = sc.nextInt();
				
				r = dao.getDelete(number);
				if (r > 0) {
					System.out.println("ªË¡¶∏¶ º∫∞¯ ! ");
				}
				
				all = dao.getAll();
				for (Product p : all) {
					System.out.println(p.toString());
				}
				break;
				
				
			case 4:
				System.out.println("ºˆ¡§ºˆ¡§");
				System.out.println("ºˆ¡§«œ∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫ ITEM¿« π¯»£øÕ ∞°∞›¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰");
				System.out.println("√ﬂ∞° \n no : ");
				number = sc.nextInt();
				System.out.println("∞°∞› \n price : ");
				price = sc.nextInt();
				pro.setNo(number);
				pro.setPrice(price);
				r = dao.getUpdate(pro);
				if (r > 0) {
					System.out.println("ºˆ¡§¿ª º∫∞¯ ! ");
				}
				break;
			case 5:
				System.exit(0);
			}
		} while (true);

	}
}

962     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestWeb\src\com\test\MyController.java

package com.test;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

/*<baean id =myController/>*/
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/test")
public class MyController { // ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ servlet¿Ã url∏≈«Œ«œ∏È, π´¡∂∞« @Ctonroller∏¶ √£æ∆¡ÿ¥Ÿ.

//	@RequestMapping("/test/res01.do")  ---> @RequestMapping("/test")∏¶ æ’¿∏∑Œ ª∞¿∏¥œ±Ó, res01∏∏Ω·¡÷∏Èµ 
	// mycontoller¿« annotation¿ª ¿ŒΩƒ«“ ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ «ÿ¡÷¿⁄. -> 
	// <context:annotation-config/>
	//<context:component-scan base-package="com.test"/>
	@RequestMapping("/res01.do")
	public String test01(Model model) { // Model¿Ã ∞™¿ª ¥„¥¬ æ÷æﬂ. ø©±‚¥Ÿ ¥„æ∆ !
		System.out.println("test01 ∏ﬁº“µÂæﬂ ");
		model.addAttribute("name", "»´±Êµø");
		return "/test/res01.jsp";
// ¿Ãπ¯ø£ ∞™¿ª ¡÷∞Ì ΩÕ¿∫∞Ìæﬂæ∆ ∞™¿ª ¥„æ∆º≠ ∫∏≥ª∞Ì ΩÕæÓ. modelandview∞° ∞™¿ª ¥„æ∆º≠ ∫∏≥ª¥¬ æ÷¥œ±Ó. page¥¬ ≥ˆµ÷.≥ˆµŒ∞Ì, modelandview µ•∏Æ∞Ìø¿∑¡¥Ÿ Model¿ª µ•∏Æ∞Ìø¿±‚∑Œ«—¥Ÿ.		
//return "/test/res01.jsp"; ∑Œ «œ∏È null¿Ã ≥™ø». ¥Áø¨»˜ æ»≥™ø¬¥Ÿ. modelø° ¥„æ∆∏∏ ≥ı∞Ì, ∫Œ∏£¡ˆ∏¶ æ æ“±‚ ∂ßπÆ.
		//return "/test/res01.jsp?name=abcd"; // nameø° abcd≥÷∞Ì return«ﬂ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, abcd∑Œ return¿Ã µ .

	} 

//	@RequestMapping("/test/res02.do")
	@RequestMapping("/res02.do")
	public String test02(Model model) {
		Map<String,String> res = new HashMap<>();
		res.put("1", "111");
		res.put("2", "222");
		res.put("3", "333");
		
		
		model.addAllAttributes(res);
		System.out.println("test02¿« ∏ﬁº“µÂæﬂ");
		return "/test/res02.jsp";
	}
}

package com.test;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.View;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceView;

//VIEW∑Œ«œ∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿæ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆æ∆ 

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/mytest")
public class MyController02 {
	@Autowired // code∑Œ ±∏∫–«œ¥¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û annotation¿∏∑Œ æÍ∞° ¥©±∫¡ˆ ±∏∫–.
	private MyService myService;

	@RequestMapping("/res05.do")
	public ModelAndView ABC() {
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView();
		mav.setViewName("res05");
		mav.addObject("res", myService.getMyDao());
		return mav;

	}

	@RequestMapping("/res03.do")
	public View prn() { // ±‚¥…∏∏ºˆ«‡«“ª” method¿Ã∏ß¿∫ ªÛ∞¸¿◊ §√§¥¥Ÿ. ¥Î§”§§ø° returntype¿Ã ¡ﬂø‰.
		System.out.println("res03¿« prn()");

		return new InternalResourceView("/mytest/res03.jsp"); // InternalResourceView¿« º±¡∂∞° View¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, return type¿Ã view
	}

	/*
	 * @RequestMapping("/res04.do") public ModelAndView test() {
	 * System.out.println("res04¿« test()"); ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView();
	 * mav.setViewName("res04"); return mav; // ¿Ã∞≈µ 
	 */

	/*
	 * @RequestMapping("/res04.do") public ModelAndView test(HttpServletRequest req)
	 * { System.out.println("res04¿« test()" + req.getParameter("no")); ModelAndView
	 * mav = new ModelAndView(); mav.setViewName("res04"); return mav; // ¿Ã∞≈µ 
	 */
	/*
	 * @RequestMapping("/res04.do") public ModelAndView test(@RequestParam("no")
	 * String id) { // ¿ß∂˚ ∞∞¿Ω. // @RequestParam("no") = req.getParameter("no")
	 * System.out.println("res04¿« id ()" + id); ModelAndView mav = new
	 * ModelAndView(); mav.setViewName("res04"); return mav; // ¿Ã∞≈µ 
	 */
	@RequestMapping("/res04.do")
	public ModelAndView test(@RequestParam("no") String id, @RequestParam("name") String res) { // param 2∞≥¿œ∂ß.
		// @RequestParam("no") = req.getParameter("no")
		System.out.println("res04¿« id is " + id + "   res04¿« name is " + res);
		ModelAndView mav = new ModelAndView();
		mav.setViewName("res04");
		return mav; // ¿Ã∞≈µ 
	}
}

package com.test;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

@Service
public class MyService { // Dao∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷¥Ÿ∞°, return«ÿ¡÷¥¬ æ÷.

	@Autowired // autowire means DI∑Œ injection«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ. (ª˝º∫¿⁄ DI or setter DI)
	private MyDao myDao;

	public MyDao getMyDao() {
		System.out.println("≥™¥¬ Service");
		return myDao;
	}
}





967     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestWeb02\src\com\test\MemberDTO.java

package com.test;

public class MemberDTO {
	private String name;
	private String id;
	private String joindate;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getJoindate() {
		return joindate;
	}
	public void setJoindate(String joindate) {
		this.joindate = joindate;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MemberDTO [name=" + name + ", id=" + id + ", joindate=" + joindate + "]";
	}
	


}

package com.test;

import java.util.HashMap;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;

@Controller // url mapping∏∏ «œ∏È ø©±‚∑Œ ø√∞Õ.

	public ModelAndView SungA() {
		return new ModelAndView("mvmv");
	}// returnµ… jsp page§∑∏ß¿ª ≥÷∞⁄ö«¥Ÿ. // or setviewnameµµ ±¶√·.

	}// /WEB-INF/RES/string.jsp

		return 34;
		// /WEB-INF/RES/34.jsp
		// jsp ∆ƒ¿œ¿∫ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ˆ¥¬µ•, mapping æ»µ  (jsp ∆ƒ¿œ¿« ¡¶∏Ò¿∫ º˝¿⁄∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓ¡˙ ºˆ∞° æ¯¥Ÿ.)

package com.test;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.ExtendedModelMap;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.ui.ModelMap;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.context.annotation.RequestScope;

@Controller
public class ViewController02 {

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/list.do
	@RequestMapping("/list.do")
	@ModelAttribute("listData") // ∞¥√º¥‹¿ß∑Œ ∞™¿ª ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ∞ÌΩÕ¿ª∂ß ¿Ã∏ß¿ª ¡÷¥¬ ∞Õ¿Ã model attribute // Modelandview ∞¥√º ∏∏µÈ±‚∞° ±Õ¬˙±Õ¬˙ //
								// æÍ∞° key // means ModelAndView∞° ¿¸∫Œ¥¬ æ∆¥’¥œ¥Ÿ. ¥ŸæÁ«— πÊπ˝¿Ã ¿÷§®æ∆.
	public List<String> Sunga11() {
		List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
		list.add("list1"); // value µ«Ω√∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.
		list.add("list2");
		list.add("list3");
		list.add("list4");
		return list; // list.jsp ª˝º∫«œ∑Ø ∞Ì∞Ì

	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model.do")
	public String Method02(Map<String, String> model) {
		model.put("modelData", "Sep01 mode");
		return "model";
	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model1.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model1.do")
	public String Method03(Model model) { // model key ∞™¿Ã≥™
		model.addAttribute("modelData", "step01 mode");
		return "model";
	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model2.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model2.do")
	public String Method04(ModelMap model) { // model key ∞™¿Ã≥™
		model.addAttribute("modelData", "ModelMap mode");
		return "model";
	}

	@RequestMapping("/att.do")
	public Model Method05() {
		Model model = new ExtendedModelMap(); // model¿Ã ¿Œ≈Õ∆‰¿ÃΩ∫ø©º≠ new Model æ»µ ("Cannot instantiate the type Model"
		// then, ¿⁄Ωƒ¡ﬂø° «“ºˆ¿÷¥¬æ÷∏¶ ∫Œ∏•¥Ÿ. = ExtendedModelMap
		// model∑Œ∏Æ≈œ«œ¿›æ∆, ∞¥√º∏¶ ¥„¥¬æ÷¿›æ∆ø‰, pagereturn ¥„¥¬æ÷µÈ¿∫ page¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈ¡ˆ∏∏, ∞¥√º∏¶ ¥„¥¬ url mapping¿∫ model∑Œ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∏¶ ∏∏µÂ¥¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, att∑Œ «ﬂ¿∏∏È ∞∞¿∫¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ jsp∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ¿¿¥‰«ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.  
		MemberDTO dto = new MemberDTO();
		model.addAttribute(dto);
		List<MemberDTO> list = new ArrayList<MemberDTO>();
		list.add(dto);
		model.addAttribute(list);
		return model; 
	}

}

package com.test;

public class MemberDTO {
	private String name;
	private String id;
	private String joindate;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getJoindate() {
		return joindate;
	}
	public void setJoindate(String joindate) {
		this.joindate = joindate;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "MemberDTO [name=" + name + ", id=" + id + ", joindate=" + joindate + "]";
	}
	


}

972     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\Spring\TestWeb3\src\com\test\ViewController02.java

package com.test;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.ExtendedModelMap;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.ui.ModelMap;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.context.annotation.RequestScope;

@Controller
public class ViewController02 {

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/list.do
	@RequestMapping("/list.do")
	@ModelAttribute("listData") // ∞¥√º¥‹¿ß∑Œ ∞™¿ª ¡÷∞Ì πﬁ∞ÌΩÕ¿ª∂ß ¿Ã∏ß¿ª ¡÷¥¬ ∞Õ¿Ã model attribute // Modelandview ∞¥√º ∏∏µÈ±‚∞° ±Õ¬˙±Õ¬˙ //
								// æÍ∞° key // means ModelAndView∞° ¿¸∫Œ¥¬ æ∆¥’¥œ¥Ÿ. ¥ŸæÁ«— πÊπ˝¿Ã ¿÷§®æ∆.
	public List<String> Sunga11() {
		List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
		list.add("list1"); // value µ«Ω√∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.
		list.add("list2");
		list.add("list3");
		list.add("list4");
		return list; // list.jsp ª˝º∫«œ∑Ø ∞Ì∞Ì

	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model.do")
	public String Method02(Map<String, String> model) {
		model.put("modelData", "Sep01 mode");
		return "model";
	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model1.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model1.do")
	public String Method03(Model model) { // model key ∞™¿Ã≥™
		model.addAttribute("modelData", "step01 mode");
		return "model";
	}

	// localhost:8888/TestWeb02/step01/model2.do
	@RequestMapping("/step01/model2.do")
	public String Method04(ModelMap model) { // model key ∞™¿Ã≥™
		model.addAttribute("modelData", "ModelMap mode");
		return "model";
	}

	@RequestMapping("/att.do")
	public Model Method05() {
		Model model = new ExtendedModelMap(); // model¿Ã ¿Œ≈Õ∆‰¿ÃΩ∫ø©º≠ new Model æ»µ ("Cannot instantiate the type Model"
		// then, ¿⁄Ωƒ¡ﬂø° «“ºˆ¿÷¥¬æ÷∏¶ ∫Œ∏•¥Ÿ. = ExtendedModelMap
		// model∑Œ∏Æ≈œ«œ¿›æ∆, ∞¥√º∏¶ ¥„¥¬æ÷¿›æ∆ø‰, pagereturn ¥„¥¬æ÷µÈ¿∫ page¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ ∏∏µÈ¡ˆ∏∏, ∞¥√º∏¶ ¥„¥¬ url mapping¿∫ model∑Œ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∏¶ ∏∏µÂ¥¬∞‘ æ∆¥œ∂Û, att∑Œ «ﬂ¿∏∏È ∞∞¿∫¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ jsp∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ ¿¿¥‰«ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.  
		MemberDTO dto = new MemberDTO();
		model.addAttribute(dto);
		List<MemberDTO> list = new ArrayList<MemberDTO>();
		list.add(dto);
		model.addAttribute(list);
		return model; 
	}

}





973     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.wst.server.core\tmp0\work\Catalina\localhost\WebJS\org\apache\jsp\sec13_005fAjax\ajaxData22_jsp.java

/*
 * Generated by the Jasper component of Apache Tomcat
 * Version: Apache Tomcat/8.5.37
 * Generated at: 2019-03-08 06:32:34 UTC
 * Note: The last modified time of this file was set to
 *       the last modified time of the source file after
 *       generation to assist with modification tracking.
 */
package org.apache.jsp.sec13_005fAjax;

import javax.servlet.*;
import javax.servlet.http.*;
import javax.servlet.jsp.*;

public final class ajaxData22_jsp extends org.apache.jasper.runtime.HttpJspBase
    implements org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceDependent,
                 org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceImports {

  private static final javax.servlet.jsp.JspFactory _jspxFactory =
          javax.servlet.jsp.JspFactory.getDefaultFactory();

  private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> _jspx_dependants;

  private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> _jspx_imports_packages;

  private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> _jspx_imports_classes;

  static {
    _jspx_imports_packages = new java.util.HashSet<>();
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet.http");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet.jsp");
    _jspx_imports_classes = null;
  }

  private volatile javax.el.ExpressionFactory _el_expressionfactory;
  private volatile org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_instancemanager;

  public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getDependants() {
    return _jspx_dependants;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPackageImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_packages;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getClassImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_classes;
  }

  public javax.el.ExpressionFactory _jsp_getExpressionFactory() {
    if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {

980     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\LogTest\src\com\test\MyLoginTest.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.logging.LogManager;
import java.util.logging.Logger;

public class MyLoginTest {

//RESOURCE∑Œ »£√‚«—¥Ÿ.
	// »Ø∞Êº≥¡§¿ª resource∑Œ º≥¡§«— ¥Ÿ¿Ω, ¥›¿Ω.
	// ∑Œ±◊πﬂª˝Ω√, ∑Œ±◊∏≈¥œ¿˙∞° ¿¸√º¿˚¿∏∑Œ æÚæÓ¥Ÿ∞° »Ø∞Êº≥¡§ ¡ˆ¡§«— ∞Õ¿ª ø¨µø«—¥Ÿ.
	// ∑Œ±◊ ∏≈¥œ¿˙¥¬ «œ¿ßæ÷µÈ («⁄µÈ∑Ø, µÓ µÓ )

	private static Logger logger = Logger.getLogger("com.test.MyLoginTest");

	public static void main(String[] args) throws SecurityException, IOException {

		InputStream in = MyLoginTest.class.getResourceAsStream("logging.properties");

		LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(in);
		in.close();

		Logger loggerX = Logger.getLogger("xxxx");
		Logger loggerY = Logger.getLogger("xxxx.yyy");
		Logger loggerZ = Logger.getLogger("xxx.zzz");

		
		loggerX.fine("LoggerX ∞Ê∞Ì");
		loggerX.info("LoggerX¡§∫∏");
		loggerY.fine("loggerY ∞Ê∞Ì");
		loggerY.info("loggerY¡§∫∏");
		loggerZ.fine("loggerZ ∞Ê∞Ì");
		loggerZ.info("loggerZ¡§∫∏");
		loggerZ.warning("loggerZ ø¿∑˘");
		loggerY.warning("loggerY ø¿∑˘");
		loggerX.finest("LoggerX FINEST");
		loggerX.finer("loggerX FINER");
		loggerX.fine("loggerX FINE");
		loggerX.config("LoggerX config");
		loggerX.info("loggerX info");
		loggerX.warning("loggerX Warning");
		loggerX.severe("loggerX SEVERE");
		

	}
}





981     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web01\src\com\test\MTest.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class MTest
 */
@WebServlet("/sunga")
public class MTest extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
	 */
	public MTest() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse
	 *      response)
	 */
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		// url ø‰√ª Ω√ø° ∞™¿¸¥ﬁ¿ª get/post∑Œ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ. doGet/doPost
		// Response∞¥√º∑Œ ¿¿¥‰±∏¡∂∏¶ ∏∏µÁ¥Ÿ. (=√‚∑¬ ±∏¡∂∏¶ ∏∏µÁ¥Ÿ.)
		// request∞¥√º∑Œ ø‰√ª¿« ¡§∫∏∏¶ æÚæÓ ø¬¥Ÿ. 
		// ≥ª∞° æ¥ text∏¶ html∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«œø©, «—±€∑Œ ºº∆√«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		
		response.setContentType("text/html;charset=euc-kr");
		// ¿¿¥‰∞¥√ºø° √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ æÚæÓø¬¥Ÿ.
		PrintWriter out =	response.getWriter(); // return ∞™¿Ã PrintWriter¿« ∞¥√º = java¿« io∞Õ.
		out.write("<h1> practice </h1>");
		out.write("<font size=5>"+request.getQueryString());
		String u_name = request.getParameter("username");
		String pw = request.getParameter("pw");
		String res = request.getParameter("thetext");
		out.write("¿‘∑¬«— ¿Ã∏ß¿∫ :" + u_name);
		out.write("¿‘∑¬«— æœ»£¥¬ :" + pw);
		out.write("¿‘∑¬«— text¥¬ :" + res);
		
		out.write("<font size=5>request.getRemoteAddr() : "+request.getRemoteAddr());
		out.write("<br/> reqeust.getLocallAddr() :"+ request.getLocalAddr());
		out.write("</font>");
		out.close();

	}

	@Override
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		// post πÊΩƒ¿∏∑Œ ø‰√ª«ﬂ¿ª ∂ß¿« reuqest ∞¥√º ∞™¿ª doGet∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ≥ª∫Œ»£√‚«œ∏Èº≠ ¿¸¥ﬁ
		doGet(request,response);

	}

}

983     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web01\src\com\test\MyClass.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class MyClass
 */
@WebServlet("/myclass02")
public class MyClass extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
	 */
	public MyClass() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse
	 *      response)
	 */

	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		// url ø‰√ª Ω√ø° ∞™¿¸¥ﬁ¿ª get/post∑Œ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ. doGet/doPost
		// Response∞¥√º∑Œ ¿¿¥‰±∏¡∂∏¶ ∏∏µÁ¥Ÿ. (=√‚∑¬ ±∏¡∂∏¶ ∏∏µÁ¥Ÿ.)
		// request∞¥√º∑Œ ø‰√ª¿« ¡§∫∏∏¶ æÚæÓ ø¬¥Ÿ. 
		// ≥ª∞° æ¥ text∏¶ html∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«œø©, «—±€∑Œ ºº∆√«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		
		response.setContentType("text/html;charset=euc-kr");
		// ¿¿¥‰∞¥√ºø° √‚∑¬«“ ºˆ ¿÷¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ æÚæÓø¬¥Ÿ.
		PrintWriter out =	response.getWriter(); // return ∞™¿Ã PrintWriter¿« ∞¥√º = java¿« io∞Õ.
		out.write("<h1> practice </h1>");
		out.write("<font size=5>request.getRemoteAddr() : "+request.getRemoteAddr());
		out.write("<br/> reqeust.getLocallAddr() :"+ request.getLocalAddr());
		out.write("</font>");
		out.close();
	}

	@Override
	protected void service(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("service   ");
	}

	@Override
	public void destroy() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("destroy     ");
	}

	@Override
	public void init() throws ServletException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("init   ");
	}

}





984     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web01\src\com\test\Result.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class Result
 */
@WebServlet("/Result")
public class Result extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
       
    /**
     * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
     */
    public Result() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
	 */
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");
		PrintWriter out =	response.getWriter(); 
		out.write("<h1> RESULT∏¶ πﬂ«•«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ. </h1>");
String id = request.getParameter("id");
String pw = request.getParameter("pw");
String nm = request.getParameter("name");
String tl = request.getParameter("tel");
String jb = request.getParameter("job");
String sx = request.getParameter("sex");
String hb = request.getParameter("hobby");
String it = request.getParameter("intro");

out.write("id : "+id +"<br/>");

out.write("pw : "+pw+"<br/>");
out.write("name : "+nm+"<br/>");
out.write("tel : "+tl+"<br/>");
out.write("job : "+jb+"<br/>");
out.write("sex : "+sx+"<br/>");
out.write("hobby : "+hb+"<br/>");
out.write("introduction : "+it+"<br/>");

	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
	 */
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		
		doGet(request, response);
	}

}





985     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web01\WebContent\classses\org\apache\jsp\b_jsp.java

/*

  private volatile org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_instancemanager;

  public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getDependants() {
    return _jspx_dependants;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPackageImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_packages;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getClassImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_classes;
  }

  public javax.el.ExpressionFactory _jsp_getExpressionFactory() {
    if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
          _el_expressionfactory = _jspxFactory.getJspApplicationContext(getServletConfig().getServletContext()).getExpressionFactory();
        }
      }
    }
    return _el_expressionfactory;
  }

  public org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_getInstanceManager() {
    if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
          _jsp_instancemanager = org.apache.jasper.runtime.InstanceManagerFactory.getInstanceManager(getServletConfig());
        }
      }
    }
    return _jsp_instancemanager;
  }

  public void _jspInit() {
  }

  public void _jspDestroy() {
  }

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;


    try {
      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();
      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("aaaaaaaa\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }
}

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;


    try {
      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();
      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("bbbbbbbbbbbb\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }

		Connection con = getConnection(); // db ø¨∞·
		// idøÕ pw∏¶ controller∑Œ ¿¸¥ﬁ πﬁæ∆º≠, dbø¨∞·Ω√≈≤ daoø°∞‘ ¥¯¡Æ¡ÿ¥Ÿ.
		// dao¥¬ ¿‘∑¬πﬁ¿∫ id, pw∞° dbø° ¿÷¥¬¡ˆ »Æ¿Œ «— »ƒ, T/F∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ

992     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web02\src\com\dao\LogDao.java

package com.dao;

import java.sql.*;

import com.entity.LogTest;
import static common.JDBCTemplate.*;

// dbø¨∞·ø°º≠ CRUD
//
public class LogDao {

	Connection con;

	public LogDao(Connection con) {
		this.con = con;
	}

	public LogDao() {
	}

	public boolean getLog(LogTest logentity) {

		String sql = "select * from logtest where id = ? and pw = ?";
		PreparedStatement pstm = null;
		boolean fw = false;
		ResultSet rs = null;
		try {
			pstm = con.prepareStatement(sql);
			pstm.setString(1, logentity.getId());
			pstm.setString(2, logentity.getPw());
			rs = pstm.executeQuery();
			if (rs.next()) {
				fw = true;
			} else {
				fw = false;
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(pstm);
		}

		return fw;
	}

}

package com.entity;

public class LogTest {
	private String id;
	private String pw;

	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}

	public String getPw() {
		return pw;
	}

	public void setPw(String pw) {
		this.pw = pw;
	}

	public LogTest(String id, String pw) {
		super();
		this.id = id;
		this.pw = pw;
	}

	public LogTest() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

}

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import com.entity.*;
import com.biz.*;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class login
 */

public class login extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");

		String id = request.getParameter("id");
		String pw = request.getParameter("pw");
		boolean fw = false;
		// 1. viewø°º≠ ¿‘∑¬πﬁ¿∫ idøÕ pw∏¶ entityø° ¥„æ∆ biz∑Œ ∫∏≥Ω¥Ÿ.
		LogTest logentity = new LogTest(id, pw); // ¥„æ∆

		// 2. biz¥¬ entity∏¶ dao∏¶ ≈Î«ÿ ∞™¿Ã DBø° ¿÷¥¬¡ˆ »Æ¿Œ
		LogBiz logbiz = new LogBiz();


		// 3. Controller ¡Ô, servlet¿∏∑Œ »Æ¿Œ µ» ∞·∞˙∏¶ return.
		fw = logbiz.getLog(logentity);
		if (fw) {
			response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/log/logout.jsp");
			// C:\WebWork\Web02\WebContent\log\login.jsp
			// C:\WebWork\Web02\WebContent\log/login.jsp
		} else {
			response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/log/login.jsp");
		}

		/*
		 * if (id.trim().equals("playdata")) {
		 * response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/log/logout.jsp"); //
		 * C:\WebWork\Web02\WebContent\log\login.jsp //
		 * C:\WebWork\Web02\WebContent\log/login.jsp } else {
		 * response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/log/login.jsp"); }
		 */
	}

	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(request, response);
	}

}

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class login
 */

public class logout extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
       
    /**
     * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
     */
    public logout() {
        super();
    }

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
	 */
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

		response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath()+"/log/logout.jsp");
		
	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
	 */
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(request, response);
	}

}
