package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

public class MyClass extends HttpServlet {
	/**
	 * 
	 */
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L; // just serial version Ωƒ∫∞ (»∏ªÁ∞°∏È ∏∏µÈæÓæﬂ «’¥œ¥Á)

	@Override
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		resp.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8"); // ≥ª∞°æ≤¥¬ text∏¶ html∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		PrintWriter out = resp.getWriter();
		out.print("<h2> ø¨Ω¿ ∂« ø¨Ω¿ </h2>");
		out.print("req.getPathInfo()");
		out.print(req.getPathInfo());

		out.print(req.getRealPath(".") + "<br/>");
		out.print(req.getContextPath() + "<br/>" + req.getServletPath());
		out.print(req.getRequestURI());
		String uri = req.getRequestURI();
		if (uri.endsWith("do")) {
			resp.sendRedirect(req.getContextPath() + "/test/do.jsp"); // øœ¿¸ ¡÷º“±Ó¡ˆ ø≈∞‹¡›¥œ¥Á.
		}
		if (uri.endsWith("ao")) {
			resp.sendRedirect(req.getContextPath() + "/test/ao.jsp"); // øœ¿¸ ¡÷º“±Ó¡ˆ ø≈∞‹¡›¥œ¥Á.
		}
		if (uri.endsWith("bo")) {
			resp.sendRedirect(req.getContextPath() + "/test/bo.jsp"); // øœ¿¸ ¡÷º“±Ó¡ˆ ø≈∞‹¡›¥œ¥Á.
		}
		out.close();
	}

	@Override
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		super.doGet(req, resp);
	} // »£√‚«œ¥¬ πÊπ˝¿Ã 2∞≥ ¿Ãπ«∑Œ, doGet doPost «◊ªÛ ∞∞¿Ã & «œ≥™¥¬ ≥ª∫Œ»£√‚«—¥Ÿ.

}





997     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web02\src\common\JDBCTemplate.java

package common;

// connection & close∏∏ ¿÷¥Ÿ. 
// DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑· / ROLLBACK / COMMIT 4∞≥∏∏ ¿÷¿Ω
// client∞° æÓ∂≤ pageø° ¡¢º”¿ª «œ∞«, ø¨∞·µ» ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ ∏µŒ client ¡§∫∏∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷æÓæﬂ «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿Ã∞˜ø° ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥¬ ¿¸∫Œ static¿∏∑Œ ª˝º∫.
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Properties;

/*Name : JDBCTemplate
 * DESC : DB¿–æÓø¿∞Ì π›»Ø«œ¥¬ µÓ ±‚¥…¿ª ºˆ«‡«œ¥¬ Utility ≈¨∑°Ω∫
 * DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑·
 * */

public class JDBCTemplate {
	public static void Commit(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.commit();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// ∆Æ∑£¿Ëº«√≥∏Æ (rollback)
	public static void Rollback(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.rollback();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

// DBø¨∞·

	public static Connection getConnection() {
		try {
			Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		String url = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@127.0.0.1:1521:XE";
		Properties pro = new Properties();
		String id = "user";
		String pw = "password";
		pro.put(id, "bigdata");
		pro.put(pw, "admin1234");

		Connection con = null;
		try {
			con = DriverManager.getConnection(url, pro);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		try {
			con.setAutoCommit(false);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return con;
	}
// db ¡æ∑·

	public static void Close(Connection con) {
		if (isConnection(con)) {
			try {
				con.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// DBøÕ ONNECCT∞° µ«æ˙¥¬¡ˆ ø©∫Œ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ
	public static boolean isConnection(Connection con) {
		boolean valid = true;
		try {
			if (con == null || con.isClosed()) {
				valid = false;
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			valid = true;
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return valid;
	} // statement close

	public static void Close(Statement stmt) {
		if (stmt != null) {
			try {
				stmt.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	public static void Close(ResultSet rs) {
		if (rs != null) {
			try {
				rs.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

import java.sql.*;
import java.util.List;
import static common.JDBCTemplate.*;

import com.dao.MemberDao;
import com.vo.Member;

public class MemberBiz {

	public List<Member> getAll() { // controllerø° ∞™¿ª return «ÿ¡‡æﬂ«‘
		Connection con = getConnection();
		List<Member> all = new MemberDao(con).getAll_member();
		Close(con);
		return all;
	}

	public int getDel(String no) {
		Connection con = getConnection();
		int  all = new MemberDao(con).getDel_member(no);
		Close(con);
		return all;
	}
// idø° ∏¬¥¬ §ƒ§©ƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ √£æ∆º≠ ∏Æ≈œ
	public int getInsert(Member member) {
		System.out.println("getinsert_biz");
		Connection con = getConnection();
		int all = new MemberDao(con).getInsert(member);
		Close(con);
		return all;
	}
	//ºˆ¡§«“ ∑πƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ ºˆ¡§»ƒ ∞·∞˙∏¶ ¡§ºˆ∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ
	public int getUpdate(Member m) {
		System.out.println("getupdate_biz");
		Connection con = getConnection();
		int all = new MemberDao(con).getUpdate(m);
		Close(con);
		return all;
	}
	public Member getFind(String no) {
	 System.out.println("getfind_biz");
		Connection con = getConnection();
		Member res = new MemberDao(con).getFind(no);
		Close(con);
	 
		return res;
	}

}





999     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web03\src\com\Controller\MyController.java

package com.Controller;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.*;

import javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

import com.biz.MemberBiz;
import com.vo.Member;

public class MyController extends HttpServlet {

	@Override
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String url = req.getRequestURI();
		if (url.endsWith("all_member")) {
			doAll(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("insert_member")) {
			doInsert(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("delete_member")) {
			doDel(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("find_member")) {
			doFind(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("update_member")) {
			doUpdate(req, resp);
		}

	}

	private void doUpdate(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String id = req.getParameter("id");
		String addr = req.getParameter("addr");
		String tel = req.getParameter("tel");
		
		Member member = new Member();
		member.setId(id);
		member.setAddr(addr);
		member.setTel(tel);
		
		int r = new MemberBiz().getUpdate(member);
		if (r > 0) {
			resp.sendRedirect("all_member");
	}
	}

	private void doFind(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String no = req.getParameter("no");
		// ºˆ¡§«“ id ∞™¿ª ∞°¡¯ no¥¬ dbø°¿÷¥¬ ∑πƒ⁄µÂ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
		Member res = new MemberBiz().getFind(no);
		// JSP∑Œ ¡‡æﬂ«‘. set attribute∑Œ ¥„¿∏∏È, get attribute∑Œ πﬁæ∆æﬂ«‘. html∑Œ ¥„¿∏∏È «“ ºˆ∞° æ¯æÓ ?
		
		req.setAttribute("my_find", res);
		RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/member/update.jsp");
		rd.forward(req, resp);
	}

	private void doDel(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String no = req.getParameter("no");
		int res = new MemberBiz().getDel(no);
		if (res > 0) {
			resp.sendRedirect("all_member");
		}

	}

	private void doInsert(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String id = req.getParameter("id");
		String pw = req.getParameter("pw");
		String name = req.getParameter("name");
		String addr = req.getParameter("addr");
		String tel = req.getParameter("tel");
		// vo∑Œ ¥„æ∆º≠ ∫∏≥Ω¥Ÿ.

		Member member = new Member(id, pw, name, addr, tel);
		int r = new MemberBiz().getInsert(member);
		// if, r¿Ã 0∫∏¥Ÿ ≈©∏È, ¿¸√º √‚∑¬ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∑Œ ¿Ãµø«—¥Ÿ.
		if (r > 0) {
			resp.sendRedirect("all_member");
		}
		/*
		 * if (r>0) { System.out.println("r>0");
		 * System.out.println(req.getRequestDispatcher("/member/all.jsp"));
		 * RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/member/all.jsp");
		 * rd.forward(req, resp); //This method returns null if the ServletContext
		 * cannot return a RequestDispatcher. }
		 */
	}

	private void doAll(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		List<Member> all = new MemberBiz().getAll();
		req.setAttribute("my_all", all);
		RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/member/all.jsp");
		// forward¿« ∞ÊøÏ ≥™∞¨¥Ÿ µÈæÓø¿¡ˆ æ ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, req.getContextPath() ∞° « ø‰ æ¯¿Ω. if has,
		// web03/web03 ¿∏∑Œ 404 ø¿∑˘≥≤.
		// forward¥¬ ¡÷º“¡Ÿø° ¿÷¥¬ ¡¶æÓ±«¿ª «•Ω√µ«¥¬ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∑Œ ≥—±‰¥Ÿ. then, request ¥©±∏ ? all.jsp ø‰√ª«— ªÁ∂˜ =
		// index.html ø‰√ª«— ªÁ∂˜.
		rd.forward(req, resp);
		System.out.println(req.getContextPath());

	}

	@Override
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(req, resp);
	}

}





1000     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web03\src\com\dao\MemberDao.java

package com.dao;

import java.sql.*;
import com.biz.*;
import com.vo.*;
import static common.JDBCTemplate.*;
import java.util.*;

public class MemberDao implements Membersql {

	private Connection conn;

	public MemberDao(Connection conn) {
		this.conn = conn;
	}
	// ¿¸√º∏Ò∑œ

	public List<Member> getAll_member() {
		List<Member> all = new ArrayList<>();
		Member member = null;
		Statement stmt = null;
		ResultSet rs = null;
		try {
			stmt = conn.createStatement();
			rs = stmt.executeQuery(all_member);

			while (rs.next()) {
				member = new Member(rs.getString(1), rs.getString(2), rs.getString(3), rs.getString(4),
						rs.getString(5));
				all.add(member);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			// TODO: handle exception
		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(stmt);
		}

		return all;
	}

	public int getInsert(Member member) {
		System.out.println("getinsert_dao");
		PreparedStatement pstm = null;
		int res = 0;
		try {
			System.out.println("insert start");
			pstm = conn.prepareStatement(insert_member);
			pstm.setString(1, member.getId());
			pstm.setString(2, member.getPw());
			pstm.setString(3, member.getName());
			pstm.setString(4, member.getAddr());
			pstm.setString(5, member.getTel());
			res = pstm.executeUpdate();
			if (res > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} finally {
			Close(pstm);
		}
		return res;

	}

	public int getDel_member(String no) {
		PreparedStatement pstm = null;
		int r = 0;
		try {
			pstm = conn.prepareStatement(delete_member);
			pstm.setString(1, no);
			r = pstm.executeUpdate();
			if (r > 0)
				Commit(conn);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} finally {
			Close(pstm);
		}
		return r;

	}

	public Member getFind(String no) {
		System.out.println("getfind_dao");
		PreparedStatement pstmt = null;
		Member res = null;
		ResultSet rs = null;
		try {
			System.out.println("getfind_dao_try");
			pstmt = conn.prepareStatement(find_member);
			pstmt.setString(1, no);
			rs = pstmt.executeQuery();
			if (rs.next()) {
				System.out.println("getfind_dao_try_rs.next_");

				res = new Member(rs.getString(1), rs.getString(2), rs.getString(3), rs.getString(4), rs.getString(5));
			}

		} catch (Exception e) {

		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(pstmt);
		}
		System.out.println("getfind_dao_try_rs.next_return");

		return res;
	}

	public int getUpdate(Member member) {
		System.out.println("getupdate_dao");
		PreparedStatement pstm = null;
		int res = 0;
		try {
			System.out.println("update start");
			pstm = conn.prepareStatement(update_member);

			pstm.setString(1, member.getAddr());
			pstm.setString(2, member.getTel());
			pstm.setString(3, member.getId());
			System.out.println("pstm.set string / res "+ res);
			System.out.println("update ¿¸"+member.getAddr());
			res = pstm.executeUpdate();
			System.out.println("update »ƒ"+member.getAddr());
			System.out.println("member get string / res "+ res);

			if (res > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
				System.out.println("update done");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} finally {
			Close(pstm);
		}
		return res;

	}
}





1001     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web03\src\com\dao\Membersql.java

package com.dao;

public interface Membersql {

	String all_member = "select * from member";
	String insert_member = "insert into member values(?,?,?,?,?)";
	String delete_member = "delete from member where id = ?";
	String update_member = "update member set eaddr=? ,etel=? where id=?";
	String find_member = "select * from member where id=?";
}





1002     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web03\src\com\vo\Member.java

package com.vo;

public class Member {
	private String id;
	private String pw;
	private String name;
	private String addr;
	private String tel;
	
	
	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getPw() {
		return pw;
	}
	public void setPw(String pw) {
		this.pw = pw;
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}
	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}
	public String getTel() {
		return tel;
	}
	public void setTel(String tel) {
		this.tel = tel;
	}
	public Member() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public Member(String id, String pw, String name, String addr, String tel) {
		super();
		this.id = id;
		this.pw = pw;
		this.name = name;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.tel = tel;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Member [id=" + id + ", pw=" + pw + ", name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}
	
	
}





1003     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web03\src\common\JDBCTemplate.java

package common;

// connection & close∏∏ ¿÷¥Ÿ. 
// DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑· / ROLLBACK / COMMIT 4∞≥∏∏ ¿÷¿Ω
// client∞° æÓ∂≤ pageø° ¡¢º”¿ª «œ∞«, ø¨∞·µ» ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ ∏µŒ client ¡§∫∏∏¶ ∞Æ∞Ì ¿÷æÓæﬂ «œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¿Ã∞˜ø° ∏ﬁº“µÂ¥¬ ¿¸∫Œ static¿∏∑Œ ª˝º∫.
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Properties;

/*Name : JDBCTemplate
 * DESC : DB¿–æÓø¿∞Ì π›»Ø«œ¥¬ µÓ ±‚¥…¿ª ºˆ«‡«œ¥¬ Utility ≈¨∑°Ω∫
 * DB ø¨∞· / DB ¡æ∑·
 * */

public class JDBCTemplate {
	public static void Commit(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.commit();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// ∆Æ∑£¿Ëº«√≥∏Æ (rollback)
	public static void Rollback(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.rollback();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

// DBø¨∞·

	public static Connection getConnection() {
		try {
			Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		String url = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@127.0.0.1:1521:XE";
		Properties pro = new Properties();
		String id = "user";
		String pw = "password";
		pro.put(id, "bigdata");
		pro.put(pw, "admin1234");

		Connection con = null;
		try {
			con = DriverManager.getConnection(url, pro);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		try {
			con.setAutoCommit(false);
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return con;
	}
// db ¡æ∑·

	public static void Close(Connection con) {
		if (isConnection(con)) {
			try {
				con.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// DBøÕ ONNECCT∞° µ«æ˙¥¬¡ˆ ø©∫Œ∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ
	public static boolean isConnection(Connection con) {
		boolean valid = true;
		try {
			if (con == null || con.isClosed()) {
				valid = false;
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			valid = true;
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return valid;
	} // statement close

	public static void Close(Statement stmt) {
		if (stmt != null) {
			try {
				stmt.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	public static void Close(ResultSet rs) {
		if (rs != null) {
			try {
				rs.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

package com.vo;

public class Member {
	private String id;
	private String pw;
	private String name;
	private String addr;
	private String tel;
	
	
	public String getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(String id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getPw() {
		return pw;
	}
	public void setPw(String pw) {
		this.pw = pw;
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getAddr() {
		return addr;
	}
	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		this.addr = addr;
	}
	public String getTel() {
		return tel;
	}
	public void setTel(String tel) {
		this.tel = tel;
	}
	public Member() {
		super();
	}
	public Member(String id, String pw, String name, String addr, String tel) {
		super();
		this.id = id;
		this.pw = pw;
		this.name = name;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.tel = tel;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Member [id=" + id + ", pw=" + pw + ", name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}
	
	
}

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;

      			null, true, 8192, true);

      application = pageContext.getServletContext();
      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}

        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {

    }

                 org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceImports {

      synchronized (this) {
        if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
          _jsp_instancemanager = org.apache.jasper.runtime.InstanceManagerFactory.getInstanceManager(getServletConfig());
        }
      }
    }
    return _jsp_instancemanager;
  }

  public void _jspInit() {
  }

  public void _jspDestroy() {
  }

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    java.lang.Throwable exception = org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspRuntimeLibrary.getThrowable(request);
    if (exception != null) {
      response.setStatus(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
    }
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;


    try {
      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();
      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("    \r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb\r\n");
      out.print( exception );
      out.write('\r');
      out.write('\n');
      out.print( exception.getMessage() );
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }
}

/*
 * Generated by the Jasper component of Apache Tomcat
 * Version: Apache Tomcat/8.5.37

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();

      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;

      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();

      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("\t<form action=\"res02.jsp\" method=\"get\"> \r\n");
      out.write("\tID : <input type=\"text\" name = id /> <br/> \r\n");
      out.write("\tPW : <input type=\"text\" name = pw /> <br/> \r\n");
      out.write("\tNAME : <input type=\"text\" name = name /> <br/> \r\n");
      out.write("\tADDR : <input type=\"text\" name = addr /> <br/> \r\n");
      out.write("\tTEL : <input type=\"text\" name = tel /> <br/> \r\n");
      out.write("\t<input type=\"submit\" value=\"?ôï?ù∏\" /> \t<input type=\"reset\" value=\"Ï∑®ÏÜå\" /> <br/>\r\n");
      out.write("\t\r\n");
      out.write("\t\r\n");
      out.write("\t</form>\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }

/*
* Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
* contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
* this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
* The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
* (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
* the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
*
*     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
*
* Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
* distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
* WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
* See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
* limitations under the License.
*/
package sessions;

import java.util.Vector;

public class DummyCart {
    final Vector<String> v = new Vector<>();

    String submit = null;
    String item = null;

    private void addItem(String name) {
        v.addElement(name);
    }

    private void removeItem(String name) {
        v.removeElement(name);
    }

    public void setItem(String name) {
        item = name;
    }

    public void setSubmit(String s) {
        submit = s;
    
   
    }

    public String[] getItems() {
        String[] s = new String[v.size()];
        v.copyInto(s);
        return s;
    }

    public void processRequest() {
        // null value for submit - user hit enter instead of clicking on
        // "add" or "remove"
        if (submit == null || submit.equals("add"))
            addItem(item);
        else if (submit.equals("remove"))
            removeItem(item);

        // reset at the end of the request
        reset();
    }

    // reset
    private void reset() {
        submit = null;
        item = null;
    }
}

import java.util.*;

public class DaoBiz {

	public List<Student_entity> getAll() {
		System.out.println("DaoBiz_getALL()");
		Connection conn = getConnection();

		List<Student_entity> all = new StudentDaoImple(conn).getAll();
		System.out.println("List<S_E>µ⁄ø° DaoBiz_getALL()");

		Close(conn);
		System.out.println("all empty ???   "+all.isEmpty());
		return all;
	}

	public int getDelete(String name) {
		Connection conn = getConnection();
		int r = new StudentDaoImple(conn).getMDelete(name);
		Close(conn);
		return r;
	}

	public int getInsert(Student_entity se) {
		Connection conn = getConnection();
		int r = new StudentDaoImple(conn).getInsert(se);
		Close(conn);

		return r;

	}


}





1017     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\biz\ScoreBiz.java

package com.biz;

// ¡°ºˆ ºº ∞≥∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ √—¡°, ∆Ú±’, «–¡°¿ª ±∏«— »ƒ ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡÷¥¬ ø¨ªÍ≈¨∑°Ω∫
public class ScoreBiz {
	private int kor;
	private int eng;
	private int mat;

	public ScoreBiz() {
		super();
	}

	public ScoreBiz(int kor, int eng, int mat) {
		super();
		this.kor = kor;
		this.eng = eng;
		this.mat = mat;
	}

	public int getTot() {
		return (kor + eng + mat);
	}
	
	public double getAvg() {
		return this.getTot()/3.0;
	}
	
	public char getGrade() {
		char grad;
		switch ( (int)this.getAvg()/10 ) {
		case 10:
		case 9: grad='A'; break;
		case 8: grad='B'; break;
		case 7: grad='C'; break;
		default : grad='F';
		}
		return grad;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "ScoreBiz [" + getTot() + ", " + getAvg() + ", " + getGrade() + "]";
	}
}

	public Object getBiz(String type, String command, Object obj) {
		System.out.println("STUDENTBIZ_getBiz¥¬ ø‘≥™ ??????????????????????");

		// String, ¥©±∏¥¬ int æﬂ !
		// ¿¸√º√‚∑¬, ¿‘∑¬, ªË¡¶ «œ∑¡∏È, getBiz∏¶ æ∆∑πøÕ ∞∞æ÷ »£√‚«œ∞⁄¡ˆ.

		Object myobj = null;

				System.out.println("StudentBiz.getBiz - if DB¿Ã∏È ø©±‚±Ó¡ˆ ø¬∞≈æﬂ !");

			if(command.equals("¿‘∑¬")) {
				myobj = new DaoBiz().getInsert((Student_entity)obj);
			}
		}

		return myobj;

	}

}





1019     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\controller\MyServlet.java

package com.controller;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

import com.biz.*;
import com.entity.*;

public class MyServlet extends HttpServlet {

	@Override
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		String url = req.getRequestURI();
		if (url.endsWith("insert")) {
			doInsert(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("delete")) {
			doMDelete(req, resp);
		} else if (url.endsWith("all")) {
			doAll(req, resp);
		}

	}

	private void doAll(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		Object obj = new StudentBiz().getBiz("DB", "¿¸√º√‚∑¬", null);
		List<Student_entity> all = (List<Student_entity>) obj;
		req.setAttribute("all", all);

		RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/Score_all.jsp");
		//RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/Score_bll.jsp");
		// getRequestDispatcher : ¿€æ˜¿Ã øœ∑·µ» »ƒ, ¥Ÿ¿Ω∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∑Œ ¿Ãµø«“ ∂ß, ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æø° ¥ŸΩ√ ø‰√ª«œ¥¬ ∞Õ¿Ã æ∆¥œ∂Û, º≠πˆø°º≠ º≠πˆ∑Œ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∏¶ ø‰√ª«œø© ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ∏¶ ø‰√ª«œø© Ω««‡«— »ƒ ¿¿¥‰«—¥Ÿ. (∏µÁ¿€æ˜¿Ã º≠πˆø°º≠ ¿Ã∑Ô¡¯¥Ÿ)
		
		/*for (Student_entity res : all) {
			System.out.println("forπÆ¿ª µπ∏Æ±‚ Ω√¿€«ﬂ¥Ÿ. «œ«œ ");
			System.out.println(res);
		}*/

		rd.forward(req, resp);
	}

	private void doMDelete(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		// doDelete method¥¬ ∏ﬁ¿Ãƒø∞° ∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬ method¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, ¥Ÿ∏•¿Ã∏ß¿∏∑Œ Ω·æﬂ«’¥œ¥Ÿ :)
		// 3 getBiz("DB", "ªË¡¶", String);

		Object obj = new StudentBiz().getBiz("DB", "ªË¡¶", req.getParameter("name"));
		req.setAttribute("delete", obj);
		System.out.println(req.getContextPath());
		RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/delete.jsp");
		rd.forward(req, resp);

	}

	private void doInsert(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		// 2 getBiz("ø¨ªÍ-db","¿‘∑¬", vo);
		

		Object obj = new StudentBiz().getBiz("ø¨ªÍ-DB", "¿‘∑¬",new Student_entity());
		List<Student_entity> insert  = (List<Student_entity>) obj;


		req.setAttribute("insert", insert);
		System.out.println(req.getContextPath());
		RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/insert.jsp");
		rd.forward(req, resp);
	}

	@Override
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(req, resp);
	}

}





1020     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\dao\StudentDao.java

package com.dao;

public interface StudentDao {

String all_student = "SELECT * FROM STUDENT";
	// String all_student = "{call AllStudent(?)}"; // ?ø° µÈæÓ∞°¥¬∞« OUT ∏≈∞≥∫Øºˆ = registerOutParameter
	//registerOutParameter(int parameterIndex, int sqlType) æÍ∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ πﬁ¿ª∞≈¿”.><
	
	String insert_student = "INSERT INTO STUDENT VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)";
	String delete_student = "DELETE FROM STUDENT WHERE NAME = ?"; 
	
	

			
}





1021     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\dao\StudentDaoImple.java

package com.dao;

import java.util.*;
import java.sql.*;
import com.entity.*;

import oracle.jdbc.OracleTypes;

import static common.JDBCTemplate.*;

public class StudentDaoImple implements StudentDao {

	private Connection conn;

	public StudentDaoImple(Connection conn) {
		this.conn = conn;

	}

	// ¿¸√º√‚∑¬
	/*
	 * public List<Student_entity> getAll() {
	 * 
	 * Statement stmt = null; Student_entity student = null; List<Student_entity>
	 * res = new ArrayList<>(); ResultSet rs = null;
	 * 
	 * try { stmt = conn.createStatement(); rs = stmt.executeQuery(all_student);
	 * 
	 * while (rs.next()) { student = new Student_entity(rs.getString(1),
	 * rs.getString(2), rs.getInt(3), rs.getDouble(4), rs.getString(5));
	 * System.out.println(rs.getString(1)); res.add(student); } } catch (Exception
	 * e) { } finally { Close(rs); Close(stmt); } return res; }
	 */

	public List<Student_entity> getAll() {
		CallableStatement stmt = null;
		Student_entity student = null;
		List<Student_entity> res = new ArrayList<>();
		ResultSet rs = null;

		try {
			stmt = conn.prepareCall(all_student);
			// no.1 ) ¿Ã∞‘ oracle type¿« cursoræﬂ. var res refcursor --> then 1 ∞™¿ª return πﬁ¿Ω
			stmt.registerOutParameter(1, OracleTypes.CURSOR);
			// stmt.registerOutParameter(1, JDBCType.JAVA_OBJECT);
			// stmt.registerOutParameter(1, Types.INTEGER);
			rs = stmt.executeQuery(all_student);

			while (rs.next()) {
				student = new Student_entity(rs.getString(1), rs.getString(2), rs.getInt(3), rs.getDouble(4),
						rs.getString(5));
				System.out.println(rs.getString(1));
				res.add(student);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		} finally {
			Close(rs);
			Close(stmt);
		}
		return res;
	}

	public int getMDelete(String name) {
		PreparedStatement pstmt = null;
		int r = 0;

		try {
			pstmt = conn.prepareStatement(delete_student);
			pstmt.setString(1, name);
			r = pstmt.executeUpdate();
			if (r > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			}

		} catch (Exception e) {
			Rollback(conn);
		} finally {
			Close(pstmt);
		}

		return r;
	}

	public int getInsert(Student_entity se) {
		PreparedStatement pstmt = null;
		int r = 0;

		try {
			pstmt = conn.prepareStatement(insert_student);

			pstmt.setString(1, se.getName());
			pstmt.setString(2, se.getTerms());
			pstmt.setInt(3, se.getTot());
			pstmt.setDouble(4, se.getS_avg());
			pstmt.setString(5, se.getGrad());
			r = pstmt.executeUpdate();
			if (r > 0) {
				Commit(conn);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			Rollback(conn);
			System.out.println("why?" + e);
		} finally {
			Close(pstmt);
		}
		return r;
	}
}





1022     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\entity\Student_entity.java

package com.entity;



/*
 *CREATE TABLE STUDENT(
NAME VARCHAR2(20),
TERMS VARCHAR2(20),
TOT NUMBER(3),
S_AVG NUMBER(5,2),
GRAD VARCHAR2(10)
); */

public class Student_entity {

	private String name;
	private String terms;
	private int tot;
	private double s_avg;
	private String grad;
	
	
	public Student_entity() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}


	public Student_entity (String name, String terms, int tot, double s_avg, String grad) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.terms = terms;
		this.tot = tot;
		this.s_avg = s_avg;
		this.grad = grad;
	}


	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}


	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}


	public String getTerms() {
		return terms;
	}


	public void setTerms(String terms) {
		this.terms = terms;
	}


	public int getTot() {
		return tot;
	}


	public void setTot(int tot) {
		this.tot = tot;
	}


	public double getS_avg() {
		return s_avg;
	}


	public void setS_avg(double s_avg) {
		this.s_avg = s_avg;
	}


	public String getGrad() {
		return grad;
	}


	public void setGrad(String grad) {
		this.grad = grad;
	}


	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Student [name=" + name + ", terms=" + terms + ", tot=" + tot + ", s_avg=" + s_avg + ", grad=" + grad
				+ "]";
	}
	
	
	
	
	
}

		System.out.println(final_term);
		
		Student s1 = new Student("»´±Êµø", mid_term, final_term);
		System.out.println(s1);

1024     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\com\vo\Score.java

package com.vo;

public class Score {
	private int kor;
	private int eng;
	private int mat;
	
	public Score() {
	}
	
	public Score(int kor, int eng, int mat) {
		super();
		this.kor = kor;
		this.eng = eng;
		this.mat = mat;
	}

	public int getKor() { return kor; }
	public void setKor(int kor) { this.kor = kor; }
	public int getEng() { return eng; }
	public void setEng(int eng) { this.eng = eng; }
	public int getMat() { return mat; }
	public void setMat(int mat) { this.mat = mat; }

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return String.format("%d/%d/%d", kor, eng, mat);
	}

}

package com.vo;

public class Student {
	private String name;
	private Score midterm;
	private Score finalterm;

	public Student() {
		super();
		// name = null;
		// midterm = null;
		// finalterm = null;
	}

	public Student(String name, Score midterm, Score finalterm) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.midterm = midterm;
		this.finalterm = finalterm;
	}

	public String getName() { return name;}
	public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; }
	public Score getMidterm() { return midterm; }
	public void setMidterm(Score midterm) { this.midterm = midterm; }
	public Score getFinalterm() { return finalterm; }
	public void setFinalterm(Score finalterm) { this.finalterm = finalterm; }

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Student [name=" + name + ", midterm=" + midterm + ", finalterm=" + finalterm + "]";
	}
	
}





1026     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\src\common\JDBCTemplate.java

package common;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.sql.Statement;
import javax.naming.Context;
import javax.naming.InitialContext;
import javax.sql.DataSource;

/* Name : JDBCTemplate
 * DESC : DB∏¶ ¿–æÓø¿∞Ì π›»Ø«œ¥¬µÓ ±‚¥…¿ª ºˆ«‡«œ¥¬ Utility≈¨∑°Ω∫
 * DB ø¨∞·/ DB¡æ∑· 
 */

public class JDBCTemplate {
	// DB ø¨∞·
	public static Connection getConnection() {
		
		Connection conn = null;
		try {
			Context initContext = new InitialContext();
			Context envContext  = (Context)initContext.lookup("java:/comp/env");
			DataSource ds = (DataSource)envContext.lookup("jdbc/mybig");
			// DataSource ds = (DataSource)initContext.lookup("java:/comp/env/jdbc/mybig");
			conn = ds.getConnection();
			conn.setAutoCommit(false);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return conn;
	}

	// DB ¡æ∑·
	public static void Close(Connection con) {
		if (isConnection(con)) {
			try {
				con.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}

	}

	// DBøÕ Connect∞° µ«æ˙¥¬¡ˆ ø©∫Œ∏¶ return----------------
	public static boolean isConnection(Connection conn) {
		boolean valid = true;
		try {
			if (conn == null || conn.isClosed()) {
				valid = false;
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			valid = true;
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return valid;
	}

	// Statement close
	public static void Close(Statement stmt) {
		if (stmt != null) {
			try {
				stmt.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	// ResultSet close
	public static void Close(ResultSet rs) {
		if (rs != null) {
			try {
				rs.close();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	public static void Commit(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.commit();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
	// ∆Æ∑ª¡ßº«√≥∏Æ(rollback)----------------------------
	public static void Rollback(Connection conn) {
		if (isConnection(conn)) {
			try {
				conn.rollback();
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
}





1027     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\Web06\WebContent\classes\org\apache\jsp\dbtest_jsp.java

/*
 * Generated by the Jasper component of Apache Tomcat
 * Version: Apache Tomcat/8.5.37
 * Generated at: 2019-02-18 05:30:02 UTC

 *       the last modified time of the source file after
 *       generation to assist with modification tracking.
 */
package org.apache.jsp;

import javax.servlet.*;
import javax.servlet.http.*;
import javax.servlet.jsp.*;
import java.sql.*;
import common.*;

public final class dbtest_jsp extends org.apache.jasper.runtime.HttpJspBase
    implements org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceDependent,
                 org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceImports {

  private static final javax.servlet.jsp.JspFactory _jspxFactory =
          javax.servlet.jsp.JspFactory.getDefaultFactory();

  private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> _jspx_dependants;

  private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> _jspx_imports_packages;

  private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> _jspx_imports_classes;

  static {
    _jspx_imports_packages = new java.util.HashSet<>();
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("java.sql");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet.http");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("common");
    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet.jsp");
    _jspx_imports_classes = null;
  }

  private volatile javax.el.ExpressionFactory _el_expressionfactory;
  private volatile org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_instancemanager;

  public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getDependants() {
    return _jspx_dependants;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPackageImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_packages;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getClassImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_classes;
  }

  public javax.el.ExpressionFactory _jsp_getExpressionFactory() {
    if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
          _el_expressionfactory = _jspxFactory.getJspApplicationContext(getServletConfig().getServletContext()).getExpressionFactory();
        }
      }
    }
    return _el_expressionfactory;
  }

  public org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_getInstanceManager() {
    if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
          _jsp_instancemanager = org.apache.jasper.runtime.InstanceManagerFactory.getInstanceManager(getServletConfig());
        }
      }
    }
    return _jsp_instancemanager;
  }

  public void _jspInit() {
  }

  public void _jspDestroy() {
  }

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;


    try {
      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();

      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>DB Test</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\t");

		Connection conn = JDBCTemplate.getConnection();
		if (JDBCTemplate.isConnection(conn)) {
			out.print("?ó∞Í≤∞ÏÑ±Í≥?");
		}
		JDBCTemplate.Close(conn);
	
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {

              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }

      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.print( request.getContextPath() + request.getServletPath() );
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }
}

1035     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\web07\src\com\test\MySession.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

/**
 * Servlet implementation class MySession
 */
@WebServlet(urlPatterns = { "/aaa", "/bbb", "/hello", "/ddd", "/login", "/logout" }) // url ø©∑Ø∞≥ ¡÷∏È, default ∞™¿Ã
																						// 'urlpaterns = πËø≠' ¿Ã µ»¥Ÿ. + /
																						// æ¯¿∏∏È ø¿∑˘∞° ≥≠¥Ÿ.
public class MySession extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
	 */
	public MySession() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse
	 *      response)
	 */
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		// servletø°º≠ session¿ª ªÁøÎ«œ¥¬ π˝ (jspø°º≠¥¬ request ∏¶ ªÁøÎ), ≈¨∂Û¿Ãæ∆Æ∞° page cotext≈Î«ÿº≠ ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆ
		// ø‰√ª«œ∏È, request πﬂª˝ -> session πﬂª˝
		// pageContext -> request -> session /aaa ø‰√ª«“∂ß, session πﬂª˝.

		String url = request.getRequestURI();
				HttpSession session = request.getSession(); // request πﬂª˝Ω√ session πﬂª˝«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, session »Æ¿Œ¿Ã requestø°º≠ ¿Ã∑Ô¡¯¥Ÿ. //
		
				if (url.endsWith("login")) {	
			// System.out.println(session.getId());
			// session.setAttribute("id", "1111");
			// session.setAttribute("pw", "hello"); // æÍ≥◊¥¬ ∞Ëº” ªÏæ∆¿÷¥Ÿ.

			String id = request.getParameter("id");
			if (id.equals("admin")) {
				session.setAttribute("myid", id);
				response.sendRedirect("test02/logout.jsp");
			} else {
				response.sendRedirect("test02/login.jsp");
			}
		} else if(url.endsWith("logout")) {
			session.invalidate();
			response.sendRedirect("test02/login.jsp");
		}
	}

	/**
	 * @see HttpServlet#doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse
	 *      response)
	 */
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(request, response);
	}

}

package com.test01;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.logging.*;

public class Nose {

	public static void main(String argv[]) throws SecurityException, IOException {
		// Log a FINE tracing message
		Logger logger = Logger.getLogger("com.test01.nose"); // com.test01.nose∏¶ Ω««‡«ﬂ¿ª ∂ß, ª˝±‚¥¬ log∏¶ mylogø° ¿˙¿Â«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
		FileHandler fh = new FileHandler("mylog02.txt"); // C:\WebWork\web07\mylog.txt
		  // consoleø° ¬Ô∞Ì ΩÕ¿∏∏È, ConsoleHandler∏¶ ªÁøÎ«œººø‰.
		logger.addHandler(fh); // «⁄µÈ∏µ«“ ¥ÎªÛ

		logger.setLevel(Level.ALL); // ±««—
		logger.info("∑Œ±‰ ¡§∫∏ √‚∑¬ "); // ¡‡µµ ±◊∏∏ æ» ¡‡µµ ±◊∏∏  - consoleø° ¬Ô»˜¥¬ ∑Œ±‰ ¡§∫∏.
		logger.fine("doing stuff");
		try {
			System.out.println("æ»≥Á«œΩ√∑∆¥œ±Ó?");
			throw new Exception();
			
		} catch (Exception ex) {
			// Log the exception
			logger.log(Level.WARNING, "WARNING - øπø‹ √≥∏Æ please", ex);
			logger.log(Level.ALL, "ALL - øπø‹ √≥∏Æ please", ex);
			logger.log(Level.CONFIG, "CONFIG øπø‹ √≥∏Æ please", ex);
			logger.log(Level.OFF, "OFF øπø‹ √≥∏Æ please", ex);
			logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "SEVERE øπø‹ √≥∏Æ please", ex);
		}
		logger.fine("done");
	}
}

package com.test;

import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

import com.oreilly.servlet.MultipartRequest;

public class FileTest extends HttpServlet {

	@Override
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		doPost(req, resp);
	}

	@Override
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
		/*
		 * resp.setContentType("text/html;charSet=euc-kr"); PrintWriter out =
		 * resp.getWriter(); MultipartRequest m = new MultipartRequest(req,
		 * "c://test","euc-kr"); // æÍ∏∏¿÷æÓµµ µÀ¥œ¥Ÿ. out.print("º∫∞¯");
		 */

		String filename = req.getParameter("filename");
		String filepath = "C:\\WebWork\\WebFile\\WebContent\\download";

		resp.setHeader("Content-Desposition", "attachment; filename=\"" + filename + "\"");
		// set header∏¶ æÓµº≠ ∫√≥ƒ∏È, cos.jar (form/data∑Œ ≥—æÓ∞°º≠ «— ∆‰¿Ã¡ˆø° ¥Ÿ ∫∏ø©¡÷¥œ±Ó, ¿Ã∞… ∫–√∂«ÿº≠ ∫∏ø©¡÷∑¡∞Ì
		// æÍ∏¶ ¥ŸøÓ πﬁæ“¥¬µ•, ∞≈±‚ø° ∫∏∏È header∞™¿Ã ¿÷æ˙¥Ÿ.)
		// ∏∂ƒ° post type¿« form/data «¸Ωƒ¿ª πﬁ¿∫ ∞Õ¿∏∑Œ ¿ŒΩƒ«—¥Ÿ.

		FileInputStream fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(filepath + filename);
		int i;
		while ((i = fileInputStream.read()) != -1) {
			out.write(i);
		}
		fileInputStream.close();
		out.close();

	}

}

package com.test;

public class MyClass {
	private String name;
	private String[] selectSEASON;

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String[] getSelectSEASON() {
		return selectSEASON;
	}

	public void setSelectSEASON(String[] selectSEASON) {
		this.selectSEASON = selectSEASON;
	}

	public MyClass() {
		selectSEASON = new String[] { "Spring", "Summer", "Fall", "winter" };
	}

}





1039     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\WebFile\src\com\test02\DateTag.java

package com.test02;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.Date;

import javax.servlet.jsp.JspException;
import javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport;

public class DateTag extends SimpleTagSupport {

	@Override
	public void doTag() throws JspException, IOException {
		DateFormat df = DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.FULL, DateFormat.MEDIUM);
		Date today = Calendar.getInstance().getTime();

		try {
			getJspContext().getOut().write(df.format(today));
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
}

package com.test02;

import javax.servlet.jsp.JspException;
import javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter;
import javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.*;

public class HelloWorldTag extends TagSupport {

	@Override
	public int doStartTag() throws JspException {

		try {
			JspWriter out = pageContext.getOut();
			out.println("<h1> º∫∞¯¿Ã∂ı¥Ÿ<h1>");
			out.println();
		} catch (Exception e) {
			throw new JspException(e.getMessage());
		}
		return SKIP_BODY;

	}

}

package com.test;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
@WebServlet({ "/MyClass", "/myres" })
public class MyClass extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
    public MyClass() {
        super();
    }

	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
// jsp∞°¥¬∞« servlet¿∏∑Œµµ ø√ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		response.setCharacterEncoding("UTF-8");
PrintWriter out = response.getWriter();
out.print(request.getQueryString());
out.print("¿Ã∏ß¿∫ : " + request.getParameter("name")+"<br/>");
out.print("√ÎπÃ  : ");

for (String r : request.getParameterValues("hobby")){
	out.print(r+",");}

	}
	protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(request, response);
	}

}

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;

    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;

      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");

      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;

      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();

      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("\t");

		out.println(request.getParameter("message"));
		out.println("?óÖÎ°úÎìú ?åå?ùº?ùò ???ûÖ?†ïÎ≥?" + request.getContentType() + "<br/><hr>");
		out.println("?óÖÎ°úÎìú ?åå?ùº?ùò ???ûÖÍ∏∏Ïù¥" + request.getContentLength() + "<br/><hr>");

		InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(request.getInputStream(), "EUC-KR");

		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(isr);

		for (String line; (line = br.readLine()) != null;) {
			out.println(line + " ");
			out.println("<br/>");
		}

		out.close(); // ?ó¨Í∏∞ÍπåÏß? Ï£ºÏÖî?ïº ?ï¥?òÅ
		br.close();
		isr.close();
		
	
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");

    _jspx_imports_packages.add("javax.servlet.jsp");
    _jspx_imports_classes = null;
  }

  private volatile javax.el.ExpressionFactory _el_expressionfactory;
  private volatile org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_instancemanager;

  public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getDependants() {
    return _jspx_dependants;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPackageImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_packages;
  }

  public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getClassImports() {
    return _jspx_imports_classes;
  }

  public javax.el.ExpressionFactory _jsp_getExpressionFactory() {
    if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_el_expressionfactory == null) {
          _el_expressionfactory = _jspxFactory.getJspApplicationContext(getServletConfig().getServletContext()).getExpressionFactory();
        }
      }
    }
    return _el_expressionfactory;
  }

  public org.apache.tomcat.InstanceManager _jsp_getInstanceManager() {
    if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
      synchronized (this) {
        if (_jsp_instancemanager == null) {
          _jsp_instancemanager = org.apache.jasper.runtime.InstanceManagerFactory.getInstanceManager(getServletConfig());
        }
      }
    }
    return _jsp_instancemanager;
  }

  }

  public void _jspDestroy() {
  }

  public void _jspService(final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, final javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      throws java.io.IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException {

    final java.lang.String _jspx_method = request.getMethod();
    if (!"GET".equals(_jspx_method) && !"POST".equals(_jspx_method) && !"HEAD".equals(_jspx_method) && !javax.servlet.DispatcherType.ERROR.equals(request.getDispatcherType())) {
      response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, "JSPs only permit GET POST or HEAD");
      return;
    }

    final javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext;
    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session = null;
    final javax.servlet.ServletContext application;
    final javax.servlet.ServletConfig config;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter out = null;
    final java.lang.Object page = this;
    javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
    javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;


    try {
      response.setContentType("text/html; charset=EUC-KR");
      pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
      			null, true, 8192, true);
      _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
      application = pageContext.getServletContext();
      config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
      session = pageContext.getSession();
      out = pageContext.getOut();
      _jspx_out = out;

      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("<!DOCTYPE html>\r\n");
      out.write("<html>\r\n");
      out.write("<head>\r\n");
      out.write("<meta charset=\"EUC-KR\">\r\n");
      out.write("<title>Insert title here</title>\r\n");
      out.write("</head>\r\n");
      out.write("<body>\r\n");
      out.write("\t");

		MultipartRequest mr = new MultipartRequest(request, "C:\\WebWork\\weblog\\WebContent\\myfile", 4096, "EUC-KR", new DefaultFileRenamePolicy());

		out.print(mr + "<br/>"); 
		//out.print(mr.getFileNames());
		out.print(mr.getOriginalFileName( "uploadfile"));
		out.print("mr.getContentType(uploadfile) : " + mr.getContentType("uploadfile") + "<br/>"  +
				" mr.getFile(uploadfile) : "+ mr.getFile("uploadfile"));
	
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("\r\n");
      out.write("</body>\r\n");
      out.write("</html>");
    } catch (java.lang.Throwable t) {
      if (!(t instanceof javax.servlet.jsp.SkipPageException)){
        out = _jspx_out;
        if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
          try {
            if (response.isCommitted()) {
              out.flush();
            } else {
              out.clearBuffer();
            }
          } catch (java.io.IOException e) {}
        if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
        else throw new ServletException(t);
      }
    } finally {
      _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
    }
  }
}

1049     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\WebTest\src\com\test\ChainedFilter.java

package com.test;

import java.util.Date;

import javax.servlet.Filter;
import javax.servlet.FilterChain;
import javax.servlet.FilterConfig;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.ServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.ServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import java.io.*;

@WebFilter("/ChainedFilter")
public class ChainedFilter implements Filter {

	public ChainedFilter() {
	}

	public void destroy() {
	}

	public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
			throws IOException, ServletException {
		HttpServletRequest req = (HttpServletRequest) request;
		System.out.println(req.getRemoteHost() + "\n=============>" + req.getRequestURL() + " ø°º≠ ø‰√ª«œΩ≈ ≥Ø¬•¥¬\n"
				+ new Date() + "¿‘¥œµÂæ∆§ø.");
		
		File f = new File("C:\\WebWork\\WebTest\\WebContent\\log\\a.log");
		BufferedOutputStream bos = new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(f));
		
		bos.write(req.getRemoteHost().getBytes());
		System.out.println("æ≤∞Ì¿÷≥™æ≤∞Ì¿÷æÓ?");
		bos.write(req.getRequestURL().toString().getBytes());
		bos.write(new Date().toString().getBytes());
		System.out.println("¥ŸΩË≥ƒΩËæÓ?");
		System.out.println(bos.toString());
		bos.close();


		
		chain.doFilter(request, response);
	}

	public void init(FilterConfig fConfig) throws ServletException {
	}

}





1050     >>>>>    path D:\02_ENCORE\Playdata_0516\WebWork\WebTest\src\com\test\FilterTest.java

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import javax.servlet.Filter;
import javax.servlet.FilterChain;
import javax.servlet.FilterConfig;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.ServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.ServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter;

public class FilterTest implements Filter {
	String encoding;
	FilterConfig fc;

	public FilterTest() {
	}

	public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
			throws IOException, ServletException {
// .jsp∏¶ ø‰√ª«œ∞‘ µ«∏È, æÍ∞° ∞°∑Œ√§±‚«ÿº≠ ø©±‚º≠ ¿€æ˜¿ª «—¥Ÿ. 
		// ∂« ¥Ÿ∏• chain filter∞° ¿÷¿∏∏È, chain.filter(req,resp)∑Œ ∫Œ∏£∏È µ»¥Ÿ. (web.xmlø° ¿÷¥¬ filter∞°
		// ∏’¿˙, æÍ∞° ±◊ ¥Ÿ¿Ω)
		request.setCharacterEncoding(encoding); // ∏µÁ page request«“∂ß, «—±€∑Œ ºº∆√ µ .
		chain.doFilter(request, response);
		System.out.println("doFilter _ ¿œ«œ∞Ì ¿÷≥™");
System.out.println(	"dofilter encoding : "+request.getCharacterEncoding());		
	}

	public void init(FilterConfig fConfig) throws ServletException {
		fc = fConfig;
		encoding = fConfig.getInitParameter("enco");
		System.out.println("init_¿œ«œ∞Ì¿÷≥™");
		System.out.println("init encoding : " + encoding);
		//
	}

	public void destroy() {
		fc = null;
		System.out.println("destroy_¿œ«œ∞Ì¿÷≥™");

	}

}

package com.test;

import java.io.IOException;
import javax.servlet.Filter;
import javax.servlet.FilterChain;
import javax.servlet.FilterConfig;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.ServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.ServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter;

@WebFilter("/SimpleFilter")
public class SimpleFilter implements Filter {

	public SimpleFilter() {
	}

	public void destroy() {
	}

	public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
			throws IOException, ServletException {
		System.out.println("=================SimpleFilter, welcome ! Hi :)");

		chain.doFilter(request, response);
		System.out.println("=================Leaving SimpleFilter, Bye Bye !! ");
	}

	public void init(FilterConfig fConfig) throws ServletException {
	}

}

/**

 *
 */
@WebListener
public class Listener01 implements ServletContextListener {

	/**
	 * Default constructor.
	 */
	public Listener01() {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent arg0) {
		System.out.println("Filterchain∏ª∞Ì, session listener≥™ ø©±‚ø° log∆ƒ¿œ¿ª ∏∏µÈ∏È ¡§∏ª ¡¡∞⁄¡ˆø‰ ?");
		System.out.println("context Destroyed :< context Destroyed :< context Destroyed :< context Destroyed :< context Destroyed :< context Destroyed :< ");
	}

	public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent arg0) {
		System.out.println("contextInitializedcontextInitializedcontextInitializedcontextInitializedcontextInitializedcontextInitializedcontextInitialized");
	}

}

package com.test01;

import javax.servlet.annotation.WebListener;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionActivationListener;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionAttributeListener;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionBindingEvent;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionBindingListener;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionEvent;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionIdListener;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener;
// ø©±‚æ÷µÈ Ωœ¥Ÿ Event «œ¥¬ æ÷µÈ

/**
 * Application Lifecycle Listener implementation class Listener02
 *
 */
@WebListener
public class Listener02 implements HttpSessionListener, HttpSessionAttributeListener, HttpSessionActivationListener, HttpSessionBindingListener, HttpSessionIdListener {

    /**
     * Default constructor. 
     */
    public Listener02() {
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionListener#sessionCreated(HttpSessionEvent)
     */
    public void sessionCreated(HttpSessionEvent arg0)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionBindingListener#valueBound(HttpSessionBindingEvent)
     */
    public void valueBound(HttpSessionBindingEvent event)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionIdListener#sessionIdChanged(HttpSessionEvent, String)
     */
    public void sessionIdChanged(HttpSessionEvent event, String oldSessionId)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionListener#sessionDestroyed(HttpSessionEvent)
     */
    public void sessionDestroyed(HttpSessionEvent se)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionActivationListener#sessionDidActivate(HttpSessionEvent)
     */
    public void sessionDidActivate(HttpSessionEvent se)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionAttributeListener#attributeAdded(HttpSessionBindingEvent)
     */
    public void attributeAdded(HttpSessionBindingEvent event)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionAttributeListener#attributeRemoved(HttpSessionBindingEvent)
     */
    public void attributeRemoved(HttpSessionBindingEvent event)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionAttributeListener#attributeReplaced(HttpSessionBindingEvent)
     */
    public void attributeReplaced(HttpSessionBindingEvent event)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionActivationListener#sessionWillPassivate(HttpSessionEvent)
     */
    public void sessionWillPassivate(HttpSessionEvent se)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }

	/**
     * @see HttpSessionBindingListener#valueUnbound(HttpSessionBindingEvent)
     */
    public void valueUnbound(HttpSessionBindingEvent event)  { 
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    }
	
}

1056     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\chap02\DataType01_TF_int_F.java

package com.chap02;

public class DataType01_TF_int_F {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		System.out.println("1. Boolean ");

		System.out.println(true);
		System.out.println(false);
		System.out.println();

		System.out.println("2. int ");
		System.out.println("100 ==> " + 100);
		System.out.println("100 + 100 ==> " + (100 + 100));
		System.out.println("100 + 100 + \"100\" ==> " + (100 + 100) + "100");
		System.out.println("\"100\" + 100 + 100 ==> " + "100" + 100 + 100); // "" + ø¨∞·«ÿº≠ √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ πÆ¿⁄ø≠
		System.out.println("100 + 100 + \"100\"+100+100 ==> " + (100 + 100) + "100" + 100 + 100); // String class
		System.out.println("\"100\" + (100 + 100) ==> " + "100" + (100 + 100));
		System.out.println("10000000000L ==> " + 10000000000L);
		System.out.println();

		System.out.println("3. Float ");
		System.out.println("90.9f ==> " + 90.9f + "\t // 90.9d ==> " + 90.9d);
		System.out.println("-----------------");
		System.out.println("'A' ==> " + 'A'); //
		System.out.println("(int)'A' ==> " + (int) 'A'); //
		System.out.println("'A'+0 ==> " + ('A' + 0)); //

		System.out.println("'A' + 2 ==> " + ('A' + 2)); // single quote¥¬ ø¨ªÍ ∞°¥… (python ø°º≠¥¬ class ≥¢∏Æ¿« ø¨ªÍ¿Ã∂Û∞Ì ∞£¡÷µ«±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ø¨ªÍ¿Ã
														// æ»µ )
		System.out.println("\"A\" + 2 ==> " + ("A" + 2));

	}
}





1057     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\chap02\DataType02_byte.java

package com.chap02;

// byte ø¨Ω¿ 
public class DataType02_byte {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		byte a = 100;
		System.out.println("<∫Øºˆº±æ>\nbyte a = " + a);
		System.out.println("a=" + a);
		System.out.println();
		
		a = 127;
		System.out.println("<¿Á¥Î¿‘> \na = 127; \na = " + a);
		System.out.println();
		
		a = (byte) 129;
		System.out.println("<overflow> \na=(byte) 129;\na = " + a);
	}

}

package com.chap02;

// short(2), int(4), long(8)
public class DataType03_short_long {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		short s = 100;
		System.out.println("s=" + s);

		s = 200; // ¿Á¥Î¿‘
		System.out.println("s=" + s);

		int s1 = 200;
		System.out.println("s=" + s1);
		System.out.println(0x100 + ":" + 0100); // ¡¢µŒæÓ∏¶ ∫Ÿ¿Ã∏È ¡¯π˝¿Ã ∫Ø∞Êµ 

		s1 = 0x100;
		System.out.println(s1);
	}

}





1059     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\chap02\DataType04_char.java

package com.chap02;

// char ø¨Ω¿
public class DataType04_char {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		char ch = 100;
		System.out.println(ch);

		char ch02 = 'd';

		System.out.println("ch02 = ch02 ==> " + ch02);
		System.out.println("ch02 = ch02 + 100 ==> " + ch02 + 100);
		System.out.println("ch02 = (ch02+100) ==> " + (ch02 + 100));
		System.out.println("ch02 = ('d'+100) ==> " + ('d' + 100));
		System.out.println();

		System.out.println(" char res = ch + ch02 \n<error> : Type mismatch: cannot convert from int to char");
		System.out.println(
				"==> + ø¨ªÍ »ƒ, ¿⁄∑·«¸ int ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Êµ«æÓæﬂ «‘ , but, øﬁ¬  char res ø°º≠ ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª char∑Œ ¡ˆ¡§«œ∏Èº≠, int(4byte)¥¬ char(2byte)∑Œ casting µ… ºˆ æ¯¥Ÿ¥¬ ∏ﬁΩ√¡ˆ.");

		System.out.println();
		char res = (char) (ch + ch02);
		System.out.println("res = (char) (ch + ch02) ==> " + res);
		char res02 = 'd'+2 ;
		System.out.println("res02 =  'd'+2  ==> " + res02);

	}
}

package com.chap02;

//  printf(String format, object ... args)
public class DataType06_prinf {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		System.out.printf("%c%c", 'A', 'B');
		System.out.printf("%10c %10c", 'A', 'B'); // 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char
		System.out.printf("%10c %10c \n %c ", 'A', 'B', 'c'); // 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° char
		System.out.printf("\n %5d %10.2f \n", 100, 92.789); // ¡ŸπŸ≤Ÿ∞Ì + 5¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° ¡§ºˆ 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° º“º˝¡° ¿⁄∏Æ 2¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ
		System.out.printf("\n %-5d %10.2f \n", 100, 92.789); // ¡ŸπŸ≤Ÿ∞Ì + 5¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° ¡§ºˆ 1 + 10¿⁄∏Æ µ⁄ø° º“º˝¡° ¿⁄∏Æ 2¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ (øﬁ¬ ¡§∑ƒ)
	}
}





1062     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\chap02\DataType07_Unicode.java

package com.chap02;

public class DataType07_Unicode {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		char ch = '\u0000';
		char end = '\uffff'; // ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ πÆ¿⁄, ¿Ø¥œƒ⁄µÂ¿Œ¡Ÿ ∏∏£¥¬ ∞ÊøÏ, ∆˘∆Æø° µ˚∂Ûº≠ ∞™¿Ã æ»≥™ø√ ºˆ ¿÷¿Ω. int∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«ÿº≠ ∞™¿∏∑Œ µÈæÓ∞¨≥™ »Æ¿Œ
		System.out.println("ch=" + (int) ch + " ~ " + (int) end);
		System.out.println("ch=" + ch + "~" + end);

		char f_name = '——';
		System.out.println(f_name + ":" + (int) f_name);

		char a = '\ubc15', b = '\uc131', c = '\uc544', d = '\n';
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C", a, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C%C", a, d, b, c);
		System.out.printf("%C%C%C%C", a, d, b, c);
		String str = "\n\\ubc15\\uc131\\uc544";
		System.out.println(str);
		String strr = "\n\ubc15\uc131\uc544";
		System.out.println(strr);
		String str01 = null;
		System.out.println(str01);

		String str02 = null;
		str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
		System.out.println(str02);

		str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ100%%¿Ã¥Ÿ";
		System.out.println(str02);

		str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ'100%'¿Ã¥Ÿ";
		System.out.println(str02);

		str02 = "≥™¥¬ø¿¥√∞®º∫¡ˆºˆ\"100%\"¿Ã¥Ÿ";
		System.out.println(str02);

	}

}

1068     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\exam02\Ch02_Exam06.java

package com.exam02;

public class Ch02_Exam06 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		//∫Øºˆº±æ
		
		int kor, eng, mat, tot ;
		double avg ;
		String name ;
		
		// ∞™ ¥Î¿‘
		avg = 0.0 ; tot = 0 ;
		name = "»´±Êµø";
		kor = 90 ;
		eng = 83 ;
		mat = 72 ;
		
		// ø¨ªÍ
		tot = kor + eng + mat ;
		avg = (double) tot / 3 ;
		
		// √‚∑¬ 
		System.out.println("name : " + name);
		System.out.println("kor : "+ kor + "\t eng : "+ eng + "\t mat : " + mat);
		System.out.println("tot = " + tot + "\t avg = " + avg);
	}
}





1069     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\exam02\Exam01.java

package com.exam02;

//æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.

/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
*  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
*  √—¡° : ?
*  ∆Ú±’ : ?
*   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
*   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
*/

public class Exam01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String name = "»´±Êµø";
		int kor = 100, mat = 78, eng = 81, tot;
		double avg = 0.0;

		tot = kor + mat + eng;
		avg = (double) tot / 3;
		System.out.printf("¿Ã∏ß : %5S\n", name);
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %3d   ºˆ«–: %3d" + " øµæÓ: %3d\n", kor, mat, eng);
		System.out.printf("√—¡° = %3d+%3d+%3d = %4d \n", kor, mat, eng, tot);
		System.out.printf("∆Ú±’ = %3.1f", avg);

	}
}





1070     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\exam02\Exam02.java

package com.exam02;

//∞™¿ª πﬁ¿∏∏È √‚∑¬«œ¥¬ ∏ﬁº“µÂ∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
public class Exam02 {
	public static void Prn_A(int a) {
		System.out.println("Prn_A: " + a);
	}

	public static void Prn_B(double d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_B: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_C(char c) {
		System.out.println("Prn_C: " + c);
	}

	public static void Prn_D(String d) {
		System.out.println("Prn_D: " + d);
	}

	public static void Prn_E(char a, String b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_E: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void Prn_F(boolean a, boolean b) {
		System.out.println("Prn_F: " + a + "," + b);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Prn_A(1000);
		Prn_B(90.9);
		Prn_C('A');
		Prn_D("sung-a");
		Prn_E('b', "abab");
		Prn_F(true, false);

	}

}




1071     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

public class MTest01 {

	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static float getF() {
		return 98.7f;
	}

	public static int getRes01() {
		return 'A';
	}

	public static int getRes02() {
		return (int) 'A';
	}

	public static int getRes03() {
		return (int) 98.7;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int A = getRes();
		System.out.println("public static int getRes() : " + A);

		float B = getF();
		System.out.println("public static float getF() : " + B);
		int C = getRes01();
		System.out.println("public static int getRes01() : 'A' ==> " + C);
		int D = getRes02();
		System.out.println("public static int getRes02() : (int)'A' ==> " + D);
		int E = getRes03();
		System.out.println("public static int getRes03() : (int)98.7 ==> " + E);
	}
}

1073     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;

public class MTest03 {
	public static int getRes() {
		return 100;
	}

	public static int getRes(int a) {
		return a * 2;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int r = getRes();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(getRes());

		int r01 = getRes(2);
		System.out.println(r01);
		System.out.println(getRes(2));

		int r02 = getRes(getRes());
		System.out.println(r02);
		System.out.println(getRes(getRes()));
	}

}

package com.test;

// static return method
public class MTest04 {
 public static int su = 10;
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int su = 10;

		String str = Integer.toBinaryString(su);
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 2¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. :" + str); // C
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 8¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. : " + Integer.toOctalString(su)); // JAVA
		System.out.println("su ∏¶ 16¡¯ºˆ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê«’Ω√¥Ÿ. : " + Integer.toHexString(su));
		System.out.println(Integer.hashCode(su));
	}
}
