1076     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\02_DataType\src\com\test\MTest06.java

package com.test;

public class MTest06 {

public static void main(String[] args) {
	
	System.out.println(MTest04.su);
	
	int su = 100 ;
	double d = Math.sqrt(su);
	System.out.printf("su = %d  ==> sqrt = %3.1f\n", su, d);
		System.out.println(Math.sqrt(su));
	
	String str = "100";
	int r = Integer.parseInt(str);
	System.out.println(r+200);
	System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(str)+200);
	
	String str02 = Integer.toString(r);
	System.out.println(str02+1000);
	System.out.println(Integer.toString(r)+1000);
	
	r += 200;
	System.out.println(r);
	r -= 100;
	System.out.println(r);
	r *= 10 ;
	System.out.println(r);
	r /= 10 ;
	System.out.println(r);
	
}
}





1077     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Calc.java

package com.chap06;

public class Calc {
	public static void Hap(int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf(" %3d + %3d = %5d \n", a,b,(a+b));
	}
	public static void Sub(int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf(" %3d - %3d = %5d \n", a,b,(a-b));
	}
	public static void Gop(int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf(" %3d * %3d = %5d \n", a,b,(a*b));
	}
	public static void Div(int a, int b) {
		System.out.printf(" %3d / %3d = %5d \n", a,b,(a/b));
	}

}





1078     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class10_MaxResult.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class10_MaxResult {
	public Class10_MaxResult(int a, int b) {
		int k = (a > b) ? a : b;
		System.out.println("max=" + k);
	}

	public Class10_MaxResult(double a, double b) {
		double k = (a > b) ? a : b;
		System.out.println("max=" + k);
	}

	public Class10_MaxResult(char a, char b) {
		char k = (a > b) ? a : b;
		System.out.println("max=" + k);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new Class10_MaxResult(10, 20);
		new Class10_MaxResult(12.4, 9.45);
		new Class10_MaxResult('Z', 'p');
	}
}





1079     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class11_Emp.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class11_Emp {
	String name;
	int salary;

	public Class11_Emp() {	
		this("noname",20000);
	}

	public Class11_Emp(String name) {
		this(name,20000);
		
	}
	public Class11_Emp(int salary) {
		this("noname",salary);		
	}

	public Class11_Emp(String name, int salary) {
		this.name = name;
		this.salary = salary;
	}

	public void Print() {
		System.out.println("Name =" + name + ", Salary=" + salary);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class11_Emp e1 = new Class11_Emp();
		Class11_Emp e2 = new Class11_Emp("∑Á∏Æ");
		Class11_Emp e3 = new Class11_Emp(200000);
		Class11_Emp e4 = new Class11_Emp("π–∑Œ", 1000000);
		e1.Print();
		e2.Print();
		e3.Print();
		e4.Print();
	}
}





1080     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class12_Phone.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class12_Phone {
	private String name;
	private String comp;

	public Class12_Phone() {
		super();
	}

	public Class12_Phone(String name, String comp) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.comp = comp;
	}

	public void Prn() {
System.out.println("Phone Name :" + name + " Comp :" + comp);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class12_Phone[] pr = new Class12_Phone[3];
		pr[0] = new Class12_Phone("æ∆¿Ã∆˘5", "æ÷∆˙");
		pr[1] = new Class12_Phone("∞∂∑∞Ω√3", "ªÔº’");
		pr[2] = new Class12_Phone("∫£∞°    ", "∆“≈π");

		for (Class12_Phone p : pr) {
			p.Prn();
		}
	}
}







1081     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class1_Score.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class1_Score {
	
	int k, m, e ;
	String name;
	
	public static void Prn_tot(int k, int m, int e) {
		int tot = k + m + e ;
			System.out.printf("√—¡° = %3d+%3d+%3d = %4d \n",k,m,e,tot) ;
			
	}
	public static void Prn_avg(int k, int m, int e ) {
		double avg = (double) (k+m+e) /3 ;
		System.out.printf("∆Ú±’ : %5.2f \n", avg );
	}
	
	 void Prn_tot() {
		int tot = k + m + e ;
			System.out.printf("√—¡° = %3d+%3d+%3d = %4d \n",k,m,e,tot) ;
			
	}
	void Prn_avg() {
		double avg = (double) (k+m+e) /3 ;
		System.out.printf("∆Ú±’ : %5.2f \n", avg );
	}
	
}





1082     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class2_ScoreMain.java

package com.chap06;
// æ∆∑°øÕ ∞∞¿Ã √‚∑¬«œµ«, ∆Ú±’¿∫ º“ºˆ¿Ã«œ «—¿⁄∏Æ±Ó¡ˆ∏∏ √‚∑¬«ÿ∂Û.

/*  ¿Ã∏ß : »´±Êµø    String name
*  ±πæÓ : 100 *  ºˆ«– : 78 *  øµæÓ : 81 int
*  √—¡° : ?
*  ∆Ú±’ : ?
*   ex) √—¡° = ±πæÓ + ºˆ«– + øµæÓ
*   ex) ∆Ú±’ = (±πæÓ+ºˆ«–+øµæÓ) / 3   = √—¡° / 3
*/

public class Class2_ScoreMain {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String name = "»´±Êµø";
		int kor = 100, mat = 78, eng = 81;

		System.out.println(name + "¥‘, º∫¿˚¿ª ∏ªæ∏µÂ∏Æ∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		System.out.printf("±πæÓ : %5d ºˆ«–: %5d" + " øµæÓ: %5d\n", kor, mat, eng);
		Class1_Score.Prn_tot(kor, mat, eng);
		Class1_Score.Prn_avg(kor, mat, eng);

		System.out.println("\n====================Mainclass ª˝º∫ ================");

		Class1_Score c = new Class1_Score();
		c.name = "º∫æ∆";
		c.k = 81;
		c.m = 92;
		c.e = 35;
		System.out.println(c.name + "¥‘, º∫¿˚¿ª ∏ªæ∏µÂ∏Æ∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		c.Prn_tot();
		c.Prn_avg();

	}
}





1083     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class3_PlaneFigure.java

package com.chap06;

import java.util.*;

public class Class3_PlaneFigure {
	public static String MyTriangle(int x, int y) {

		// (ªÔ∞¢«¸≥–¿Ã = (πÿ∫Ø * ≥Ù¿Ã)/2)
		double area = (x * y) / 2.0;

		String str = String.format("%.2f", area);
		return str;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int base, height;

		System.out.println("--¿‘∑¬--");
		System.out.println("**** ªÔ∞¢«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã ±∏«œ±‚  ****");

		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

		System.out.print("πÿ∫Ø : ");
		base = sc.nextInt(); // πÿ∫Ø
		System.out.print("≥Ù¿Ã : ");
		height = sc.nextInt(); // ≥Ù¿Ã

		System.out.println("--√‚∑¬--");
		System.out.println("≥–¿Ã : " + MyTriangle(base, height));

	}
}





1084     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class4_Recursion.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class4_Recursion {

	public int getFactorial(int n) {
		if (n <= 1){
			System.out.print(n+"=");
			return 1;
		}
		else{
			 System.out.print(n+"*");
			return n * getFactorial(n - 1);
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Class4_Recursion r1 = new Class4_Recursion();
		int res = r1.getFactorial(3);
		System.out.println( res);

	}

}





1085     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class5_PrimitiveSwap.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class5_PrimitiveSwap {

	void change(int x, int y) {
		System.out.println("\n Before Change X = " + x + "  Y = " + y);
		int temp = x;
		x = y;
		y = temp;
		System.out.println("After Change X = " + x + "  Y = " + y);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class5_PrimitiveSwap ps = new Class5_PrimitiveSwap();

		int x = 10;
		int y = 20;
		System.out.println("\n»£√‚¿¸ Main X = " + x + "  Y = " + y);
		ps.change(x, y);
		System.out.println("\n»£√‚»ƒ   Main  X = " + x + "  Y = " + y);

	}

}





1086     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class6_RefSwap.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class6_RefSwap {
	int x;

	void change(Class6_RefSwap rs2) {
		System.out.println("Before Change x = " + rs2.x);
		rs2.x = 2000;
		System.out.println("\nAfter   Change x = " + rs2.x);
	}

	public static void main(String args[]) {
		Class6_RefSwap rs = new Class6_RefSwap();
		rs.x = 10;
		System.out.println(" Main Before Calling   x = " + rs.x);
		rs.change(rs);
		System.out.println(" Main After   Calling   x = " + rs.x);
	}

}





1087     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class7_Diagram.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class7_Diagram {
	double size;

	public void area(int r) {
		size = r * r * Math.PI;
		System.out.printf("\nø¯¿« ≥–¿Ã : %.2f", size);
	}

	public void area(int a, int b) {
		size = (double) a * b;
		System.out.printf("\nªÁ∞¢«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã : %.2f", size);
	}

	public void area(int a, int b, int c) {
		size = (double) (a + b) * c / 2;
		System.out.printf("\nªÁ¥Ÿ∏Æ≤√¿« ≥–¿Ã : %.2f", size);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class7_Diagram p = new Class7_Diagram();
		p.area(3);
		p.area(4, 5);
		p.area(3, 4, 7);
	}

}





1088     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class8_Address.java

package com.chap06;

public class Class8_Address {

	public String name;
	public String Addr;
	public String phone;

	public Class8_Address() {

	}

	public Class8_Address(String name, String phone) {
		this.name = name;
		this.phone = phone;
		this.Addr = "º≠√ ±∏";
	}

	public Class8_Address(String name, String Addr, String phone) {

		this.name = name;
		this.Addr = Addr;
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", Addr=" + Addr + ", phone=" + phone + "]";
	}

	public void prn() {
		System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, phone);
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		Addr = addr;
	}

	public void setPhone(String phone) {
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}

	public String getPhone() {
		return phone;
	}

	
	
}





1089     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\chap06\Class9_AddressMain.java

package com.chap06;
// Address ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«œ∞Ì, ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ √‚∑¬¿ª «œ¿⁄.

import com.chap06.Class8_Address;

/*    ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 */

public class Class9_AddressMain {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class8_Address a1 = new Class8_Address();
		Class8_Address a2 = new Class8_Address();
		Class8_Address a3 = new Class8_Address();

		a1.name = "º∫æ∆";
		a1.Addr = "º≠øÔΩ√";
		a1.phone = "01-01";
		a1.prn();

		a2.setName("æ∆º∫");
		a2.setAddr("¥Î¿¸Ω√");
		a2.setPhone("20-01");
		a2.prn();

		a3.setName("æ≈æ≈");
		a3.setAddr("±§¡÷Ω√");
		a3.setPhone("31-25");
		a3.prn();

//1. º∫æ∆¿« ¿Ã∏ß¿ª π⁄º∫æ∆∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê»ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a1.prn();
		a1.name = "π⁄º∫æ∆";
		a1.prn();
		a1.setName("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆");
		a1.prn();

//2.  æ∆º∫¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ ∞≈¡¶µµ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê»ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a2.prn();
		a2.Addr = "∞≈¡¶µµ";
		a2.prn();
		a2.setAddr("øÔ∏™µµ");
		a2.prn();

		// 3. æ≈æ≈¿« π¯»£∏¶ 12-34∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ ¿¸√º √‚∑¬
		a3.prn();
		a3.phone = "12-34";
		a3.prn();
		a3.setPhone("56 - 78");
		a3.prn();

	}
}

1091     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\construction\Mytest.java

package com.construction;

public class Mytest {
	public static int a;
	public static int b = 99;
	public static int c;

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("a= " + a);
		System.out.println("b= " + b);
		System.out.println("c= " + c);
		System.out.println();
		System.out.println("a= " + Mytest.a);
		System.out.println("b= " + Mytest.b);
		System.out.println("c= " + Mytest.c);
		System.out.println();
		a = 1000;
		System.out.println("a = 1000 ;");
		System.out.println("a= " + a);
		System.out.println("a= " + Mytest.a);
		System.out.println();

		int c = 500;
		System.out.println("int c = 500 ;");
		System.out.println("c= " + c);
		System.out.println("c= " + Mytest.c);

	}

}

package com.construction;

// Non static method - ¡÷º“ª˝º∫
class U_Test {
	public int a;
	public double d;
}

public class MyTest01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		U_Test um = new U_Test();
		System.out.println(um);
		System.out.println("a: " + um.a +" d: "+ um.d);
		
		um.a = 100 ;
		um.d = 90.9 ;
		System.out.println("a: " + um.a +" d: "+ um.d);
		System.out.println();
		um = null ;
		System.out.println("a: " + um.a +" d: "+ um.d);
		
	}

}

package com.construction;

class Test {
	public int a, b;

	public Test() {
		a = 100;
		System.out.println("Test class¿« ±‚∫ª ª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}

	public Test(int a) {
		this.a = a;
		System.out.println("Test class¿« this.a ª˝º∫¿⁄");
	}
}

public class MyTest03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test t1 = new Test();
		System.out.println(t1);
		System.out.println(t1.a);
		System.out.println();

		Test t2 = new Test(3);
		System.out.println(t2);
		System.out.println(t2.a);
	}

}

package com.construction;

// Consoleø°º≠ ¿‘∑¬πﬁæ∆º≠ ∞ËªÍ«ÿ∫æΩ√¥Ÿ.
// run as - configurations - main¿« directory¿ª »Æ¿Œ - program argumentsø° variables - Strinig_prompt ≈¨∏Ø  =$(String_prompt)
public class MyTest05 {

	public static void main(String[] ar) {

		int a = Integer.parseInt(ar[0]);
		int b = Integer.parseInt(ar[1]);

		System.out.println(a + "+" + b + "=" + (a + b));
		System.out.println(a + "-" + b + "=" + (a - b));
		System.out.println(a + "*" + b + "=" + (a * b));
		System.out.println(a + "/" + b + "=" + (a / b));

	}

}

// static ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¡§¿« & √ ±‚»≠

class Test {
	public int a;
	public static int s;

	static {
		System.out.println(" 10----------------");
		s = 100;
	}

	public Test() {
		System.out.println("15ª˝º∫¿⁄ Test");
		}
}

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
	//	System.out.println("ø©±‰∞° 0 ");
	//	System.out.println(Test.s);
		Test t1 = new Test();
		System.out.println("25"+Test.s);
		System.out.println("26ø©±‰∞° 1 ");
		Test t2 = new Test();
		System.out.println("28ø©±‰∞° 2 ");
		System.out.println("29"+Test.s);
		System.out.println("30 ø©±‰∞° 3 ");

	}

package com.day07test05;

// Getter / Setter∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê«œø© √‚∑¬

class Test02 {
	private int a;
	private int b;

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	}

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public int getB() {
		return b;
	}

	public void setB(int b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
}

public class MTest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test02 t1 = new Test02();
		System.out.println(t1.getA());
		t1.setA(1000);
		System.out.println(t1.getA());

		// Test02.a = 1000;
		// System.out.println(Test02.a);

		t1.setB(5000);
		System.out.println(t1.getB());
		System.out.println(t1.getClass());
	}
}

package com.day07test05;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Random;

import com.chap06.Class8_Address;

public class MTest05 {

//	public String toString() {
	// return "toString ¿Á¡§¿« ≥ª≤øæﬂ";
	// }
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		MTest05 mt5 = new MTest05();
		System.out.println(mt5.toString());

		Class8_Address ad = new Class8_Address();
		System.out.println(ad.toString());

		System.out.println(r);
		
		Runtime rt = Runtime.getRuntime();
		System.out.println(rt);

		rt.exec("mspaint");

		Process ab = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("mspaint");

}

1102     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam01\BookShop.java

package com.exam01;

public class BookShop {
	public String bname;
	public String author;
	public int price;
	
	public BookShop() {}
	public BookShop(String bname, String author, int price) {
		super();
		this.bname = bname;
		this.author = author;
		this.price = price;
	}
	public String getBname() {
		return bname;
	}
	public void setBname(String bname) {
		this.bname = bname;
	}
	public String getAuthor() {
		return author;
	}
	public void setAuthor(String author) {
		this.author = author;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
}





1103     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam01\exam01.java

package com.exam01;

public class exam01 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		BookShop ob = new BookShop("Web/servlet", "Sung-A", 100000);

		System.out.println();
		System.out.println("√•¿Ã∏ß:" + ob.getBname());
		System.out.println("¿˙¿⁄:" + ob.getAuthor());
		System.out.println("∞°∞›:" + ob.getPrice());

		System.out.println("\n <<∞™∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ √‚∑¬>>\n");
		ob.setBname("æ»µÂ∑Œ¿ÃµÂ ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ Ω√¿€«’Ω√¥Ÿ.");
		ob.setAuthor("Dominica");
		ob.setPrice(30000);

		System.out.println("√•¿Ã∏ß:" + ob.getBname());
		System.out.println("¿˙¿⁄:" + ob.getAuthor());
		System.out.println("∞°∞›:" + ob.getPrice());

	}

}

package com.exam02;

public class Ch06_Exam02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Emp[] ep = new Emp[3];
		ep[0] = new Emp("A111", 780000);
		ep[1] = new Emp("B222", 450000);
		ep[2] = new Emp("C333", 570000);
		
		System.out.println(" ∫¿±ﬁ ∞ËªÍº≠ ");
		System.out.println("===========================================");
		System.out.println("ªÁπ¯    ±‚∫ª±ﬁ       ºˆ¥Á          ºº±›           ∫ª∫¿            µÓ±ﬁ");
		System.out.println("===========================================");

		for (Emp e : ep) {
			System.out.println(e.toString());
		}
			
	}

}





1105     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam02\Emp.java

package com.exam02;

public class Emp {

	 private String empno;
	 private int gi;
	 private double se;
	 private double su;
	 private double bong;
	 private String grad;
	 
	 
	public Emp() {
		super();
	}


	public Emp(String empno, int gi) {
		super();
		this.empno = empno;
		this.gi = gi;
		this.se = gi*0.2;
		this.su = gi*0.15;
		this.bong = gi-se+su;
	}


	public String getEmpno() {
		return empno;
	}


	public void setEmpno(String empno) {
		this.empno = empno;
	}


	public int getGi() {
		return gi;
	}


	public void setGi(int gi) {
		this.gi = gi;
	}


	public double getSe() {
		return se;
	}


	public double getSu() {
		return su;
	}


	public String getGrad() {
		if (this.bong >= 500000) {
			return "∞¸∏Æ";
		} else { return "øµæ˜" ;}
		
	}


	public void setBong(double bong) {
		this.bong = bong;
	}


	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return empno +"|"+ gi +"|" + su +"|"+ se + "|"+ bong + "|" + getGrad()
				+ "]";
	}
	 
	 
	 
}





1106     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam03\Ch06_Exam03.java

package com.exam03;

public class Ch06_Exam03 {
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Fruit [] f = new Fruit[4];
		 f[0] = new Fruit("jujube", 24000);
		 f[1] = new Fruit("strawberry", 21000);
		 f[2] = new Fruit("persimmon", 19000);
		 f[3] = new Fruit("cherry", 12000);
		
		int totalPrice =0 ;
		 for (int i = 0 ; i < f.length ; i++) {
			 totalPrice += f[i].getPrice();
		 }
		int savePrice = (int) (totalPrice*0.15);
		
		System.out.println("===========∞˙¿œ±∏¿‘∏Ò∑œ=========");
		 for (int i = 0 ; i < f.length ; i++) {
			System.out.println(f[i].getFname() + " : "+ f[i].getPrice());
		 }
		System.out.println("---------------------------");
		System.out.println("¡÷πÆ √— ±›æ◊ : "+ totalPrice+"ø¯");
		System.out.println("«“¿Œ»ƒ ∞·¡¶ ±›æ◊  : "+ (totalPrice - savePrice) + "ø¯");
	}

}

package com.exam03;

public class Fruit {
	public String fname;
	public int price;

		super();

		this.price = price;
	}

	public String getFname() {
		return fname;
	}

	public void setFname(String fname) {
		this.fname = fname;
	}

	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}

	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}

	
	
}





1108     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam04\Ch06_Exam04.java

package com.exam04;

public class Ch06_Exam04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		SmartPhone smart[] = {
				new SmartPhone("ªÔº∫", "∞∂∑∞Ω√≥Î∆Æ", 850000),
				new SmartPhone("æ÷«√", "æ∆¿Ã∆˘", 740000,30),
				new SmartPhone("ªÔº∫", "∞∂∑∞Ω√ S", 750000,35)
		};
		
		int len = smart.length;
		System.out.println("==¡¶«∞∏Ò∑œ===");
		System.out.println("-------------");
		for (int i = 0; i<len ; i++) {
			System.out.println(smart[i].getName() + "["+ smart[i].getMaker()+"]");
			System.out.println("∞°∞› : " + smart[i].getPrice());
			int discountPrice = smart[i].calculateDiscount();
			if(discountPrice != smart[i].getPrice()) {
				System.out.println("«“¿Œ∞°∞› : " +  discountPrice );
			}
			System.out.println("-------------");
		}
		
	}

}





1109     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam04\SmartPhone.java

package com.exam04;

public class SmartPhone {
public String maker;
public String name;
public int price;
public int discountRate;

public SmartPhone(String maker, String name, int price) {
	super();
	this.maker = maker;
	this.name = name;
	this.price = price;
}

public SmartPhone(String maker, String name, int price, int discountRate) {
	super();
	this.maker = maker;
	this.name = name;
	this.price = price;
	this.discountRate = discountRate;
}

public int calculateDiscount() {
	int discount = (int) (this.price - (this.price*discountRate*0.01));
	return discount;
}

public String getMaker() {
	return maker;
}

public void setMaker(String maker) {
	this.maker = maker;
}

public String getName() {
	return name;
}

public void setName(String name) {
	this.name = name;
}

public int getPrice() {
	return price;
}

public void setPrice(int price) {
	this.price = price;
}

public int getDiscountRate() {
	return discountRate;
}

public void setDiscountRate(int discountRate) {
	this.discountRate = discountRate;
}


}

		m2.setJob("øµæ˜");
		m2.setHiredate("2012-1-3");
		m2.setSal(9000);

		System.out.println("»∏ø¯¿« ±‚∫ª¡§∫∏");

		System.out.println(m2.toString());

		System.out.println("\n »´±Êµø¿« ¿‘ªÁ¿œ¿ª 4ø˘ 5¿œ∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê»ƒ √‚∑¬");
		m1.setHiredate("2012-4-5");
		System.out.println(m1.toString());

		System.out.println("\n ¡§±Êµø¿« ¡˜æ˜¿ª »´∫∏∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ √‚∑¬");
		m2.setJob("»´∫∏");

		System.out.println("sum = " + sum);
	}

1111     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\exam05\Member.java

package com.exam05;

public class Member {
	private int empno ;
	private String ename;
	private String job;
	private String hiredate;
	private int sal;
	
	public Member () {}
	public Member(int empno, String ename) {
		super();
		this.empno = empno;
		this.ename = ename;
	}
	
	
	public int getEmpno() {
		return empno;
	}
	public void setEmpno(int empno) {
		this.empno = empno;
	}
	public String getEname() {
		return ename;
	}
	public void setEname(String ename) {
		this.ename = ename;
	}
	public String getJob() {
		return job;
	}
	public void setJob(String job) {
		this.job = job;
	}
	public String getHiredate() {
		return hiredate;
	}
	public void setHiredate(String hiredate) {
		this.hiredate = hiredate;
	}
	public int getSal() {
		return sal;
	}
	public void setSal(int sal) {
		this.sal = sal;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return empno + "   " + ename +  "   " + job +  "   " + hiredate + "   "+ sal;
	}
	
	

}

		System.out.println("π›∞©¥Ÿ prn !, ≥™¥¬ DISPæﬂ !");
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

1118     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test02\MTest03.java

package com.test02;

public class MTest03 {

	public static void MTest(int a) {
		System.out.println(a + "==> int ! ");
	}

	public static void MTest(char a) {
		System.out.println(a + "==> char ! ");

	}

	public static void MTest(char a, char b) {
		System.out.println(a + " & " + b + "==> both char ! , if a+b ? ==> " + (a + b));

	}

	public static void MTest(int a, int b) {
		System.out.println(a + " & " + b + "==> both int ! , if a+b ? ==> " + (a + b));

	}

	public static void MTest(int a, char b) {
		System.out
				.println(a + " ==> int & " + b + "==> char ! , if (a+b) ? ==> " + (a + b) + " or a+b ? ==>" + a + b);

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		MTest('A');
		MTest(100);
		MTest('A', 'B');
		MTest('A', 35);
		MTest(35, 'A');
		MTest(10, 50);
	//	System.out.println((int)true);
	}

}





1119     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test03\Mytest.java

package com.test03;
// UML »Æ¿Œ
public class Mytest {
	Mytest() {
		return;
	}
	 public class AA {}
	 protected class BB {}
	 class CC {}
	 private class DD {}

	public 		byte a;
	protected 	short b;
				int c;
	private 	double d;

	public 		static byte e;
	protected 	static  short f;
	 		  	static int g;
	private 	static double h;

	public static void A() {
	}

	protected static void B() {
	}

	static void C() {
	}

	private static void D() {
	}

	public static byte E() {
		return e;
	}

	protected static short F() {
		return f ;
	}
	
	static int G () {
		return g ;
	}
	
	private static double H () {
		return h ;
	}

	
	public 		void I () {}
	protected 	void J () {}
				void K () {}
	private 	void L () {}
	
	public byte M () {
		return a ;
	}
	
	protected short N () {
		return b ;
	}
 int O () {
	 return c;
 }	
private double P () {
	return d ;
}
}

package com.test04;

// ∞¥√º ª˝º∫ & ¡÷º“ »Æ¿Œ
public class MTest01 {

	int a;

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("new Mtest01().a : " + new MTest01().a);

		MTest01 m1 = new MTest01();
		System.out.println("m1.a : " + m1.a);
		System.out.println();

		m1.a = 19;
		System.out.println("m1.a = 19 ;");
		System.out.println("new Mtest01() : " + new MTest01());
		System.out.println("new Mtest01().a : " + new MTest01().a);
		System.out.println("m1.a : " + m1.a);
		System.out.println();

		System.out.println("new Mtest01() : " + new MTest01());
		System.out.println("new Mtest01() : " + new MTest01());
		System.out.println("new Mtest01() : " + new MTest01());
	}
}





1123     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test04\MTest02.java

package com.test04;

// this () : ≥ª∫Œª˝º∫¿⁄ »£√‚
class My {
	public String name;

	public My() {
		//name = "º∫æ∆";
		// this("º∫æ∆") ;
		this.name = "noname";
	}

	public My(String name) {
		this.name = name;
		// name = name ;

	}
}

public class MTest02 {
	public static void Disp(int a) {
		System.out.println(a);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("My m1 = new My();");
		My m1 = new My();
		System.out.println("m1.name: " + m1.name);
		System.out.println();

		My m2 = new My("æ∆º∫");
		System.out.println("My m2 = new My(\"æ∆º∫\");");
		System.out.println("m2.name: " + m2.name);
		System.out.println("m1.name: " + m1.name);
		System.out.println();

		My m3 = new My(new My().name);
		System.out.println("My m3 = new My(new My().name);");
		System.out.println("m3.name: " + m3.name);
		System.out.println("m1.name: " + m1.name);

	}
}

package com.test04;


// Getter / Setter∏¶ ¿ÃøÎ ∞™¿ª ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ ∫Ø∞Ê«œø© √‚∑¬

class Test02 {
	private int a;
	private int b;

	public int getA() {
		return a;
	}

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public int getB() {
		return b;
	}

	public void setB(int b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
}

public class MTest03 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Test02 t1 = new Test02();
		System.out.println(t1.getA());
		t1.setA(1000);
		System.out.println(t1.getA());

		// Test02.a = 1000;
		// System.out.println(Test02.a);

		t1.setB(5000);
		System.out.println(t1.getB());
		System.out.println(t1.getClass());
	}

1125     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test04\MTest04.java

package com.test04;
// Address ∞¥√º∏¶ ª˝º∫«œ∞Ì, ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ∑Œ ∞™ ¿¸¥ﬁ π◊ √‚∑¬¿ª «œ¿⁄.

import com.chap06.Class8_Address;

/*    ¿Ã∏ß ¡÷º“ ¿¸»≠π¯»£    = address class / ≥™∏∏¿« ¿⁄∑·«¸¿ª ∏∏µÈ¿⁄ ! 
 * a1 º∫æ∆ º≠øÔΩ√ 01-01    ∏‚πˆ∫Øºˆ string 3∞≥ ∏∏µÈ∏È µ«∞⁄≥◊ø© ¿Ã∏ß¡÷º“¿¸»≠π¯»£
 * a2 æ∆º∫ ¥Î¿¸Ω√  20-01
 * a3 æ≈æ≈ ±§¡÷Ω√ 31-25
 * 
 * class ∑Œ ¿€º∫«“∂ß¥¬, record ¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿€º∫
 */

public class MTest04 {
	public static void Disp(Class8_Address ar) {
		ar.prn();
		ar.setName("what?");
		System.out.println(ar);
		;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class8_Address a1 = new Class8_Address("º∫æ∆", "º≠øÔΩ√", "01-01");
		Class8_Address a2 = new Class8_Address("æ∆º∫", "¥Î¿¸Ω√", "02-02");
		Class8_Address a3 = new Class8_Address("æ≈æ≈", "±§¡÷Ω√", "03-03");

		System.out.println("a1 &=" + a1);
		System.out.println("a2 &=" + a2);
		System.out.println("a3 &=" + a3);

		a1.prn();
		a2.prn();
		a3.prn();
		System.out.println();
		
		Disp(a1);
		a1.prn();
		Disp(a2);
		a2.prn();
		Disp(a3);
		a3.prn();
	}
}





1126     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test04\MTest05.java

package com.test04;

import com.chap06.Class8_Address;

// static, non static¿« ¬˜¿Ã∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏¿⁄.
public class MTest05 {

	public static Class8_Address getAddress(Class8_Address r) {
		//r.name = "º∫æ∆";
	//	r.Addr = "º≠øÔΩ√";
	//	r.phone = "01-01";
		
		r.setName("º∫æ∆");
		r.setAddr("º≠øÔΩ√");
		r.setPhone("01-01");
		return r;
	}

	public Class8_Address getAddress01(Class8_Address r) {
		return r;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Class8_Address a1 = new Class8_Address("æ∆º∫", "¥Î¿¸Ω√", "02-02");
		Class8_Address a2 = getAddress(a1);
// static, a1¿ª ∏≈∞≥∫Øºˆ∑Œ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∏Æ≈Õ∑≤(a1¿« ∞™ address("æ∆º∫", "¥Î¿¸Ω√", "02-02"))¿Ã «ÿ¥Á µ•¿Ã≈Õ ≈∏¿‘(Address r)¿Ã∂˚ ∏¬¿∏∏È, r¿ª ∏Æ≈œ«ÿ¡ÿ¥Ÿ. 
		System.out.println("Address a2 = getAddress(a1);");
		a2.prn();

		Class8_Address a3 = new MTest05().getAddress(a1);
// new ª˝º∫¿⁄∏¶ ∏∏≥™ static method∏¶ ∞¥√º ª˝º∫«œø© non static¿∏∑Œ »£√‚.
		System.out.println("Address a3 = new MTest05().getAddress(a1);");
		a3.prn();

		Class8_Address a4 = new MTest05().getAddress01(a1);
		System.out.println("Address a4 = new MTest05().getAddress01(a1);");
		a4.prn(); /// ¡÷º“∞° æ¯¥¬µ• æÓ∂ª∞‘ ∫Œ∏ß ?
	}
}





1127     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\06_ClassObjectArray\src\com\test04\MTest06.java

package com.test04;

// Integer class¿« non_static method »∞øÎ
public class MTest06 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String su = "980.007";

		Double d = new Double(su);
		System.out.println("Double d : " + d);
		
		Integer i = new Integer((int) Double.parseDouble(su));
		System.out.println("new Integer((int) Double.parseDouble(su)): " + i);

		

		int r = d.intValue();
		System.out.println("int r = d.intValue() ==> " + r);

		Integer r1 = new Integer(d.intValue());
		System.out.println("Integer r1 = new Integer(d.intValue()); ==> "+r1);
		
		int res = new Double(su).intValue();
		System.out.println("int res = new Double(su).intValue() ==> " + res);

	}

}

package play.data.ch7.p7;

public class Dvd {
	public String title;
	public int price;

	public Dvd() {}
	public Dvd(String title, int price) {
		super();
		this.title = title;
		this.price = price;
	}
	public String getTitle() {
		return title;
	}
	public void setTitle(String title) {
		this.title = title;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
}





1129     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\ch7\p7\DvdShop.java

package play.data.ch7.p7;

public class DvdShop {
	private Dvd[] dvdlist;
	
	public DvdShop(Dvd[] d) {
		dvdlist = new Dvd[d.length];
		for (int i = 0 ; i < d.length ; i++) {
			dvdlist[i] = d[i];
		}
	}
	public void printDvdlist() {
		System.out.println("Dvd ∏Ò∑œ=============");
		for (int i = 0; i<dvdlist.length ; i++) {
			System.out.println(dvdlist[i].getTitle() + dvdlist[i].getPrice());
		}
	}
	public void printTotalPrice() {
		System.out.println("====================");
		int sum = 0 ;
		for (int i = 0; i < dvdlist.length ; i++ ) {
			sum += dvdlist[i].getPrice();
		}
		System.out.println("√—«’∞Ë : "+ sum);
		
	}
	
	

}

package play.data.ch7.q1;

class A {
	public A() {
		System.out.println("ª˝º∫¿⁄ A");
	}

	public A(int a) {
		System.out.println("ª˝º∫¿⁄ A" + a);
	}
}

class B extends A {
	public B(int a) {
		System.out.println("ª˝º∫¿⁄ B" + a);
	}
}

public class Constructor {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		A a = new A(10);
		System.out.println();
		B b = new B(11);
	}

}

1138     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\ch7\q4\Subclass.java

package play.data.ch7.q4;

public class Subclass extends SuperClass{

	public Subclass(int x, int y, int z) {
		super(x, y, z);
		super.display();
		this.sumData();
	}
	
	public void sumData() {
		System.out.println("«’ : " + (x + y+ z));
		
	}

}





1139     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\ch7\q4\SuperClass.java

package play.data.ch7.q4;

public class SuperClass {
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;

	public SuperClass() {
		System.out.println("**** x,y,zø° ∞™¿ª √§øˆ∫æΩ√¥Ÿ. ****");
	}

	public SuperClass(int x) {
		this();
		this.x = x;
		System.out.println(x + "∏¶ ≥—∞‹ πﬁ¿∫ ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.");
	}

	public SuperClass(int x, int y) {
		this(x);
		this.y = y;
		System.out.println(x +"    " +y +"∏¶ ≥—∞‹ πﬁ¿∫ ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.");
	}

	public SuperClass(int x, int y, int z) {
		this(x,y);
		this.z = z;
		System.out.println(x +"    " +y +"    "+z+"∏¶ ≥—∞‹ πﬁ¿∫ ª˝º∫¿⁄ ¿‘¥œ¥Ÿ.");
	}

	public void display() {
		System.out.println(this.x + "     "+ this.y +  "     "+ this.z );

	}

}





1140     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\ch7\q5\Ch07_Exam05.java

package play.data.ch7.q5;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Ch07_Exam05 extends Sales {
	int amount;

	public void setProcess() {
		amount = qty * cost;
	}

	public void getDisplay() {
		int price = amount - (int) (amount * discount);
		System.out.println(article + "    " + price + "ø¯");
	}

	public static void setDiscount(float f) {
		discount = f;

	}

	public Ch07_Exam05() {
		super();
		setProcess();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Ch07_Exam05[] op = new Ch07_Exam05[2];
		for (int i = 0; i < op.length; i++) {
			op[i] = new Ch07_Exam05();
		}
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		float dis = 0.0f;

		System.out.println("«“¿Œ¿≤ : ");
		dis = sc.nextFloat();
		Ch07_Exam05.setDiscount(dis);

		System.out.println("[∆«∏≈∞°]");
		for (int k = 0; k < op.length; k++) {
			op[k].getDisplay();
		}
		System.out.println("∆«∏≈∞«ºˆ : " + cnt);
	}
}





1141     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\ch7\q5\Sales.java

package play.data.ch7.q5;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Sales {
	protected String article;
	protected int qty;
	protected int cost ;
	protected static int cnt ;
	protected static float discount ;
	protected Scanner sc;
	
	public Sales() {
		sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("«∞∏Ò");
		article = sc.next();
		System.out.println("ºˆ∑Æ");
		qty = sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("¥‹∞°");
		cost = sc.nextInt();
		cnt += qty;
		}

}

public class Car {

	public int account;

		this.account = account;
	}

	public String getColor() {
		return color;
	}

	public int getAccount() {
		return account;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "[ªˆªÛ]" + color + "\t [ª˝ªÍºˆ∑Æ]" + account + "\t";
	}

}

1146     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\com\chap07\C02_BZ.java

package com.chap07;

public class C02_BZ extends C01_AZ {
	private int b;

	public C02_BZ() {
	}

	public C02_BZ(int b) {
		super();
		this.b = b;
	}
	
	public C02_BZ (int a, int b)	{
		super (a);
		this.b=b ;
	}

	public int getB() {
		return b;
	}

	public void setB(int b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
	
	public int getHap() {
		int Hap = getA() + getB() ;
		return Hap;
	}
}





1147     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\07_Inheritance\src\com\chap07\C03_FZ.java

package com.chap07;

public class C03_FZ extends C02_BZ{

	private int f ;
	
	public C03_FZ() {}
	public C03_FZ(int f) {
		super();
		this.f=f;
	}
	public C03_FZ (int a , int b , int f) {
		super(a,b);
		this.f=f ;
	}
	
	public int getRes () {
		int r = getHap() - getF();
		return r;
	}
	public int getF() {
		return f;
	}
	public void setF(int f) {
		this.f = f;
	}
	
	
}





1148     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p3\Base.java

package play.data.ch8.p3;
// ¥Ÿ«¸º∫¿« º≠∫Í≈∏¿Ã«Œ º≥∞Ë
public abstract class Base {

	public abstract void Start();

	public abstract void Stop();
}

class Cat extends Base {

	@Override
	public void Start() {
		System.out.println("cat ∞…æ˙¥Ÿ.");
	}

	@Override
	public void Stop() {
		System.out.println("cat ∏ÿ√Ë¥Ÿ.");
	}

}

class Duck extends Base {

	@Override
	public void Start() {
		System.out.println("Duck ∞…æ˙¥Ÿ.");
	}

	@Override
	public void Stop() {
		System.out.println("Duck ∏ÿ√Ë¥Ÿ.");
	}

}

class Puppy extends Base {

	@Override
	public void Start() {
		System.out.println("Puppy ∞…æ˙¥Ÿ.");
	}

	@Override
	public void Stop() {
		System.out.println("Puppy ∏ÿ√Ë¥Ÿ.");
	}

}





1149     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p3\DynamicBind.java

package play.data.ch8.p3;

import java.util.*;

public class DynamicBind {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		System.out.println("input no : [∞≠æ∆¡ˆ 1, æﬂøÀ¿Ã 2, ø¿∏Æ 3, exit et]");
		Base base = null;
		// º±¡∂∏¶ «œ≥™ º±æ
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		while (true) {
			System.out.println("\n Choice no: ");
			int no = sc.nextInt();
			switch (no) {
			case 1:
				base = new Puppy();
				break;
			case 2 :
				base = new Cat();
				break;
			case 3 :
				base = new Duck();
				break;
			default :
				System.exit(0);
			}
			base.Start();
			base.Stop();
			// ø‹∫Œø°º≠¥¬ æÓ∂≤ ∞¥√º∞° »£√‚µ«¥¬¡ˆ ∏∏ß = «‡¿ß ¿∫¥–
		}
	}
}





1150     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p3\StaticBind.java

package play.data.ch8.p3;

//¡§¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘ : ªÛº” ∞¸∞Ë¿« ¥Ÿ«¸º∫¿ª ø¨µø«œ∏Èº≠, »ƒº’≈¨∑°Ω∫ ∞¥√º∏¶ ∞¢∞¢ ª˝º∫«ÿº≠ »ƒº’¿« ¡÷º“π¯¡ˆ∑Œ ¥Î¿‘
import java.util.*;

public class StaticBind {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("input no : [∞≠æ∆¡ˆ 1, æﬂøÀ¿Ã 2, ø¿∏Æ 3, exit et]");
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		while (true) {
			System.out.println("\n Choice no: ");
			int no = sc.nextInt();
			switch (no) {
			case 1:
				Puppy p = new Puppy();
				p.Start();
				p.Stop();
				break;
			case 2:
				Cat c = new Cat();
				c.Start();
				c.Stop();
				break;
			case 3:
				Duck d = new Duck();
				d.Start();
				d.Stop();
				break;
			default:
				System.exit(0);
			}
		}
	}

}





1151     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p4\MShape.java

package play.data.ch8.p4;

import java.util.*;

public class MShape {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		ShapeX sp = null;
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		while (true) {
			System.out.println("\n *** Shape Select \n 1.ªÔ∞¢«¸ , 2.ªÁ∞¢«¸, 3. ¡æ∑·");
			int no = sc.nextInt();
			switch (no) {
			case 1:
				sp = new Triangle(2, 3);
				break;
			case 2:
				sp = new Rectangle(4, 5);
				break;
			case 3:
				System.out.println("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Ÿ");
				System.exit(0);
			}
			if (sp instanceof Triangle) {
				System.out.println("ªÔ∞¢«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã¥¬ : " + sp.getArea());
			} else {
				System.out.println("ªÁ∞¢«¸¿« ≥–¿Ã¥¬ : " + sp.getArea());
			}
		}
	}

}





1152     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p4\Rectangle.java

package play.data.ch8.p4;

public class Rectangle extends ShapeX{

	public Rectangle(int data1, int data2) {
		super(data1, data2);
	}

	@Override
	public double getArea() {
		return (double) (data1 * data2);
	}

 

}





1153     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p4\ShapeX.java

package play.data.ch8.p4;

public abstract class ShapeX {
	protected int data1, data2;

	public ShapeX(int data1, int data2) {
		this.data1 = data1;
		this.data2 = data2;
	};

	public abstract double getArea();

}





1154     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\p4\Triangle.java

package play.data.ch8.p4;

public class Triangle extends ShapeX{

	public Triangle(int data1, int data2) {
		super(data1, data2);
	}

	@Override
	public double getArea() {
		return (double) (data1 * data2)/2;
	}

}





1155     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\q1\Ch08_exam01.java

package play.data.ch8.q1;

public class Ch08_exam01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Circle[] obj = new Circle[] { new Circum(), new Area() };
		System.out.println("π›∞Ê:" + 10 );
		for (Circle res : obj) {
			System.out.println(res.Calc(10));
		}
	}
}

class Circum implements Circle {
	public String Calc(double r) {
		double circum = 2.0 * Math.PI * r;
		return "µ—∑π : " + circum;
	}
}

class Area implements Circle {
	public String Calc(double r) {
		double area = Math.PI * r * r;
		return "≥–¿Ã  : " + area;
	}
}




1156     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\q1\Circle.java

public interface Circle {
String Calc(double d);
}

		Dog dog = new Dog();
		Cat cat = new Cat();

// is-a ∞¸∞Ë 
		Countable[] objs = { dog, cat };

// interface method ªÁøÎ
		objs[0].setCount(10);
		objs[1].setCount(2);

		for (int i = 0; i < objs.length; i++) {
			System.out.println(objs[i].getCount());
		}
	}

}

package play.data.ch8.q5;

public class Airplane extends Plane{

	public Airplane() {
		super();
	}

	public Airplane(String planeName, int fuelSize) {
		super(planeName, fuelSize);
	}

	@Override
	public void flight(int i) {
		setFuelSize(getFuelSize() - ((i/10)*30));
		System.out.println(getPlaneName() + "\t\t" + getFuelSize()+"\n");
	}

}

	}

	@Override
	public void flight(int i) {

package play.data.ch8.q5;

public class Ch08_Exam05 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
Airplane ap = new Airplane("L747", 1000);
Cargoplane cp = new Cargoplane("C40",1000);

System.out.println("Plane FuelSize \n ---------------");
System.out.println(ap.getPlaneName() + "\t\t" + ap.getFuelSize());
System.out.println(cp.getPlaneName() + "\t\t" + cp.getFuelSize()+"\n");

System.out.println("100 øÓ«◊");
System.out.println("Plane FuelSize \n ---------------");
ap.flight(100);
cp.flight(100);

System.out.println("200 ¡÷¿Ø");
System.out.println("Plane FuelSize \n ---------------");
ap.refuel(200);
cp.refuel(200);

	}

}





1171     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\08_Polymorphism\src\ch8\q5\Plane.java

package play.data.ch8.q5;

public abstract class Plane {
	
	private String planeName;
	private int fuelSize;
	
	public Plane() {
		super();
	}
	public Plane(String planeName, int fuelSize) {
		super();
		this.planeName = planeName;
		this.fuelSize = fuelSize;
	}
	public String getPlaneName() {
		return planeName;
	}
	public void setPlaneName(String planeName) {
		this.planeName = planeName;
	}
	public int getFuelSize() {
		return fuelSize;
	}
	public void setFuelSize(int fuelSize) {
		this.fuelSize = fuelSize;
	}
	
	public void refuel(int i) {
		setFuelSize(getFuelSize()+i);
		System.out.println(getPlaneName() + "\t\t" + getFuelSize()+"\n");
	}
	public abstract void flight(int i);

}





1172     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\01_JAVA\SungAutomation\src\com\test\Autofileread.java

package com.test;

import java.io.*;
// directory∏¶ ≈Ωªˆ«ÿº≠, java sourceƒ⁄µÂ∏¶  ±‹æÓø¿¥¬±‚∆Ø«—≥‡ºÆ :) .
public class Autofileread {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		File fi = new File("D:\\");		// æÓµº≠ ¿–¿ª±Ó
		File ff = new File("new.txt");				// æÓµø° æµ±Ó
		FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(ff);
		View(fi, ff, fw);
		fw.close();
		System.out.println(ff.getAbsolutePath()); // æ¥ ∆ƒ¿œ æÓµø° ¿÷¥¬∞Ì
	}

	public static int cnt = 0;
	public static int read = 0;

	// static, class ≥ªø° º±æµ«¥¬ ∞¯øÎ∫Øºˆ¿œ∂ß ªÁøÎ

	public static void View(File fi, File ff, FileWriter fw) throws IOException {
		// directory ≈Ωªˆ¿ª ¿ß«ÿ ¿Á±Õ«‘ºˆ∑Œ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏∞⁄¥Ÿ.

		// System.out.println(++cnt + "======cnt is called   " + fi.getName());
		if (fi.exists() && fi.isDirectory()) {
			for (File str : fi.listFiles()) {
				try {
					if(str.getAbsolutePath().startsWith("D:\\02_ENCORE\\Playdata_0516\\192_168_0_182\\Getting start JAVA")) {
						continue;
					}
					if (str.getName().endsWith(".java") && str.canRead()) {
						
					//	System.out.println(str);
						FileReader fr = new FileReader(str);
						int ch;
						fw.write(read + "     >>>>>    path ");
						fw.write(str.getAbsolutePath());
						fw.write("\n\n");

						while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) {
							fw.write(ch);
						}
						read ++;
						fw.write("\n\n\n\n\n");
						fr.close();
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					e.printStackTrace();
					continue;
				}
				View(str, ff, fw);
			}
		} else {
			return;
		}
	}
}

//		f.setBackground(Color.PINK);

		System.out.println(f.getTitle());
		
		f.add(new Button("≈¨≈¨≈¨≈¨"));
Button bt = new Button("∞¥√ºª˝º∫ button");
bt.setBackground(Color.pink);

1176     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY08\src\com\test\Address.java

package com.test;

public class Address {

	public String name;
	public String Addr;
	public String phone;

	public Address() {

	}

	public Address(String name, String phone) {
		this.name = name;
		this.phone = phone;
		this.Addr = "º≠√ ±∏";
	}

	public Address(String name, String Addr, String phone) {

		this.name = name;
		this.Addr = Addr;
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", Addr=" + Addr + ", phone=" + phone + "]";
	}

	public void prn() {
		System.out.printf("%10s %10s %10s \n", name, Addr, phone);
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}

	public void setAddr(String addr) {
		Addr = addr;
	}

	public void setPhone(String phone) {
		this.phone = phone;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public String getAddr() {
		return Addr;
	}

	public String getPhone() {
		return phone;
	}

	
	
}

// java beans 
public class MTest03 {

	private Test t1;

	public MTest03() {
		t1 = new Test();

		// Test t1 = new Test() ;
	}

	public MTest03(Test t1, Test t2, Test t3) {
		//super();
		this.t1 = t1;
	}

	public Test getT1() {
		return t1;
	}

	public void setT1(Test t1) {
		this.t1 = t1;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		MTest03 m1 = new MTest03();

		System.out.println(m1.getT1());

		Test t2 = new Test();
		t2.setA(100);
		System.out.println(t2.getA());
		m1.setT1(t2);
		System.out.println(m1.getT1().getA());
		m1.getT1().setA(200);
		System.out.println(t2.getA());

		Test r = m1.getT1();
		System.out.println(r);
		System.out.println(r.getA());
		System.out.println(m1.getT1().getA());
	}

}

1183     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY08\src\com\test01\Student.java

package com.test01;
import com.test.Address;
public class Student {
	private int no ;
	private Address address;
	
	public Student (int no, Address address) {
		super() ;
		this.no = no;
		this.address = address;
	}
	
	public Student() {
		super();
	}


	public int getNo() {
		return no;
	}

	public void setNo(int no) {
		this.no = no;
	}

	public Address getAddress() {
		return address;
	}

	public void setAddress(Address address) {
		this.address = address;
	}
	
	public String toString() {
		String str = String.format("no.%5d",this.getNo());
		return str+ this.getAddress();
	}

}

package com.test;

public class MTest01 {

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "≥™¿«¡÷º“¥¬" + super.toString();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		System.out.println("new MTest01() ==> " + new MTest01());
		System.out.println("new MTest01().toString() ==> " + new MTest01().toString());

		MTest01 ma = new MTest01();
		System.out.println("ma ==> " + ma);
		System.out.println("ma.toString ==> " + ma.toString());
		System.out.println("ma.hashCode() ==> " + ma.hashCode());
		System.out.println("ma.getClass() ==> " + ma.getClass());
		System.out.println("ma.getClass().getSimpleName() ==> : " + ma.getClass().getSimpleName());

		MTest01 mb = new MTest01();
		System.out.println("mb.equals(ma) ==> " + mb.equals(ma));
	}
}

1186     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY09\src\com\test\MTest022.java

package com.test;
// ¡÷º“∫Ò±≥

class U_Class01 {
	String N_Name;

	public U_Class01() {

	}

	public U_Class01(String N_Name) {
		this.N_Name = N_Name;
	}

	@Override
	public int hashCode() {
		final int prime = 31;
		int result = 1;
		result = prime * result + ((N_Name == null) ? 0 : N_Name.hashCode());
		return result;
	}

	@Override
	public boolean equals(Object obj) {
		U_Class01 res = (U_Class01) obj;
		if (this.N_Name.equals(res.N_Name)) {
			return true;
		}
		return false;

		/*
		 * if (this == obj) return true; if (obj == null) return false; if (getClass()
		 * != obj.getClass()) return false;
		 * 
		 * U_Class01 other = (U_Class01) obj; if (N_Name == null) { if (other.N_Name !=
		 * null) return false; } else if (!N_Name.equals(other.N_Name)) return false;
		 * return true;
		 */
	}

}

public class MTest022 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		U_Class01 u1 = new U_Class01("ππæﬂππæﬂ");
		U_Class01 u2 = new U_Class01("ππæﬂππæﬂ");

		System.out.println("u1: " + u1);
		System.out.println("u2: " + u2);
		System.out.println("u1.toString(): " + u1.toString());
		System.out.println("u2.toString(): " + u2.toString());
		System.out.println(u1.N_Name + ":" + u2.N_Name);
		System.out.println("¡÷º“∫Ò±≥ : " + (u1 == u2));
		System.out.println("∞™∫Ò±≥ : " + u1.equals(u2));
		
		System.out.println("πÆ¿⁄ø≠∫Ò±≥ :\"æ»≥Á«œººø‰\".equals(\"æ»≥Á«œΩ ¥œ±Ó\") ==> "+"æ»≥Á«œººø‰".equals("æ»≥Á«œΩ ¥œ±Ó"));
		System.out.println("πÆ¿⁄ø≠∫Ò±≥: \"æ»≥Á«œººø‰\".equals(\"æ»≥Á«œººø‰\") ==> "+"æ»≥Á«œººø‰".equals("æ»≥Á«œººø‰"));

	}
}

		System.out.println("AA Constructor");
	}

		public BB() {
			super(100);
			System.out.println("BB Constructor");
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		BZ b1 = new BZ();
		AZ a1 = new BZ();
//		BZ b2 = new AZ () ; // Type mismatch: cannot convert from AZ to BZ
		AZ a2 = (AZ) new BZ();

		System.out.println(b1 instanceof BZ);
		System.out.println(b1 instanceof AZ);
		System.out.println(b1 instanceof Object);
	//	System.out.println(b1 instanceof Integer);
		
		
	}

package com.test;

public class MTest04 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		BZ b1 = new BZ();
		b1.setA(100);
		b1.setB(50);

		System.out.println("a= " + b1.getA() + " b= " + b1.getB());
		System.out.println("Hap= " + b1.getHap());
		System.out.println();
		
		BZ b2 = new BZ(200, 300);
		System.out.println("a= " + b2.getA() + " b= " + b2.getB());
		System.out.println("Hap= " + b2.getHap());
		System.out.println();
		
		FZ f1 = new FZ(200,300,60);
		System.out.println("a= " + f1.getA() + " b= " + f1.getB()+ " f= "+f1.getF());
		System.out.println("a+b-f: "+ f1.getRes());
		
		
		
	}
}





1189     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY09\src\com\test02\DZ.java

package com.test02;

import com.test.AZ;

public class DZ extends AZ {

	private int d;

	public DZ() {
	}

	public DZ(int d) {
		this.d = d;
	}

	public int getD() {
		return d;
	}

	public void setD(int d) {
		this.d = d;
	}

	public int getRes() {

		return getA()^getD();
	}
	
	public int getRes01() {
		int i , j ;
		for(i = 1, j =0; j <getD(); j++) {
			i = i*getA() ;
		}
		return i;
	}

}

public class MTest01 {

		d1.setD(3);
		System.out.println(d1.getA()+" ^ "+
				+d1.getD()+":"+d1.getRes());
		System.out.println(d1.getA()+" ^ "+
				+d1.getD()+":"+d1.getRes01());
	}

}





1191     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY09\src\com\test03\MTest01.java

package com.test03;

class ATest {

	public void prn() {
System.out.println("A prn");
	}
}

class BTest extends ATest {
	
	public static void disp() {
System.out.println("B disp");
	}

	public void prn() {
	//	super.prn();
		System.out.println("B prn");
	}
}

public class MTest01 {
	

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		BTest b1 = new BTest();
		System.out.println("b1.prn(); ==> ");
		b1.prn();
	//	super.prn();
	

		ATest a1 = new ATest();
System.out.println("a1.prn(); ==> ");
		a1.prn();
		

		ATest a2 = new BTest();
		System.out.println("a2.prn(); ==> ");
		a2.prn();
		System.out.println("((BTest) a2).prn(); ==> ");
		((BTest) a2).prn();
		// a2.disp();
		System.out.println("((BTest) a2).disp(); ==> ");
		((BTest) a2).disp();

		System.out.println("b1.prn(); ==> ");
		b1.prn();
		System.out.println("b1.disp(); ==> ");
		b1.disp();
	}
}

package com.test;
import java.awt.Button;
import java.awt.FlowLayout;
import java.awt.Frame;
public class MTest01 extends Frame{
	Button button1, button2, button3 ;

	public void init() {
  button1 = new Button("ok");
  button2 = new Button("Open");
  button3 = new Button("Close");
 
  add(button1);
  add(button2);
  add(button3);
 setLayout(new FlowLayout());
 setSize(200,200);
 setVisible(true);
		 }

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		MTest01 a1 = new MTest01();
		a1.init();
				System.out.println(a1.getLayout());
	}
	
	
}

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;

public class MTest02 extends Frame {

	Panel p1, p2, p3;

	public MTest02() {
		super("≥ª∞° ∏∏µÁ «¡∑π¿”");
		 p1 = new Panel();
		 p2 = new Panel();
		 p3 = new Panel();

	}

	public void Fr() {
		p1.setBackground(Color.BLUE);
		p2.setBackground(Color.RED);
		p3.setBackground(Color.gray);

		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(1, 3));
		setSize(2000, 200);
		setVisible(true);

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		new MTest02().Fr();

	}
}

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;

public class MTest03 extends Frame {
// Panel
	Panel p1, p2, p3;
// Label
	Label lb1, lb2, lb3;
// TextField
	TextField tf1, tf2, tf3;

	// Button
	Button bt1, bt2;
// TextArea
	TextArea ta1;

	public void FCR() {
		p1 = new Panel();
		p2 = new Panel();
		p3 = new Panel();

		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		lb1 = new Label("¿Ã∏ß");
		lb2 = new Label("¡÷º“");
		lb3 = new Label("¿¸»≠π¯»£");

		tf1 = new TextField("¿Ã∏ß¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 10);
		tf2 = new TextField("¡÷º“∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 50);
		tf3 = new TextField("¿¸»≠π¯»£∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 20);
		p1.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2));
		p1.add(lb1);
		p1.add(tf1);
		p1.add(lb2);
		p1.add(tf2);
		p1.add(lb3);
		p1.add(tf3);

		bt1 = new Button("»Æ¿Œ");
		bt2 = new Button("√Îº“");

		p2.add(bt1);
		p2.add(bt2);

		ta1 = new TextArea("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Ÿ :) ");
		p3.add(ta1);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 1));
		setSize(2000, 1000);
		setVisible(true);
		p2.setBackground(Color.pink);
		setFont(new Font("µ∏øÚ", Font.BOLD, 25));
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest03().FCR();
	}
}

package com.test;
// javax.swing¿ª ¿ÃøÎ«œø© ¡ª ¥ı ªÍ∂Ê«— ∑π¿Ãæ∆øÙ
import java.awt.*;

import javax.swing.*;

public class MTest031 extends JFrame {
// Panel
	JPanel p1, p2, p3;
// Label
	JLabel lb1, lb2, lb3;
// TextField
	JTextField tf1, tf2, tf3;

	// Button
	JButton bt1, bt2;
// TextArea
	JTextArea ta1;

	public void FCR() {
		
		p1 = new JPanel();
		p2 = new JPanel();
		p3 = new JPanel();

		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		lb1 = new JLabel("¿Ã∏ß");
		lb2 = new JLabel("¡÷º“");
		lb3 = new JLabel("¿¸»≠π¯»£");

		tf1 = new JTextField("¿Ã∏ß¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 10);
		tf2 = new JTextField("¡÷º“∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 50);
		tf3 = new JTextField("¿¸»≠π¯»£∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 20);
		p1.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2));
		p1.add(lb1);
		p1.add(tf1);
		p1.add(lb2);
		p1.add(tf2);
		p1.add(lb3);
		p1.add(tf3);

		bt1 = new JButton("»Æ¿Œ");
		bt2 = new JButton("√Îº“");

		p2.add(bt1);
		p2.add(bt2);

		ta1 = new JTextArea("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Ÿ :) ",5,100);
		p3.add(ta1);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 1));
		setSize(2000, 1000);
		setVisible(true);
		p2.setBackground(Color.pink);
		setFont(new Font("µ∏øÚ", Font.BOLD, 25));
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest031().FCR();
	}
}





1198     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY10\src\com\test\MTest04.java

package com.test;
import java.awt.*;
public class MTest04 extends Frame{

	Panel p1 ;
	TextField A,B,Res;
	List Mcalc;
	Button ok;

	public MTest04() {
		super("Calculation");
		p1 = new Panel() ;
		A = new TextField(10) ;
		B = new TextField(10);
		Res = new TextField(15) ;
		ok = new Button("=");

		Mcalc = new List(4,false);
		Mcalc.add("+");
		Mcalc.add("-");
		Mcalc.add("*");
		Mcalc.add("/");

	
	}
	
	public void go() {
		add(p1);
		p1.add(A);
		p1.add(Mcalc);

		p1.add(B);
		p1.add(ok);
		p1.add(Res);
		
		setSize(700,200);
		setLayout(new GridLayout(1,1));
		setVisible(true);
p1.setBackground(Color.pink);
}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest04().go();
	}
}





1199     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test\MTest01.java

package com.test;

public class MTest01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		char ch = 'A';
		boolean tf = Character.isUpperCase(ch);
		System.out.println(ch+" is upper case? : "+tf);
		
		tf = Character.isDigit(ch);
		System.out.println(ch+" is numeric? : "+tf);
		System.out.println(ch+" is numeric? : "+tf + "\t" + Character.getType(ch));
		
		char ch01 = Character.toLowerCase(ch);
		System.out.println("To LOWER : "+ch01);
		
		String str = " a value of type int representing the character's general category.";
System.out.println(str.toUpperCase());		
	}
}





1200     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test\MTest02.java

package com.test;

abstract class AA {
	public abstract void prn();
}

class BB extends AA {

	@Override
	public void prn() {
		System.out.println("BB Prn");
	}

}

class DD extends AA {

	@Override
	public void prn() {
		System.out.println("DD Prn");
	}

}

public class MTest02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("¿Ã∑±πÊπ˝µµ ¿÷∞Ì");
	//	System.out.println(new AA());
		System.out.println(new BB());
		new BB().prn();
		System.out.println(new DD());
		new DD().prn();
		System.out.println("¡§¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘");
		BB b1 = new BB() ;
		b1.prn();
		
		DD d1 = new DD();
		d1.prn();
		System.out.println();
		System.out.println("µø¿˚πŸ¿Œµ˘");

		AA a1 = new BB() ;
		a1.prn();
		
		a1 = new DD () ;
		a1.prn();
		
		a1 = new BB () ;
		a1.prn();
	}
}

1202     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test\My_Sub.java

package com.test;



public class My_Sub extends U_Super {

	private int age;

	public My_Sub() {
		super();
	}

	public My_Sub(String name, int age) {
		super(name);
		this.age = age;
	}

	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}

	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	@Override
	public void Prn() {
		System.out.println("name : " + getName() + "  age: " + age);

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		U_Super u1 = new My_Sub("π⁄º∫æ∆¥‘",30);
		u1.Prn();
		u1.setName("º∫æ∆º∫æ∆");
		u1.Prn();

		System.out.println(u1 instanceof U_Super);
		System.out.println(u1 instanceof My_Sub);
		
		((My_Sub) u1).setAge(25);
		u1.Prn();
	}
}





1203     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test\U_Super.java

package com.test;

public abstract class U_Super {
	private String name ;

	public U_Super() {
		super();
	}

	public U_Super(String name) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	
	public abstract void Prn() ;

}

			}

1207     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test03\ALLNEW.java

package com.test03;

import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
import java.awt.event.WindowListener;
import java.awt.*;

public class ALLNEW extends Frame {

	public ALLNEW() {
		super("AA or BB");
	}

	class AA implements WindowListener {

		@Override
		public void windowActivated(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowActivated");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowClosed(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowClosed");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowClosing");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowDeactivated(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowDeactivated");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowDeiconified(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowDeiconified");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowIconified(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowIconified");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowOpened(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("AA - windowOpened");
		}
	}

	class BB implements WindowListener {

		@Override
		public void windowActivated(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowActivated");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowClosed(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowClosed");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowClosing");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowDeactivated(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowDeactivated");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowDeiconified(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowDeiconified");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowIconified(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowIconified");
		}

		@Override
		public void windowOpened(WindowEvent e) {
			System.out.println("BB - windowOpened");
		}

	}

	public void go() {
		addWindowListener(new AA());
		setSize(200, 200);
		setVisible(true);
	}

	public void GO() {
		addWindowListener(new BB());
		setSize(200, 200);
		setVisible(true);

	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new ALLNEW().go();
		new ALLNEW().GO();
	}
}





1208     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test03\Myclass.java

package com.test03;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
import java.awt.event.WindowListener;

//event ªÛº”πﬁ¥¬ class∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
//1. √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫ , 2. ¿Œ≈Õ∆‰¿ÃΩ∫ ±∏«ˆ 3. ¿Ã≥ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∑Œ Override 4. ¡˜¡¢ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ªÛº”


public class Myclass extends Frame implements WindowListener{
public Myclass() {
	super("¿Ã∫•∆Æø¨Ω¿");
}

public void go () {
	addWindowListener(this);
	setSize(200,200);
	setVisible(true);
	 
}

@Override
public void windowActivated(WindowEvent e) {
System.out.println("windowActivated");
}

@Override
public void windowClosed(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowClosed");
	
}

@Override
public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowClosing");
	
}

@Override
public void windowDeactivated(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowDeactivated");
	
}

@Override
public void windowDeiconified(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowDeiconified");

}

@Override
public void windowIconified(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowIconified");
	
}

@Override
public void windowOpened(WindowEvent e) {
	System.out.println("windowOpened");
	
}
	

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new Myclass().go();
}
	
}





1209     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY11\src\com\test03\Myclass02.java

package com.test03;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;;
//event ªÛº”πﬁ¥¬ class∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄.
//1. √ﬂªÛ≈¨∑°Ω∫ , 2. ¿Œ≈Õ∆‰¿ÃΩ∫ ±∏«ˆ 3. ¿Ã≥ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∑Œ Override 4. ¡˜¡¢ ≈¨∑°Ω∫ ªÛº”
// ¿Ã≥ ≈¨∑°Ω∫∑Œ Override
public class Myclass02 extends Frame {
	public Myclass02 () {
		super("¿Ã∫•∆Æø¨Ω¿!");
	}

	public void go() {
		addWindowListener( new WindowAdapter() {
			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				System.exit(0);	}
		});
		setSize(500,200);
		setVisible(true);
	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new Myclass02().go();
	}
}

1211     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test\MTest02.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;
import java.awt.Frame;


// abstract class & interface
public class MTest02 extends Frame {

	Button bt;

	public MTest02() {
		super("InterfaceøÕ Abstract class¿« ø¨Ω¿");
		bt = new Button("≈¨∏Ø");
	}

	public void go() {
		add(bt);
		bt.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {

			@Override
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				System.out.println("πˆ∆∞¿ª ≈¨∏Ø«ﬂ¥Ÿ∞Ì «’¥œ¥Ÿ.");
				System.out.println(" e.getActionCommand() : "+e.getActionCommand());
				System.out.println("e.getWhen(): "+e.getWhen());
				System.out.println("e.getID(): "+e.getID());
				System.out.println("e.getSource(): "+e.getSource());

				System.out.println();
				Button res = (Button) e.getSource();
				System.out.println("≥ª∞°º±≈√«—πˆ∆∞¿«¡§∫∏");
				System.out.println("e.getSource().getActionCommand() : "+res.getActionCommand());
				System.out.println("e.getSource().getLabel(): "+res.getLabel());
				System.out.println("e.getSource().getName(): "+res.getName());
				System.out.println("e.getSource().getX()&getY(): "+res.getX() + "," + res.getY());
				System.out.println("e.getSource().getSize(): "+res.getSize());

			}

		});// ActionListener¿« ¡÷º“∏¶ πﬁæ“¥Ÿ∞Ì ª˝∞¢.

		addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {
			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				//super.windowClosing(e);
				System.exit(0);
				}
			
		});
		
		setSize(500,200);
		setVisible(true);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest02().go();
	}
}





1212     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test\MTest03.java

package com.test;
// ¥Ÿ«¸º∫ ø¨Ω¿

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class MTest03 extends Frame implements ActionListener{

	Button bt01, bt02;
	Panel p1 ;
	
	public MTest03() {
		super("¥Ÿ«¸º∫ø¨Ω¿");
		bt01 = new Button("+");
		bt02 = new Button("-");
		p1 = new Panel();
	}

	 public void go() {
		 //1. anonymous class
		 //2. ≥ª∞° implement«— interface∏¶ πﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ.
		 bt01.addActionListener(this); 		 
		 bt02.addActionListener(this);
		// this = MTest02¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø°, MTest02ø°º≠ ActionListener ¿Á¡§¿««— Method∞°¡ˆ∞Ì ¿÷æÓæﬂ «‘.

		 p1.add(bt01);
		 p1.add(bt02);
		 add(p1); // Frameø° p1¥ı«œ±‚.
		 setFont(new Font("±√º≠",Font.BOLD,25));
		 
		 addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {

			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				super.windowClosing(e);
				{System.exit(0);}
			}
		 });
		 setSize(500,200);
		 setVisible(true);
	 }
		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
System.out.println(e.getActionCommand()+"∏¶ ¥©∏•¥Ÿ");			
System.out.println("e.getSource()==> "+ e.getSource());			

		}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest03().go();
	}
}






1213     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test\MTest04.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class MTest04 extends Frame {

	Button bt;

	public MTest04() {
		super("¥Ÿ«¸º∫¿«ø¨Ω¿¿Œ∞°π∫∞°");
		bt = new Button("≈¨∏Ø");
	}

	public void go() {
		add(bt);
		bt.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		addWindowListener(new MyEvent());

		setSize(500, 200);
		setVisible(true);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MTest04().go();
	}

	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter implements ActionListener {

		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			System.out.println(e.getSource());
			System.out.println(e.getActionCommand());

		}

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.exit(0);
		}

	}
}

1215     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test\MTest06.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;
// ∏∂øÏΩ∫¿« ¡¬«•∏¶ «•Ω√«—¥Ÿ
public class MTest06 extends Frame {

	Panel p1, p2;
	Label lbx, lby;
	TextField txtx, txty;

	public MTest06() {
		super("¡¬«•∏¶ æÀ∑¡¡÷¥¬ Frame ª˝º∫");
		p1 = new Panel ();
		p2 = new Panel () ;
		
		lbx = new Label(" X : ");
		lby = new Label(" Y : ");

		txtx = new TextField("0");
		txty = new TextField("0");

	}
public static void main(String[] args) {
	new MTest06().go();
}
	public void go() {

		p2.add(lbx);
		p2.add(txtx);
		p2.add(lby);
		p2.add(txty);
		p2.setBackground(Color.GREEN);
		
		p1.addMouseListener(new MyEvent());
		p1.addMouseMotionListener(new MyEvent());
		addWindowListener(new MyEvent());
		
		add(p1, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		add(p2, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
		setSize(500,500);
		setVisible(true);
	}
	
	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener{

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.exit(0);
		}

		@Override
		public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {
			System.out.println("mouseDragged");
			
		}

		@Override
		public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) {
			System.out.println("mouseMoved : "+ e.getSource() );
			System.out.println("X"+e.getX()+" Y:"+e.getY());
			txtx.setText(new Integer(e.getX()).toString());
			txty.setText(String.valueOf(e.getY()));
			
		}

		@Override
		public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
			System.out.println("mouseClicked");
			p1.setBackground(Color.YELLOW);
		}

		@Override
		public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) {
			System.out.println("mouseEntered");
			p1.setBackground(Color.PINK);
		}

		@Override
		public void mouseExited(MouseEvent arg0) {
			System.out.println("mouseExited");
			txtx.setText("0");
			txty.setText("0");
		}

		@Override
		public void mousePressed(MouseEvent arg0) {
			System.out.println("mousePressed");
}

		@Override
		public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent arg0) {
			System.out.println("mouseReleased");
		}

		
	}
}





1216     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test\NewFrame.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.Frame;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class NewFrame extends Frame{
	
	Button bt ;
	TextArea ta ;
	String str ;
	
	public NewFrame() {
		super("NewFrame");
		bt = new Button("≈¨∏Ø");
		ta = new TextArea(20,20); 
	}
	
	public NewFrame(String str) {
		this();
		this.str = str;
	}

	public void go () {
		add(bt, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
		add(ta, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		ta.setText(str);
		setFont(new Font("∞ÌµÒ",Font.BOLD,40));
		addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {

			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				super.windowClosing(e);
				{System.exit(0);}
			}
			
		});
		setSize(500,500);
		setVisible(true);
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new NewFrame("ππ∞°¥Ÿ∏•¡ˆ∏∏£∞⁄¡ˆ∏∏ »Øøµ»Øøµ").go();
	}
}





1217     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test02\MTest01.java

package com.test02;
// ∞ËªÍ±‚∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ∫∏¿⁄
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class MTest01 extends Frame {

	TextField txtA, txtB;
	Choice cho;
	Button bt;
	TextArea res;

	public MTest01() {
		super("∞ËªÍ±‚∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		txtA = new TextField("", 10);
		txtB = new TextField("", 10);
		cho = new Choice();
		cho.add("+");
		cho.add("-");
		cho.add("*");
		cho.add("/");

		bt = new Button("=");
		res = new TextArea(1, 10);
	}
public static void main(String[] args) {
	new MTest01().go();
}
	public void go() {
		setLayout(new FlowLayout());
		setSize(800,200);
		setVisible(true);
		setFont (new Font("∞ÌµÒ",Font.BOLD,25));
		
		add(txtA);
		add(cho);
		add(txtB);
		add(bt);
		add(res);
		
		cho.addItemListener(new MyEvent());
		bt.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		addWindowListener(new MyEvent());
	}
	
	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter implements ItemListener, ActionListener {

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.exit(0);
		}

		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent arg0) {
			
			int a = Integer.parseInt(txtA.getText());
			int b = Integer.parseInt(txtB.getText());
System.out.println(txtA.getText() + cho.getSelectedItem() + txtB.getText());
			if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("+")) {
				String hap = String.valueOf((a+b));
				res.setText(hap);
			}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("-")) {
				String Sub = String.valueOf((a-b));
				res.setText(Sub);
			}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("*")) {
				String Mul = String.valueOf((a*b));
				res.setText(Mul);
			}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("/")) {
				String Div = String.valueOf((a/b));
				res.setText(Div);
			}
			
		}

		@Override
		public void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent arg0) {
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			
		}
		
	}
	
}





1218     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY12\src\com\test02\MTest02.java

package com.test02;
// 
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;
import com.test.Calc;
import com.test.NewFrame;

public class MTest02 extends Frame {

	TextField txtA, txtB;
	List cho;
	Button bt, nbt;
	TextArea res;
	Calc c1 ;

	public MTest02() {
		super("∞ËªÍ±‚∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓ ∫∏∞⁄Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		c1 = new Calc();
		txtA = new TextField("", 10);
		txtB = new TextField("", 10);
		cho = new List();
		cho.add("+");
		cho.add("-");
		cho.add("*");
		cho.add("/");

		bt = new Button("=");
		nbt = new Button("±◊∞˜¿∏∑Œ !");
		res = new TextArea(1, 10);
	}
public static void main(String[] args) {
	new MTest02().go();
}
	public void go() {
		setLayout(new FlowLayout());
		setSize(800,200);
		setVisible(true);
		setFont (new Font("∞ÌµÒ",Font.BOLD,25));
		
		add(txtA);
		add(cho);
		add(txtB);
		add(bt);
		add(res);
		add(nbt);
		
		cho.addItemListener(new MyEvent());
		bt.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		nbt.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		addWindowListener(new MyEvent());
	}
	
	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter implements ItemListener, ActionListener {

		 public void View_bt() {

				int a = Integer.parseInt(txtA.getText());
				int b = Integer.parseInt(txtB.getText());

				if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("+")) {
					String hap = String.valueOf((a+b));
					res.setText(hap);
				}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("-")) {
					String Sub = String.valueOf((a-b));
					res.setText(Sub);
				}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("*")) {
					String Mul = String.valueOf((a*b));
					res.setText(Mul);
				}if (cho.getSelectedItem().equals("/")) {
					String Div = String.valueOf((a/b));
					res.setText(Div);
		 }
		 }
		public void View_nbt() {
			NewFrame nf = new NewFrame(c1.toString());
			nf.go();
			
			c1.setA(Integer.parseInt(txtA.getText()));
			c1.setB(Integer.parseInt(txtB.getText()));
			res.setText(String.valueOf(c1.toString()));


				}
		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.exit(0);
		}

		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			if(e.getActionCommand().equals("=")) {
				View_bt();
			}
			if(e.getActionCommand().equals("±◊∞˜¿∏∑Œ !")) {
				View_nbt();
			}
			}
		@Override
		public void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			
		}
			
		}

		
	}

}





1220     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY13\src\com\test\MyAddress.java

package com.test;

// javax.swing¿ª ¿ÃøÎ«œø© ¡ª ¥ı ªÍ∂Ê«— ∑π¿Ãæ∆øÙ
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
import java.awt.event.KeyListener;
import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;

import javax.swing.*;

public class MyAddress extends JFrame {
// Panel
	JPanel p1, p2, p3;
// Label
	JLabel lb1, lb2, lb3;
// TextField
	JTextField tf1, tf2, tf3;

	// Button
	JButton bt1, bt2;
// TextArea
	JTextArea ta1;

	public MyAddress() {
		super("¡÷º“∑œ");
		p1 = new JPanel();
		p2 = new JPanel();
		p3 = new JPanel();

		lb1 = new JLabel("¿Ã∏ß");
		lb2 = new JLabel("¡÷º“");
		lb3 = new JLabel("¿¸»≠π¯»£");

		tf1 = new JTextField("¿Ã∏ß¿ª ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 10);
		tf2 = new JTextField("¡÷º“∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 50);
		tf3 = new JTextField("¿¸»≠π¯»£∏¶ ≥÷æÓ¡÷ººø‰", 20);

		bt1 = new JButton("»Æ¿Œ");
		bt2 = new JButton("√Îº“");

		ta1 = new JTextArea("∞®ªÁ«’¥œ¥Ÿ :) ", 5, 100);
	}

	public void FCR() {

		add(p1);
		add(p2);
		add(p3);

		p1.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2));
		p1.add(lb1);
		p1.add(tf1);
		p1.add(lb2);
		p1.add(tf2);
		p1.add(lb3);
		p1.add(tf3);

		p2.add(bt1);
		p2.add(bt2);

		p3.add(ta1);

		setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 1));
		setSize(2000, 1000);
		setVisible(true);
		p2.setBackground(Color.pink);
		setFont(new Font("µ∏øÚ", Font.BOLD, 25));

		addWindowListener(new MyEvent());
		bt1.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		bt2.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
		tf1.addKeyListener(new MyEvent());
		tf2.addKeyListener(new MyEvent());
	}

	class MyEvent extends WindowAdapter implements ActionListener, KeyListener {

		@Override
		public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
			System.exit(0);
		}

		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			if (e.getActionCommand().equals("»Æ¿Œ")) {
				String name = tf1.getText();
				String addr = tf2.getText();
				String phone = tf3.getText();
				String str = String.format("%10s %10s %10s\n", name, addr, phone);
				ta1.setText(str);
			}
			if (e.getActionCommand().trim().equals("√Îº“")) {
				tf1.setText(" ");
				tf2.setText(" ");
				tf3.setText(" ");
				ta1.setText(" ");
			}
		}

		@Override
		public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {
			System.out.println(e.getKeyCode());
			if (e.getKeyCode() == 10) {
				System.out.println("ø£≈Õƒ°ºÃæÓø©?");
				tf2.requestFocus();
			}
		}

		@Override
		public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e) {
			System.out.println("keyReleased");}

		@Override
		public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e) {
			System.out.println("keyTyped: " + e.getKeyCode()+e.getKeyChar());
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MyAddress().FCR();
	}
}





1221     >>>>>    path D:\Git_20182019\DAY13\src\com\test\MyFrame.java

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.Frame;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class MyFrame extends Frame {

	Button bt;
	TextArea ta;

	public MyFrame() {
		super("My_Name");
		bt = new Button("≈¨∏Ø");
		ta = new TextArea(20, 20);
		setFont(new Font("∞ÌµÒ", Font.BOLD, 40));
		bt.addActionListener(new MyEvent());
	}

	public void go() {
		add(bt, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
		add(ta, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {

			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				super.windowClosing(e);
				{
					System.exit(0);
				}
			}

		});
		setSize(500, 500);
		setVisible(true);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new MyFrame().go();
	}

	class MyEvent implements ActionListener {

		@Override
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent arg0) {
			String str = ta.getText();
			NewFrame nf = new NewFrame(str);
			nf.go();
		}

	}
}

package com.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.Frame;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class NewFrame extends Frame{
	
	Button bt ;
	TextArea ta ;
	String str ;
	
	public NewFrame() {
		super("NewFrame");
		bt = new Button("≈¨∏Ø");
		ta = new TextArea(20,20); 
	}
	
	public NewFrame(String str) {
		this();
		this.str = str;
	}

	public void go () {
		add(bt, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
		add(ta, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		ta.setText(str);
		setFont(new Font("∞ÌµÒ",Font.BOLD,40));
		addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {

			@Override
			public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
				super.windowClosing(e);
				{System.exit(0);}
			}
			
		});
		setSize(500,500);
		setVisible(true);
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		new NewFrame("ππ∞°¥Ÿ∏•¡ˆ∏∏£∞⁄¡ˆ∏∏ »Øøµ»Øøµ").go();
