package com.test_2000;
import java.util.Scanner;

class BJ_2000 {
	public String solution(String s) {
		String answer = "";
 char[] chAnswer = s.toCharArray();
 String [] ans = null;

 
System.out.println(chAnswer.length); 

 for (int i = 0; i<chAnswer.length ; i++)
 { System.out.println(i);
	 if( i/2 == 0) {  System.out.println(chAnswer[i]); }
 }

		return answer;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
//Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
//new Solution().solution(sc.nextLine());
		
		new BJ_2000().solution("hellow to my self!");
	}
}





1362     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\compathapi\src\com\dart\Dartdetailparser.java

package com.dart;

import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
import org.jsoup.select.Elements;

public class Dartdetailparser {
	public static void detailparser(int cnt) throws IOException {	
		
		for(int i = 1 ;i<cnt+1 ;i++ ) {
			Document doc = null;
			doc = Jsoup.parse(new File("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartsearch\\dartÍ≤??Éâpage"
					+ i +".xml"), "UTF-8");
			
			Elements nos = doc.select("crp_cd");
			for(String st : nos.eachText()) {
				String url = "http://dart.fss.or.kr/api/company.xml?auth="
						+ "c3e9f90c0a5369c038ee7cdf4e717c698c89f303&crp_cd="
						+st;
				
				Document docc = Jsoup.connect(url).get();
				String xml = docc.toString();

				InputStream is = new ByteArrayInputStream(xml.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
				FileOutputStream fos=null;
				try {
					fos = new FileOutputStream("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartdetail\\dart?ÉÅ?Ñ∏" 
							+st+".xml");
				} catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
					// TODO Auto-generated catch block
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
				int r = 0;
				while ((r = is.read()) != -1) {
					fos.write(r);
				}
				is.close();
				fos.close();
				
				
			}
			
			
			
		}
	}
}





1363     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\compathapi\src\com\dart\Dartdetailxml2csv.java

package com.dart;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import org.jsoup.select.Elements;

public class Dartdetailxml2csv {
	
	
	public static String detail2csv(String cnt) throws IOException {
		String sb = "";
		File fi = new File("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartdetail\\dart?ÉÅ?Ñ∏" + cnt + ".xml");
		Document ddoc = null;
		try {
			ddoc = Jsoup.parse(fi, "UTF-8");
		} catch (IOException e1) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e1.printStackTrace();
		}

		/*
		 * <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <result> <err_code> 000 </err_code>
		 * <err_msg> ?†ï?ÉÅ </err_msg> <crp_nm> ?èô?ôî?ïΩ?íà(Ï£?) </crp_nm> <crp_nm_e> DONGWHA
		 * PHARM.CO.,LTD </crp_nm_e> <crp_nm_i> ?èô?ôî?ïΩ?íà </crp_nm_i> <stock_cd> 000020
		 * </stock_cd> <ceo_nm> Î∞ïÍ∏∞?ôò </ceo_nm> <crp_cls> Y </crp_cls> <crp_no>
		 * 1101110043870 </crp_no> <bsn_no> 1108100102 </bsn_no> <adr> ?Ñú?ö∏?äπÎ≥ÑÏãú Ï§ëÍµ¨ ?õÑ?ïîÎ°? 98
		 * 19Ï∏?(?Ç®??Î¨∏Î°ú5Í∞?) </adr> <hm_url> www.dong-wha.co.kr </hm_url> <ir_url></ir_url>
		 * <phn_no> 02-2021-9300 </phn_no> <fax_no> 753-2347 </fax_no> <ind_cd> 21210
		 * </ind_cd> <est_dt> 18970925 </est_dt> <acc_mt> 12 </acc_mt> </result>
		 */
		
		sb += ddoc.select("crp_nm").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("crp_nm_e").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("crp_nm_i").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("stock_cd").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("ceo_nm").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("crp_cls").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("crp_no").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("bsn_no").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("adr").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("hm_url").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("ir_url").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("phn_no").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("fax_no").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("ind_cd").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("est_dt").text().trim() + ",";
		sb += ddoc.select("acc_mt").text().trim();

		/*System.out.println(sb);*/
		return sb;
	}
	
	public static String detail2csvrep(String cnt) throws IOException {
		Pattern pt 
		= Pattern.compile("[\\&quot;\\&gt;\\&lt;\\&amp;\\=\\<\\>\\Ôº?\\/\\,\\\\\"\\.\\?\\!\\#\\%\\^\\&\\*\\[\\]\\{\\}\\|\\t\\n\\;\\:\\+\\-\\`\\~\\(\\)]");
		Pattern urlonly 
		= Pattern.compile("[\\Ôº?\\,]");
		String sb = "";
		File fi = new File("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartdetail\\dart?ÉÅ?Ñ∏" + cnt + ".xml");
		Document ddoc = null;
		try {
			ddoc = Jsoup.parse(fi, "UTF-8");
		} catch (IOException e1) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e1.printStackTrace();
		}

		/*
		 * <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <result> <err_code> 000 </err_code>
		 * <err_msg> ?†ï?ÉÅ </err_msg> <crp_nm> ?èô?ôî?ïΩ?íà(Ï£?) </crp_nm> <crp_nm_e> DONGWHA
		 * PHARM.CO.,LTD </crp_nm_e> <crp_nm_i> ?èô?ôî?ïΩ?íà </crp_nm_i> <stock_cd> 000020
		 * </stock_cd> <ceo_nm> Î∞ïÍ∏∞?ôò </ceo_nm> <crp_cls> Y </crp_cls> <crp_no>
		 * 1101110043870 </crp_no> <bsn_no> 1108100102 </bsn_no> <adr> ?Ñú?ö∏?äπÎ≥ÑÏãú Ï§ëÍµ¨ ?õÑ?ïîÎ°? 98
		 * 19Ï∏?(?Ç®??Î¨∏Î°ú5Í∞?) </adr> <hm_url> www.dong-wha.co.kr </hm_url> <ir_url></ir_url>
		 * <phn_no> 02-2021-9300 </phn_no> <fax_no> 753-2347 </fax_no> <ind_cd> 21210
		 * </ind_cd> <est_dt> 18970925 </est_dt> <acc_mt> 12 </acc_mt> </result>
		 */
		
				/*ddoc.tagName("crp_nm").text();*/
		
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("crp_nm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("crp_nm_e").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("crp_nm_i").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("stock_cd").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("ceo_nm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("crp_cls").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("crp_no").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("bsn_no").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("adr").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("hm_url").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("ir_url").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("phn_no").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("fax_no").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("ind_cd").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("est_dt").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
		sb+=pt.matcher(ddoc.select("acc_mt").text().trim()).replaceAll("");
		/*System.out.println(sb);*/
		return sb;
	}
	

}





1364     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\compathapi\src\com\dart\DartSearchParser.java

package com.dart;

import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.util.Locale;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;

public class DartSearchParser {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		//http://dart.fss.or.kr/api/search.xml?auth=c3e9f90c0a5369c038ee7cdf4e717c698c89f303&page_set=100&page_no=1
		Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(Locale.KOREA);
		SimpleDateFormat sm = new SimpleDateFormat("YYYYMMdd");
		calendar.add(Calendar.MONTH, -2);
	    String strDate = sm.format(calendar.getTime());
		
		
		String url = "http://dart.fss.or.kr/api/search.xml?auth="
				+ "c3e9f90c0a5369c038ee7cdf4e717c698c89f303&page_set=100&"
				+ "start_dt="+strDate
				+ "&dsp_tp=A&page_no=";
		Document doa = Jsoup.connect("http://dart.fss.or.kr/api/search.xml?auth=c3e9f90c0a5369c038ee7cdf4e717c698c89f303&dsp_tp=A&page_set=100"
				+ "&start_dt="+strDate).get();
		String num = doa.select("total_page").text();
		System.out.println(num);
		int cnt = Integer.parseInt(num);
		System.out.println(cnt);
		Document doc = null;
		
		for(int i = 1 ;i<=cnt ;i++ ) {
			String pageurl = url + i;
			try {
				doc = Jsoup.connect(pageurl).get();
			} catch (IOException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			String xml = doc.toString();

			InputStream is = new ByteArrayInputStream(xml.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			FileOutputStream fos=null;
			try {
				fos = new FileOutputStream("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartsearch\\dartÍ≤??Éâpage" 
						+i+".xml");
			} catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			int r = 0;
			while ((r = is.read()) != -1) {
				fos.write(r);
			}
			is.close();
			fos.close();
		}
		
		
		Dartdetailparser.detailparser(cnt);
		

	}
}





1365     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\compathapi\src\com\dart\Dartsearchxml2csv.java

package com.dart;

import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
import org.jsoup.select.Elements;

public class Dartsearchxml2csv {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		Document doc = Jsoup.parse(new File("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\" + "dartsearch\\dartÍ≤??Éâpage1.xml"), "UTF-8");
		String cnt = doc.select("total_page").text();
		Pattern pt 
		= Pattern.compile("[\\&quot;\\&gt;\\&lt;\\&amp;\\=\\<\\>\\Ôº?\\/\\,\\\\\"\\.\\?\\!\\#\\%\\^\\&\\*\\[\\]\\{\\}\\|\\t\\n\\;\\:\\+\\-\\`\\~\\(\\)]");
		
		System.out.println(cnt);
		int num = Integer.parseInt(cnt);
		for (int i = 1; i < num + 1; i++) {
			Document docc = Jsoup.parse(new File("C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\" + "dartsearch\\dartÍ≤??Éâpage" + i + ".xml"),
					"UTF-8");
			String sb = "";
			String fsb = "";
			// csv ?åå?ùº ÎßåÎìú?äî ÏΩîÎìú
			sb += "crp_cls,crp_nm,crp_cd,rpt_nm,rcp_no,flr_nm,rcp_dt,rmk\n";
			fsb += "crp_cls,crp_nm,crp_cd,rpt_nm,rcp_no,flr_nm,rcp_dt,rmk\n";
			Elements e = docc.select("list");
			for (Element eeee : e) {
				sb += eeee.select("crp_cls").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("crp_nm").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("crp_cd").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("rpt_nm").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("rcp_no").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("flr_nm").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("rcp_dt").text().trim() + ",";
				sb += eeee.select("rmk").text() + "\n";
				
				
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("crp_cls").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("crp_nm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("crp_cd").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("rpt_nm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("rcp_no").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("flr_nm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("rcp_dt").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				fsb+=pt.matcher(eeee.select("rmk").text()).replaceAll("") + "\n";
				

			}
			System.out.println(sb);

			InputStream is = new ByteArrayInputStream(sb.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(
					"C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartsearchcsv\\" + "dartsearchdetailpage" + i + ".csv"); // csv
			// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
			int r = 0;
			while ((r = is.read()) != -1) {
				fos.write(r);
			}
			is.close();
			fos.close();
			
			InputStream is2 = new ByteArrayInputStream(fsb.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			FileOutputStream fos2 = new FileOutputStream(
					"C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartsearchcsvrep\\" + "dartsearchdetailpagerep" + i + ".csv"); // csv
			// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
			int rr = 0;
			while ((rr = is2.read()) != -1) {
				fos2.write(rr);
			}
			is2.close();
			fos2.close();
			
			
			String ssb = "";
			String ssbb = "";
			ssb += "crp_nm,crp_nm_e,crp_nm_i,stock_cd,ceo_nm,crp_cls,crp_no,bsn_no,"
					+ "adr,hm_url,ir_url,phn_no,fax_no,ind_cd,est_dt,acc_mt\n";
			ssbb += "crp_nm,crp_nm_e,crp_nm_i,stock_cd,ceo_nm,crp_cls,crp_no,bsn_no,"
					+ "adr,hm_url,ir_url,phn_no,fax_no,ind_cd,est_dt,acc_mt\n";
	
			Elements nos = docc.select("crp_cd");
			for (String st : nos.eachText()) {
				ssb += Dartdetailxml2csv.detail2csv(st)+"\n";
				
				ssbb+=Dartdetailxml2csv.detail2csvrep(st) + "\n";
			}

			InputStream iss = new ByteArrayInputStream(ssb.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			FileOutputStream foss = new FileOutputStream(
					"C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartdetailcsv\\" + "dartdatailcsv" + i + ".csv"); // csv
			// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
			int a = 0;
			while ((a = iss.read()) != -1) {
				foss.write(a);
			}
			iss.close();
			foss.close();
			
			InputStream issr = new ByteArrayInputStream(ssbb.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			FileOutputStream fossr = new FileOutputStream(
					"C:\\Webwork\\compathapi\\dartdetailcsvrep\\" + "dartdatailcsvrep" + i + ".csv"); // csv
			// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
			int ar = 0;
			while ((ar = issr.read()) != -1) {
				fossr.write(ar);
			}
			issr.close();
			fossr.close();

			
			

		}

	}

}

Î™®ÎìàÎ≥? Î™®Ïßë,Í≤ΩÎ†•,, ?†úÏ°∞ÏóÖ Í¥??†® MMPMQMFCM Î™®Îìà Íµ¨Ï∂ï?ö¥?òÅ Í≤ΩÌóò  ?†úÏ°∞ÏóÖ Í¥??†® ABAP Î∞? Í∏∞Ì? ?îÑÎ°úÍ∑∏?û® Í∞úÎ∞ú Í≤ΩÌóò  Ôø?,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,";
		Matcher mm = pt.matcher(sss);
		System.out.println(mm.toMatchResult());
		System.out.println(mm.regionEnd());
		System.out.println(sss.split(",").length);
		System.out.println(ddd.split(",").length);
		System.out.println("Ôº?".equals(","));
		System.out.println("/".equals("/"));
	}
}

		calendar.add(Calendar.MONTH, -2);
	    String strDate = sm.format(calendar.getTime());
	   
	    
	  
	}

	}
}





1369     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\compathapi\src\com\news\Patternsample.java

package com.news;

import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

public class Patternsample {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Pattern pt = Pattern.compile("[\\/\\,\\\"\\.\\?\\!\\#\\%\\^\\&\\*\\[\\]\\{\\}\\|\\\\t\\\\n]");
		Matcher mt = pt.matcher("asdas1@!#!@%!%!@*(^&*(*{}{}[][}[]\n\n\t\t");
		System.out.println(mt.replaceAll(""));
	}
}

package com.worknet;

import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
import org.jsoup.select.Elements;

//3Î≤?. Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏ xml?ùÑ ?ùΩ?ñ¥ Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏csv?? Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏csvrepÎ°? Ï∂úÎ†•?ï¥Ï£ºÎäî ?Å¥?ûò?ä§?ûÖ?ãà?ã§
public class Gongdetailxml2csv {
	public static void detailcsv(int page) throws IOException {
		Document doc = null;
		// &amp \&amp
		/*
		 * \&nbsp; ?? ?? : Í≥µÎ∞±(?ä§?éò?ù¥?ä§ ?ïú Ïπ?)?ùÑ ?ùòÎØ?
		 * 
		 * \&lt; Î∂??ì±?ò∏(<)
		 * 
		 * \&gt; Î∂??ì±?ò∏(>)
		 * 
		 * \&amp; ?ï∞?çº?Éå?ìú(&) Í∏∞Ìò∏
		 * 
		 * \&quot; ?åç?î∞?ò¥?ëú(??)
		 * 
		 * \&#035; sharp(#)
		 * 
		 * \&#039; ?î∞?ò¥?ëú(??)
		 */
		Pattern pt = Pattern.compile(
				"[\\&quot;\\&gt;\\&lt;\\&amp;\\=\\<\\>\\Ôº?\\/\\,\\\"\\.\\?\\!\\#\\%\\^\\&\\*\\[\\]\\{\\}\\|\\t\\n\\;\\:\\+\\-\\`\\~\\(\\)]");
		Pattern urlonly = Pattern.compile("[\\Ôº?\\,]");

			doc = Jsoup.parse(new File("D:\\JAVA_WORK\\compathapi\\recruitsok\\Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?" + page + ".xml"), "UTF-8");
		} catch (IOException e1) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e1.printStackTrace();
		}

				ddoc = Jsoup.parse(fi, "UTF-8");
			} catch (IOException e1) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e1.printStackTrace();
			}

			sb += ddoc.select("empSeqno").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("empWantedTitle").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("empBusiNm").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("coClcdNm").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("empWantedStdt").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("empWantedEndt").text().trim() + ",";

			sb += ddoc.select("empWantedTypeNm").text().trim() + ",";

			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empSeqno").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";

			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empBusiNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("coClcdNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empWantedStdt").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empWantedEndt").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("empWantedHomepg").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("empWantedHomepgDetail").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("regLogImgNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empWantedTypeNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";

			/* Elements selfintroQstCont = ddoc.select("empSelfintroList"); */
			// 4
			int qstcnt = 0;
			System.out.println("ddoc size :  " + ddoc.select("empSelsListInfo").size());
			for (Element QstCon : ddoc.select("empSelsList").select("empSelsListInfo")) {

				if (!QstCon.hasClass("selfintroQstCont")) {
					sb += QstCon.select("selfintroQstCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(QstCon.select("selfintroQstCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
				qstcnt += 1;
				if (qstcnt == 4) {
					System.out.println("full");
					break;

				}

				/*
				 * sb += QstCon.select("selfintroQstCont").text().trim(); fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(QstCon.select("selfintroQstCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") +
				 * ",";
				 */
			}
			if (4 - qstcnt > 0) {
				for (int q = 0; q < 4 - qstcnt; q++) {

					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
			}

			// System.out.println(selslist);
			/* Elements sla = ddoc.select("empSelsListInfo"); */
			int empcnt = 0;
			for (Element list : ddoc.select("empSelsList").select("empSelsListInfo")) {

				/*
				 * sb += list.select("selsNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("selsNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb +=
				 * list.select("selsSchdCont").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("selsSchdCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				 * sb += list.select("selsCont").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("selsCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb +=
				 * list.select("selsMemoCont").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("selsMemoCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				 */
				if (!list.hasClass("selsNm")) {
					sb += list.select("selsNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("selsNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
				if (!list.hasClass("selsSchdCont")) {
					sb += list.select("selsSchdCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("selsSchdCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
				if (!list.hasClass("selsCont")) {
					sb += list.select("selsCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("selsCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
				if (!list.hasClass("selsMemoCont")) {
					sb += list.select("selsMemoCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("selsMemoCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				empcnt += 1;
				if (empcnt == 7) {
					System.out.println("fffull");
					break;
				}
			}
			if (7 - empcnt > 0) {
				for (int i = 0; i < 7 - empcnt; i++) {
					sb += "," + "," + "," + ",";
					fsb += "," + "," + "," + ",";
				}
			}

			/* Elements slb = ddoc.select("empRecrListInfo"); */
			int reccnt = 0;
			for (Element list : ddoc.select("empRecrList").select("empRecrListInfo")) {

				/*
				 * sb += list.select("empRecrNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("empRecrNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb
				 * += list.select("jobCont").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("jobCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb +=
				 * list.select("empWantedCareerNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("empWantedCareerNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") +
				 * ","; sb += list.select("empWantedEduNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("empWantedEduNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				 * sb += list.select("sptCertEtc").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("sptCertEtc").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb
				 * += list.select("recrPsncnt").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("recrPsncnt").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb
				 * += list.select("empRecrMemoCont").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("empRecrMemoCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") +
				 * ","; sb += list.select("workRegionNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("workRegionNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				 */

				if (!list.hasClass("empRecrNm")) {
					sb += list.select("empRecrNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("empRecrNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("jobCont")) {
					sb += list.select("jobCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("jobCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("empWantedCareerNm")) {
					sb += list.select("empWantedCareerNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("empWantedCareerNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("empWantedEduNm")) {
					sb += list.select("empWantedEduNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("empWantedEduNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("sptCertEtc")) {
					sb += list.select("sptCertEtc").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("sptCertEtc").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("recrPsncnt")) {
					sb += list.select("recrPsncnt").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("recrPsncnt").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("empRecrempRecrMemoContNm")) {
					sb += list.select("empRecrMemoCont").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("empRecrMemoCont").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				if (!list.hasClass("workRegionNm")) {
					sb += list.select("workRegionNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("workRegionNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				reccnt += 1;
				if (reccnt == 20) {
					break;
				}

			}
			if (20 - reccnt > 0) {

				for (int j = 0; j < (20 - reccnt); j++) {
					sb += "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + ",";
					fsb += "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + "," + ",";

				}
			}

			/*
			 * Elements slb = ddoc.select("empRecrListInfo"); int reccnt = 0; for (Element
			 * list : slb.select("empRecrListInfo")) {
			 */

			/* Elements slc = ddoc.select("empJobsListInfo"); */
			int jobcnt = 0;
			for (Element list : ddoc.select("empJobsListInfo")) {
				/*
				 * sb += list.select("jobsCd").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("jobsCd").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ","; sb +=
				 * list.select("jobsCdKorNm").text().trim() + ","; fsb +=
				 * pt.matcher(list.select("jobsCdKorNm").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				 */

				if (!list.hasClass("jobsCd")) {
					sb += list.select("jobsCd").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("jobsCd").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}
				if (!list.hasClass("jobsCdKorNm")) {
					sb += list.select("jobsCdKorNm").text() + ",";
					fsb += pt.matcher(list.select("jobsCdKorNm").text()).replaceAll("") + ",";
				} else {
					sb += ",";
					fsb += ",";
				}

				jobcnt += 1;
				if (jobcnt == 5) {
					break;
				}

			}
			if (5 - jobcnt > 0) {
				for (int k = 0; k < 5 - jobcnt; k++) {
					sb += "," + ",";
					fsb += "," + ",";
				}
			}

			sb += ddoc.select("recrCommCont").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("inqryCont").text().trim() + ",";
			sb += ddoc.select("empnEtcCont").text().trim() + "\n";

			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("recrCommCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += urlonly.matcher(ddoc.select("inqryCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + ",";
			fsb += pt.matcher(ddoc.select("empnEtcCont").text().trim()).replaceAll("") + "\n";
			
			//System.out.println(fsb.split("\n")[cc].split(",").length);
			
		}
		String[] ress = fsb.split("\n"); 
		List<String> resl = new ArrayList<>();
		for(String a : ress) {
			resl.add(a);
		}
		
		for(int z=0 ; z < resl.size(); z++ ) {
			if((resl.get(z).split(",").length) < 214) {
				resl.remove(z);
			}
		}
		String res = "";
		for(int x = 0 ;x<resl.size() ;x++ ) {
			res += resl.get(x) + "\n";
			System.out.println(resl.get(x).split(",").length);
		}
		
		InputStream is = new ByteArrayInputStream(sb.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
		FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(
				"D:\\JAVA_WORK\\compathapi\\recruitdetailcsv\\Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏csv" + page + ".csv"); // csv
		// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
		int bt = 0;
		while ((bt = is.read()) != -1) {
			fos.write(bt);
		}
		is.close();
		fos.close();

		InputStream iss = new ByteArrayInputStream(res.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
		FileOutputStream foss = new FileOutputStream(
				"D:\\JAVA_WORK\\compathapi\\recruitdetailcsvrep" + "\\Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏csvrep" + page + ".csv"); // csv
		// FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?.xlxs"); ?óë???åå?ùº
		int btt = 0;
		while ((btt = iss.read()) != -1) {
			foss.write(btt);
		}
		iss.close();
		foss.close();

	}

}

package com.worknet;

import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;

import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;

import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
import org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
import org.jsoup.select.Elements;
//2Î≤?. Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥¥xml?óê ?ì§?ñ¥?ûà?äî empseqnoÎ•? ?ùΩ?ñ¥ Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏ url?óê ?öîÏ≤??ïú?í§ ?åå?ã±?ï¥ recruitdetail?ùò Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏.xmlÎ°? ???û•?ïò?äî ?Å¥?ûò?ä§ ?ûÖ?ãà?ã§
public class Gongdetailxmldownload {
	public static void detailparser(int page) throws IOException {
		Document doc=null;
		try {
			doc = Jsoup.parse(
					new File("D:\\JAVA_WORK\\compathapi\\recruitsok\\Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÜçÎ≥?"+page+".xml"),
					"UTF-8");
		} catch (IOException e1) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e1.printStackTrace();
		}
		Elements e = doc.select("empSeqno");
		for(String r : e.eachText()) {
			String url 
			= "http://openapi.work.go.kr/opi/opi/opia/dhsOpenEmpInfoAPI.do"
					+ "?authKey=WNJSMP271GLDTVNDP06A72VR1HK&returnType=XML"
					+ "&callTp=D&empSeqno="+r;
			Document docc=null;
			try {
				docc = Jsoup.connect(url).get();
			} catch (IOException e1) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e1.printStackTrace();
			}
			String gdetail = docc.toString();
			
			InputStream is //Í∏??ûê Íπ®Ï?Î©? ?ù∏ÏΩîÎî© ?ôï?ù∏
			= new ByteArrayInputStream(gdetail.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
			//Ï∂úÎ†•?úÑÏπ?

			= new FileOutputStream("D:\\JAVA_WORK\\compathapi"
					+ "\\recruitdetail\\Í≥µÏ±Ñ?ÉÅ?Ñ∏" + r + ".xml");
			int bt = 0;
			while((bt=is.read())!=-1) {
				fos.write(bt);
			}
			is.close();
			fos.close();
		}
	}
}

1374     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\Array\DiagonalTraverse.java

package Array;

public class DiagonalTraverse {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Solution s = new Solution();
		int[][] matrix = new int[][] { { 1, 2, 3 },{4,5,6} };
		s.findDiagonalOrder(matrix);
		s.print(matrix);
	}
}

class Solution {
	public int[] findDiagonalOrder(int[][] matrix) {
		if (matrix.length == 0)
			return new int[0];
		int i = 0, j = 0, m = matrix.length, n = matrix[0].length, arr[] = new int[m * n];
		for (int in = 0; in < arr.length; i++) {
			arr[in] = matrix[i][j];
			if ((i + j) % 2 == 0) { // moving up
				if (j == n - 1) {
					i++;
				} else if (i == 0) {
					j++;
				} else {
					i--;
					j++;
				}
			} else { // moving down
				if (i == m - 1) {
					j++;
				} else if (j == 0) {
					i++;
				} else {
					i++;
					j--;
				}
			}
		}
		return arr;
	}

	public void print(int[][] matrix) {
		int[] s = findDiagonalOrder(matrix);
		for (int item : s) {
			System.out.print(item + ",");
		}
	}
}

package Array;

public class FLoop {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int i = 0 ; 
		System.out.println(" <=5 , i++");
		for(i = 0 ; i <=5; i++) {
			System.out.print(i + ",");
		}
		System.out.println("\n i∞™  : " + i);
		System.out.println("\n\n <5 , i++");
		for(i = 0 ; i <5; i++) {
			System.out.print(i + ",");
		}
		System.out.println("\n i∞™  : " + i);
		System.out.println("\n\n <=5 , ++i");
		for(i = 0 ; i <=5; ++i) {
			System.out.print(i + ",");
		}
		System.out.println("\n i∞™  : " + i);
		System.out.println("\n\n <5 , ++i");
		for(i = 0 ; i <5; ++i) {
			System.out.print(i + ",");
		}
		System.out.println("\n i∞™  : " + i);

		System.out.println("\n\n <5 , ++i");
		int j = 0;
		for(i = 0 ; i <10; i++) {
			System.out.print("¿¸" + i + "," + j);
			j++;
			System.out.println("     >>>     »ƒ" + i+","+j);
		}
		System.out.println("\n i∞™  : " + i);

	
	}
}





1376     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\Array\PascalTriangle.java

package Array;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.List;

public class PascalTriangle {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int index = 5;
		SolutionPascal s = new SolutionPascal();
		System.out.println(s.generate(index));

	}

}

class SolutionPascal {
	public List<List<Integer>> generate(int numRows) {
		List<List<Integer>> solution = new ArrayList<List<Integer>>(numRows);
		for (int i = 0; i < numRows; i++) {
			List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<Integer>();
			list.add(0, 1);
			if (i > 0) {
				for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {
					int e = solution.get(i - 1).get(j - 1) + solution.get(i - 1).get(j);
					list.add(j, e);
				}
				list.add(i, 1);
			}
			solution.add(i, list);
		}
		return solution;
	}
}





1377     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\Array\SpiralMatrix.java

package Array;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public class SpiralMatrix {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int[][] matrix = new int[][] { { 7 }, { 9 }, { 6 }, { 5 }, { 4 }, { 3 }, { 2 }, { 1 } };
		SolutionSpiral s = new SolutionSpiral();
		List<Integer> list = s.spiralOrder(matrix);
		System.out.println();
		for (int a : list) {
			System.out.print(a);
		}
		System.out.println();
		System.out.println("size : " + list.size());
	}
}

class SolutionSpiral {

	public List<Integer> spiralOrder(int[][] matrix) {
		if (matrix.length == 0) {
			return new ArrayList<Integer>();
		}
		int m = matrix.length;
		int n = matrix[0].length;
		List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<Integer>();
		int i = 0, j = 0;
		while (i < (m / 2) + 1) {
			for (; j < n - i - 1; j++) { // 1. j++
				list.add(matrix[i][j]);
			}
			for (; i < m - (n - 1 - j) - 1; i++) { // 2. i++
				list.add(matrix[i][j]);
			}
			for (; j > m - 1 - (i) && m != 1; j--) { // 3. j--
				list.add(matrix[i][j]);
			}
			for (; i > j + 1 && n != 1; i--) {// 4. i-- m-1-(j+1)
				list.add(matrix[i][j]);
			}
			if (list.size() >= m * n - 1) {
				if (list.size() == m * n) {
					return list;
				}
				list.add(matrix[i][j]);
				break;
			}
		}
		return list;
	}

}





1378     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\kakao\rectangle.java

package kakao;

public class rectangle {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int[][] v = new int[][] { { 1, 4 }, { 3, 4 }, { 3, 10 } };
		Solution s = new Solution();
		System.out.println(s.solution(v));
	}
}

class Solution {
	public int[] solution(int[][] v) {
		int x, y;

		if (v[0][0] == v[1][0]) {
			x = v[2][0];
		} else if (v[0][0] == v[2][0]) {
			x = v[1][0];
		} else {
			x = v[0][0];
		}

		if (v[0][1] == v[1][1]) {
			y = v[2][1];
		} else if (v[0][1] == v[2][1]) {
			y = v[1][1];
		} else {
			y = v[0][1];
		}

		int[] answer = { x, y };

		System.out.println("x:" + x + "y" + y);

		return answer;
	}
}




1379     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\ArrayPairSum.java

package pointer;

public class ArrayPairSum {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Solution s = new Solution();
		int[] nums = new int[] { 1,4,3,2 };
		System.out.println(s.arrayPairSum(nums));
	}
}

class Solution {
	public int arrayPairSum(int[] nums) {

		int sum = 0;
		quicksort(nums);
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length / 2; i++) {
			sum += Integer.min(nums[i * 2], nums[(i * 2) + 1]);
		}
		return sum;
	}

	public void quicksort(int[] nums) {
		if (nums.length < 2) {
		} else {
			quicksort(nums, 0, nums.length - 1);
		}
	}

	private void quicksort(int[] nums, int start, int end) {
		int part2 = partition(nums, start, end);
		if (start < part2 - 1) {
			quicksort(nums, start, part2 - 1);
		}
		if (part2 < end) {
			quicksort(nums, part2, end);
		}
	}

	private int partition(int[] nums, int start, int end) {
		int pivot = nums[(start + end) / 2];
		while (start <= end) {
			while (nums[start] < pivot)
				start++;
			while (nums[end] > pivot) {
				end--;
			}
			if (start <= end) {
				int tmp = nums[start];
				nums[start] = nums[end];
				nums[end] = tmp;
				start++;
				end--;
			}
		}
		return start;
	}
}





1380     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\ArrayPairSum2.java

package pointer;

public class ArrayPairSum2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Solution1 s = new Solution1 ();
		int[] nums = new int[] { 1,2,3,2};
		System.out.println(s.arrayPairSum(nums));
	}

}

class Solution1 {
    void quickSort(int [] nums, int start, int end) {
if (nums.length <= 2) {} else
	   if (start < end) {
		   int pivot = nums[end];
		   int i = (start -1);
		   for (int j = start ; j <= end-1 ; j++) {
			   if (nums[j] < pivot) { i++;
			   int tmp = nums[i];
			   nums[i] = nums[j];
			   nums[j] = tmp;
			   
			   }
			   int tmp = nums[i+1];
			   nums[i+1] = nums[end];
			   nums[end] = tmp;
		   }
		   
		   quickSort(nums, start, i);
		   quickSort(nums, i+1, end);
		   
	   }
		}
	
	public int arrayPairSum(int[] nums) {
		
		quickSort(nums, 0, nums.length-1);
		
		int sum = 0;
		
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length/2; i++) {
			sum += Integer.min(nums[i * 2], nums[(i * 2) + 1]);
		}
		return sum;
	}
}




1381     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\ArrayPairSum3.java

package pointer;

public class ArrayPairSum3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Solution2 s = new Solution2();
		int[] nums = new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 2 };
		System.out.println(s.arrayPairSum(nums));
	}

}

class Solution2 {
	public int arrayPairSum(int[] nums) {
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length - 1; i++) {
			if (nums[i] > nums[i + 1]) {
				int tmp = nums[i];
				nums[i] = nums[i + 1];
				nums[i + 1] = tmp;
			}
		}

		int sum = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length / 2; i++) {
			sum += Integer.min(nums[i * 2], nums[(i * 2) + 1]);
		}
		return sum;
	}
}




1382     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\FindMaxConsecutiveOnes.java

package pointer;

public class FindMaxConsecutiveOnes {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int[] input = new int[] { 1, 1};
		Solution6 s = new Solution6();
		System.out.println(s.findMaxConsecutiveOnes(input));
		System.out.println();
		System.out.println(s.findMaxConsecutiveOnes2(input));


	}
}

class Solution6 {
	public int findMaxConsecutiveOnes(int[] nums) {
		int max = 0;
		int output = 0;
		for (int num : nums) {
			if (num == 1) {
				output++;
				//System.out.println(output);
			} else {output = 0;}
			if (output > max) {
				max = output;
			}
		}
		return max;
	}
	public int findMaxConsecutiveOnes2 (int[] nums) {
		int max = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length-1 ; i++) {
			int output = 0;
			while (nums[i] == 1 && i <= nums.length-1) {
				output++;
				i ++;
			} 
			max = Math.max( output, max);
		}
		return max;
	}

	

}

package pointer;

public class MinSubArrayLen {

		int[] nums = new int[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };

		Solution7 sol = new Solution7();
		System.out.println(sol.minSubArrayLen2(s, nums));
	}
}

class Solution7 {

	public int minSubArrayLen(int s, int[] nums) { // Time Limit Exceeded
		for (int l = 1; l <= nums.length; l++) {
			System.out.println("Length ∞° : " + l);
			for (int i = 0; i + l <= nums.length; i++) {
				int sum = 0;
				for (int j = i; j < i + l; j++) {
					sum += nums[j];
					System.out.println(j + "π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ " + nums[j] + "¥ı«œ∏È >> " + sum);
				}
				if (sum >= s) {
					return l;
				}
				System.out.println();
			}
		}
		return 0;
	}

	public int minSubArrayLen2(int s, int[] nums) {

		for (int l = 1; l <= nums.length; l++) {
			System.out.println("Length ∞° : " + l);

			int sum = 0;
			while (sum < s) {
				for (int i = 0; i + l <= nums.length - 1;) {
					sum += nums[i];
					System.out.println(i + "π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ " + nums[i] + "¥ı«œ∏È >> " + sum);

					i++;

				}
				return l;
			}
		}
		return 0;

	}

}




1384     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\RemoveElement.java

package pointer;

public class RemoveElement {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int[] nums = new int[] { 2,3,3 };
		int val = 3;

		Solution5 s = new Solution5();
		int len = s.removeElement(nums, val);
		System.out.println(len);
	}

}

class Solution5 {
	public int removeElement(int[] nums, int val) {
		if (nums.length == 0)
			return 0;
		int lenth = nums.length;
		for (int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1; i < nums.length && i < j; i++) {
			System.out.println("i value : " + i + " π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ " + nums[i]);
			if (nums[i] == val) {
				while (nums[j] == val && j > i) {
					System.out.println("nums[j] == val   " + j);
					j--;
				}
				System.out.println("swap >> i value : " + i + " π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ " + nums[i] + "∂˚ " + j + " π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ " + nums[j]);
				int tmp = nums[j];
				nums[j] = nums[i];
				nums[i] = tmp;
				j--;
			}
		}
 for(int num : nums) {
	 System.out.print(num + ", ");
 }
		for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
			if (nums[i] == val) {
				return i;
			}
		}

		return nums.length;

	}
}





1385     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\pointer\TwoSum.java

package pointer;

import java.util.Arrays;

public class TwoSum {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int[] numbers = new int[] { 2,7,11,15 };
		int target = 9;

		Solutiontwo s = new Solutiontwo();

		for (int index : s.twoSum(numbers, target)) {
			System.out.print(index + ",");
		}
	}

}

class Solutiontwo {
	public int[] twoSum(int[] numbers, int target) {
		int[] answer = new int[2];

		for (int i = numbers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
			if (numbers[i] <= target) {
				answer[1] = i + 1;
				System.out.println("index2 : " + answer[1]);
			}
			if (answer[1] > 0) {
				for (int j = 0; j <= numbers.length - 1; j++) {
					if (target - numbers[i] == numbers[j]) {
						System.out.println("answer[1] : " + answer[1] + "  target-numbers : " + (target - numbers[i])
								+ "numbers?" + numbers[j]);
						answer[0] = j + 1;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			if (answer[0] > 0) {
				if (answer[0] > answer[1]) {
					answer[1] = answer[0];
					answer[0] = i + 1;
				}
				break;
			}
		}
		 Arrays.sort(answer);
		


		return answer;

	}
}

1387     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\addBinary.java

package string;

public class addBinary {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		String a = "10", b = "1111111111111111";

		addBinary ad = new addBinary();
		System.out.println(ad.addBinary01(a, b));
		System.out.println(ad.addBinary02(a, b));

	}

	public String addBinary01(String a, String b) {
		int binary = Integer.parseInt(a, 2) + Integer.parseInt(b, 2);
		return Integer.toBinaryString(binary);
	}

	public String addBinary02(String a, String b) {
//		System.out.println(a);
//		System.out.println(b);
		// 1. String >> Char []
		char[] max = (a.length() >= b.length() ? a.toCharArray() : b.toCharArray());
		char[] min = (a.length() < b.length() ? a.toCharArray() : b.toCharArray());
		StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
		int tmp = 0;
		// 2. Char[] >> char >> int
		for (int i = max.length - 1, j = min.length - 1; i >= 0; i--, j--) {

			// System.out.println("i : " + max[i] + " j: " + min[j] + " tmp : "+ tmp);

			// 3. int binary + int binary sum
			int sum = Character.digit(max[i], 2) + Character.digit(min[j], 2) + tmp;
			// System.out.println("sum: " + sum);

			// 4. carry digit (1+1 ¿Ã∏È, 0¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø∞Ê »ƒ, tmp +1)
			if (sum > 1) {
				if (sum == 2) {
					sb.append(0);
					// System.out.println("append 0");

				} else {
					sb.append(1);
					// System.out.println("append 1");
				}
				tmp = 1;
				if (i == 0) {
					sb.append(1);
				}

			} else {
				// System.out.println("append");
				sb.append(sum);
				tmp = 0;
			}

			// 6. String¿∏∑Œ return.

			// System.out.println("48 i : " + i + " j: " + j);
			// System.out.println();
			if (j == 0) { // j ∞° ≥°≥µ¿∏∏È 0¿∏∑Œ √§øÏ±‚
				j++;
				min[0] = '0';
			}

		}

		return sb.reverse().toString();
	}
}





1388     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\longestCommonPrefix.java

package string;

public class longestCommonPrefix {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String[] l = new String[] { "ca","a"};
		SolutionPrefix sp = new SolutionPrefix();
		System.out.println("∞·∞˙  >>    " + sp.longestCommonPrefix(l));

	}

}

class SolutionPrefix {public String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {
    if(strs.length == 0) return "";
	String min = strs[0];
	for (int i = 0; i < strs.length; i++) {
		if (strs[i].length() < min.length()) {
			min = strs[i];
		}
	}
	for (int i = min.length();  i > 0; i--) { // ∏Ó ±€¿⁄∏¶ ∞Àªˆ«“ ∞Õ¿Œ∞°
		for (int j = 0; j <= min.length()-i; j++) { // ∞Àªˆ Ω√¿€¡°
            			int match = 0;

			for (String str : strs) {
				if (!str.contains(min.substring(j, j+i))) {
					continue;
				} else {
					match++;
				}
			}
			if (match == strs.length) {
				return min.substring(j, i);
			}
		}
	}
	return "";
}
}




1389     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\longestCommonPrefix2.java

package string;

public class longestCommonPrefix2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String[] l = new String[] {"flower","flow","flight"};
		SolutionPrefix2 sp = new SolutionPrefix2();
		System.out.println("∞·∞˙  >>    " + sp.longestCommonPrefix(l));

	}

}

class SolutionPrefix2 {
	public String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {
		if (strs.length == 0)
			return "";
		String min = strs[0];
		for(int i =0; i < strs.length;i++) {
			if(strs[i].length()<min.length()) {
				min = strs[i];
			}
			
		}

		for (int i = min.length(); i > 0; i--) { // ∏Ó ±€¿⁄∏¶ ∞Àªˆ«“ ∞Õ¿Œ∞°
				int match = 0;
				for (String str : strs) {
					if (!min.substring(0,i).equals(str.substring(0, i))) {
						continue;
					} else {
						match++;
					}
				}
				if (match == strs.length) {
					return min.substring(0, i);
				}
			}
		return "";
	}
}




1390     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\longestCommonPrefix3.java

package string;

public class longestCommonPrefix3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		String[] l = new String[] {"ca","a" };
		SolutionPrefix3 sp = new SolutionPrefix3();
		System.out.println("∞·∞˙  >>    " + sp.longestCommonPrefix(l));

	}

}

class SolutionPrefix3 {
	public String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {
	    if (strs == null || strs.length == 0) return "";    
	        return longestCommonPrefix(strs, 0 , strs.length - 1);
	}

	private String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs, int l, int r) {
	    if (l == r) {
	        return strs[l];
	    }
	    else {
	        int mid = (l + r)/2;
	        String lcpLeft =   longestCommonPrefix(strs, l , mid);
	        String lcpRight =  longestCommonPrefix(strs, mid + 1,r);
	        return commonPrefix(lcpLeft, lcpRight);
	   }
	}

	String commonPrefix(String left,String right) {
	    int min = Math.min(left.length(), right.length());       
	    for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {
	        if ( left.charAt(i) != right.charAt(i) )
	            return left.substring(0, i);
	    }
	    return left.substring(0, min);
	}
}




1391     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\Practice.java

package string;

public class Practice {
	// "static void main" must be defined in a public class.
	    public static void main(String[] args) {
	        // initialize
	        String s1 = "Hello World";
	        System.out.println("s1 is \"" + s1 + "\"");
	        String s2 = s1;
	        System.out.println("s2 is another reference to s1.");
	        String s3 = new String(s1);
	        System.out.println("s3 is a copy of s1.");
	        // compare using '=='
	        System.out.println("Compared by '==':");
	        // true since string is immutable and s1 is binded to "Hello World"
	        System.out.println("s1 and \"Hello World\": " + (s1 == "Hello World"));
	        // true since s1 and s2 is the reference of the same object
	        System.out.println("s1 and s2: " + (s1 == s2));
	        // false since s3 is refered to another new object
	        System.out.println("s1 and s3: " + (s1 == s3));
	        // compare using 'equals'
	        System.out.println("Compared by 'equals':");
	        System.out.println("s1 and \"Hello World\": " + s1.equals("Hello World"));
	        System.out.println("s1 and s2: " + s1.equals(s2));
	        System.out.println("s1 and s3: " + s1.equals(s3));
	        // compare using 'compareTo'
	        System.out.println("Compared by 'compareTo':");
	        System.out.println("s1 and \"Hello World\": " + (s1.compareTo("Hello World") == 0));
	        System.out.println("s1 and s2: " + (s1.compareTo(s2) == 0));
	        System.out.println("s1 and s3: " + (s1.compareTo(s3) == 0));
	        
System.out.println("\n\n ±◊π€¿« ±‚¥…µÈ ");
	        String s10 = "Hello World";
	        // 1. concatenate
	        s10 += "!";
	        System.out.println(s10);
	        // 2. find
	        System.out.println("The position of first 'o' is: " + s10.indexOf('o'));
	        System.out.println("The position of last 'o' is: " + s10.lastIndexOf('o'));
	        // 3. get substring
	        System.out.println(s10.substring(6, 11));
	        
	        
	    }
	}






1392     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\RegionMatchesDemo.java

package string;

public class RegionMatchesDemo {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
        String searchMe = "Green Eggs and Ham";
        String findMe = "Eggs";
        int searchMeLength = searchMe.length();
        int findMeLength = findMe.length();
        boolean foundIt = false;
        for (int i = 0; 
             i <= (searchMeLength - findMeLength);
             i++) {
        	
//        	regionMatches(int toffset, String other, int ooffset, int len)
           if (searchMe.regionMatches(i, findMe, 0, findMeLength)) {
              foundIt = true;
              System.out.println(searchMe.substring(i, i + findMeLength));
              break;
           }
        }
        if (!foundIt)
            System.out.println("No match found.");
    }
}





1393     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\string\ReverseString.java

package string;

public class ReverseString {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		char[] s = new char[] { 'h', 'e', 'l', 'l', 'o' };
		Solution solution = new Solution();
		solution.reverseString(s);
	}
}

class Solution {
	public void reverseString(char[] s) {
		for (int i = 0; i < (s.length + 1) / 2; i++) {
			char tmp = s[i];
			s[i] = s[s.length - 1 - i];
			s[s.length - 1-i] = tmp;
		}

		for (int i = 0; i < s.length; i++) {
			System.out.println(s[i]);
		}
	}
}

1395     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\ContainsDuplicate.java

package topQ.array;

public class ContainsDuplicate {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		solution04 s = new solution04();
		int[] nums = { 1, 1 };
		System.out.println(s.containsDuplicate(nums));
	}

}

class solution04 {
	public boolean containsDuplicate(int[] nums) {

		for (int i = 0; i <= nums.length - 2; i++) {
			for (int j = i + 1; j <= nums.length - 1; j++) {
				// System.out.print(nums[i] + "&" + nums[j] + "\n");
				if (nums[i] == nums[j]) {
					return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
}




1396     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\IntersectTwoArray.java

package topQ.array;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;

public class IntersectTwoArray {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Solution06 s = new Solution06();

		int[] nums1 = { 4, 9, 5 };
		int[] nums2 = { 9, 4, 9, 8, 4 };

		int[] res = s.intersect(nums1, nums2);
		
		 for( int re : res) {
			 System.out.print(re + ", ");
		 }
	}
}

class Solution06 {

	public int[] intersect(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {

		Arrays.sort(nums1);
		Arrays.sort(nums2);
		int pnt1 = 0;
		int pnt2 = 0;
		ArrayList<Integer> myList = new ArrayList<Integer>();
		while ((pnt1 < nums1.length) && (pnt2 < nums2.length)) {
			if (nums1[pnt1] < nums2[pnt2]) {
				pnt1++;
			} else {
				if (nums1[pnt1] > nums2[pnt2]) {
					pnt2++;
				} else {
					myList.add(nums1[pnt1]);
					pnt1++;
					pnt2++;
				}
			}
		}
		int[] res = new int[myList.size()];
		for (int i = 0; i < res.length; i++) {
			res[i] = (Integer) myList.get(i);
		}
		return res;
	}

}





1397     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\MaxProfit.java

package topQ.array;

public class MaxProfit {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		solution01 s = new solution01();
		int[] prices = { 7, 1, 5, 3, 6, 4 };
		int price = s.maxProfit(prices);
		System.out.println(price);
	}

}

class solution01 {
    public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
        return calculate(prices, 0);
    }

    public int calculate(int prices[], int s) {
        if (s >= prices.length)
            return 0;
        int max = 0;
        for (int start = s; start < prices.length; start++) {
            int maxprofit = 0;
            for (int i = start + 1; i < prices.length; i++) {
                if (prices[start] < prices[i]) {
                    int profit = calculate(prices, i + 1) + prices[i] - prices[start];
                    if (profit > maxprofit)
                        maxprofit = profit;
                }
            }
            if (maxprofit > max)
                max = maxprofit;
        }
        return max;
    }
}




1398     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\MaxProfit02.java

package topQ.array;

public class MaxProfit02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		solution02 s = new solution02();
		int[] prices = { 7, 1, 5, 3, 6, 4 };
		int price = s.maxProfit(prices);
		System.out.println(price);
	}

}

class solution02 { // Peak Valley Approach
    public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
        int i = 0;
        int valley = prices[0];
        int peak = prices[0];
        int maxprofit = 0;
        while (i < prices.length - 1) {
            while (i < prices.length - 1 && prices[i] >= prices[i + 1])
                i++;
            valley = prices[i];
            while (i < prices.length - 1 && prices[i] <= prices[i + 1])
                i++;
            peak = prices[i];
            maxprofit += peak - valley;
        }
        return maxprofit;
    }
}







1399     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\MoveZero.java

package topQ.array;

public class MoveZero {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Solution07 s = new Solution07();
		int[] nums = { 0, 1, 0, 3, 12 };
		s.moveZeroes(nums);

		for (int re : nums) {
			System.out.print(re + ", ");
		}
	}

}

class Solution07 {

	public void moveZeroes(int[] nums) {
		int i = 0;
		for (int num : nums) {
			if (num != 0) {
				nums[i] = num;
				i++;
			}
		}
		while (i <= nums.length - 1) {
			nums[i] = 0;
			i++;
		}
	}

}




1400     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\RemoveDuplicates.java

package topQ.array;

public class RemoveDuplicates {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		int[] nums = { 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3, 5, 5, 6, 9 };
		Solution s = new Solution();
		int num = s.removeDuplicates(nums);
		System.out.println(num);
	}
}

class Solution {
	public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {
		if (nums.length == 0)
			return 0;
		int i = 0;
		for (int num : nums) {
			System.out.print(num + ",");
		}
		System.out.println();
		for (int j = 0; j < nums.length - 1; j++) {
			if (nums[j] != nums[j + 1]) {
				i++;
				nums[i] = nums[j + 1];
			}
		}

		for (int num : nums) {
			System.out.print(num + ",");
		}
		System.out.println();
		return i + 1;
	}
}




1401     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\RotateArray.java

package topQ.array;

public class RotateArray {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		solution03 s = new solution03();
		int[] nums = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };
		int k = 3;
		s.rotate(nums, k);

		for (int num : nums) {
			System.out.print(num + ", ");
		}
	}

}

class solution03 {
	public void rotate(int[] nums, int k) {
		for (int i = 0; i <= k - 1; i++) {
			int z = nums[nums.length - 1];
			for (int j = nums.length - 1; j > 0; j--) {
				nums[j] = nums[j - 1];
			}
			nums[0] = z;
		}
	}
}





1402     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\SingleNumber.java

package topQ.array;

public class SingleNumber {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		solution05 s = new solution05();
		int[] nums = { 4,1,2,1,2};
		System.out.println();
		System.out.println(s.singleNumber(nums));
	}

}

class solution05 {
	public int singleNumber(int[] nums) {

		for (int i = 0; i <= nums.length - 1; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j <= nums.length - 1; j++) {
				//System.out.print(i +"π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬ "+ nums[i] + "& j :" + j +"π¯¬∞ø° ¿÷¥¬"+ nums[j] + "\n");
				if (i != j && nums[i] == nums[j]) {
					//System.out.println(i);
					//System.out.println("break !");
					break;
				} else if (j == nums.length-1) {
					return nums[i];
				}
			}
		}
		return nums[nums.length - 1];
	}
}




1403     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\Leet\src\topQ\array\TwoSum.java

package topQ.array;

public class TwoSum {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Solution08 s = new Solution08();
		int[] nums = { 2, 7, 11, 15 };
		int target = 9;
		int[] sums = s.twoSum(nums, target);
		for (int sum : sums) {
			System.out.print(sum + ", ");
		}
	}
}

class Solution08 {

	public int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) {

		 int [] res = new int[2];
		for (int i = 0; i <= nums.length - 2; i++) {
			for (int j = i + 1; j <= nums.length - 1; j++) {
				if(nums[i] + nums[j] == target) {
					res[0] = i;
					res[1] = j;
					break;
				}
			}
		}

		return res;

	}

}




1404     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\MyCalc\src\com\test\Calc.java

package com.test;

public class Calc {
	private int a;
	private int b;

	public Calc() {
		super();
	}

	public Calc(int a, int b) {
		super();
		this.a = a;
		this.b = b;
	}

	public void getA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public void getB(int b) {
		this.b = b;
	}

	public void setA(int a) {
		this.a = a;
	}

	public void setB(int a) {
		this.b = b;
	}

	public int getHap() {
		return a + b;
	}

	public int getSub() {
		return a - b;
	}

	public int getMul() {
		return a * b;
	}

	public int getDiv() {
		return a / b;
	}
	
	public String toString() {
	String str01 =	String.format("%5d + %5d = %5d\n", a, b, this.getHap());
	String str02 =	String.format("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", a, b, this.getSub());
	String str03 =	String.format("%5d * %5d = %5d\n", a, b, this.getMul());
	String str04 =	String.format("%5d - %5d = %5d\n", a, b, this.getDiv());
		return str01 + str02 + str03 + str04;
	}
	
}

		fi.renameTo(fi_1);
// f.renameto(new File("c:\\MyTest02\\AA\\a.txt"));
		System.out.println("2. MyTest\\πË±∏∏¶ ªË¡¶");
		File fi02 = new File("c:\\MyTest\\πË±∏");
		fi02.delete();

		System.out.println("3. MyTest\\æﬂ±∏\\≥Û±∏ -> √‡±∏∑Œ ¿Ã∏ß ∫Ø∞Ê");
		File fi03 = new File("c:\\MyTest\\æﬂ±∏\\≥Û±∏");

1408     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test\Mtest04.java

package com.test;

import java.io.*;

public class Mtest04 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// List∏Ò∑œ¿ª ªÏ∆Ï∫∏¥¬µ•, ¥ÎªÛ dir¿Ã∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬∆ƒ¿œ µÓ¿« ∏Ò∑œ

		/*
		 * list() Returns an array of strings naming the files and directories in the
		 * directory denoted by this abstract pathname. listFiles() Returns an array of
		 * abstract pathnames denoting the files in the directory denoted by this
		 * abstract pathname.
		 * 
		 * isDirectory() Tests whether the file denoted by this abstract pathname is a
		 * directory.
		 * 
		 * isFile() Tests whether the file denoted by this abstract pathname is a normal
		 * file.
		 */

		File fi = new File("c:\\Windows\\System32");
		prn(fi);
		prn02(fi);

	}

	public static void prn(File fi) {
		// ¥ÎªÛ¿Ã∞Æ∞Ì¿÷¥¬∞ÕµÈ¿ª πËø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ
//		∏Æ≈œ¿Ã Ω∫∆Æ∏µπËø≠¿Ã¥œ±Ó generic return¿∏∑Œ πﬁæ∆º≠ ∏Ò∑œ¿∏∑Œ 

		System.out.println("list()");
		for (String m_list : fi.list()) {
			System.out.println(m_list);
		}

	}

	public static void prn02(File fi) {
		// public File[] listFiles()
		// list files∂Û¥¬ ∞Õ¿ª ∏Æ≈œ.
		// non static¿Ã∂Ûº≠ fi∞°∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬∞Õ¿Ã, list files ∆ƒ¿œ¿« πËø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈Õπﬁ¥¬¥Ÿ. ?
		// file¿Ã∏ß¿ª æÍ¥¬ ∆ƒ¿œ¿« ∞¥√º∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ¿ª«œ¥œ±Ó, non static¿Œ method∏¶¥Ÿæµºˆ¿÷¥¬∞≈ø°ø‰. ?
		//
//		∆ƒ¿œ¿« πËø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈Õ πﬁ∞⁄¥Ÿ = fi.listFiles()

//	¡¶≥◊∏ØΩ∫∆˜∏¶¿ÃøÎ«œ≥™æø∏Æ≈œπﬁ¿⁄.
		// ¿ßø°∞≈¥¬ ¿Ã∏ß∏∏∏Æ≈œ, æÍ¥¬ file¿« ∞¥√º∑Œ «œ∏È æ∆∏∂ to String ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥œ±Ó ∞Ê∑Œ±Ó¡ˆ ≥™ø√∞Õ.

//	File[] res = fi.listFiles();
//	for(File m_list : res) {
		// System.out.println(m_list); // ¿œπ›¿˚¿Œ ¡÷º“∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬ toString¿Ã ≥™ø√∞Õ

		// toString override µ∆≥™ »Æ¿Œ«ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
		// public String toString()
//		Returns the pathname string of this abstract pathname. This is just the string returned by the getPath() method.
		File[] res = fi.listFiles();
		int fc = 0;
		int dc = 0;
		for (File m_list : res) {
			// System.out.println("getPath(): "+ m_list.getPath());
			// toString = getPath ∞° ∞∞¥Ÿ∞Ì«ﬂ¿›æ∆ø© ?
			// System.out.println("getAbsolutePath(): "+ m_list.getAbsolutePath());
			// System.out.println("getParent(): "+ m_list.getParent());
			// System.out.println("getName(): "+ m_list.getName());

			if (m_list.isFile()) {
				System.out.println("File name : " + m_list);
				fc++;

			} // if
			if (m_list.isDirectory()) {
				System.out.println("Directory name: " + m_list);
				System.out.println();
				dc++;
			} // if

			//
		} // for
		System.out.println("File count :" + fc);
		System.out.println("Dir count: " + dc);

	}// method

}// class





1409     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test\MTest05.java

package com.test;

import java.io.*;

public class MTest05 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		File fi = new File("c:\\MyTest");
		View(fi); // ∆ƒ¿œ¿ª πﬁ¥¬æ÷ // ¿Á±Õ∏ﬁº“µÂ ? ¿Ã∞‘π∫¡ˆ∏∏£∞⁄§µïï¥Ÿ¥„§§ ¿∏«„«Î
	}

	public static int cnt = 0;

	public static void View(File fi) { // ∆ƒ¿œ∞¥√º∏¶ πﬁ¥¬æ÷ -->
///		for (String str : fi.list()) { // fi¿« list∏∏ πÆ¿⁄ø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ, πÿø° dir¥¬ ≈Ωªˆ ∫“∞°. «œ¿ß∞¥√º∏¶ πﬁ¿∏∏È, ≈Ωªˆ«œ¥¬ method∞° ¿÷æ˙¡ˆ. exists.
		// System.out.println(str);
		// }
		// int cnt = 0;// ø©±‚ static¿∏∑Œ º±æ«œ∑¡∏È, ¿¸ø™∫Øºˆ∑Œ ¡‡æﬂ«‘ (pulic static int∑Œ ¡‡æﬂµ ) static¿∫
		// class æ»ø° º±æµ«¥¬ ∞¯øÎ∫Øºˆ
		System.out.println(++cnt + "============= cnt∞° ∏Óπ¯»£√‚µ«≥™" + fi.getName());
		if (fi.exists() && fi != null) {
			for (File str : fi.listFiles()) {
//∆ƒ¿œ¿« πËø≠∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬æ÷¥œ±Ó, 0π¯¡ˆ[æﬂ±∏], 1π¯¡ˆ[πË±∏] - 0π¯¡ˆ æﬂ±∏∏¶ πﬁæ∆º≠ ¥ŸΩ√ ¿⁄±‚¿⁄Ω≈¿ª ∫“∑Ø. ifπÆ  if æﬂ±∏∞° ¡∏¿Á«œ∏È, fi list files æﬂ±∏ πÿø°¿÷¥¬ ≥Û±∏∏¶ for ∑Œ ∏Æ≈œ.  ±◊∑Ø¥Ÿ ≥™¡ﬂø° æ¯¿∏∏È, ∏Æ≈œ = method¡æ∑·(≥Û±∏¬˘¥¯∏ﬁº“µÂ) , ¡æ∑·(æﬂ±∏√£¥¯), ¡æ∑·(mytest)µ«∞Ì≥™º≠ ≥° 
				System.out.println(str);
				View(str); // ≥™¥¬ «ÿ¥Á str¿ª πﬁæ∆º≠ ∞¥√º∏¶ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¥¬æ÷¥œ±Ó, ≥ª∞° ≥™∏¶ ∫Œ∏£¥¬ ¿Á±Õ∞° ∞°¥…. ±◊∑≥, π´«—∑Á«¡∞° µ«±‚ ∂ßπÆø° ifπÆ¿Ã « ø‰

			} // ∆ƒ¿œ¿÷¿∏∏È, depthæ¯æÓº≠ null point exception¿Ã ≥™¥œ±Ó, if, directory∏∏«œ∞ÌΩÕ¿∏∏È ¥ÎªÛdirectory
				// fi∞° null¿Ã æ∆¥“∂ß, ∂Û∞Ì ¡∂∞«¿ª «œ≥™ ¥ı¡‹ or text ∆ƒ¿œ¿ª ¡ˆøˆ∂Û.
		} else {
			return;
		}
	}

}

/*
 * 
 * ¿œπ›¿˚¿∏∑Œ ∆ƒ¿œø¿∏•¬ ∏∂øÏΩ∫µÈæÓ∞°º≠º”º∫µÈæÓ∞°º≠ ≥™ø¿¥¬ ∏µÁ §ø¿œ¡§∫∏∏¶ file class ∏ﬁº“µÂ∑Œ ¥Ÿ ∞Æ∞Ìø√ºˆ¿÷¥Ÿ. getseries,
 * total space, µÓµÓ æ¥¥Ÿ set series, πË∆˜, »∏ø¯∞°¿‘º≥πÆπﬁæ“¿ª∂ß, ¿–±‚∏∏ «ÿ! = setReadonly , or

 * ±◊¥Ÿ¿Ωø° ∏∏∏∏«— file ¿–∞Ìæ≤¥¬∞Õ. - Ω·æﬂ ¿–¥¬¥Ÿ. write ∏’¿˙. Class FileWriter º±¡∂∞°¥©±∏≥ƒ :
 * java.io.OutputStreamWriter char ¥‹¿ß∏È, writer // ª˝º∫¿⁄ : method : ∫ª¿Œ method æ¯æÓº≠

1410     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test\MTest06.java

package com.test;
import java.io.*;
//∆ƒ¿œ ¿‘√‚∑¬¿ª «ÿ∫∏∞⁄∂Â¥œ¥Ÿ.
public class MTest06 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
	File fi = new File("a.txt") ;	// "." : «ˆ¿Á µ∑∫≈‰∏Æø°¥Ÿ∞° ∆ƒ¿œ¿ª ª˝º∫«œø© ±∏ø¨«œ∞⁄¥Ÿ.
	// "." æ¯¿∏∏È, Day21 æ∆∑°ø° ª˝±È¥œ¥Ÿ.
	FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(fi);
	fw.write("æˆ∏∂æˆ∏∂\n");
	fw.write("æ∆∫¸æ∆∫¸ \t");
	fw.write("π⁄¿Œæ∆µ≈¡ˆ \n");

	fw.close();
	
	// ΩË¿∏∏È ¿–¿⁄.
	// FileReader : ∫ª¿Œ Methodæ¯¿Ω - readæ∏.
		/* public int read()
         throws IOException
Reads a single character.
Overrides:
read in class Reader
Returns:
The character read, or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached*/
	FileReader fr = new FileReader(fi); // > ø≠æÓº≠ √ππ¯¬∞ pointerø° ¿ßƒ°.
	int ch ; // int read ¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° int∑Œ πﬁæ∆º≠ ≥™¡ﬂø° «¸∫Ø»Ø¿ª «ÿ¡‹.
	while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) { // stream¿Ã ≥°ø° ¥Í¿∏∏È return¿Ã -1¿Ãπ«∑Œ, ∞™¿Ã -1 µ…∂ß±Ó¡ˆ π›∫ππÆ
		// means, «—±€¿⁄æø ¿–æÓº≠ ∏Æ≈œ«œ¿⁄, æ¯¿∏∏È -1¿ª ∏Æ≈œ. º¯¬˜¡¢±Ÿ, 
		// «—±€¿⁄æø -1¿Ã æ∆¥“∂ß±Ó¡ˆ ¿–æÓº≠ ∏Æ≈œ.
		System.out.print((char)ch); // ch∞° int¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆø° char∑Œ «¸∫Ø»Ø
	}
	fr.close(); // close ¡÷ºÆ√≥∏Æ«ÿπˆ∏Æ∏È, lock ∞…∑¡º≠ exception µ» ªÛ≈¬, read - consoleø° æ»∫∏ø©¡‹. -Transaction.
		// ≥ π´ ¡ﬂø‰«œ¥œ±Ó π›µÂΩ√ ∏ÌΩ√«ÿ¡÷∞ÌΩÕ¿∫∞≈æﬂ. ±◊∑°º≠ try-with resource ±∏πÆ¿ª ¡÷¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
		
	}
}





1411     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test\MTest07.java

package com.test;

import java.io.*;
// Stream¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿–∞ÌΩ·∫∏¿⁄ (BYTE)
public class MTest07 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		File fi = new File("b.doc"); // øˆµÂ¥¬ ¿Œƒ⁄µ˘¿Ã¥ﬁ∂Ûº≠, µ˚∑Œ ¿€æ˜¿ª «ÿ¡‡æﬂ«’¥œ¥Ÿ. - webø°∞°∏È «’¥œ¥Ÿ.
		// java.lang ≈¨∑°Ω∫¿« String, πˆ∏± ∞Õ¿Ã æ¯¥¬ Class String
		// ª˝º∫¿⁄¿« character set . Class Charset - > stream¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»Ø«ÿº≠ charset±Ó¡ˆ ¡‡∂Û.
		// A named mapping between sequences of sixteen-bit Unicode code units and sequences of bytes. This class defines methods for creating decoders and encoders and for retrieving the various names associated with a charset. Instances of this class are immutable. 
		
		try {
			My_Write(fi);
			My_Read(fi);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			System.out.println(e);
		}
	} // main

	public static void My_Write(File fi) throws IOException  {// mainø°º≠ exception √≥∏Æ«œ∂Û∞Ì ¥¯¡¸
		FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(fi); // Unhandled exception type FileNotFoundException
		//FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(fi,true); 
		//FileOutputStream(File file, boolean append) ==> √ﬂ∞°«œ±‚
//		Creates a file output stream to write to the file represented by the specified File object.
		
		
		fos.write(100);// Unhandled exception type IOException
		 // IOExcetion æ∆∑°ø° File not found exception¿Ã ¿÷±‚ ∂ßπÆø° πŸ≤„¡‡µµ ±¶√· 
		for(int i = 65 ; i <=90 ; i++)
		{
			fos.write(i);
		}
		fos.close();
		
	} // M_Wr

	public static void My_Read(File fi) throws IOException {
		
		FileInputStream fr = new FileInputStream(fi); // MTest 06ø° read øÕ ∂»∞∞¿Ω.
		 // Unhandled exception type FileNotFoundException
		int ch ; 
		// Unhandled exception type IOException ==> IOE ∑Œ ¥¯¡¸
		while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) { 
			System.out.print((char)ch);
		}
	} // M_R

}





1412     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test\MTest08.java

package com.test;
// stream(byte) read ( ) write ( ) : String ¥‹¿ß æ»µ .

//char type¿∏∑Œ read«“∂ß, String æ»µ . 
//--> char read( ) = string X
// ≥™¥¬ String¿∏∑Œ ¿–∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿ, ±‚∫ª¿˚¿∏∑Œ ƒƒ«ª≈Õ¥¬ byte¥‹¿ß¿Ã±‚∂ßπÆø° «—±€¿⁄æø
// then, «—±€§∏æø ¿–æÓº≠ ¿”Ω√πÊ(«—±€¿⁄¥¬ -buffer <∫Ÿ¿Ã±‚(ctrl+c,v) «—π¯π€ø° æ»µ , flash¿Ã±‚ ∂ßπÆ>, «—±€¿⁄ ¿ÃªÛ¿∫ clip board) ø° ≥÷æÓ≥ı∞Ì, «œ≥™¿« πÆ¿⁄ø≠¿Ã ∏∏µÈæÓ¡˙∂ß±Ó¡ˆ ≥÷∞Ì, ∏∏µÈæÓ¡ˆ∏È read ()

import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;

// ∆ƒ¿œ∏∏µÈ∞Ì πˆ∆€ø°≥÷∞Ì ±◊¥„ø° ¿–æÓ
//1 ∞¥√º«œ≥™ ∏∏µÈæÓ
//2πˆ∆€¿Œ«≤Ω∫∆Æ∏≤ø°≥÷æÓ//
//3 ∆ƒ¿œ¿Œ«™Ω∫∆Æ∏≤ø°º≠¿–¿∏∏Èµ»¥¡¿˙§”

public class MTest08 {
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
//		æµ∂ß¥¬ String æµºˆ¿÷æÓ (character πËø≠¿÷¿∏¥œ±Ó.) 
		
//ª˝º∫¿⁄ 	BufferedInputStream(InputStream in)  --- > InputStream Class InputStream --- > Subclasses: FileInputStream
	
		
	//	1. ∆ƒ¿œ§∑∏£ ∏∏µÈæÓ		
		File f = new File("a.png") ;
		FileInputStream fi = new FileInputStream(f);
		BufferedInputStream bi = new BufferedInputStream(fi);

//		bi∏¶ ¿–æÓº≠ fod§ƒ æ¥¥Ÿ.
		File res = new File("baby.png");
		FileOutputStream fo = new FileOutputStream(res);
		BufferedOutputStream bfo = new BufferedOutputStream(fo);
		
		int ch = 0;
		while((ch = bi.read()) != -1) {bfo.write(ch);}
		
		bfo.close();
		fo.close();
		bi.close();
		fi.close();
		
		
		
	//	Class BufferedInputStream : String ¿–¥¬ read∞° æ¯¥Ÿ. ±◊∑≥ ¥©∞° ¿÷¿ª∞°. 
	//	 ª˝º∫¿⁄∞° InputStream ,  (system, field, in¿« ∞¥√º∞° inputstream - public static final InputStream in
		//		 The "standard" input stream. This stream is already open and ready to supply input data. Typically this stream corresponds to keyboard input or another input source specified by the host environment or user. ) 
		 // InputStream  ø©±‚ø° system in¿ª æµ ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ¥¬∞≈¡ˆ. 
		// ∆ƒ¿œ¿«§” ¥ÎªÛ¿ª πŸ¿Ã∆Æ ¥‹¿ß∑Œ πˆ∆€∏¶ ªÁøÎ«“∂ß¥¬ BufferedInputStream∏¶ ªÁøÎ.
		// byte¥‹¿ß∑Œ √≥∏Æµ«¥¬ ∞Õ, ¿ÃπÃ¡ˆ, µøøµªÛ, ¿Ωº∫∆ƒ¿œ µÓ  - byte¥¬ ¥ÎªÛ¿Ã µ¸ ¡§«ÿ¡Æ¿÷¿Ω.
		// ¥ÎªÛ¿ª ∆ƒ¿œø°º≠ ¿–æÓº≠ ∆ƒ¿œ∑Œ æ≤∞⁄¥Ÿ.
	//	 Class BufferedReader : String  readLine() : Reads a line of text.
		// §§ 
		
	}

}

package com.test;

import java.io.*;

public class MTest22 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		File fi = new File("C:\\MyTest02");
		if (fi.exists()) {
			System.out.println("±◊∆ƒ¿œ π˙Ω· ¿÷Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		} else {
			fi.mkdir();
			System.out.println("∆ƒ¿œ¿ª ª˝º∫«œø¥Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ.");
		}
		String mydir = "CC";
		My_mkdir(fi, mydir);
		mydir = "DD";
		My_mkdir(fi, mydir); // method∏¶ ∏∏µÈæÓº≠ directory∏¶ ≥—±Ë

	}

	public static void My_mkdir(File f, String str) {
		File fi = new File(f, str);
		fi.mkdir();

	}

}





1414     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\Address.java

package com.test01;

import java.io.Serializable;

public class Address implements Serializable {

	private String name;
	private transient String addr; // π´»ø»≠ (æ»∫∏≥ª∞ÌΩÕ¿ª∂ß)
	private  static String tel;
	
	public Address() {
		super();
	}

	public Address(String name, String addr, String tel) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.addr = addr;
		this.tel = tel;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Address [name=" + name + ", addr=" + addr + ", tel=" + tel + "]";
	}


	
	
}





1415     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\MTest01.java

package com.test01;
// buffered reader ,writer
import java.io.*;
// char∏¶ ¿–∞Ì æ≤¥¬µ•, ¥‹ bufferø° ¥„¥¬ πˆ∆€∏µ¿∏ «ÿ∫∏¿⁄.
// ∆ƒ¿œ∞¥√º, file reader (¿–∞Ì), buffered reader (πˆ∆€∏µ) => ReadLine
// «—±€¿⁄æø ≥÷¿∏∏È, ≤®≥æ∂ß¥¬ πÆ¿⁄ø≠∫∞∑Œ read line.
public class MTest01 {
	
public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
	FileReader fr = new FileReader("b.txt");
	BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr); // String¿∏∑Œ ∏Æ§√§§¿ª «ÿ¡‹.
	String str = null;

//	public String readLine()
//Reads a line of text. A line is considered to be terminated by any one of a line feed ('\n'), a carriage return ('\r'), or a carriage return followed immediately by a linefeed.
	//A String containing the contents of the line, not including any line-termination characters, or null if the end of the stream has been reached
//	BufferedReader(Reader in, int sz) 
	//Creates a buffering character-input stream that uses an input buffer of the specified size.
	// §§ ªÁ¿Ã¡Ó∏¶ æÓ∂ª∞‘ æÀæ∆, 
	while ( (str = br.readLine()) != null) { //readLine¿Ã ¥Ÿ ¿–¿∏∏È null ∏Æ≈œ
		System.out.println(str);
	}
br.close();
fr.close();
}	

}





1416     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\MTest02.java

package com.test01;

import java.io.*;

// Stream¥‹¿ß∑Œ ¿–∞ÌΩ·∫∏¿⁄ (BYTE)
public class MTest02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		File fi = new File("b.txt"); //
		try {
			My_Write(fi);
			My_Read(fi);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			System.out.println(e);
		}
	} // main

	public static void My_Write(File fi) {
		// jdk 7version Try catch∑Œ exception «œ≥™æø ¥Ÿ ¿‚¿ª ∂ß ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ æ¥¥Ÿ.
		// The try-with-resources statement ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement.  Any object that implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, which includes all objects which implement java.io.Closeable, can be used as a resource.
		FileOutputStream fos = null;
		try {
			fos = new FileOutputStream(fi);
			for (int i = 65; i <= 90; i++) {
				fos.write(i);
			}
		} catch (FileNotFoundException f) {

		} catch (IOException i) {

		} finally {

			try {
				fos.close();
			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
	// ø¯∑° π›µÂΩ√ fos.close() ; --< exception¿Ã πﬂòÀ¥œ±Ó, try-catch∏¶ «œ¥¬∞Õ.

	public static void My_Write02(File fi) {
		// jdk 7version

		try (FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(fi)) // æÍ¥¬ πŸ±˘ø° ¿÷¥¬ æ÷¥¬ ¿ŒΩƒ«œ¡ˆ ∏¯«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° æ»ø° ≥÷æÓ¡‹
		// catch ±∏πÆ¿Ã ≥°≥Ø∂ß ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ º“∏Íµ«±‚ ¥ÎπÆ¿Ã ¿⁄µø close. ¿Ã∞‘ ∏≈øÏ ≈©∞‘ ª˝∞¢«—¥‰¥œ¥Ÿ.
		// outer excepiont ¿‚¿ª ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ ≥™¡ﬂø° ∂·¥Ÿ. // exception¿∫ ¥‹¿ß∫∞∑Œ «œ≥™æø √≥∏Æ«ÿæﬂ«œ¥¬µ•, outer √≥∏Æ«ÿπˆ∏Æ∏È
		// æ»ø°¿÷¥¬ exception¿∫ ≥ıƒ• ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		//
		{
			for (int i = 65; i <= 90; i++) {
				try {
					fos.write(i); // inner exception ¿‚¿ª ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ ∏’¿˙ µÂ∞Ì,
				} catch (IOException e) {
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}
		} catch (FileNotFoundException e1) {
			e1.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e1) {
			e1.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	public static void My_Read(File fi)  {

		try (FileInputStream fr = new FileInputStream(fi)) {

			int ch;

			while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) {
				System.out.print((char) ch);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) { // Close∞° æ¯¥¬µ• ? æÓ∂ª∞‘ close∞° µ  ? The try-with-resources statement ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement.
			// https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/exceptions/tryResourceClose.html
		}
	} // M_R

}

import java.io.*;

//The try-with-resources Statement ¿∏«„¿∏«„
public class MTest03 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		File fi = new File("a.txt");
		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(fi)) {
			fw.write("æˆ∏∂æˆ∏∂\n");
			fw.write("æ∆∫¸æ∆∫¸ \t");
			fw.write("π⁄¿Œæ∆µ≈¡ˆ \n");
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}

		try (FileReader fr = new FileReader(fi)) {
			int ch;
			while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) {

				System.out.print((char) ch);
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
		//	fr.close(); // close ¡÷ºÆ√≥∏Æ«ÿπˆ∏Æ∏È, lock ∞…∑¡º≠ exception µ» ªÛ≈¬, read - consoleø° æ»∫∏ø©¡‹. -Transaction.
		// ≥ π´ ¡ﬂø‰«œ¥œ±Ó π›µÂΩ√ ∏ÌΩ√«ÿ¡÷∞ÌΩÕ¿∫∞≈æﬂ. ±◊∑°º≠ try-with resource ±∏πÆ¿ª ¡÷¥¬∞≈æﬂ.
		// «ŸΩ…¿∫ Any object that implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, which includes all
		// objects which implement java.io.Closeable, can be used as a resource.`
	}
}





1418     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\MTest04.java

package com.test01;
import java.io.*;
public class MTest04 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		DataOutputStream dos = new DataOutputStream(new FileOutputStream("e.txt"));
				
//DataOutputStream(OutputStream out) --> Class OutputStream∏¶ ∏≈∞≥¿Œ¿⁄∑Œ æµºˆ¿÷¥Ÿ.
//<Direct Known Subclasses:
//ByteArrayOutputStream, FileOutputStream, FilterOutputStream, ObjectOutputStream, OutputStream, PipedOutputStream>
	
		dos.writeInt(100);
		dos.writeDouble(90.9);
		dos.writeUTF("abc");
		dos.close();
		
		
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("e.txt"));
		System.out.println(dis.readInt());
		System.out.println(dis.readDouble());
		System.out.println(dis.readUTF());
		dis.close();
		
		
	}
}





1419     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\MTest05.java

package com.test01;

// line number Ω√∏Æ¡Ó∏¶ Ω·∫æΩ√¥Ÿ. public class LineNumberReader
// LineNumberReader(Reader in)  ∞¥√º∞° reader
import java.io.*;

public class MTest05 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {

		LineNumberReader r = new LineNumberReader(new FileReader("b.txt"));
		int ch = 0;
//		System.out.print(r.getLineNumber()+"=>");
		//r.setLineNumber(0);
		System.out.printf("%5d).", 1);
		while ((ch = r.read()) != -1) {
		
			if ((char) ch == '\n') {
//A line is considered to be terminated by any one of a line feed ('\n'), a carriage return ('\r'), or a carriage return followed immediately by a linefeed.

				System.out.printf("%5d).\n", r.getLineNumber()+1);
		
			} else {	System.out.print((char) ch);}
			
		}
		r.close();
	}

}





1420     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY21\src\com\test01\MTest06.java

package com.test01;
// object io
import java.io.*;
public class MTest06 {
//	writeObject(Object obj) 
//	Write the specified object to the ObjectOutputStream.
// ∞¥√º read/write«“∂ß, ¡˜∑ƒ»≠ ¿ÿ¡ˆ∏ª∞Õ.
	
	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
		ObjectOutputStream oos = new ObjectOutputStream(new FileOutputStream("data.txt"));
		// Exception in thread "main" java.io.NotSerializableException : java.io. Interface Serializable
		// ¡˜∑ƒ»≠ Ω√≈∞¥Ÿ.(serialize) : file  ==> implements Addressø°º≠ ¡˜∑ƒ»≠
		oos.writeObject(new Address("111","111","111")) ;
		oos.writeObject(new Address("222","222","222")) ;
		oos.writeObject(new Address("333","333","333")) ;
		oos.writeObject(new Address("444","444","444")) ;
		oos.close();

		ObjectInputStream ois = new ObjectInputStream(new FileInputStream("data.txt"));
		System.out.println(ois.readObject());
		System.out.println(ois.readObject());
		System.out.println(ois.readObject());
		System.out.println(ois.readObject());

		ois.close();
	}
	
}

package com.test01;

import java.io.*;

//The try-with-resources Statement ¿∏«„¿∏«„
public class MTest22 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		File fi = new File("b.txt"); //
		try {
			My_Write(fi);
			My_Read(fi);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			System.out.println(e);
		}
	} // main

	public static void My_Write(File fi) {
		// jdk 7version Try catch∑Œ exception «œ≥™æø ¥Ÿ ¿‚¿ª ∂ß ¿Ã∑∏∞‘ æ¥¥Ÿ.
		FileOutputStream fos = null;
		try {
			fos = new FileOutputStream(fi);
			for (int i = 65; i <= 90; i++) {
				fos.write(i);
			}
		} catch (FileNotFoundException f) {

		} catch (IOException i) {

		} finally {

			try {
				fos.close();
			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
	// ø¯∑° π›µÂΩ√ fos.close() ; --< exception¿Ã πﬂòÀ¥œ±Ó, try-catch∏¶ «œ¥¬∞Õ.

	public static void My_Write02(File fi) {
		// jdk 7version

		try (FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(fi)) // æÍ¥¬ πŸ±˘ø° ¿÷¥¬ æ÷¥¬ ¿ŒΩƒ«œ¡ˆ ∏¯«œ±‚ ∂ßπÆø° æ»ø° ≥÷æÓ¡‹
		// catch ±∏πÆ¿Ã ≥°≥Ø∂ß ¿⁄µø¿∏∑Œ º“∏Íµ«±‚ ¥ÎπÆ¿Ã ¿⁄µø close. ¿Ã∞‘ ∏≈øÏ ≈©∞‘ ª˝∞¢«—¥‰¥œ¥Ÿ.
		// outer excepiont ¿‚¿ª ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ ≥™¡ﬂø° ∂·¥Ÿ. // exception¿∫ ¥‹¿ß∫∞∑Œ «œ≥™æø √≥∏Æ«ÿæﬂ«œ¥¬µ•, outer √≥∏Æ«ÿπˆ∏Æ∏È æ»ø°¿÷¥¬ exception¿∫ ≥ıƒ• ºˆ ¿÷¥Ÿ.
		//

					fos.write(i); // inner exception ¿‚¿ª ºˆ ¿÷∞‘ ∏’¿˙ µÂ∞Ì, 
				} catch (IOException e) {
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}} catch (FileNotFoundException e1) {
				e1.printStackTrace();
			} catch (IOException e1) {
				e1.printStackTrace();
			} 
	}

	public static void My_Read(File fi) throws IOException {

		FileInputStream fr = new FileInputStream(fi);

		int ch;

		while ((ch = fr.read()) != -1) {
			System.out.print((char) ch);
		}
	} // M_R

1424     >>>>>    path D:\JAVA_WORK\PLAY\DAY22\src\com\test\MTest02.java

package com.test;
// Class StringTokenizer (java.util.StringTokenizer)
/* public StringTokenizer(String str, String delim)
The characters in the delim argument are the delimiters for separating tokens. Delimiter characters themselves will not be treated as tokens. 

The tokenizer uses the default delimiter set, which is " \t\n\r\f": the space character, the tab character, the newline character, the carriage-return character, and the form-feed character. Delimiter characters themselves will not be treated as tokens.


*/
import java.util.*;
public class MTest02 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		String str = "	public\t static\\t void '\t' main(String[]\"\t\" args) " ;
		StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(str);
		System.out.println(st.countTokens());
		while(st.hasMoreTokens()) {
//			System.out.println(st.nextToken()+ "," + st.countTokens());
			System.out.println(st.nextToken());

		
		}
		
	
	}

}
